1b1: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su rba u0f7fpra b+ha rba tam su tr-in dA rA dzi na ma ma hA yA na sU tra
1b2: bod skad du/ 'phags pa ga ser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen
1b3: po'i mdo/ / bam po dang po// 'od so pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /
1b4: byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
1b5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa du sa gcig na/ bya rgod phung po chos kyi dbyings// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod
1b6: yul na/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas ni// dag cing rdul rnams med pa yi// byang chub sems dpa'
1b7: mchog rnams la/ / mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po ste// mnyan na shin tu zab pa dang // yongs su brtags na
1b8: zab pa nyid/ / gser 'od dam pa 'di 'chad do// phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// byin gyis brlabs
2a1: kyis byin gyi rlabs pa/ / mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyogs su// rin chen tog gis lho phyogs su// 'od dpag med kyi nub phyogs su// rnga sgra yis ni byang phyogs su// sdig pa thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir/
2a2: bshad pa dam pa bkra shis pa// sdig pa'i las rnams zad byed pa// bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa// sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig byed pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhi// dpal kun gyis ni legs brgyan
2a3: pa/ / byin gyis brlabs de brjod par bya// sems can gang dag dbang po nyams// tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang // phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang // lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang // mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba
2a4: dang / / bram gze'i la stsogs gtses pa dang // phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin dang // nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang // mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa dang ni 'phongs pa dang // gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang //
2a5: mi zad gdon gyis nyen pa dang // mya ngan ngal las byung ba yi// rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang // des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin// mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing // gos gtsang
2a6: rnams kyis rab brgyan te/ / zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// mdo 'di nyan par byed na ni// mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis// srog chags kun gyi gnod pa dag/ shin tu mi bzad 'di 'dra ba// de dag rtag tu zhi bar
2a7: 'gyur/ / 'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid dang // blon po tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas// gnod sbyin bye ba du ma yis// de dag la ni srung bar byed// lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang // nair dz+nyA na dgan sa pa dang // 'byung po'i
2a8: ma mo 'phrog ma dang / / sa yi lha mo brtan ma dang // tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang // klu dbang mthu chen rnams dang ni// mi 'am ci dbang lha min dbang // de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang rnams// sde dang stobs da
2b1: bzhon pa dang / / bcas te de dag der lhags nas// nyin dang mtshan mo mi g.yel bar// de dag la ni srung bar byed// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste// bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ba/
2b2: mdo 'di rab tu bshad par bya// gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa dang // gang dag gzhan la thos byed dang // gang su rjes su yid rang dang // gang dag michod pa byed pa rnams// de dag lha dang klu dag dang // mi dang mi 'am ci dag dang // lha
2b3: min gnod sbyin du ma yis/ / bskal pa bye bar mchod par 'gyur// srog chags bsod nams byed pa rnams// de dag bsod nams phung po ni// mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang // bsam gyis mi khyab sku
2b4: bar 'gyur/ / phyogs bcu'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin zab mor spyod pa yis// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // rab tu bzung bar 'gyur ba yin// gtsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos la// dri zhim
2b5: pa yi gos 'chang zhing / / byams pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag nas// g.yel ba med par mchod par bya// rang gi sems ni dri med cing // rgya che bar yang rab byed la// sems kyang shin tu dang byed kyis// mdo sde dam pa mnyan pa
2b6: gyis/ / gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa ni// de dag mi nang legs par 'ongs// mi yi srid pa legs par thob// 'tsho ba bde bas 'tshe bar 'gyur// gang gi rna ba'i bu gar yang // bshad pa 'di ni grag 'gyur la// de dag dag rtsa
2b7: sbyangs pa ste/ / sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o// // yang de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ni/ byang
2b8: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la rim gro byas pa zhig gnas pa de 'di
3a1: snyam du sems te/ rdzu gang dang rkyen gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di lta ste/ lo brgyad bcu zhig thub ste/ 'di ltar sku tshe thung snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di
3a2: skad du/ rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis kyis tshe ring bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang kha zas rab tu sbyin pa'o zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ni/ bskal pa bye ba
3a3: khrag khrig brgya stong zangs med pa mang po nas/ srog gcod pa spangs par gyur pa nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar du yang dag par blangs par gyur/ zas kyang phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la
3a4: yongs su btang ste/ tha na rang gi lus kyi sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang gis kyang sems can ltogs pa rnams tshim par mdzad na/ zas gzhan gyis lta ci smos snyam mo// de nas skyes bu dam pa de sangs rgyas la/
3a5: song ba'i yid la byed pa dag las/ 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis bsam pa 'di dag sems pa na/ de'i khyim yangs shing rgya che la bai DUr+ya sngon po las grub pa/ lha'i rin po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog/
3a6: bsgyur ba/ lha'i las 'das pa'i spos kyis khyab par gyur to// khyim de'i phyogs bzhi nas lha'i rin po che'i khri bzhi byung bar gyur te/ khri de dag las kyang lha'i khri lha'i ras bco zung rin po che phrugs nams bting ba dag zung
3a7: bar gyur to/ / khri de dag las kyang lha'i me tog pad ma rin po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag zung ngo // pad ma de dag las kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung bar gyur te/ shar phyogs
3a8: nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa byung / / sgo phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog byung // nub phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med zung // byang phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs parnga sa
3b1: bung ste/ seng ge'i khri de dgal sa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag b+ha ma pagaH/ de nas da'i rgyal ba'i sa kyi thang kya chen po sna chan pas khyab par byung to// steng gsum gyi stong can pa'i 'jig rten tu/
3b2: khams kyi bar dang / sogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang rje'i klung dgi rtsem snyed kyi bar dag snang bas khyab par gyur// ske'i me tog dgagis char yang bag lha pol snyan gyi sgra yang byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi mthus
3b3: stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can dbang po mtshad pa rnams ni dbang pa thams cad ldan par gyur/ sems can dmus long dag
3b4: gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa dag ni rna bas sgra rnams thos/ sems can smyos pa dag ni dran pa so sor rnyed/ sems can sems g.yeng pa dag ni sems mi g.yeng bar gyur/ sems can sgren mo dag ni
3b5: gos bgos par gyur/ sems can bkres pa dag ni lto 'grangs par gyur/ sems can skom pa dag ni skom ngoms par gyur/ sems can nad kyis btab pa dag ni nad dang bral bar gyur/ lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dag
3b6: ni dbang po tshang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du ngo mtshar rmad du blang ba'i chos rnams rgya cher byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/
3b7: de tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rnam
3b8: par rjes su dran la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yon tan rjes su dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad la the tshom za bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar lo brgyad bcu zhig
4a1: thub ste su ma zung ba 'di ji lta ba/ 'di ci zhig snyam du bsam pa de sems shing 'dug par gyur to// de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' mjas
4a2: pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar sku tshe thung ngo snyam du ma sems shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
4a3: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang bdud dang bcas pa dang tshangs pa dang dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na/
4a4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyi mtha'/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du yang rtogs par nus pa ded kyis su yang ma mthong ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de bzhin gshes
4a5: pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa brjod ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lha'i bu 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams dang gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci
4a6: dang lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gi khyim der lhags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thams cad
4a7: dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa tshigs su bcad de mdor bka' stsal pa/ rgya mtsho'i chu rnams thams cad kyi/ thigs pa dag ni bgrang bar nus/ shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus
4a8: kyang bgrang bar mi nus so/ / ri rab rnams ni thams cad kyang // phra rab rdul du bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bzeng bar mi nus so// sa la gang dag yod pa mes// rab tu bra rdul ji snyed pa// thamra
4b1: cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi/ / rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tshad mi nus// gal te la las nam mkha'al// sna 'ga' zhig gis dpag 'dod kyang // bkya thu ba'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bzang bar mi nus so// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srid
4b2: bzhugs/ / bskal pa dag ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa bye ba brgya dag ces// grangs ni rnyed par mi rung ngo // gang phyer de yi rgyu gnyis ni// rgyu dang rkyen kyang rnam gnyis te// sdig pa'i 'tshe ba spangs pa dang // kha zas mang po byin pa ste//
4b3: dephyir bdag nyid chen po de'i// sku tshe'i grangs ni mi rnyed de// bskal pa 'di snyed cig tse 'am// grangs med pa'am de bzhin te// de bas the tshom med par 'gyur// the tshom cung zad ma za shig/ rgyal ba'i sku tshe tha ma yi// grangs ni gang
4b4: du mi dmigs so/ / de nas de'i tshe 'khor der slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kau di n+ya zhes bya ba dang // bram ze stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa
4b5: chen po'i sgra thos nas/ 'phral la dus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba/ thugs rje chen po dang /
4b6: ldan pa/ phan par bzhed pa sems can thams cad la pha ma lta ba/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyur pa/ zla ba lta bu snang ba mdzad pa/ shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i nyi ma shar ba lta bu lags shing / gal te khyod sems can
4b7: thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs na/ bdag la dam pa zhig stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das cang me gsung bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor der ling tsa byi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams
4b8: cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba de spobs pa skyes nas/ slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kau di n+yal 'di skad ces smras so// ci bram ze chen po khyod/ bcom ldan 'das la dam pa gcig gsol lam/ bdag
5a1: gis khyod la dam pa cig sbyin no/ / zas ces smras pa/ yid makyi gzhon du bdag na bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang ring bsrel gyi byem bgos pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dang bsrel grangs
5a2: al bsten par 'dod do/ / rang le la grangs chu ma mngon par mchod na/ sras cu ca gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po 'bang shig 'thob ces gag go// kyi ling tsa kyi gzhon nu gsesar 'dod pa pa'i bdonyan thos dang
5a3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gas par dada' ba/ khong du rbad par dka' ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yon tan dang ldan pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'a chad ces thag gis nyon cig/ ying sa byigazhon nugaser 'od dam pa'i mdon//
5a4: shes par dka' zhing rtogs par dka/ 'a bas na/ kho bo cag ma tha' 'khob kyi gling gi bras ze rnams ni// gang bcangs na sems can nams skur du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po 'thob par 'gyur ba'i ring bsrel yungs
5a5: tsam za ma tog gi nang du bcug la bcangs kyang rung ngo / / kye ling tsa byi gzhon nu khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa las ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gsol nas/ ring bsrel gyi zam tog tu bcug te bcangs pas sems can rnams
5a6: sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par mi 'dod dam/ kye ling tsa byi gzhon nu kho bos ni dam pa de lta bu gsol to// de nas lid tsa byi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas/ slob dpon lung ston pa bram
5a7: da rgyal tshigs su bcad bdag gis par smras pa/ na ba zhig gang gA rgya sman la// me tog dag ni kye ba dang // bya rog dmar por 'byung ba dang // khwa thug drang mdog 'drang 'gyur dang // 'jam bu ta la'i 'bru chags dang /
5a8: a mra'i dog pa chags// de yi chen grangs 'bratsas// ring bsrel du ni gsal bar 'gyur// nas zhig dra bral su rnams las// gos su legs par btags gyur te// dgan kyi thang ba sel byed pa// deci ring bsrel yod par
5b1: 'gyur/ / ba zhig spang bu'i nang gas pa// yang pog legs par byas gyur te// brtan ning rab tu mi g.yog// de tso nga bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig sri bu bang ma kun// son dkar po skyes gyur te// rdo nadang chen por gyur pa na//
5b2: de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// mtho ris su ni 'dzegs pa'i phyir// nas zhig ri bong drarnams las// gas ni legs par byas zung ba// de tshe rang bkral yod par 'gyur// nam zhig gas ni der 'dzegs te// byibs zla ba bca
5b3: ba dang / / snga gcan la yang gnod byed pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// grong na rgyu ba'i sbrang bu yis// nam zhig rdza ma'i chang 'thungs te// khyim na gnas par byed 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam
5b4: zhig bong ba bder gyur la/ / mchu dmar bim pa 'drar gyur cing // klu gar rnams la mkhas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig 'ug pa bya rog rnams// dben par dong nas rtse ba dang // phan tshun 'thun par gyur pa na//
5b5: de tshe ring bsrel yod par gyur// pa la sha yi lo ma rnams// rin chen sna gsum gdugs gyur te// char 'bab skyabs su nam gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par gyur// nam zhig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che// 'khrul 'khor dang ni g.yog
5b6: sor bcas/ / thang la byung ste 'gro ba na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bya ni 'ug pa yis// ri bo spos kyi rang ldang ba// mchu la thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// slob dpon lung ston pa
5b7: bram ze kod ces tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ / ling tsa byi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bal tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag slar smras pa// legs so legs so gzhon nu mchog/ rgyal ba'i sras po
5b8: tshig po che/ / dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa// lung bstan pa ni dam pa thob// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa che ba nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab go rims bzhin// gzhon nu dag las snyan par gyis// sangs
6a1: rgyas yul ni bas ma mi phyag/ de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa med// sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu ni// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag zung // sangs rgyas thams cad 'dog mtshungs// di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin
6a2: bcom ldan 'das ni cos ma yin/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te// rdo rje lta bungasra pa'i sgra// sprul ba'i sku ni ston par mdzad// drang srong chen po'i ring bsrel ni// yungs 'brutsa ma zhes bya ba med// skul dras pa khrag med na// ring bsrem
6a3: yod par gal 'gyur/ / sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thabs kyis ring bsrel gzhags mdzad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings// chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba// bcom ldan 'dra
6a4: kyi sku de 'dra/ / bdag gis 'di thos shes nas ni// bdag gis dam pa gsol bar byas// de nyid kho na lung bstan phyir// gtam gleng ba ni bdag gis byas// de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyi stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad
6a5: bstan pa zab mo de dag thos nas/ thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag yid kyi rtog pa rab tu dga' nas sgra dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs
6a6: rgyas mya ngan yod mi 'da'/ / chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir// yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston// sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku// sems can rnams
6a7: la phan pa'i phyir/ / bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa
6a8: thos nas/ / tshi ma ning mgul yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas dga' ba dang mgrub rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe tshad bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i / sems can tshad med grangs
6b1: med pa dag blan mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to// gser 'od dam pa mdo rje'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshe'i tshad bstan pa'i man
6b2: zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog ga nyid kyis log pa'i rmilam na// gsar gying kun tu snang ba 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bzhig mthong ngo // phyogs thams cad na yangs
6b3: rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin po che'i shing drung na/ rin pa che'i ba DUr+ya'i khri rnams la bzhugs shing / 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong // de nas yang skyes
6b4: bu bram ze'i gzugs lta bu zhig rje de rdung ba mthong ste/ rnga'i sgra de las bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung ba thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog sa ma thag tu/ bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag rjes
6b5: su dran no/ / rjes su dran nas kyang de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
6b6: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
6b7: logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ rmi lam na gang rnga'i sgra las bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa thos pa de dag gsol to// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rmi la ma mthong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o//
6b8: nub gcig g.yel ba med par yang // bdag gi rmi lam rmis pa ni/ mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong ba ste/ thams cad du ni gser gyi 'ong // nyi ma ji lta bzhin du 'bar// kun tu rnam par lha de ste/ phyogs bcu rnams su snang bar gyur//
7a1: tu su na tu na ku smra na /
7a2: smra sa
7a3: su/ dug
7a4: ma nga sa na / / 9 / ldan nan / sa smra
7a5: mas 'as sa sa ldan tha/ / sa ma rnas kya bdam pas ga la 'dagapas sa pa ma sa ga/ sem
7a6: sum la sa / gas pa /
7a7: sas rgyas ga ma mas pa/ ma jugs// theg na / yul/ k+Shan nga // da
7a8: sa/ sa sa / ga sa
7b1: cad kyis de dag bsam dang smon lam gang yin pa/ / rdobo cheb sgrasad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams kyi dkun rdzogs gyur cig/ sems can gang dag sems dmyal mi bzad skyes// lus la me lce kun tA rab tu'abab// skabs med bya/
7b2: ngan bcas shing yongs 'khyam pa// me rnams de dag rab tu zhi bar shog/ sems dmyal yi dgas mi yi 'jig rten na// sems can sdug bsngal mi bzang drag po gang // rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams kyi sdug bsngal
7b3: kun zhi shog/ rten med dpung gnyen med pa dang // skyabs med par yang gyur pa dag/ de rnams la ni skyob pa dang // dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dam pa dag/ thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thus//
7b4: gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// bzhugs pa bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag gis sngon chad sdig pa'i las// shin du mi bzang gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu'i spyan sngar bdag mchis te// de dag thams cad bshags par
7b5: bgyi/ / pa ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang // sangs rgyas rnams su mi 'dzin dang // dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin pas// sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis dang // phyug pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang // rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang // gzhon
7b6: pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis/ / bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // nyes bsams nyes par smras pa dang // nyes par bgyis pa'i las rnams dang // nyes pa'i dmigs su ma bltas pas// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis/
7b7: ngang / byis pa'i blo yis 'jug pa dang // mi shes mun pa'i sems dang ni// sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyur dang // nyon mongs rnam par 'khrug sems dang // rtsed mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang // mya ngan dang ni nad dbang dang // nor gyis/
7b8: mcho gnyes pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // 'phags min skye bo 'dre ba dang // phrag dog ser sna'i rgyu dang ni// g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // phongs pa byung ba'i dus kyi tshe/
8a1: 'dod pa rnams kyi 'jigs rgyu dang // phug po ma yin gyur pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // g.yo ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang // 'dod dang khro bo'i dbang dag dang // bkres dang skom gyis nyen pa yis//
8a2: bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang // bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir// nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sdig/ nyes par
8a3: spyad pa rnam gsum bsags/ / 'di 'dra'i tshul gyis gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang // de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang
8a4: bgyis pa/ / de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// dam chos
8a5: smra ba rnams la yang / / gus pa ma lags bgyis pa dang // chos la'ang gus par ma bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pas// dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang // pha ma rnams la mgus
8a6: dang / / de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// blun pa dang ni byis pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal dregs par bsgribs bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// bdag ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du//
8a7: stobs bcu rnams la mchod par shog/ bdag gis phyogs bcur sems can rnams// sdug bsngal kun las 'don gyur cig/ sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun// sa bcu la ni dgod par bgyis// sa bcu la ni gnas nA
8a8: kyang / / thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig/ ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las// de kun thar bgyi nus srid du// sems can re re'i phyir yang ni// bskal pa bye bar spyad par bgyi// gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba// las rnams
8b1: thams cad byang bgyis pa/ / zab mo dag ni ston pa ni// sems can de dag bstan par bgyi// gang gis bskal pa stong rnams su// sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bgyis// lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis// de dag thams cad byang bar
8b2: 'gyur/ / gang gis las kyi sgrib pa rnams// mur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba// gser 'od dam pa dge ba yi// bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni// rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po// sa bcu la ni gnas par bgyi// sangs//
8b3: rgyas yon tan snang bar bgyi// srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang // yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo de// sangs rgyas yon tan bas ma yas kyis// thams cad mkhyen du rdzogs par bgyi// ting 'dzin brgya
8b4: phrag stong rnams dang / / gzungs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang // dbang stobs byang chub yan lag gis// stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar bgyi// dgongs pa'i thugs kyis sangs rgyas rnams// bdag la rnam par gzigs
8b5: su gsol/ / thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni// nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol// bdag gis bskal pa brgya rnams su// sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sems// phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs par
8b6: gzir/ / sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyid// yid ni rtag tu dman par 'gyur// gang dang gang du spyod bgyid pa// bdag ni gang du'ang dga' ma mchis// sangs rgyas thams cad thugs rje ldan// 'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sem
8b7: bas/ / nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol// 'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdzod// bdag gi nyon mongs las rnams kyis/ dri ma de bzhin gshegs pas shol// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la ni// snying rje'i chu yis bkru par
8b8: gsol/ / sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyi dang // da ltar bdag gi sdig pa gang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// nongs par bgyis pa'i las rnams kun// slan chad mi
9a1: bgyid bsdam par bgyi/ / bdag gis nongs par bgyis pa gang // sdig de bcab par mi bya'o// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum pa rnams// de dag thams cad
9a2: bdag bshags so/ / lus kyis bgyis dang ngag gi las// yid kyis rnam par bsams pa dang // las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dag/ de dag thams cad bdag bshags so// mi dge las bcu spangs nas su// dge ba bcu po rten
9a3: bgyis te/ / sa bcu la bdag gnas par bgyi// stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi// bdag gi sdig pa'i las gang dag/ mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni// de dag thams cad bshags/
9a4: par bgyi// 'dzam bu gling 'dir gang dag dang // 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu// gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid pa// de dag kun la yid rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa/
9a5: bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chub mchog la reg par bgyi// srid 'gro nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni// shin du mi bzad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu mi mnyam spyan sngar mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so
9a6: sor bshags par bgyi/ / skye ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang // 'jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam nga bar// lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bsags de bshags so// byis pa blun byas nyon mongs
9a7: nyam nga dang / / sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang // srid pa nyam 'dod chags nyam nga dang // zhe sdang nyam nga gti mug nyam nga dang // ngal ba'i nyam dus kyi nyam nga dang // bsod nams bsgrubs pa nyam nga dag gis kyang //
9a8: rgyal ba mi mnyam mngon sum mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// sangs rgyas gser mdog ri sna ri rab 'dra// yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba de dag rnams la skyabs su mchi//
9b1: rgyal ba de dag kun la mgos phyag 'tshal// gser mdog pa se dri med mer kyi 'od// dri med rnam dag bai DUr+ya'i yan lag spyan// sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas// thugs rje'i 'od zer dag/
9b2: gis mun pa mun nag bsal// yan lag rab tu dri med rab bzad rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri med gser 'dras khyab// nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra ba// thub pa'i zla ba'i
9b3: 'od zer dra bas tshim par mdzad/ / mtshan mchog sum bcu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzes// dpe byad bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes// dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od zer dra ba yis// 'jig
9b4: rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs/ / dri med rgya chen la dog sna tshogs bai DUr+ya// sgra reng dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin yan lag dmar// 'od zer dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pas// thub chen khyod ni/
9b5: nyi ma bzhin du de bzhin mdzes// mya ngan 'khrug pa 'chi churga ba'i dpa' rlabs can// 'khor ba'i klung chen phongs pa'i chu bor lhung ba la// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cing shugs drag pa// bde gshegs nyi ma'i
9b6: 'od zer mang po rnams kyis skems/ / yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang // ye shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan lag rnams spras pa// sangs rgyas gser
9b7: sku 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ / ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag med dang // ji ltar sa las rdul mtha' yas dang // ji ltar ri rab rngo mtha' mtshungs med dang // ji ltar nam mkha'i mtha' la mtha' yas pa// de bzhin sangs
9b8: rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te/ / sems can kun gyis shes par mi nus so// bskal pa du mar gzhal cing bsams kyang ni// yon tan mtha' ma shes par mi nus so// chu ni sgra yi rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang // rdor bcas rir/
10a1: bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni// bskal pa grangs na shes par nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan pa mtha' shes mi nus// yon tan kha dog snyan dang grags pa dang // dge ba'i mtshon gyis brgyan pa'i sku lus dang /
10a2: dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus brgyan pa yis// sems can thams cad de 'drar gyur par shog/ bdag gis dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi// 'gro la phan phyir chos kyang bstan par
10a3: bgyi/ / sems can sdug bsngal mang gzir thar bar bgyi// stobs bcas sder bcas bdud las rgyal bar bgyi// chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar bgyi// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab gnas par bgyi// bdud rtsi'i chu yis/
10a4: sems can tshim par bgyi// ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba'i rdzogs pa ltar// pha rol phyin drug tha med rdzogs par bgyi// nyon mongs gzhom zhing sdug bsngal bsal bar bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi bar bgyi// skye ba brgya dang
10a5: skye ba bye ba stong / / bdag ni rtag tu skye ba dran par bgyi// thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran par bgyi// de yi gsung ni rgya chen thos par bgyi// bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par bgyi// sdig
10a6: pa'i las rnams rnam par spang bar bgyi/ / dge ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams spyad par bgyi// zhing rnams kun na srog chags thams cad kyang // 'jig rten dgan sdug bsngal kun zhi gyur// sems can dbang po ma tshang yan
10a7: lag nyams/ / de kun de'u dbang po tshang bar shog/ gang dag nad btab nyam chung lus nyams dang // phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams// de kun myur dund lang gyur cig/ nad med stobs dang dbang po dad par//
10a8: shog/ gang dag rgyal po chom rkun bde gas gsad thug dang // sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yis phongs gyur pa// sems can nyam thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun// 'jigs mchog mi bzad brgya po de las
10b1: ga sags shes me bas pa ga / sa pa snamags gnagan pa// nas sa nga gargyas gas nas nga// gas yin kya rdzu sa / shA
10b2: zad kyi sa las thos rgya / / ga pa ga ni gapas pa coM// yang sems kya gang ldanan // nga sa rgya yas dang gas pa dang na// sas can ga dag kyis gra kyi
10b3: dag pas stom tu tshogs rnyed par gog/ / yong bas gzugs rnams tshogs meng gyur cig// don pas 'di 'a sarnapa pa thos pa ga// Nar bunams kyis shA gas gas rnyed byung// sems can nga pos gter nas
10b4: rnyed par shog/ nor 'brur na chen sna tshogs mang po yis// sems can thams cad pade dang ldan par shog/ gang yang sdug bsngal tshor bas non mgyur// sems can thams cad blta na sdug pa dang // gzugs bzang mdzes shing /
10b5: tshul du shis par shog/ rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur cig/ yid kyis zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams dag/ bsams ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cig/ rdza rnga cang te'u bi bang sgra snyan dang // chu mig mtshe'u dang rdzing bu lteng kha dang /
10b6: gser gyi pad ma ud pal pad ma can// zas skom gos nor mu tig nor bu dbyig/ rgyan gser rin chen sna tshogs bai DUr+ya// de dag bsams ma thag tu grub gyur cig/ 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung // sems can
10b7: gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyur/ / de dag thams cad kha dog tu chen dang // phan tshun du ni 'od byed gyur par shog/ mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod// de dag gang du bsams par skye bar gyur// bsam pa thams
10b8: cad bsams ma thag tu yang / / bsod nams 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par shog/ spos dang phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang // gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dag/ ljon shing dag las dus gsum 'bab par shog/ sems
11a1: can dag len cing dgar gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam las thams cad dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba sems dpa' nyan thos dang // rdul bral drim brtan pa'i chos la yang // phyogs brgyarnams su cho
11a2: pa byed par shog/ 'gro ba dma' ba thams cad spong gyur cig/ mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog/ dal ba'i rgyal po dam pa tho ba gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs par thob par shog/ rtag tu mthon po'i rigs su skye
11a3: bar shog/ nor dang 'bru yi mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig/ snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis// bskal pa du mar legs par brgyan par shog/ bud med thams cad rtag tu phor gyur te// dpa' zhing rtul phod mkhas shing
11a4: gsal bar shog/ de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur// pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog/ phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung // sangs rgyas bde bzhugs rin che ni bai DUr+ya'i// khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong
11a5: gyur cig/ chos bstan pa yang de dag thos gyur shog/ bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa ni// srid pa nyam ngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa// sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa// de dag thams cad ma lus
11a6: zad gyur cig/ sems can gang dag srid par bcings nas su// 'khor ba'i zhags pa'i thag pas dam bcings pa// shes rab lag gis bcings pa bkrol bar shog/ sdug bsngal rnams las myur du zar gyur cig/ sem
11a7: can gang dag 'jam bu'i bring 'di dang / gang dag 'jig rten 'ams ni gzhan nams na/ sang nams sna tshogs za mo rnams byed pa// de gakun lardzas su yi dang // las dang ga dang nyid kyis bsgrubs pa 'i// dag rdzo
11a8: su yid rang bsod nams de/ / bdag ni smon grub 'bras bu yod par shog/ byang chub rdul bral bla med tho ba gyur cig/ gang dag rtag dang dri ma bral ba dang // dri mad yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang // yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di/
11b1: yis ni// bskal pa drug bcur ngan song spong bar gyur// tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis// skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las// thal sbyar 'dug te rgyal ba gang bstod pa// tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur//
11b2: yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag brgyan// bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// mi dbang rgyal pos rtag tu de mchod de// de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur// gang dag rna ba'i bu gar bshags pa 'di ni drag 'gyur ba//
11b3: de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin// gnyis lam yin bzhi lam yin lnga min bcu la min// de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gan nas dge ba byas pa yin// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
11b4: las bshags pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o/ / // 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po gnyis pa// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
11b5: kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi lha ma de me de'i dris na// rgyal po gas kyi lag pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa/
11b6: pad ma'i 'byung gnas 'dis// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba gang dag sngar gyur gang byung dang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs
11b7: pa/ rgyal bde dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o// rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod// thub dbang ni zhing rab ni rnam par dag/ sku ni gser gyi mdog tu rab tu gda'// dbyangs rnams kun/
11b8: gyis sangs rgyas gsung snyan te// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa'i gsung // bung ba rma bya ud pal sngon po'i dbu// mthon ting lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'dra// kha ba dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems// rtag tu gser ltar rnam
12a1: par cings pa ga dang/ spya ning shes can ta dri ma med// mad pa rtson pa sa rgyas pa 'ang // gas na ma da legs la bdam mad// dadam 'ang snang ba ma'i zab tu// la kyi mdzad pa dam
12a2: dang 'dra/ bai dUr+ya'i mdog 'dra ga yas su 'byil// thub pa'i zlab dra zhing zla bzad pa 'dra// sA yi lte bzung ba gsal ba bzhin// zhal la mtho ba'i shangs ni rtag tu lhag gi ste// 'dam zhing sa le'i gsang snang bdog bzang / tan
12a3: pa rgyun tu rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ / ngo mchog 'dam zhid dam pa mchog rab 'phags// s+phu laM bu gnas ni re re skyes// spu rnams skyes pa g.yas su 'khyil ba ste// mngon teng 'od 'bar 'tshor zhing lcang lo can// cha bya'i mgrin
12a4: sdug 'dra bar sngo la mdzes/ / bltas ma thag tu sku yis snang bar bgyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag ni thams cad gang // 'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi// bde ba kun gyis sems can rnams kyang
12a5: tshim/ sems dmyal 'gro dang dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dang // yi dgas lha gnas mi yi 'gro rnams su// sems can de dag thams cad bde bas tshim// ngan song 'gro ba rnams ni thams cad zhi// kha dog mdog bzang gser
12a6: dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ / gtse ma'i gser ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku// bde gshegs zla ba rab tu dri med zhal/ 'dzum zhing rnam mdzes shin du dri med zhal// gzhon nu btsas 'drar sku lus yan lag 'jam// seng ge 'dra bar rtsal gyis gnon pa'i
12a7: mchog/ phyag ring phyag ni rab tu ring ba ste// sa la'i lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// 'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtong // nyi ma stong ltar rab tu lhag go'o// thub pa'i dbang po'i sku mchog dri ma med// zhing rnams mtha' yas
12a8: thams cad rab tu snang / / sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par ltung ri bas// zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yang // mtshan byed zla ba nyi ma mang po dag/ de dag thams cad 'od ni med par gyur// sangs rgyas nyi ma 'jig rten sngon/
12b1: ma ste/ sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams ni// zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag brgya dgan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma sems can mthong // bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku// yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i
12b2: klang chen dbang po'i snga nga rgyal pa'i phyag/ phyag dang bas 'od nga mdzas drim med// sa mi steng gi rdul dang mdzus 'drasnyed// thab dus snyed pangs rgyas gang das dang // nga dag gra 'i rdus snyed rgyang ba // gang dgam
12b3: ba'i rdul snyed bzhugs pa yi/ / rgyal ba de dag la ni rab dang ba'i// ngag yid lus kyis me tog dbul ba dang // sgo rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dag dang // dge ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag
12b4: dger gyur pa/ / snying po mchog rab sna tshogs du ma ste// bdag gis bskal pa stong du lce brgya yis// sangs rgyas yon tan brjod par mi nus so// rgyal ba gcig gi yon tan rnams kyang ni/ lce stong gis kyang cung za brjod mi nus// bdag gis
12b5: rgyal ba dag ni thams cad ni/ / yon tan cig rgyas brjod par ga la nus// lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad mtshor gyur te// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang ba// skra yi rtse mos dpag par nus srid kyi// / bde gshegs rnams kyi yon
12b6: tan gcig la min/ / lus dang ngag yid rab tu dang ba yis// rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas// bdag gis bsod nams 'bras bu mchog bsags gang // des ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig/ de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas
12b7: rnams bstod nas/ / rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni// ma 'ongs bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su yang // gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba na// rmi lam du ni 'di 'dri rnga blta zhing // der ni bshags pa 'di 'dra mnyan par bgyi// rgyal
12b8: bstod pad ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba/ / skye ba de dang der ni rnyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med dang // gang yang bskal pa stong du rnyed dka' ba// de dag rmi lam du yang mnyan par bgyi// nyen gyur tshe yang de dag
13a1: bgad par gyi/ sems can phrag pasngal mchogs thar bar bgyi// pha ros byin pa drug kyi rdzogs par gyi// b+hi nas byang chub tha me tho par gyi// dag ga zhing ni ltang ba med pa bya// dza bral rnam par sbyin
13a2: pa'i 'bras bu dang / / rgyal ba thams cad la yang gi stod pa'i rgyus// bA thub dbang mngon du blta bar bgyi// dngan bdag gis lung bstan tha 'gyur cig/ gser gyi lag pa'i dbang dang gas kyi 'od// dag gi
13a3: gang yin 'di gnyis kyang / / der ni bri po de dag gnyig dang / byang chub thamad lung bstan thob bar shog/ sems can gang dag gnas dang rten mad cing // skyabs dang bral nas phongs par gyur ba dag/ de dag la yang mthos
13a4: dus rnams dang / / skyob dang dpung gnyen skyabs dang rten gyur shog/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad pa byed gyur cig/ bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog/ sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid pa// ma 'ongs bskal par byang
13a5: chub smad par bgyi/ / gser 'od dam pa yi ni bshags pa yis// bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho skams par shog/ bdag gi las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig/ bdag gi nyon mongs rgya mtsho zad par shog/ bdag gi bsod nams
13a6: rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig/ ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi ye shes rgya mtsho rnam dag shog/ yon tan kun gyi rgya mtshor gyur par shog/ byang chub yon tan rin chen rdzogs gyur cig/ gser 'od dam pa'i bshags/
13a7: pa'i stobs kyis ni// bdag gis bsod nams rab tu snang bar shog/ bdag gi byang chub snang ba rnam dag gyur// ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog/ bsod nams snang ba lhag ger bya ba'i
13a8: phyir/ 'jig rten gsum na khyad par 'phags gyur cig/ bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog/ sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang // bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis// ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad pa/
13b1: 9/ rten gargyasan sngon yang nga med shegs/ de dag ni kyil ba thams pa // yon na tha' las byung dgas ci 'drag// kun mags pan mang+yas bdagag zhid// ma dras da
13b2: so/ / do pa mas thamasas/ rdzoms pa/ ga zhi gas na/ la bstod pa ma tog bdapa'i 'drung gnas zhes bya ba'i badz+ram+b+ha // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyipa na/
13b3: chatshigs su ca dpa' dag gang sas// ba ma gyis mi byab mi napas gaganadas// pa'i po rnams panas bkad de/ b+hang bsan nga ga dam pa 'dang // sto 'i tshas rnam pa med
13b4: yin/ / sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas// chos rnams thams cad shes par mi nus te// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad pa yin// sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang /
13b5: sems can 'byung bya'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang // thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni// mdo mchog dam pa dbang po'i da bshad do// lusa'i dgrong khyer stong pa ji bzhin te// dbang po rnams ni dmag dang chom rkun 'dra//
13b6: de dag thams cad grong cig gnas mod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so// mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug/ rna ba'i dbang po sba la rnam par dpyod// sna yi dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog/ lce
13b7: yi dbang po rtag tu rol rgyug/ lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la chug/ yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par dpyod// dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du// rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed// sems ni sgyu maH/
13b8: bur g.yo ba yin// dbang po drug ni yul la rnam dpyod de// ji ltar mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang // dmag dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas shing // dbang po'i spyod yul dag/
14a1: kyang bshes pa// de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te// dbang pa'i spyod yul rnams kyang bzugs// gzugs dang skadang de bzhin dri rnams dang // ro nga dag bya de bzhin stong dum chos// samasan/
14a2: dbang po drug po thams cad la// dbang por zhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar 'gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes par bdag nyid byed// lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med// snying po med cing rkyen
14a3: las byung ba yin/ / yang dag ma yin yongs su tog las byung // grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni// grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sprul gdug gan
14a4: gcig ji bzhin te/ / rtag tu phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang // gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te// khams sprul de/
14a5: dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// sa yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// me yi sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis steng gi nam mkha'agro ba yin// ji ltar sngon chad byas
14a6: pa'i las rnams kyis/ / sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong // lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye// pad kan rlung dang mkhris pa zad gyur na// lus ni gcin dang ngan
14a7: sngags rnams kyis gang / / mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur// dur khrod dag na mthor ba shing bzhin gyur// lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can de bzhin gang zag dang // chos rnams 'di dag
14a8: thams cad stong pa ste/ / ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// 'byung ba chen po 'di dag che 'byung min// ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste// gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba mi 'byung ba// de phyir 'byung ba chen zhes ngas brjod/
14b1: do yod pa min zhing gzhar yang yod min la// ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin// ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te// de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do// 'du shes rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang //
14b2: reg dang tshor ba dang // sred dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang // skye dang rga sha mya ngan gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag/ ma byung ba las byung dang mi 'byung dang
14b3: tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyod dang / / bdag gis lta bar gyur par gcad par dgyes// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mtshatha la// phung po'i gnas la stod par gyur par ltos// byang chub yon tan rgya chen rig par bgyis//
14b4: ngas ni bdud rtsi grong khyer sgo yang phye// bdud rtsi khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan// nga ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ nga ni bdud rtsi'i khu bas bdag tshim bya// ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus//
14b5: ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab// nga ni nyon mongs sgra mchog rnams las rgyal// ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng // srid pa'i mtshalas sems can rab tu bskal// ngas ni ngan
14b6: song gsum gyi lam rnams bkag/ sems can nyon mongs me yis gdungs gyur pa// rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag/ srog chags nyon mongs mes gdungs zhi byas nas// bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsol bas tshim par byas//
14b7: gang phyir bskal pa du mar sngon chad ngas// 'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas// chos kyi sku de yongs su tshol ba na// brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang // yan lag mchog
14b8: dang bu sdug bu mo dang / / nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser// bai dUng+ya dang rin chen sna tshogs btang // stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang // rtswa dang rtswa rnams thams cad dang // nags tshal dag dang sa las ni// skye ba thams cad
15a1: bcad gtubs te/ / de dag thams cad phyer blags nas// rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsam par// phye ma'i phung po spungs nas ni// 'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus// sa la rdul ni yod pa
15a2: rnams/ / stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sems can kun gyi shes pa gang // de ni sems can gcig gir gyur// shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyis// phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni// sems can
15a3: kun las rab 'phags pa/ / ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis// thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i khyon la mi nus so// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang // skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang // bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// gang /
15a4: du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste drug pa'o// // de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang rgyal po chen po
15a5: 'phags skyes po dang rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang rnams stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
15a6: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
15a7: kyis gzigs pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba// lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa// lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis
15a8: mchod pa/ / lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa// 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags te// brjod nas rab tu bkur ba// lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyid pa// sems can
15b1: thams cad la mchog tu bde ba rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ / sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skems pa// 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/
15b2: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zlog pa// mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa// nad kyi dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa// gza' thams cad sel ba// mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa//
15b3: ngan dang nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa// gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa// gnod pa brgya stong rab tu 'jom par bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang
15b4: po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad na/ / chos nyan pa chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis// bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi lha'i lus 'dis gzi chen pos rnam par
15b5: 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang stobs dang mthu yang skyed par 'gyur// gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang de dag gi lus la 'jug par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dra
15b6: bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa chos smra ba chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang dri za dang mi 'am
15b7: ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o/ / 'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad pa snying rje ma mchis pa gzhan gyi mdangs 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/
15b8: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun tu lha'i mig rnam par dag pa// mi las 'das pas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi bsrung bar bgyi
16a1: yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten sbyor shes ming du chags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dga'adzas bu'i gling 'dipa/
16a2: rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'jom par 'gyur ram// mu ge'i gnod pa'amand kyi gnod pa'am gnod pa sna tshags rgya dang gnod pa stong dang gnod pa brgya phrag stong dgagis gces par 'gyur ba ni// btsun pa bcom ldan
16a3: 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul bar bgyi'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po
16a4: bzhis rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyis brlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bkur pa na/ yul gang dang gang du 'chi bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dang de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par
16a5: 'gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang gnod pa stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de
16a6: dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan te
16a7: thos nas/ / mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las kun tu bsrung bar bgyid/ yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su 'dzin pa dang yongs su skyong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
16a8: cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ / mi'i rgyal po'i yul de thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyid/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su
16b1: 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos nas dge slong ma// dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen nam dag bstan ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la// bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na// btsun pa
16b2: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'o yo byad thams cad kyis// bde ba dang yo byad thams cad thun su ma tshogs par bgyi'o// tsun
16b3: pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma'am/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la sti stang du bgyid tha mar bgyid rim gror bgyid cing mchod na// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
16b4: ga rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal ba de la rgyal po thams cad pas ches bsti stang du bkyi ches bla mar ba gyi ches rim gro ba'i ches mchod par bgyi ste/ yul thams cad du yang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o// nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyas
16b5: po chen po bzhi la legs so legs so zhes bya babyin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po khyed yang legs so legs so// 'di lta ste khyed ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
16b6: bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa chos dang ldan pa chos smra ba chos kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di lta ste khyed yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan
16b7: pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs la// mi phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad
16b8: la bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis// mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang rim gro byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu bsrung
17a1: bar bgyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang gnod sbyin pargya stong phrag
17a2: du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi tshul bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ / yongs su bskyangs pa dang yongs su gzung bar yang 'gyur ro// des na
17a3: rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa byed pazhi lnga dang lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin rnams bas par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde
17a4: dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bgyis shig/ yongs su
17a5: bskyab pa dang yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po
17a6: dang rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs ste/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la
17a7: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram grong rdal lam ljongs sam yul 'khor ram pho brang 'khor gang du spyod par
17a8: 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por gyur pa gang la la zhig lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis/ rgyal po bgyid cing
17b1: r tag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam rim gror bgyid dam mchod par bgyid dam dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen nas dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i 'dzin pa de dag la yang
17b2: bsti stang bgyid btsun par bgyid rim gro babyed cing mchod de rtag par rnyan tu gser 'odas pa med sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chub 'arnams bdud rtsi'i khub 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang g.yon
17b3: rnams dang gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ / bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag gi gzi brjid da
17b4: dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lus bltar mi 'da' bar
17b5: bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal lam yul 'khor ram pho brang 'khor gang na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o//
17b6: mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa dang rim gror bgyid pa dang mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba
17b7: dang chad pa spang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ / rgyal po'i thong 'apor de dag dang yul 'khor de dag dang bul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang chad pa
17b8: spang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ / yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar bzlog par bgyi'o//
18a1: mi'i rgyal po gang la la ga ser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa brgyad pa de'i dgra zla mdab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dra
18a2: nam dgra zla mang ba nye ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig yul der song ste// yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na//
18a3: gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus dgra zla mdab nye ba'i rgyal po de rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur// rang gi yul du phyin na yang / yul 'khrug par 'gyur// rgyal po'i
18a4: 'khrug pa mi bzad pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ / yul du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla mad pa nye ba'i rgyal po de rang
18a5: gi yul du phyin pa na/ / gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla mad pa nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsags te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
18a6: su mchi ba'i slad du rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam
18a7: par gzhig 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa// gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi 'da' bar bgyis te der mchi bar bgyi'o//
18a8: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul du zhugs pa las kyang / de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// brel ba rnam par sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste yul der pha rol gyi dmag chog
18b1: de mchi bar yang mi nus na/ yul gzhig par bgyid par lhag la 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po dag
18b2: khyed yang legs te/ khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
18b3: 'di nyan pa dang rim gro byed pa dang mchod pa byed pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyar ba dang chad pa spang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba gyis shig/
18b4: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang grong khyer de dag dang yul 'khor de dag dang yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang chad pa spang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su
18b5: 'gyur ba gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmag tshegs rnams kyang zlog cig/ 'dzam bu'i gleng thams cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal
18b6: po dag mi 'thab pa dang mtshang mi 'dru ba dang mi rtsod pa dang mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na/
18b7: rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi/
18b8: skyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol gyi gnod pa dang /
19a1: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab
19a2: mtshar mi 'dra mi rtsod mi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar
19a3: 'gyur/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang mdangs can du 'gyur/ dus dang zla ba dang zla ba phyed dang lo khyu dkor thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang rgyu skar dang zla ba dang nyi ma yang nyin
19a4: mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ / char ba'i rgyun yang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur// 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs spyod che
19a5: ba dang ser sna med par 'gyur/ gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten tu skye bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnam
19a6: kyis gang bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur te/ rim gro byas mchod pa byas dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am dge snyen nam
19a7: dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang byed bla mar byed rim gro byed mchod pa byed cing / / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir rtag par
19a8: rgyan tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu'i klung chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro// khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi chen po yang rnam par 'phel
19b1: lo/ / khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs kyang bskyed do// khyed kyi gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel lo// mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
19b2: rgyas shAkya thub pa la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar blang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la yang
19b3: yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod par byas par 'gyur ro/ / des na mi'i rgyal po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyab
19b4: pa dang yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang chad pa spang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro/ / btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnams dang btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang
19b5: bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang chad pa spang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams
19b6: cad kyang ches gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang ches stobs dang ldan pa dang bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu
19b7: bsrungs par 'gyur/ yongs su bskyabs par 'gyur// gnod pa med par 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang gnod pa med pa dang 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// de skad ces
19b8: bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//
20a1: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di yang nyan 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid la yang bsrung ba chen po bgyis 'tshal bar 'gyur// btsun
20a2: modam pa dang rgyal bu rnams dang rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la yang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dethams cad la yang zhi bdang bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po
20a3: bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ / tshe 'di la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur// rgyal po nyid
20a4: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag gi yul thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yongs su bskyang 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang
20a5: g.yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang dgra ma mchis pa dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi rdzi ba dang nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des
20a6: g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang gus pa dang bcas pa dang ri mo dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o/ / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
20a7: mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par mchis par bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag gdab cing me tog sil ma sna tshogs dgram par/
20a8: bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa deng chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o// phyogs der gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par
20b1: brgyan par bgyi'o/ / mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o// gos dri rab tu bda' ba gos sar pa mdzes pa bgos nas rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gi stan rab tu dma' ba gding bar bkye ste/ stan de la
20b2: mchis nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o/ / dang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o// chags pa dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis gser 'od dam pa
20b3: mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'ang mnyan par bgyi'o/ / dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na/ btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnams dang rgyal po'i bu
20b4: mo rnams dang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o/ / btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnams dang rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs
20b5: thams cad la tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o/ / chos nyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs spyod du stsal bar bgyi'o// dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang bde ba
20b6: bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o/ / dbang po bde bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o// bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas chos smra ba
20b7: bsra bar bgyi'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po sar pa
20b8: mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o/ / spung ba dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bya'o// gdugs dkar po yang gzung bar bya'o// rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang rgyal po'i bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs
21a1: thogs te/ rgyal po'i bo brang de nas byung ba chos smra ba bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos der gos pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor ba phyir bsnyil
21a2: par 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed du tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bel bar 'gyur/ bskal
21a3: pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar ba nas yangs shing rgya che ba lha'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi rgyal rigs lha'i rgya che zhing rgya che ba brgya stong phrag du ma thob par
21a4: 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tshe bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur// tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur// grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod
21a5: pa shin du rgya che bar 'gyur/ / bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur
21a6: chen po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang
21a7: phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu dag mthong nas/ mi'i
21a8: rgyal po des/ dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/ tshes smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 'di snyam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
21b1: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des bdag cag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag gi rgyal po'i pho
21b2: brang 'dir bshos gsol par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bya'o// deng bdag/
21b3: gis chos nyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya'o// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag
21b4: gis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang dung
21b5: 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin du rgyun bcad par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa de dag gi//
21b6: dge ba'i rtsa ba sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zag du ma 'thob pa dag dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
21b7: bo nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'khor ba las yongs su thar par byas pa
21b8: 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yangs shing de rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la
22a1: bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ / deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gi
22a2: yul 'di thams cad kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ / yongs su bskyangs pa dang gnod pa med pa dang dgra med pa dang pha rol gyis dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang nad 'gro ba med pa dang 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// snyam
22a3: du sems bskyed par bya'o/ / rgyal po chen po dag dge slong dam dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa dag la mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa 'di lta bus
22a4: bsti stang byed bla mar byed rim gro byed mchod pa byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dag la shes kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po de bsod nams
22a5: mngon par 'du byed pa dang dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa
22a6: dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa dang gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang dgra thams cad chos dang 'thun pas shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka'
22a7: stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la// de chos la gus pa de lta bus gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang por
22a8: rgyal po nyan la dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang bgyid bla mar bgyid rim gro bgyid mchod pa bgyid cing / rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad
22b1: du rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag dar bgyi'o/ / spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po shing kun gyi/ thun mong du chos nyan pa de nyan cing bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du dge ba'irtsa
22b2: bar shas cung zad cig sbyin pa bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu mi'i rgyal po des/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs par bgyi'o// btsun pa/
22b3: bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du/ bdug pas bdugs ma thag tu spos sna tshogs rnams las spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig
22b4: tha cig yud tsam de la bdag cag rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam
22b5: par 'gyur/ / gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des bdag cag gi sa pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang 'dug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag skad cig thang
22b6: c ig yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen
22b7: p o nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang ldan pa dang klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa
22b8: dang klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang de dag gi rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs pargya chen po yang
23a1: mnas pa gyur khang rnams kyin gas byung nga ba shA ga pa gnas thams pa dbang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / byu sa gsas pa dang mam ldan das kyis rgya
23a2: bo bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rgyal po chen po dag rgyal po chen po khyed pazhi'i rang gi khang ba rnams kyi steng gi bar snang la/ spros dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa dam pa do//
23a3: bye zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag mi'i rgyal po des gsar 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos sna tshogs da dag gis bdugs ma thag tu lag na spos snod gcig thogs pa de las spos dang /
23a4: bdug pa sa tshogs kyi 'khrig rnams 'byung bar 'gyur // de sad cig nga cig su mad la stong gsum kyi snang chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dathams cad dru gang dathAb bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyem byu ga shAg
23a5: m tshan pa kyi ba zag pa dang rgyal par ga byab zag pargya dang rgyas pa 'bang grag dang yang dag rab 'brag da gan padun pa'i ji d+hA kyi 'ams kyi bzag pa dpal na
23a6: bye ba zug brgyad sum bcu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgyanas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med men dunye par song pa'i bar gyi la bye ba brgya dang / stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du muH wanag
23a7: k yi skya des bye ba phrag brgya po thams cadan lta dang u0f89u0fa4 dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang l+h+wam yin dang namamakha' lding dang mi'am ci dang k+ta'i bya chen pa'i chags rnams kyi rang rang gi khang bdag gi stong gi par blang sa thos dang s
23a8: na tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur shing / snang ba des kyang lha'i kha pa
23b1: rnams snang ba byas par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa'i 'bri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas/
23b2: pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus
23b3: spros dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'bri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag/
23b4: khrig brgya stong phrag rnamasu// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par
23b5: 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya tshe zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba
23b6: khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po dag cho 'phrul de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
23b7: chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshul 'di lta bu/ zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan
23b8: ba 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa khyod yang legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang
24a1: dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ gang dang dzin pa dang chad bdang cha pa dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de ci'i phyir/
24a2: zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
24a3: pa'i phyir ro/ / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po gsum pa// de nas phyogs bcu'i kun du sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
24a4: phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis/ de'i tshe de'i dus na tshig gcig dang ngag gcig dang sgra skad cig/
24a5: gis dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par
24a6: song ste/ shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi
