66b3: btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor yid dgra grul bum gyis zin pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni 'di
66b4: lta bu lags te/ shin tu skom pas 'debs par gyur// g.yeng bas btab cing lta bur 'gyur// bzhin yang dmar por gda' bar 'gyur// bskums nas sa la nyal bar 'gyur// kha dog ngan cing lus kyang skem/ skra dang sen mo ring ba ste/ dri ma
66b5: can la dri mi bda'/ / brdzun dang kyal pa smra bar bgyid// de la sngags kyi tshig mchis kyis// 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson// s+yAd ya zed na// 'a kha kha mi// kha la ne kha lo me/ kha ra li// kha ra li/ ka ra be/ ka shi na/ kar te/ ka le/ ka/
66b6: mA ni/ bid+ha le/ khaM b+he la ga sa nis mag/ pa ti sha si/ sha ma ni swA hA// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po'i ming dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag gi gdon dang / gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po mag
66b7: mi bzang stan las langs te/ tha gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lcangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la byeg 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces
66b8: gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'khor klu mdab bzangs kyi gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul gyi mtshan ma ni/ 'di lta bu lags te/ skyigs bus 'debs shing dbugs kyang 'byin// de bzhin dbugs kyang grang bar 'gyur// rdul
67a1: zhing lbub kha chu 'byung / phyi phyir gnyid kyang log par 'gyur// kha dog ldan zhing dpa' ba ste// de bzhin 'dar zhing rgyug par 'gyur// sen mo dag kyang ston par bgyid// dogasar mchis shing ngu bar bgyid// de la sngags
67a2: tshig mchis kyis/ / 'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson// sAd ya the dan/ wa ka ye/ grag she/ grag se/ klu sha me// krug/ krug pa me// khrig/ a ga le/ nag le/ sa ma ga le/ ku Ta ma gu me/ a la ke/ ka la ke/ i ri mir
67a3: d+ha re a drag ba ti swA hA/ / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gi ming dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das yi da bor thams cad kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa/ nga ni stobs
67a4: bcu dang ldan zhing mi 'jigs pa bzhis 'jigs pa med pa ste/ 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra khyu mchog lta bu rgya chen po yang dag par bsgrag so// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro// sde dang mthu dang bzhon bcas pa'i// bdud kyang
67a5: gcig gis rab tu btul/ / sems can thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir// rig sngags thams cad nga la nyon// sAd ya the dan/ a sang ge/ kha ga ba te/ ba la ba te/ ba la nir g+ho she/ shU re/ shU ra d+he re badz+rag ma badz+ra teg/ stam b+he dzaM b+he dri D+ha sA re/ bir
67a6: do bi g+ha swe/ ba rA gra prA pa te/ a ra Ne d+har+m+ma yug te/ di shi bi g+huSh+pe swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba dag/
67a7: sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung thos nas/ 'jigs dang skrag dang sngangs gyur te// thal mo sbyar nas 'khor bar gyur// 'byung po'i tshogs ni lpags pa rnams// sngangs 'khrugs rod rod por gyur nas// phyogs bcur rab tu 'byir byed cing/
67a8: bo che yang sgrogs par byed// rgyal po chen pos de shes nas// gsang ba gsum ni yang dag sgra// kye ma rigs sngags rigs sngags che// stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa de// thos nas 'byung
67b1: skrag gyur te/ dper na rab tu 'bar me dang // til mar ngar btags ral gri bzhin// go'u ta mas ni rab bshad pa'i// rig sngags spu gri'i so dang 'dra/ drang srong tshig ni legs bshad pa// de la gang zhig ma dad na// de yi bu yi thu bo ni// radra
67b2: ba'i zhags pas med par 'gyur/ / me ni rab tu 'bar byas la// bla dang 'og dang phyogs bzhar yang // sbyin bsreg gi ni chus gtor te// nas dang nyungs kar blangs nas su// mar gyi snying po dang sbyar nas// me yi nang du blugs par bya
67b3: legs par gsungs pa 'di thos nas/ / gal te myur du mi gtong na// thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ba ni// mar dang nyungs kar mer blugs bzhin// gnod sbyin chad pas bsdigs nas su// de dag bde ba mi rnyed do// de yi rtsib
67b4: logs g.yas par ni/ / 'bras chen nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin nad kyis btab pa ni// sha bkra'i nad kyis btab par 'gyur// lcang lo can gyi pho brang du// gzhar yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// lus ngan grags dang ldan
67b5: pa yi/ / khyim yang mthong bar mi 'gyur te// 'byung po mang po 'tshogs pa na// stan yang thob par mi 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dag gi dkyil 'khor du// zas skom dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur// stong chen rab 'joms mdo sde la//
67b6: gnod sbyin gang dag mi phyogs pa// de la rdo rje 'chang khros te// spyi bo dag ni 'gems par 'gyur// spu gri so ni rtsub po yis// de yi lce ni gcod par 'gyur// mtshon cha shin du rnon po yis// de yi sna dang rna ba gcod// 'khor lo sku
67b7: gri'i so 'dra bas/ glad pa rab tu gshegs par byed// tho ba ljags kyis dkris pa yis// de yi steng la 'joms par byed// rnag dang khrag ni dron mo dag/ de yi kha nas 'dzag par 'gyur// rig sngags zhags pa'i chad pa yis//
67b8: rtag tu 'khor bar 'gro ba na// 'khor ba gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor du// de nyid du ni 'khor bar 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po dpal ldan gaphyogs bzhi dag tu song gyur nas// chos kyi go cha bgos gyur te// bzang po'i khrel 'dug pa ni// shar
68a1: phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / / lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba yi// rgyal po dag ni phyin pa dang // de che stod
68a2: thams cad mkhyen/ / bar snang gnas la rab tu 'phags// tshangs pas sprul pa'i gzhal med khang // der ni rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs// de nas tshangs dang tshangs chen rnams// thal mo sbyar 'khod phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan gser
68a3: gyi ri bo 'dra/ / gser gyi mchod sdong dang yang mtshungs// me tog pad ma bzhin du rgyas// sa la'i rgyal po bzhin du rgyas// nyis dang draT+Tatas// ska ma rnams kyis yongs bskor bzhin// thub sku gser gyi kha dog la// mtshan rnams kyis ni yongs su bskor//
68a4: 'jig rten mes po tshangs pa yis// 'jig rten sgron ma bstod byas te// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// 'jig rten skyeng la 'di skad smras// 'jig rten skyong gi 'khor rnams kyis// rjes su bstan pa ma thob ste// gang phyir
68a5: 'di las sangs rgyas dang / / rang sangs rgyas dag 'byung 'gyur zhing // 'di las nyan thos rnams kyang skye// lha rnams dag kyang skye bar 'gyur// rig byed yan lagazug mthar phyin// bram ze rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur/
68a6: drang srong skal pa chen po dang // dge sbyong bram ze 'di las skye// khyed cag snying las chung byed pa// mi yi skye dgu gnod par 'gyur// tshangs pa yi ni tshig thos nas// 'jig rten skyong gi tshig smras pa// tshangs pa chen po//
68a7: de bzhin no// thub pa chen po de bzhin no// bdag gis ri rab bskul byas shing // sa yang rab tu bzlog byas la// rgya mtsho la ni thug pa rnams// rnam par sbyang ba nyid du bya// zhags pa dam po ma nyams pas// nyi ma zla ba
68a8: rlung rnams dang / / skar ma dag ni thams cad kyang // bdag gis su ni bcing bar bya// gang dag rab tu sdang byed cing // 'jig rten la ni phan mi phyed// de dag la ni thams cad du// phyogs kyang snang bar mi bya'o// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa
68b1: 'byung po rnams kyi phyir smod de/ / 'byung po mi yi skye dgu la// gnod par byed cing 'tshe bar byed// gang dag sngags dang sman rnams dang // rigs sngags las ni 'da' byed pa// 'di la sngags kyi dam pa ni// pha rol
68b2: gnon pa ston par byed/ / rig sngags las ni 'da' ba'i 'khor// kun du chad pas bsdigs byas ste// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// yang dag par yang brjod par bgyi// gang gi 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor du// 'di bshad pa na mi nyan
68b3: de dag chad pa bshad par bya/ / tshangs pas sprul pa'i mdo sde'o// sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// phan tshun du ni blta byas nas// bai dUr+ya dang gser dang dngul// mu tig rnams dang shel dag dang // spug dang rdo yi snying po dang /
68b4: rin chen bdun gyis brgyan pa yi// rtsibs stong kha dog gser 'dra ba'i// shing rta rnam pa bzhi byas pa// bzo rnams kun dang ldan pa ste// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro// rgyal po dag ni der bzhugs nas// 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor nyid du dong //
68b5: sa ni gser gyi phye ma dang // me tog dag gis bkang byas nas// mgul bar ltung dang skud pa dang / zhags pa dag kyang gdags byos la// phyogs rnams kyis ni ci snyed pa'i// 'byung po thams cad khrid shog ces// gnod sbyin gyi ni sde dpon kun// phyogs
68b6: bzhi dag tu dgye ba byas/ / stong chen rab tu 'joms pa yi// mdo sde yi ni dam pa 'di// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar du byung // lha rnams kun gyis rnam par bsams// stong chen po yi lus kyis su// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po btul// lus ngan po
68b7: yi tshig thos nas/ / gnod sbyin gyi ni sde dpon dag/ phyogs bzhi dag tu song nas su// gsang ba po la drag tu bsgo// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// dri za las byung gdon gyi rnams// shar phyogs chan 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i zhags
68b8: pas de dag kun/ / bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yi// 'byung po mang po nga la nyon// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// grul bum las byung gdon gyi rigs// lho phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun// bcing ba lnga
69a1: yis bsdams pa yis/ 'byung po mang po nga la nyon// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// ku las gdon du gyur pa rnams// nub phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun// bcing ba lnga yis bsdabs pa yi//
69a2: 'byung po mang po nga la nyon// thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad// gnod sbyin las ni gdon gyur pa// byang phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag/ mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun// bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa yis// 'byung po mang po la nyon// lus ngan
69a3: po'i bu mthu bo/ / kun tu rgyal ba mi la zhon// de yi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyin bye ba drug bcu dag/ bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun du drangs// de nyid kyi ni bu gnyis pa// skyes pa po zhes rnam grags pa/
69a4: de yi drung na 'khod pa yi gnod sbyin bye ba zug bcu dag/ bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun tu drangs// de nyid kyi ni bu gsum pa// de yi ming ni gdon mo tshe// de yi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyin bye ba drug bcu
69a5: rnams/ / ba ning pa rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun du drangs// de nyid kyi ni bu bzhi pa// de yi ming ni bum pa'i lho// de yi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyin bye ba drug bcu rnams// bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas//
69a6: mdo sde'i zhags pas kun du drangs// dbang phyug chen po lha chen po// lag bzhi pa la stobs po che// de yi drung na 'khod pa yi// gnod sbyin bye ba drug bcu rnams// bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas// mdo sde'i zhags pas kun du drang //
69a7: 'byung po 'joms pa'i ril ni// 'byung po thams cad lhag nas su// rigs sngags thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rig sngags 'di ni kun du bsams// chad pa mi bzad drag po ste// gang phyir sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs
69a8: go ru tas la gus par ni/ / thams cad de la skyabs su song // g.yo med par ni rjes zhugs shig/ thams cad med par gyur ta re// de nas thang cig yud tsam gyis// 'byung po mang po thams cad lhags// ri rnams dang ni g.yang sa dang // rgya
69b1: mtsho dang ni mtsho rnams dang / / klu dang 'bab chu lu ma dang // dba' rlong dag na gang 'khod des/ bskyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang// kun dgA dang ni nags rnams dang // mchod rten gnas dang grong gi gnas// ljon shing drung na gang gnas dang // grong
69b2: khyer sgo dang gang gnas dang / / grong rdal dang ni ljongs rnams dang // rgyal po'i pho brang sgo rnams dang // gzhal med khang na gang gnas dang / dkyil 'khor dag dang dur khrod dang // de bzhin lha khang rnams dang ni// mtshams dang shog gam gnas
69b3: rnams dang / / khang stong dang ni thams dang // gnod sbyin gang rnams bla 'og dang // phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams rnams nas// gnod sbyin bye ba stong rnams ni// rig sngags zhags pas dkrug pa rnams// rdza rnga dag ni brdungs nas su
69b4: la las rnga zlum dag ni brdungs/ / bi bang gling bu khar ba'i rnga// stobs chen rnams ni sgra 'byin te// rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs dang // klu dang gar rnams byas nas su// dbang po zla ba chu lha dang // b+ha ra dA dza skya dgu'i bdag/ mi ldan pa
69b5: dang kun du lta/ / mngon shes gangs can rdzogs pa dang // tsan dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang // mgul ba mdzes dang mgul nges dang // skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang // lha las byung ba'i ma ldan dang // dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// mi rgyal rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / de
69b6: bzhin phung po lnga zhes bya/ / g.yer ma dang ni nye zer dang / nya ldebs dang ni ral gri bu// kun gyi bshes dang grags 'dzin dang // 'brog gnas dang ni yid bzangs dang // khab sna dang ni ri sul la// lnga 'dzin dang ni khab bzangs dag/ sde dang dpung dang gzhon
69b7: par bcas/ / lha dang klu dang dri za dang // gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin// nyin gsum pa yi spyo byed dang // de bzhin bzhi pa'i rims dag dang // 'jig rten 'tshe ba gang yin gaganod sbyin srin po ma rungs rnams// phyogs bzhi nas ni bkug nas su// bci
69b8: ba lnga yis bsdams pa rnams/ / 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru// thal sbyar 'khod nas 'di skad smras// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la
70a1: phyag 'tshal lo/ / de dag gi ni mdun rgyug pa// 'byung po gnod sbyin lus po che// lag pa bzhi pa ma rung ba// rkang mangs dang ni rkang gcig pa// gang bzhi pa dang nang gnyis pa// rkang pa pa sgreng la spyi tshugs dang // lus mang
70a2: mgo bo gcig pa dang / / lus gcig pa la mgo bzhi pa// mig mangs po la lus byed dang // mig gcig lto ni bcu gnyis dang // bong bu rnga mo glang chen mgo/ lag pa bsgreng la mgo btung dang // mtshon cha'i so dang mtshon cha'i lag/ mtshon cha'i rkang
70a3: pa srin po'i rnams/ / zangs kyi sgra dang zangs kyi so// zangs kyi mig dang zangs kyi lag/ zangs kyi tho ba'i rkang pa dang // zangs kyi sna dang zangs kyi kha// rkang lag kun du 'bar ba dang // mi yi lus su gnas pa rnams// skur zhar lba ba gsum yod pa
70a4: mig mi sdug la kha glal pa/ / chu srin stag gi gzugs dang ni// gzugs mi sdug dang kha ral po// mchu 'phyangs po dang so yon po// rab tu gtum po khro gnyer can// gsus po che dang bum rna po// rna 'byangs pa dang rna ba med// lag rings
70a5: dang ni rna ba ring / / sna yi rtse dang lag rtse ring // lus skam lus ni ring ba dang // skra rings rab tu brgyan pa dang // rkang pam myid pa phra ba dang // dri nga ba dang bum lto bo// yan lag chu srin 'dra ba dang // gtun shing thob 'dra ba'i lto// gnam lto bo la rna po che
70a6: gyen dra brjes sgra rab du dmar/ / mge bo che la gzhu mgrin po// skem po sgur po bum lto go// ri rab rtse mo bskul nas su// me mdag gi ni char pa 'bebs// ljon shing ri dang rdo ba dang // sprin gyi tshogs kyi mdog 'dra ba// dung dang rnga chen rdza rnga dang // bral
70a7: bumadza bran rnams kyikyi/ 'jigs pa'i sgra ni rab tu 'byin// ming po che la bong bri'i sgra// nag po ser po sngon po dang // dmar sar me ltar dmar ser dang // khab 'dra'i spu dang ral gri'i sgra// dmang po khrag gis bskus pa rnams// mi ro dag ni byer nas
70a8: sa/ / za bzhin du ni rnam par rgyug/ so rnon lag pa dmar po dang // mchu ni khrag gis bskus pa dang // lus phyed dag ni zos pa dang // mkhal ma snying dang nang grol gyis// snyim pa shin du bkang ba dang // byin bdag ni za bzhin du// mer mer po
70b1: dad srog chags kyi/ / rkang lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'phrog/ keng rus kyi ni lus kyis su// skye bo mang po skrag par byed// khrag gis rab tu bkang ba yi// mi yi lpags pa thogs nas su// mi bzad dug gis kun bskus te// phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam
70b2: par rgyug/ grong dakhyer rnams kyi sgo dag dang / khyim nas khyim du rnam par 'thor// rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa rnams// phyogs bzhi dag tu 'khrugs par byed// de ltar de na rgyal po yis// gdon dang 'jigs pa chen po rnams// lhags pa de dag thams
70b3: cad kyang / rig sngags zhags pas rab tu bsdams// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// grong khyer grong dang yul 'khor dang // pho brang
70b4: 'khor na rgyu ba ni/ / gnod sbyin ma rungs mdangs 'phrog pa// snying rje med cing khrag 'thung ba// lus chen 'jigs pa chen po ste// stobs po che la sgra yang che// mgrin bcu po la mig stong po// gdon chen mig ni dmar po rnams 'khor ni mang po rnams btang ste24/
70b5: namatshon thogs rab tu 'jigs// sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa dang // lag bzhi lag na sgron ma thogs// lag na mtshon dang dbyig pa thogs// rdo rje mdung rtse lag thogs pa// rab tu drag pa'i dmag brgal nas// phyogs kun tu ni skrag par byed
70b6: sdang ba'i gnas na 'khod pa yi/ / gsang ba po ni dang kun kyang // mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu// skyes pa bud med gzhan yang 'dzin// sha khrag dron por bcas pa la// rnam par 'khrul cing 'dod pa'i gzugs// seng ge dang ni stag dang rta// ma
70b7: he ba lang bung burnga/ / glang po che yi gzugs 'dra dang // dom dang gzig dang sbyang ki dang // khyi dang wa dang ra dag dang // byi la byib spre'u yi gzugs// bas dang phag dang sre mong dang // nya dang rus sbal dag gi gzugs// kha cig dag ni sram gyi
70b8: gzugs/ / khra dang 'ug pa lu byug dang // bya rgod khra dang nya mid bcas// rma bya dang pa thi bya dang // khrud khrung dang ni bya rnams dang // kha gcig pa ga gi gzugs rnams su// gnod sbyin rnams ni mi yis mthong // mdab bzangs bya yi tshul gyis
71a1: kyang / / skye bo mang po skrag par byed// kha cig mi yi mgo can la// lus ni bya gag bong bu 'dra// kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tsho// lus dang bral ba dag tu snang // rnam par 'khrugs shing 'dod la mos// rgyu ma 'phreng /
71a2: bas kun du dkris// rtse gsum mdung gis rab 'debs shing // srog chags rnams la gnod par byed// mi bzad gdug pa'i dbugs 'byin cing // skye dgu 'di dag skrag par byed// srog chags rgyud ni ci snyed par// sna tshogs kyi ni
71a3: gzugs su snang / / kha cig dag ni ri yang thogs// la la ral gri 'khor lo thogs// grangs ni brgya phrag stong rnams te// dbyug pas bsdigs shing kha drag po/ mig phyud pa la bzhin mi sdug/ srin po so ni rno ba dang // sna dang rnang
71a4: bcad pa dang / lce chad gdeng ni gnyer ma can// rkang lag dag ni gtubs pa dang // mgo bo bcad pa'i srin po rnams// skabs ni rab tu tshol bar byed// sdig pa can rnams mdangs kyang 'phrog/ mig dag gi ni lus rnams la// rab
71a5: tu phra ba'i gdon du sdang / / spu yi bar dang gnod rnams dang // de bzhin rma yi kha rnams su// lpags pa de dag thams cad kyang // rigs sngags zhags pas rab tu drangs// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' byod la// phyag 'tshal skyes
71a6: bu mchog khyod la/ / thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ri yi rgyal po ri rab dang // de bzhin khor khor yug dang / bya rgod phung po gshol mda' 'dzin// spos ngang ljang dang gangs kyi ri// sna tshogs
71a7: brtsegs dang ban ra bA/ / na la da yer gnyis dang // dpal gyi ri yi rtse mo ni// gang dag shin tu mthong 'phags dang // ri bod dag kun la yang // lha dang drang srong gang gnas pa// de dag thams cad mi dga' zhing // 'jigs pa'i yid
71a8: kyis mya ngan byed/ / bye ba stong gi lha dag dang // bye ba phrag brgya'i lha rnams dang // lha yi bu mo skal chen dag/ thal mo rab tu sbyor ba byed// thags zangs ris dang sgra gcan dang // sim par byed pa'ang der phyin te// lha min bye ba phrag stong dang /
71b1: lha min bye ba phrag brgya dang // de dag bu mo 'phrul ldan pa// mang po kun kyang thal mo sbyor// rab tu gnas dang rgya mtsho dang // klu yi rgyal po gzi can dang // klu yi rgyal po ma dros dang // dga' bo nye dga' gnyis po dang // rdo rje blo gros bab shu dang /
71b2: gA dga' bo chen du mtsho// bya yi rgyal po mngad ba bzangs dang // rgya mtsho chen po 'khrug byed dang // stong phrag bye ba'i klu yi rnams// bye ba brgya yi klu dag dang // de dag bu mo rgal chen rnams// thal mo rab tu sbyor bar byed// nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka yang // sku
71b3: ma'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor/ / gser gyi me tog yan lag na// ma ga d+ha na 'jigs byed pa// gso ba'i mtha' na mi thod can// ko sa lan rab tu dkar// bzang po'i yul na kha spu can// gyad kyis yul na grags pa 'dzin// lnga 'byin
71b4: pa na skrag byed pa/ / ta m+me ba na mig dmar gnas// srung byed pa na ser sna ste// sems pan ni mig ser po// be'u la ban bum pa'i lho// dga' ba'i yul na ring por skyes// ba lang 'dzin na rab tu 'joms// dung yul na ni nyi ma'i grogs// ldong
71b5: chen rnams kyi gnod sbyin ni/ / brjod pa bcu drug de dag dang // lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che/ tshes skyong rab tu dkar ba dang // ser skya rab mdzes khyab 'jug pa// bum lho gsus pa zlum po dang // chu srin bden pa 'chang ba dang // lnga ldan
71b6: rgyal ba kyu mchog dang / / gnod sbyin chen po dbang phyug che// lag pa bzhi can stobs po che// sde dpa' rab tu 'dul ba ni// mthu bo che la stobs po che// gshin rje gshin rje'i pho nya dang // bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa dang // gnod
71b7: sbyin bye ba'i g.yog 'chang ba/ / gnod sbyin de ming 'phrog pa yin// sha ri ta ni sder bcas dang // ri yi bu mo sder bcas dang // ri yi bu mo gnod sbyin ma// gzi brjid chen mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'phrog ma zhes kyang grags pa dang // gdol pa
71b8: mo ni gtum mo dang / / bu rnams lnga brgya bskor ba dang // mi rdung nag mo ka ra ta te// pad ma dang na pad ma can// me tog so dang sa ga dang // srin mo bung bu'i rna can dang // tsan dan dang ni khyab 'jug len// seng ge ser skya dmar ser po// glang po klung yi so
72a1: can dang / ri ba shes drag po'i mche ba can// srin mo so bzang yod pa dang // tshangs pa len dang lngab 'dug len// gnod sbyin ta la ha la dang // gnod sbyin rnam pa'i mchu can dag/ mdud dang mda' gzhu kun thogs shing // meH/
72a2: ba lang ri dgas rnams// za zhing 'tshe ba de dag ni// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyug cing 'dod// sa 'di rab tu g.yo bar byed// nags tshal rnams kyang rab tu skems// ri rnams kun nas g.yo bar byed// skye dgu 'di dag 'che byed cing // phan tshun nas ni
72a3: 'dra ba dag/ rig sngags kyis ni drangs nas lhags// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa 'khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga dra// de dag
72a4: lhags par gyur pa dang / / de nas rgyal po rnam thos bus// 'jig rten mgon la 'di skad gsol// bdag gi phyogs cha byang phyogs su// rgyal po'i gnas su sprul pa ni// lcang lo ldan pa yid du mchi// de bas bdag ni lcang lo'i bdag/ rgyal po'i pho brang
72a5: lung lo can/ / lha rnams kun gyis bsams par gyur// phyir shin du mthon po can// rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa lags// 'phang du dpag tshad bcu drug ste// gser gyi rgyu las bgyis pa lags// phyogs bzhi cog ni re re la'ang // gnod sbyin rdo rje
72a6: 'chang bdag/ kun nas rab tu gnas par gyur// lag na mtshon cha legs par sprul// rgyal po'i pho brang de yi sgo// bzhi po gtod ba bgyis pa ni// gcig ni gser las bgyis pa'i sgo// gnyis pa dngul las bgyis pa ste// gsum pa shel gyi mo
72a7: mo lags/ / bzhi pa gser gyis rnam par spras// grong byer de yinang dag na// bskyed mas tshal gyi me tog rgyas// de yi nang na gzhal med khang // rin chen bdun rgyu sna tshogs mchis// rin chen sna tshogs ljon shing can// bya bran sa tshogs skad kyang
72a8: 'byin/ me tog sna tshogs legs par bkram// sna tshogs spos kyis byugs pa lags// gnod sbyin mo ni 'jom ma dang // klu dang rol mos rab tu brgyan// dpal byi ma pa nyams su myeng/ da ni 'byung po di kyis 'bor derang / gang dag 'khor zhing mchis bdag/
72b1: de// gang dag 'khor zhing mchis pa dag/ rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa ste// chos 'tshal ba dang chos spyod pa// srog chags rnams la 'tshe mi bgyid// zas dang skom gyis mi brel te// skye dgu mi bzad gzhan dag ni// 'ongs spyod chen po tshol bgyid
72b2: cing / / phyogs bzhi kun du rnam par lnga// grong khyer mo/ yi gam yo dang // bza' shing ra ba nags tshal na// gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po'i tshogs// bye ba stong phrag brgya mchis pa// de dag thams cad mdo sde ye// zhags pas drangs te brlag par/
72b3: bgyi/ rgyal po'i pho brang dbus na ni// chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas gyur pa// bsil ba'i rdzing dbus bskor ba ste// tsan dan nags kyis 'khor ba lags// kun nas dpag tshad drug bcu ste// khang pa brtsegs ma sprul pa dag/ gcig ni gser wa
72b4: bgyis pa ste/ / gnyis pa dngul las bgyis pa lags// gsum pa bai DUr+ya las bgyis// bzhi pa gtsang dang shel gyi rgyu// lnga pa mu tig dmar po ste// drug pa rdo yi snying po lags// bdun pa spug las bgyis pa ste/ brgyad pa rin chen
72b5: bdun las bgyis/ / bud med stong phrag brgya dag kyang // de dag re re kun na ni// lha ba lbub sna tshogs mchog dag dang // cha byad sna tshogs mang pos brgyan// glu dang rol mo sna tshogs dang // bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa mchis// de lta'i
72b6: rab tu dga' ba yis/ / bde zhing tshim par yid gyur cing // de na bdag ni dgun skyems dang // 'dod pa dag gis rab myos pas// bdag gis 'khor rnams 'phyan bgyid cing // phyogs bcu dag du 'jigs pa skyed// bud med dag dang skyes
72b7: pa dang / / de bzhin khye'u dang bu mo dang // mngal na gnas pa'ang 'jig par bgyid// dud 'gro'i skye gnas gtogs pa'ang 'tshe// skar ma dag dang nyi zla dang // gtum pa'i gza' rnams gnod par bgyid// le rtog sa bon 'bras bu dang // ma~M
72b8: tog sman dang zas skom dang / / mi rnams kyi ni dpal 'phrog cing // mthon po rnams kyang dma' bar bgyid// 'jig rten dag na nongs pa rnams// dmag dang 'thab mo shar gnyer dang // tshim gam zhig gam gas dbye ba// de kun 'byung
73a1: po'i rnam par gyur/ / sbed cing ston par bgyid pa dang // bzlog par bgyid cing nod par bgyid// 'jigs par bgyid cing lta bar bgyid/ dgrar 'gyur ba yang ston par bgyid// sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bgyid// nyal ba
73a2: ngag la gnod par bgyid/ / sgo nas se gol sgra gyur zhing // mi snyan brjed de za bar bgyid// mda' bo gnyen bshes gzugs dag tu// gda' zhing bka' mchis smra bar bgyid// bu mo sdug gu'i gzugs dag tu// 'dod la spyod pa dga' bar
73a3: bgyid/ nyi ma skar ma'i gzugs dang ni// zla ba'i gzugs su gda' bar bgyid// rlung dang skar mda' lce gzugs su// tshe la gnod par de dag gda'// skar mda'i tshogs dang 'dra ba dag/ 'jigs par bgyid pawa dang khyer// rnam par
73a4: sprul nas ljon shing dang / / mchod rten dag gis gnas na gda'// skyes pa gzhon nu'i gzugs mdzes pas// 'bar zhing shing rta'i sgra yang 'byin// gnas rnams dang ni shul dag tu// rnam pa sna tshogs rjes kyang ston// grong khyer dag dang khyim
73a5: rnams kyi/ / sgo yang gnod sbyin de dag 'byed// srog dang lus kyang blangs bgyis shing // lam ngan kun du skor bar bgyid/ rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag dang // rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnams dang // rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyi rnams// lus lan pa/
73a6: gnas par ston// nad rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // phyin ci log tu ston par bgyid// ji snyed 'jig rten rang bzhin dag/ thams cad log par de dag ston// rig sngags zhags pas drangs pas na// de dag kun kyang 'dir mchis so// de
73a7: nas rgyal po rnam thos bu/ / langs te thal mo rabasbyar na/ zhabs la 'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' ba// gser gyi mchod sdod 'bar ba bzhin// 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa po// thub pa chen po me dang 'dra// gnod sbyin gsang sngags mi bzang
73a8: can/ stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi dag/ byang gi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas// byang phyogs dag tu gnod par bgyid// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// de dag chad ba dag gis bshad// s+yAd ba the dad/ kharge/ kharge/ kharga gar b+he/ bi tsa kA/
73b1: na/ tsa kre/ rA dza ne/ tsan dre/ tsa ba le/ b+hIm pa ra ba te/ kha rA gre gu Ti la ga rA gre/ e kAk+Shi/ ba ra ga be te/ sA ra da ga ba ti tsi tra kA na ti/ bdag byang phyogs su dge bar gyur cig srA tA// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che//
73b2: gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang // bdag gi me tog spos dag dang // sbyin sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis// de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nad rnams thams cad
73b3: bcom par gyur/ / bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag
73b4: 'tshalo/ / rgyal chen yul 'khor srung ba yang // langs te thal mo sbyar btud nas// me tog tshogs ltar rgyas gyur cig/ ka la pi da ka'i sgra dbyangs can// khu byug dang ni rma bya'i sgra// rnga dang 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa// thub chen gnod sbyin
73b5: srin po dang / / dri za stong phrag drug bcu bzhi// shar gyi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas// shar phyogs pa la gnod par byed// 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni// de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad// s+yAd ya the dan// d+ha ra Ni d+hA ra Ni/ pra d+hA na sa ni//
73b6: b+han dza ne/ pra b+ha na dza na/ bi d+ha mni/ kim bur She shaka le mA ra rme thA la d+he shU la d+ha ra Ni/ shud d+ha tsa ra re/ g+ho shA ba te/ shA rA gre/ shAn ti/ bdag shar phyogs su dge bar gyur cig sA hA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rter skyong dang dbang phyug che/
73b7: gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang // bdag gis me tog spos dag dang // sbyin bsreg 'di ni blang bar bgyis// de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nad rnams thams
73b8: cad bcom par gyur/ / bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang // gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod
74a1: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po// thal mo sbyar te de nas langs// thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs// smra ba thams cad rab 'joms pa// the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa// 'jig rten thams
74a2: cad rnam 'dren pa/ / grul bum yi dgas srul po dag/ stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi rnams// lho yi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas// de nas byung la gnod par bgyid// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad// sAd ya
74a3: ngan/ shAn ti// shA ra ba ti/ kAn ti/ kA ra ba ti/ ki ma ka si/ kIng kar ti/ kim ba ti/ d+ha ra ni/ brda ni/ b+hU myi/ d+ha ra ni/ hi ma ba ti/ dz+ye ti sh+tsa ra Ne/ mA lA gri bdag lho phyogs su dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug me
74a4: gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang // bdag gi me tog spos dag dang // sbyin bsreg 'di ni blang bar gyis/ de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nad rnams thams cad bcom par
74a5: gyur/ / bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang // gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal
74a6: po mig mi bzang ba yang / / thal mo sbyar ba byas nas langs// sprin chen seng ge chen po pa// che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho che// gsung ba chen po dpa' chen po// g.yul chen rab tu 'joms mdzad pa// klu dang mdab bzangs gsang ba pa// stong phrag
74a7: drug bcu rtsa bzhi dag/ nub kyi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas// de nas byung ba gnod par bgyid// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni// de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad// s+yAd ya the dan/ baNi ba rA gre kha la ba ti/ ba li ni/ bi sha ma// bi ba shi/ sA ga
74a8: ra/ khA rI/ kA ba li/ tsaN DI li/ ki ra Ni/ nA ra dze na/ bi d+hA ra Ni/ bal+lu ma ti/ a tsa le bdag nub phyogs su dge bar gyur cig swA hA// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che// gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang /
74b1: 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang // bdag gi me tog spos dag dang // sbyin bsreg 'di ni blang bar bgyi// de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur// bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod
74b2: pa las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ / phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas tshangs pa tshangs chen yang // thal mo sbyar ba byas nas
74b3: langs/ / tshangs pas bkrus pa dag pa po// rig byed kun gyi pha rol phyin// skye bo dga' mdzad sman pa'i rje// 'jig rten thams cad gso mdzad pa// gnod sbyin srin po gang gi rnams// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams gnas pa dang // sa yi 'og dang
74b4: bar dang steng / / nam mkha' dag la gnas pa'i gdon// 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni// de dag chad pa bdag gis bshad// s+yAd ya the dan/ pra h+me/ pra h+ma/ g+ho she/ prah+ma swa re// badz+re badz+ra g+ho She/ badz+ra d+ha re/ s+thi te sA re/ a tsa la/ a ra ne i sha
74b5: ni/ / a rA ni te/ shA re/ ba rA gra/ prA ba te/ skA ra ba te// bdag phyogs thams cad tu dge bar gyur cig swA hA// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che// gnod sbyin sde dpon thams cad dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa
74b6: yang / / bdag gi me tog spos dag dang // sbyin bsreg 'di ni blang bar gyis// de dag gi ni brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang // nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur// bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad
74b7: las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ / rlung las byur dang ma khris las gyur// bad kan las gyur 'dus las gyur// nad rnams thams cad bcom par gyur// bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ phyag
74b8: 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ / phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
75a1: ni rgyal srid gcig gi phyir 'jig rten du byung ba ma yin/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni grong khyer dang // grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / grong dang / khyim nas sems can gcig gi bar gyi don gyi phyir 'jig rten du
75a2: byung ba ma yin gyi/ / 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshas pa dang bcas pa// dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
75a3: 'jig rten du byung ste/ de ni dper na sman pa mkhas pa'i mchog tu phyin pa// gso ba la brtson pa/ sman pas shes par bya ba shin tu bslabs pa rgyal po gcig gi don du byung ba ma yin// yul gcig gi don du byung ba ma yin
75a4: pa nas sems can gcig gi don gyi bar du byung ba ma yin pa dang 'dra'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyogs gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i phyogs de dag tu ma rnams dang // mi ma yinapa de dag kyang rnam par 'tshe bar
75a5: mi bya bar sems kyis/ nga yang yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ba dang // yangs pa can gyi grong byer chen po'i skye bo'i tshogs phal po che'i don kyang byas par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang byas par 'gyur ro snyam
75a6: du dgongs te/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang // sham thabs bsnams nas lhung zed bsdams te// dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang thabs gcig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri las shod tu gshegs pa dang //
75a7: mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lha'i gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te// bcom ldan 'das la g.yas rol nas phul lo// phul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yo ba cing 'dug par gyur to// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
75a8: byin gyis kyang gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yon rol nas phul lo// phul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang re re zhing lha'i
75b1: gdugs lnga brgya tsam blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la snam logs nas phul nas bcom ldan 'das la rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang // gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
75b2: nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin mthu bo che sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang bcas pas kyang so so nas lha'i gdugs dag blangs te// nyan thos rnams la phul nas rdul yab kyis g.yob cing 'dug par
75b3: gyur to/ / de lta bu'i grags pa dang / bkur sti dang / brnyes par bya ba brnyes nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri las shod tu babs te// yangs pa can gyi grong khyer
75b4: chen po ga la ba der gshegs pa dang / yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das shin du mdzes pa// dad par 'os pa dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dbang po dul ba/ thugs dul ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas
75b5: kyi dmapa pha rol du phyin pa brnyes pa/ / dbang po dper zhing khugs pa/ glang po chen po lta bu shin du dul ba// mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal pa// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan
75b6: pa/ / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus shin du rgyas pa// shing sa la'i rgyal po ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par spras pa/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba kun du 'gyed pa// mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na ri bo'i spos la me'i phung po rab tu 'bar
75b7: ba dang 'dra zhing / / bcom ldan 'das gser gyi ri bo chen po dam pa ltar lham me/ ldan no// lhung de rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par
75b8: gyur nas/ / sems dad par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por lam gang nas gshegs pa'i lam de phyogs shing chag chag 'debs/ byi dor byed me tog 'thor/ dar gyi lda ldi dang / dril bu dang /
76a1: gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/ bdug spos sna tshogs kyis gdugs nas// bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong sa phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// de nas
76a2: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gi mthil 'khor lo brtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i ri mo can/ me tog pad ma'i snying po ltar 'jam pa/ sngon legs par spyad pa'i mtshan gyis rgyan pa// gzhon shachags shing 'jam pa nyi ma'i 'od zer bas
76a3: lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ 'od zer brgya phrag mang po kun tu 'phro ba/ dri ma med pa'i phyag gis li tsa byi dag gi mgo la byugs te rjes su bstan pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i nang du gshegs
76a4: nas/ / nam gyi gung thun la sgo skyes kyi gzhi zhabs kyis mnan nas phyogs bzhir gzigs te/ phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas na bza' bla gos gsol te bka' stsal pa/ phyi ma'i dus na dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen
76a5: nam/ / dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gang su yang rung ba dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la mchod pa byed pa dang // stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar par byed pa'i chos
76a6: kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing ston pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de dag la yams kyi nang
76a7: da/ khris pa dang / tshud pa ga slo dang // 'khrug pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'ching ba dang // a mchu dang / shugs dang / than pra ma dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i sdug bsngal ba'i las kyis mi tshugs shing / 'tshe bar byed pa thams cad kyis mi
76a8: thub par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon
76b1: thams cad las thar par bgyid pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcos pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sa sa rgyas kyi b+hag rgya de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
76b2: bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// btsun pa de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ mi mjed
76b3: kyi bdag po tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// s+yAd la the dan/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ sA ra ma tsa le/ pra kri te ba Ne/ pra kri te nir g+ho She/ sa man te/ khu khe/ s+thi re/ s+thA ba re/
76b4: bi g+huSh+Ta/ sha ba de/ prag la ne/ pA ra da ga me/ sA ra su te/ ba lI ma hA ba le/ ma hA ni ra b+hU se swA hA/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lus su gtogs pa dran pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / ting nge 'dzin gsum dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
76b5: pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / rjes su dran pa drug dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang
76b6: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / rnam par grol ba'i skye mched bcu gcig dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan
76b7: lag bcu gnyis dang / rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang / dbugs dbyung ba dang / rngub pa rjes su dran pa rnam pa bcu drug dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang /
76b8: tshangs pa de ni stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i mdo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
77a1: rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya ste/ sangs rgyas bsgrub pa'o// chos bsgrub pa'o// dge 'dun bsgrub pa'o// tshangs pa bsgrub pa'o// dbang po bsgrub pa'o// 'jig rten skyong ba bsgrub pa'o// dbang phyug bsgrub
77a2: pa'o/ / bden pa bsgrub pa'o// lam bsgrub pa'o// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsgrub pa'o// zla ba bsgrub pa'o// nyi ma bsgrub pa'o// gza' bsgrub pa'o// rgyu skar bsgrub pa'o// sAd ya the dan/ sA le/ ko si ne/ bi d+ha ra Ni/ ba rA gra/ sA
77a3: A mar sha Ni/ a mo g+ha ba te/ sa tsa ni kA li/ na ka li kA shi ka ba ti/ b+ha ra ni/ b+ha ra ka sha khe/ sa man ta pra ba te/ sa ra prA ba te/ stam b+ha Ni/ stam b+ha prA ba te/ badz+ra d+ha re swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su
77a4: bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / 'jig rten 'di'am yang dag 'das pa dang / mtho ris dag na rin chen mchog yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi lhar gyur pa/ mi yi mchog dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa med// de bas 'di ni/
77a5: rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ zad pa chags bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas// shes pas shAkya thub des rab tu phye// bdud rtsi zhi ba 'dus byas ma yin pa// chos de dang ni mtshungs pa gang
77a6: yang med/ / de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhin rab bstan pa// ston pa'i rnal 'byor bla med rtag sgrub pa// rdo rje lta bu'i mig gnyis lam mthong ba//
77a7: ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin// de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ gang zag chen po brgyad po rab sngags shing // gang zag zur bzhir brjod pa de dag ni// drang srong chen
77a8: po gang zag mtshungs med pa/ / bde bar gshegs pas sbyin pa'i gnas shes gsungs// de la byin na 'bras bu cher 'gyur te// zhing rab gshin la sa bon btab pa bzhin// 'di ni dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa
77b1: de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ gang dag brtan pa'i yid kyis rab brtson zhing // gau ta ma'i btin la 'jug byed na// de dag thob nas bdud rtsi 'jug thob ste/ mun pa bsal nas mya ngan 'das thob pa// de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog/
77b2: tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ lta ba 'di la sbyar ma thag tu ni// 'jigs tshogs lha dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang // the tshom dang ni nyon mongs gsum po dag/ gcig char spangs te 'phags pa'i
77b3: bden mthong ba/ / des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ lus sam ngag gam 'on te yid kyis kyang // sdig pa rnam gsum nam yang mi byed cing // glo bur byas na'ang 'chab par mi byed/
77b4: la// de ltar de dag lta bas 'dzin mi byed// de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ ji ltar dbang po'i sdong po sar btsugs pa// phyogs bzhi'i rlung rnams kyis ni mi g.yo ltar/
77b5: 'phags pa'i lam gyi dam pa mthong ba yi// gang zag 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de bzhin no// des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog du gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ shes rab zab mos shin tu bstan pa
77b6: yis/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa su dag rnam sgom zhing // lus kyang sbyin par yid la byas pa ni// de dag 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur// des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge
77b7: bar shog/ ji ltar me ni rlung gis rab gtor ba// lag tu blangs te bgrang du med pa nyid// de ltar kun du sbyor ba rab btang ba// sangs rgyas sras rnams bstan du med par 'gro// des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsum/
77b8: bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ sems can gang dag gro dang mi 'gro ba// de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig/ ston mchog lha dang mis ni mchod 'os pa// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar
78a1: shog/ sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba// de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig/ zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa// chos la phyag 'tshal ded 'dir dge bar shog/ sems can gang dag 'gro
78a2: dang mi 'gro ba/ / de dag thams cad 'dir ni bde gyur cig/ tshogs kyi dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa// dge 'dun phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te// sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa
78a3: dag/ skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog/ 'di ni rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis// shin tu bden pa gsung zhing brdzun med pa// bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog/ de kun
78a4: 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig swA hA/ / sAd ya the dan/ d+hi ri bi d+hi rai/ ba la nir g+ho She/ ba la sA re/ sA ra ba te/ stu ti pra tu ta prA ba te/ A ra d+he/ ar nir g+ho She/ A ra ba ta/ a ts+tsha te/ ba la ba te/ shwa ra prA ba te/ sA raM ga me/ sur+ya ba le/
78a5: sUr+ya nir g+ho She swA hA// tshangs pa stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las rab tu thar bar byed pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi
78a6: bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi gnas so// chos kyi gnas so// dge 'dun gyi gnas so// tshangs pa'i gnas so// dbang po'i gnas so// 'jig rten skyong ba'i gnas so// dbang phyug gi gnas so// drang srong chen po'i
78a7: gnas so/ / 'byung po'i gnas so// mig gi gnas so// rgyu'i gnas so// phyogs kyi gnas so// bstan pa'i gnas so// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o// nyan thos rnams kyis reg pa'o// tshangs pas
78a8: byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ / dbang pos rab tu bsngags pa'o// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mchod pa'o// dbang phyug gis phyag byas pa'o// lha thams cad kyis kun tu mchod pa'o// rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'o// mtha
78b1: pa rnams mngon par dga' bar gyur pa'o/ / drang srong rnams kyis rab tu sngags pa'o// tshangs pa rnams kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o// lha rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'o// bus byed pa rnams kyis bsangs pa'o// rigs bzhi 'jig rten
78b2: gyis dga' bar byas pa'o/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul lo// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal lo// drang srong rnams kyi gnas so// nyan thos rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'o// rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams kyi gnas
78b3: so/ / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi 'byung gnas so// nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms pa'o// bag la nyal gyi zug rngu rnams 'byin pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam kun tu ston pa'o// thar pa'i sgo rnams 'byed pa'o// 'jigs tshogs la/
78b4: lta ba rnams 'jig par byed pa'o// nga rgyal gyi ri rab tu snyil bar byed pa'o// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skams pa'o// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can thams cad sgrol ba'o// bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa'o// bdud kyi 'khor skrag par byed
78b5: pa'o/ / bdud kyi mchil pa 'dor ba'o// nyon mongs pa'i g.yul las sgrol ba'o// mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par byed pa'o// 'khor ba'i khyim nas 'byung bar byed pa'o// s+yAd ya the dan/ khaD+ge kha n+te/ khen+de g+ho She/ u sho d+ha ne/ sA
78b6: ra thi/ pra b+he de/ bi pu la pra b+he/ saM kar Sha Ni/ bi kar Sha Ni/ bi shA gra ba ti/ shud d+ha sA d+ha ni/ ba ru Na ba te/ bA sa be/ bi b+hu Sha ne/ bi saM ga me/ ba shu ba ti/ bu spag d+he/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang // nye bar 'tshe ba dang /
78b7: dal ba thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ stong chen por bcu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i mdo sde 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
78b8: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'dis ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten phyag rgyas btab pa ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer bla na med par zhugs so//
79a1: de'i don gyi phyir sngon mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / pha ma dang / sbyin gnas dang / bla ma lta bu rnams la bsnyen
79a2: bkur to/ / ngas par spyod pa spyad do// tshul khrims bsrungs so// sbyin pa byin no// snying rje'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su bskangs so// byang chub thob par bsgrubs so// bdud pham par byas so// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang
79a3: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gis skad gcig dang / tho blos gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/ kye ma rig snga gra ga sngam che/ stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa/
79a4: sangs rgyas phyag rgya de yis ni// phyogs bzhi'i sems can thams cad srung // phyag rgya gang gis btab gyur na// 'byung po thams cad skrag bgyid pa// stong chen rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo// phyag rgya bdag cag stsal bar bgyi// mi gang
79a5: rab tu sdang ba dang / / bstan pa 'di la ma dad pa// de dag tshangs pas sprul pa yi// rig sngags chad pas gcad par bgyi// brgya byin gyis ni spyi bos blangs// 'jig rten skyong bas rgyas btab bo// s+yAd ya the dan/ ka li ma ge/ b+hA ra de/ dzu'u ta
79a6: gre dzA man/ si ma hA pa ne/ sA rA gra prA pa te/ tad sa gA mi ni/ mA li ni/ hu li si hu li si hu li si tsu la me/ ha ha ma/ ha ha ma/ sud ma ni// ba rA gra/ pa ti/ hasti ne/ ne ba ra mi ta/ tsan DA li/ tsa ra me/ tsa rA tsa ra swA hA// stong chen po rab tu 'joms
79a7: pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ kun tu yog kun tu bdug sos// phyogs bzhi'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po sha za rnams kyis
79a8: sgra skad drag po phyung ba/ kye ma'o sdug bsngal kye ma'o brlag/ bdag cag 'byung po'i tshogs phung ngo // 'byung po'i tshogs ni rab tu phung // bdag cag rtag tu dbang gi khrid// srog chags 'byung po thams cad ni// de ring dgrar bcas dbang med do//
79b1: de dag sa la 'khod nas ni// bum zhing rnam par zhum gyur nas// 'gre zhing ldog par rab tu byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa gzhi rdo rjer mngon par sprul pa dang / de dag kyang phyogs bzhir byer ro// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis
79b2: phyogs bzhir me lce'i phung po chen po mngon par sprul pa dang / / de dag nam mkha' la rgyug go// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas nam mkha' lcags su mngon par sprul pa dang // de dag shing ta la bdun tsam nas nam mkha' la kun
79b3: du rgyug go/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis ral gri dang / mda' dang / mdung thung dang / mdung dang / mda' bo che dang / shing ljon pa dang / ri'i char mngon par phab po// de'i tshe gnod sbyin lnga stong mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su
79b4: kun nas 'dus pa rnams rig sngags kyi dmod pas bcom ste/ rims nad kyis btab nas myos te/ myo zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te gsol pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
79b5: thugs brtse ba can lags kyis dge sbyong gau ta mas bdag cag bskyab tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba po de dag la byams pas khyab par mdzad nas bslab pa gzhi na du btsud do// bdag cag phyag rgya spong gyur na/
79b6: ma bsad pa yi 'gro gang dang // pha bsad pa yi 'gro gang dang / dgra bcom pa yang gsod gang dang / dge 'dun dbyen bgyid 'gro gang dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas la sdang sems kyis// sku mtshal phyung ba bgyis pa yi// 'gro ba gang lag
79b7: der mchi'o/ / a rdza ka yi dog pa ltar/ mgo ni tshal pa bdun 'gas shing // gnod sbyin nad kyis btab pa dang // bdag lus sha bkra 'byung bar shog/ gang 'di rgyal bas gsungs pa'i mdo// stong chen rab tu 'joms pa yi// rig
79b8: sngags rgyal las 'gal bgyis ni/ / bdag cag 'dod bzhin mi 'gyur ro// de'i tshe grong khyer chen po yangs pa can na yams kyi nad dang // 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad rgyun
80a1: chad par gyur to/ / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rang rang gi spyod yul las 'das so// ngang pa dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu brug dang / rma bya dang / ngur ba dang / shang shang de'u dang / bya
80a2: tshegs rnams kyang sgra bstan pa 'byin to/ / mi 'am ci rnams ni lha'i bu mo bzhin du lus la gnod pa med do// rin po che'i cha byad rnams kyis ma bkrol bar 'khrol lo// rnga bo che dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga bran dang / bi ba dang / gling bu rnam
80a3: kyang ji ltar gnas su bkod pa bzhin du sgra byung ngo / / bal po se'u dang / bil ba dang / s+phu ru ra dang / n+ya gro d+ha dang / byang chub kyi shing dang / spre'u gnas dang / blag sha dang / u dum par dang / sa la dang / ta ma la'i shing ljon pa rnams kyang dri rab tu 'byin
80a4: to/ / lha brgya stong dag gis kyang a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste/ bar snang las me tog gi char mngon par phab po// mi ma yin pa'i dri dag kyang / 'jig rten du byung ngo // de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'dra
80a5: la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gad la la zhig gis bslab pa'i gzhi yongs su bzung ste/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde'i rgyal po gdon thams cad las thar bar
80a6: byed pa sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs shing bzung ste/ klags shing bshad la kun chub par bgyis shing / yi ger bris nas mdud pa bor te 'chang na/ de la yams kyi nad dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad
80a7: 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'thab mo dang / bcing ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa nas phra ma'i bar gyi sdig pa mi dge'i tshes rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so// rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur
80a8: lags so/ / yul 'khor mtshams gcad par 'tshal ba// khrus bgyis pa/ zas dkar gsum 'tshal ba// zas ngan pa rnam lnga spangs pa// mi'i bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yongs su bzung ba// sems can thams cad la sems
80b1: snyoms pa/ / shin du brgyan pa/ gos dang / rgyan dang ldan pa des grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / sum mdo dang / khyim rnams nyal nya ril gyi phung po ma mchis par bgyis te/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi dbus kyi dog ma/
80b2: rnams su me tog sil ma bkram la// spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu 'dug par bgyi'o// phyogs bzhir bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis pa brgyan pa/ lag na mtshon thogs pa bzhi dang / dril bu bzhi dang / rin po che'i snod bzhi gzhag go// snga drol
80b3: dus kyi tshe gdugs shar ba dang / rig sngags klag par bgyi ste/ mdo sde zlas shing klag par bgyi'o// yi ger bris te mchod rten chen po dang / shing ljon pa chen po dang / rgyal mtshan chen po'i rtse mo la bstod de btags la/ me tog sna tshog
80b4: dang / spos sna tshogs dag gis dgud zla phyed kyi bar du mchod par bgyi'o// gdugs re re zhing rig sngags lan re klag par bgyi'o// de ltar na yul 'khor yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// de ltar grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang /
80b5: ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dang / gnas dang / gtsug lag khang dang / khyim dang / zhing dang / las khangad dang / shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu dang ne'u sing dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / gnag lhas dang / phyugs lhas rnams
80b6: nyal nyil ma mchis par bgyis te/ ser ldeng dang / rgya shug gi zhugs blta ma la/ dogs la me tog sil ma bkram ste/ sgo gang g.yas g.yon nas dri sna tshogs kyis bdugs la/ sa bon thams cad mar gyis bskus te/ phyog
80b7: bzhir gtor bar bgyi/ / chab sgor tshon skud sna tshogs bri bar bgyi'o// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa dag ni gtor la slar yang gzung bar bgyi'o// rig sngags kyang klag par bgyi'o// yi ger bris sam/ mdud pa mdud de
80b8: mthon po'i khar btags la mchod par bgyi'o/ / nad pa'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam// sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel lam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gzugs
81a1: khri'u 'am za ma tog gi steng du bzhag ste/ phyag brgya bzhi bgyis la gzhag par bgyi'o// me tog sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod
81a2: sbyin gyi sde dpon dang / / gnod sbyin stobs po che dang / 'phrog ma la sogs pa'i ming gis dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bgyi'o// de rnams kyi stobs dang / dbang phyug dang / byin gyis bdag dge bar gyur cig/ bdag la bsrung bgyis
81a3: shig/ nad thams cad las thar bar gyur cig/ nad pa'i zas dang / skom dang / sman rnams kyang rig sngags 'dis btab ste stsal bar bgyi'o// rdzogs sangs rnam par sangs rgyas tshe// 'jig rten skyong bas phyogs bzhi nas/ snod
81a4: bzhi dag ni blangs nas su/ / bde bar gshegs la phul ba dang / mthu yis gcig tu sprul mdzad pa// lha yis gnod mchog de dang ni/ bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams// ston pa'i phyag na bsnams gyur pa/ bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gri
81a5: sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog/ de bzhin lha mo 'phrogs ma yis// lha rdzas dge ba a ru ra// blangs nas ston la rab phul ba// bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams// bden pa'i tshig ni 'di dag gis// nad pa rnams kyi nad sel cing //
81a6: nyes pa thams cad 'phrog byed pa// sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog/ sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gzi brjid dang // gtsug tor can gyi stobs rnams dang // thams cad slob kyi bden tshig dang // log dang sel gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
81a7: gser zhes bya ba'i ye shes dang / 'od srung gi ni rdzu 'phrul dang / shAkya seng ge'i mthu rnams kyis// sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog/ nad pa shar phyogs kha bstan la/ sman rnams nye bar stsal bar bgyi// de yi tshe na rig sngags 'di
81a8: lag mthil bzhag ste klag par bgyi/ / s+yad ya the dan/ kha Te kha Te/ kha Te kha Ta/ bi kha Te/ bi ma le/ bi lam be/ ba le/ ba la la ti/ tsan dre/ tsa ra Ne/ a mri ta nir g+ho She mA hA// rlung las gyur dang mkhris las gyur// bad kan las
81b1: gyur 'dus las gyur/ / nad rnams thams cad rab bcom ste/ bdag la rtag tu dge bar shog/ rtes gang yongs dang ldan pa'i las rnams la skyes pa 'am/ bud med gdugs zhag gcig spang bar bgyis pa/ rab tu bkrus pa/ shin tu
81b2: brgyan pa des dogs la me tog gi sil ma bkram ste/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs la seng ldeng dang / rgya bug rigs gnyis kyi zhugs bus te/ sa bon thams cad phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o// zhugs kyi nang du'ang gtor bar bgyi'o// rtsa ba
81b3: thams cad dang / me tog thams cad tshon skud sna tshogs la brgyus te ral gri 'am/ mdung rtse gsum pa 'am/ mdung ngam/ mda' la gdags par bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs sbyar te/ bum pa chen po'i nang du blugs la/ gang byad sems kyis
81b4: phog pa de skud pa des bcings te/ bum pa'i chab kyis bkru bar bgyi'o// skud pa yang ral gris bcad de zhugs kyi nang du dor ro// stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di yang brjod par bgyi'o// gang dag sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas
81b5: sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos dang / tshangs dbang dang ni 'jig rten skyeng // gnod sbyin sde dpon dbang phyug dang // de bzhin gnod sbyin stobs chen dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang // de dag mthun dang gzi brjid kyis// ro la
81b6: la sa rnams chab gyur cig/ rdo rjes rin chen phug pa dang // me yis bus shing sreg pa dang // rlung gis sprin ni mthong ba dang // nyims nags tshal skems byed pa// bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis// byad sems las rnams tshig par shog/
81b7: spos dang me tog sna tshogs kyis/ sdig pa thams cad nges par bsal// tad ya thA/ hu me hu me/ ka la li/ ka kha li/ kha ra le/ dzu hri ni/ dza ba le/ ha ra gre/ ha ri Ni shA ba ri/ shA na ta/ pra shA na ti swA hA/ d+ha ba ni swA hA/ pra d+ha ba ni swA hA/ gAn
81b8: d+ha ra pa swA hA/ ba laM gi ni swA hA/ sarba kA khor de tshe da ni swA hA/ lha thams cad kyis gsang sngags 'di dag gis 'ad pying ste pa dang / ro langs dang / sman dang / sngags dang / dug dang / dug sbyar ma rnams gcad do// ba shi bi/ go// pham
82a1: par byas so/ / pha rol pham par byas so swA hA/ lba ba dang / shu pa dang / spro ba dang / 'bras dang / 'brum bu dang / gom po dang / dug 'thungs pa las thar bar 'tshal ba shin du khrus bgyis pa// shin tu brgyan pa/ stan bzang po'i steng/
82a2: du mchis te/ rig sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang / rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang // dgra bcom bdag mthu dag dang // gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang // shA ri'i bu yi shes rab dang // maud gal bu yi rdzu
82a3: 'phrul dang / / ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni// 'od srung sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang // kauN+Di n+ya'i sngar thob dang // kun dga' bo yi thos pa dang // tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang // brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong ba'i yul rnams dang //
82a4: dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dag dang // sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang // 'phrog ma gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang // de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis// bdag gi dug ni dug med shog/ dug med dug rnams 'jig byed pa// gsang sngags tshig
82a5: rnams de lag so/ / swad ya the dan/ ha ri ke shi na ge le/ e he ra/ a ma re/ aN+Da re/ pa Na D+ha re/ ka Ta ke/ ka yu'u re/ ha se ha se ha saM/ kha se kha se kha se kha raM ge/ ma ru ga ha Ne swAhA/ mu muk+Sha sA hA/ hi le swA hA/ mi le swA hA// 'bras dang rma
82a6: dang shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang ni 'brum bu dang / lhog pa dang ni g.ya' ba ni// bdun pa lags te rab tu bcom// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste// bcom ldan sangs rgyas drug mi mnga'// sangs rgyas
82a7: gzi yis drug bcom mo/ / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten drug gsum ste// bcom ldan chos ni dug mi mnga'// chos kyi gzi yis dug bcom mo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten
82a8: drug gsum ste/ / bcom ldan dge 'dun drug mi mnga'// dge 'dun gzi yis drug bcom mo// sa ni drag gi ma yin te// sa ni dug gi pha yang yin// bden pa'i bden tshig de dag gi/ bdag gi drug ni drag med shog/ drug ni sa yi nang du song //
82a9: gang ba'i snod du dug song shig swA hA// de nas khrag khrug dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra rnams las rgyal bar 'tshal bas thog mar mchod rten chen po la mchod par bgyi'o// stong chen po rab
82b1: tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yang brjod par bgyi'o/ / sangs rgyas kyis ni bdud pham mdzad// chos ma yin ni chos kyis so// dge 'dun gyis ni mu stegs pam// dbang pos lha min pham par gyur// lha min rnams kyis zla ba
82b2: pham/ / nam mkha' lding gis rgya mtsho'o// ma yis shing rnams pham par gyur// chus ni me yang pham par 'gyur// rlung gis sprin rnams rab tu pham// rdo rje yis ni rin chen thug/ lha rnams bden par rab tu gsungs// sa yang bden par gnas
82b3: pa lags/ / sangs rgyas dang ni chos kyang bden// bden pa rgyal gyur brdzun ma lags// s+yAd ya the dan/ a mri taM/ a gra bu ste/ ba hu pha li/ ni bA ra Ni/ sarba ar tha sA d+ha ni/ a ba rA dzi te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra ni/ gu h+NA ba ra tAM/ gau ta me/ ku b+ha ma ti/ dzam d+ha ni
82b4: swA hA/ pra dza ma b+ha ni swA hA/ ba la pra b+han dza ni swA hA/ dza ye swA hA/ bi dza ye swA hA/ dza ya bi dzi ye swA hA/ phyir rgol ba ni kun las rgyal// sdig pa thams cad rab tu pham/ swA hA/ de nas ston pa kun mkhyen gyis// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs/
82b5: mi 'khrugs pa dang snang mdzad spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // rin chen 'od 'phro ri rab mu khyud 'od dpag med// rdo rje rnams kyi mtshan rnams rtag tu gzung na ni// 'jigs par 'gyur ba ma yin non par mi 'gyur ro// gang gis mthu
82b6: stobs chen po brgya po 'di dag gi/ mtshan rnams rjes su bzung ba'i phyir ni rab brjod cing // kun du bskyab pa byas na de yi lus la ni// me dang dug dang mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// gal te de la gnod pa byed pa nye bar gnas
82b7: gshed mas mtshon rnams kyis ni gdab par gzas pa las/ / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rje su dran na ni// mtshon cha de dag dum bu dum bur chag cing 'brul// gal te mtshon cha rnams ni thogs par 'gyur na yang // lag pa
82b8: chag nas sa la rab tu ltung bar 'gyur/ / de yi lus la cung zad 'bab par mi 'gyur te// sngon chad byas pa gang yin pa ni ma gtogs so// lha rnams kyis 'thun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas spyod
83a1: yul mtha' yas khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bden par rab ston thub pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// deng ni bden pa rnams la gnas nas mchi bar bgyi// bdag gi las rnams thams cad 'bras bur bcas gyur cig/
83a2: de nas tshangs pa tshangs chen gyis// langs te thal mo sbyar btud nas// stong chen rab tu 'joms byed pa// legs par gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di// byis pa rnams la phan bgyid pa// rig sngags bdag gis brjod par bgyid//
83a3: gang gis dang por 'dzam gling du// rig sngags rab tu ston mdzad pa// chos kyi rgyal po snang mdzad pa// sangs rgyas dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// khyad par 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang // tshogs kyi dam pa dge 'dun dang // sangs
83a4: rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ / tshangs pas 'di skad tshig gsol to// gang dag sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kyi ni nyan thos dang // drang srong dang ni 'jig rten skyong // lha rnams ji snyed mchis pa dag/ de kun mi yi
83a5: 'jig rten na/ / 'di las skyes pa sha stag go// thub chen mngal la 'tshal ba yi// gnod sbyin srin po 'di ni mchis// rgyal po rnams kyis mthong mi nus// bstan par yang ni mi nu so// gang la bu ni mi 'chags dang // gang gi mngal ni/
83a6: mi gnas dang // skyes pa bud med 'dra ba na// dbang po rnams ni myos par bgyid// mer mer po dang nur nur po// bu yi sa bon ma ru bgyid// gang yang mngal ni thur du gyur// sha ma mi 'byung gnod bgyid pa// de rnams kyi ni ming brjod kyis//
83a7: 'jig rten mgon po dag la gson// 'jam pa po dang ri dgas rgyal// skem byed brjed byed khu tshur can// ma mo dang ni dzi ma ka/ 'dod pa can dang nam gru dang // bsrul po dang ni ma dga' byed// bya dang gnya' ba'i lag can dang // bzhin
83a8: brgyan dang ni mig 'phyang ba/ / de dag thams cad sa la rgyu// gdon rnams bcwa lnga de dag ni// byis pa rnams la 'jigs par bgyid// ji ltar byis pa 'dzin pa yi// mtshan dang gzugs kyang brjod par bgyi// 'jam pa pos ni zin gyur na//
83b1: mig ni rab tu 'gyur bar bgyid// ri dgas rgyal gyis zin gyur na/ skyugs pa mi bzang skyugs par 'gyur// skem byed kyis ni zin gyur na// skem byed pas ni byis pa 'gul// brjed byed kyis ni zin gyur na// 'gre zhing de ltar sgra yang 'byin//
83b2: dbu ba dang ni khu tshu 'dzag/ khu tshur can gyis rab zin na// khu tshur 'chang zhing 'byed par bgyid// ma mo yis ni zin gyur na/ rgod cing de bzhin sgra yang 'byin// dza mi kas ni rab zin na// nu zho nu bar mngon mi dga'// 'dod pa can gyis
83b3: rab zin na/ / mal naganyid log du bar 'gyur// nam grus rab tu zin gyur na// lce la sos ni 'cha' bar bgyid// srul pos rab tu zin gyur na// ku co 'don cing sgra yang 'byin// ma dga' byed pas zin gyur na// rnam pa sna tshogs
83b4: gzugs su 'gyur/ / bya yis rab tu zin gyur na// mnam pa'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur// gnya' lag can gyis zin gyur na// mgul ba rab tu 'gag par 'gyur// bzhin brgyan gyis ni zin gyur na// rims kyis btab cing 'bru bar 'gyur//
83b5: mig 'phyang bas ni zin gyur na// skyigs bu dang ni sngam pa 'byung // byis pa ji ltar sreg bgyid pa// de yi gzugs ni brjod par bgyi// 'jam pa po ni ba lang gzugs// ri dgas rgyal po ri dgas 'dra// skem byed pa ni gzhon nu'i gzugs
83b6: brjed byed pa ni wa 'dra'o/ / khu tshur can ni bya rog gzugs// ma mo de ni ma yi gzugs/ dza mi ka ni ta yi gzugs// 'dod pa can ni rdo rje'i gzugs// nam gru khyi yi gzugs kyis te// srul po phag gi gzugs kyis so// ma dga' byed
83b7: pa byi la'i gzugs/ / bya ni mdab chags gzugs kyis so// gnya' lag can ni bya gag gzugs/ bzhin brgyan 'ug pa'i gzugs su ste// mig 'phyang ba ni pha bang gzugs// 'di dag byis pa skrag par bgyid// 'di dag bu 'phrog ma rung ba/
83b8: byis pa rnams la 'jigs bgyid pa// mdo sde'i zhags pas drangs nas ni// 'di dag shin du dgug par bgyi// gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po ni/ dri za tsan dan zhes bgyi ba// yi ge phyag rgya de stsal te// song la gdon ni drag po pa// bcwa lnga de dag
84a1: khug shig ces/ pho nyar yang ni btang bar bgyi// de dag rnams ni skad cig gis// bcing ba lnga yis bcing bzhin bkug/ de nas 'jig rten mgon po la// tshangs chen thal sbyar 'di skad gsol// srog chags sa bon
84a2: 'jig bgyid pa/ / 'byung po 'di dag rnams lhags te// mgon po yi ni spyan snga ru// 'di dag chad pa bshad par bgyid// bud med gang dag bu mi 'tshal// gang zhig btsas pa 'dzin 'tshal bas// tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la// bslab bzung
84a3: dam chos skyabs mchis la/ / mchod rten legs par mchod par bgyi// khrus bgyis shin du brgyan nas ni// sa gzhir yungs kar gtor nas su// me tog spos kyis brgyan par bgyi// sna lnga'i mtshon gyi skud pas ni// khor yug tu ni
84a4: bskor bar bgyi/ / nam phyed par tu mchis nas ni// spyi bor yungs kar bzhag nas su// tshangs pas rab tu byas pa ste// tshangs pas sprul ces brjod par bgyi// lo grangs bcu gnyis bar du ni// gzhon nu rnams la phan bgyid pa//
84a5: tshangs pas sprul pa'i mdo sde yi// rig sngags 'di la gang 'da' ba// ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// s+yA ya the dan/ aM ge/ bau ge/ b+haM ge/ b+ha ba ne/ i nan di/ su lu ri/ ri gi ri gi/ sha ba ri/ ga ru ni/ sha ra ni
84a6: gi ri/ ga ba re/ l-i tsi ni/ la sa na/ ro tsa tsha ni/ a la b+he/ aM ga ne/ a la b+he/ ta la b+he/ pra kar Shi Ne sA hA// mngal na bde bar gnas gyur cig/ dbang po yang dag 'phel bar shog/ mngal na 'dug pa bde gyur cig/ btsas pa 'jig par ma gyur
84a7: cig/ mngal na bde bar gnas gyur cig/ dus bzhin du ni 'byung bar shog/ tshon srud sna tshogs rnams dang ni// yungs dkar 'bru ni ma grugs pa// de dag bsrung bar gsungs pa ste/ byis pa ring du 'tsho bar shog/ de nas ston pa kun mkhyen
84a8: gyis/ / rig pa'i sngags ni 'di dag gsungs// mngal na 'dug pa srung bar shog/ byis pa rnams ni bde gyur cig/ s+yAd+ya the dan/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ ma b+ha bo d+hi/ bo d+ha/ a nu ma te/ ba li nib hu pha le/ shi k+ka shik+ka/ sA rab te/ sA ga le/ du ra sa re/ du rA
84b1: ga ma/ shA ra bA ba te/ thu ra ba te/ b+ha be/ b+ha gA b+ha ge/ b+ha gi ni ni bA ra Ni swA hA// de nas gdon ni bcwa lnga po// rtag tu khrag la 'thung rnams kyis// 'jig rten mgon ma phyag 'tshal te// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad gsol// grong ngam khyim 'am grong khyer
84b2: ram/ gang na legs par gsungs pa yi// mdo sde 'di ni bzhugs pa der/ byis pa rnams ni 'chi mi 'gyur// thub chen khyod ni ji bzhin du// rjes su 'thun par 'jug par bgyi// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa la phyag
84b3: 'tshal lo/ / gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig/ grub par gyur cig/ rig sngags kyis sgrol bar gyur cig/ tshangs pas bsams par gyur cig swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po nam thos kyi bus bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/
84b4: thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos gang la la stor chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ ston tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par
84b5: bgyid pa des mang du thos pa la brtson par bgyi'o/ / mchod rten mchod pa la brtson par bgyi'o// tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi'i dang / bcwa lnga'i dus su mchod rten la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas rig sngags klag par bgyi'o// tshes brgyad kyi
84b6: tshe ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i skyes bu dag rgyal po chen po rnams kyi mdun na de la sems par bgyid/ / ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do// tshes bcu bzhi'i tshe ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag nyid mdun sems par bgyid// ming nas kyang
84b7: 'don par bgyid do/ / tshes bcwa lnga'i tshe ni rgyal po chen po dag nyid sems par bgyid cing ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos gang stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / ston
84b8: pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa de ni srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying po rtse zhing phan par bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang de la gos dang / zas dang / mal cha
85a1: dang stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o// sems can thams cad kyis kyang sti stang bgyid par 'gyur// rgyal po dang / blon po dag gis kyang bla mar bgyi ba dang / rim gro bgyi ba dang /
85a2: mchod par bgyid par 'gyur ro// gzhan mu stegs can dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa can dang / kun du rgyu dang / mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba dag gi nang du mchis kyang mchod par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa nges
85a3: gtsang mar bgyi te/ lus gtsang ba dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / yo byad khyad par can gtsang mar bgyi/ yul ngan pa rnyed mi bgyi// yul ngan pa'i mdza' bo dang bsten par mi bgyi// yul ngan pa na gnas pa la bsngags
85a4: par mi bgyi'o/ / gang 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mdun du stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di dran par gyur na/ de la rgyal po chen po bzhi padag nyid bsrung ba dang / skyob dang / sbed par bgyid par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom
85a5: ldan 'das de ltar na stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di mthu che ste/ gang gis rang gi khyim du mtshan gcig gam/ nyin gcig kyang rung yang dag par bsams na/ de la lo gcig gis bar du mi ma lags pas glags rnyed
85a6: par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ba lags so// gang stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de 'tshal na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang bzhin ston par 'gyur na/ gnod sbyin dang
85a7: srin po dang / phal pa gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can rnams la sman pa'i slad du 'jig rten la gang su dag rig sngags bgyid pa de dag pas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag rab mchog gtso bo// khyad
85a8: par du 'phags pa dam pa/ zab pa rgya che ba/ tshad ma mchis pa/ 'jug par dka' thun mong ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya lags so// de nas dbang po mig stong po// lha yi rgyal po bde sogs khyod// thal mo
85b1: sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ / 'jig rten mgon po 'di skad gsol// 'jig rten kun la phan bgyid pa// rig sngags 'di ni legs par gsungs// gsang sngags sman dang ldan pa yi// rig sngags bdag gis brjod par bgyi// shing
85b2: sha me tog a ba marga dang / / karta ka yi 'bras bu a ka ru// rdo dreg dang ni me DA btsod rnams dang // su ka ri dang dzA ya marga ti// ba ri be la sa ri bi ra dang // sa ma ka dang bu sargya spos dang // tsan dan a bar ta ka ru rta dang // sder mo lo ma ka ta ma pa
85b3: ra dang / / pri yang ku dang 'bug sug smig bcud dang // yungs dkar dag dang ldong ros rnams dang ni// shing tsha shu dag gur gum shing kun dang // lo ma dag dang ldan pa'i brna ka/ de dag sbyar te reng bur bgyid pa ni// gdon rnams kun las
85b4: grol bar bgyid pa ste/ / 'byung po dag ni kun gyi 'gyur ba la// mig la de yis bskus pa bgyis na ni// de nas 'byung po rdo rje dang // gnam lcags mda' yas zin las thar// ljon shing che dang de bzhin du// mchod rten che la bskus
85b5: bgyis na/ / gang gis gnas de mthong ba de// 'byung po la ni 'jigs ma mchis// der ni 'byung po mi gnas te// gnod byed gzhan yang ma lags so// rnga chen dung dang rdza rnga dang // rnga bran dag la bskus na ni// de dag sgra ni gar grags
85b6: par/ / 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor skrag par 'gyur// grong du rgyu ba'i bya rnams kyi// mdab ma dag la bskus na ni// yul dang phyogs ni gzhan dag du// bya de gang du mchis pa der// 'byung po rnams ni mi gnas te// gnod byed gzhan
85b7: yang ma lags so/ / chu mig mtsho dang lteng ka 'am// gang dang gang du bor yang rung // der ni dpag tshad khor yug tu// bde ba dang ni zhi bar 'gyur// pha rol dmag tshogs nang mchis te// mtshon cha dag ni 'bab pa na// gnas
85b8: rnams kun tu byug bgyis na/ / bde blag tu ni thar bar 'gyur// lba ba dang ni gzhang nang dang // me dpal dang ni 'bras byung dang // gdug pas zin dang dug 'thungs pas// 'thungs sam byugs na thar bar 'gyur// lus la de yin
86a1: blugs na ni/ / byang sde mas thams cad gcod par bgyid// rtsod pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur// rgyal po'i gyod las thar par 'gyur// ma grub pa yang grub par 'gyur// dbul po las ni phyug por 'gyur// bu ma mchis pa
86a2: ba rnyed 'gyur/ nor ma mchis pa nor rnyed 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang gnas bar du yang // 'dis ni gsang sngags grub par bgyid// dud 'gro'i skye gnas gyur pa dang // ljon shing gnas kyi 'bras bu dang // rig sngags 'chang ba thob la
86a3: yang / / 'di ni zhi ba'i las dge byed// 'di la gsang sngags tshig mchis te// dper na dbang po'i tshig bzhin no// s+yAd ya the dan/ a kra me/ bi kra me b+hu ta g+ho She b+hu taM ga me// da ha ni d+ha d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha re/ da d+hi ni/ ni kha me/ kha kha me/ kha kha kha kha/
86a4: sA raM ga me/ tsan dre/ tsa pa le/ ha li me/ ha le/ hA rI Ne swA hA// phyogs thams cad nas bdag gi sdig pa thams cad zhi bar gyur cig swA hA// de nas tshangs pa dbang po dang // 'jig rten skyong dang dbang phyug che// gnod sbyin sde dpon tham
86a5: cad dang / / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa yang // thal mo dag ni rab sbyar nas// sgra skad gcig tu 'di skad gsol// nyi ma stong ltar gsal ba po// zla ba nya ltar 'od gsal ba// lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// khyod dang 'dra ba
86a6: yongs ma mchis/ / legs bsams legs par sbyar na ni// gnod sbyin srin po rnam 'joms pa// rgyal srid thar bgyid ces bgyi ba// rig sngags rgyal srid rab sbyor ba// stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten na// bsrung ba'i mdo sde dam pa
86a7: lags/ / phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas// de nyid du ni mi snang gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das nub kha'i dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs
86a8: nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ / dge slong dag stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde long shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ ston cig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la yun
86b1: ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag pa'i dge slong gang la la zhig gis stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'dis shing skam po la skud pas bcings na de/
86b2: la lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu rnams skyes par 'gyur na/ rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
86b3: ldan 'das la dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde chen po lnga gsungs pa de dag ni 'di lta ste/ stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa dang / rma bya chen mo dang / bsil ba'i tshal/
86b4: chen mo dang / so sor 'brang ba chen mo dang / gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang ba chen mo lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag zas rnam pa lnga yongs su spongs la chongs shig ces kyang bka' stsal pa/ zas bsod snyoms
86b5: la brten te rab tu byung shig ces kyang gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das zas rnam pa lnga dang ma 'dres pa'i bsod snyoms ni nyung / 'di ltar zas rnam pa lnga dang 'dres pa de ni mang lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag
86b6: cag gis ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag de nyid kyi phyir su stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo 'di 'chang ba des/ rma med
86b7: pa'i nor bu'i gzungs zhes bya ba de bdag nyid bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir chongs shig/ des bsod snyoms len pa'i tshe zas la mi mthun pa med pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// zas rnam pa lnga dang 'dres pa'i bsod snyoms la yang
86b8: zas rnam pa lnga dang ma 'dres pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya/ 'dus byas thams cad la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / mi rtag pa la sdug bsnga ba'i 'du shes dang / sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes skyed par bya'o// zas rnam pa
87a1: lnga po dag ga la yod/ zas nam lnga lo su'i yin/ ni zas rnam lnga po za// sems can dmigs su med do// de la zas rnam pa lnga dang 'dres na tshes brgyad dang // bcu bzhi dang / bcwa lnga la bdag bsrung ba byas te/ rgyal rigs kyi bu mo leg/
87a2: par bkrus pa/ shin tu brgyan pa/ nyin zhag gcig zas bcad pa/ bslab pa'i gnas lnga bzung ba// skud pa dmar po bzhi sgril du 'bal du bcug la/ gsang sngags 'dzin pas rig sngags dran par byas te skud pa de mdud
87a3: ba mdud la/ / skud pa de mtshon sar pas chod de sregs la rin po che'i snod dam/ lcags kyi snod kyang rung / chus bong ste me tog gis khyab par khrom la/ bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdugs te/ snod kyi nang nas skud pa de slar 'byor te
87a4: ma byung gi bar du rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ / de yang lag pa la bcings la tshig 'di skad brjod do// bram ze rnams kyis bslus nas su/ shAkya seng ge skyob pa la// dpal sbas kyis ni dug can gyi// bsod snyoms dag ni bul
87a5: ba dang / / de las de ni blangs nas su// ston pas dug ni bsad nas gsol// bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis su/ zas ni bdud rtsir 'gyur bar shog/ rnam par gzigs la lha gang dang // gtsug tor can dang kun skyob dang // log par
87a6: dad pa sel ba dang / / stobs chen lha gang dang pa dang // gser dang dpal ldan 'od srung dang // shAkya yi ni seng ge la// rab dang lha yi dbang po dang // tshangs dbang sum bcu'i dbang phyug dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang / nor
