87a7: bu bzang dang dbang phyug che/ / srin mo nag mo chen mo dang // de bzhin gdol ma gtum mo dag/ me tog dang ni bdug pa dang // bdag gi sbyin bsreg 'di bzhes shig/ de dag tshim zhing mchod gyur nas// bdag gi kha zas byang bar
87a8: mdzod/ / zas lnga dag dang 'dres pa yang // bdag lam 'dres mdzad du gsol// kha zas lnga dang 'dres pa yang // zas de kun mi bza' bar bgyi// sa bon dag gi tshigs kun la// sa yi bcud ni zhugs pa yi// kha zas 'dres
87b1: pa thams cad kyang / / bdag la ma 'dres mdzad du gsol// ji ltar skud pa bcad sregs pa// de lta bu yang slar 'byor pa// de ltar zas rnams 'dres pa yang / ma 'dres par yang bdag la mdzod// s+yAd ya thed na/ kha kha me// kha ba kha kha/
87b2: kha kha me/ shi me shi me/ shi hu me/ shi me shi me/ sra ste swa sti swa staM swa sti/ ma ma shAn ti/ shA rA gri/ kha zas lnga dang 'dres pa yang // ji ltar ma 'dres zas bzhin du// gang gis ji ltar skud bsred sa pa// de 'dra'i bden pa mdzad du gsol
87b3: s+ya ya the dan/ ka la ke/ ka la le/ ba la ni/ ka ru ta A la ye/ a ga ne/ si krA ma Ne swA hA// sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang gtsug tor can dang // bde gshegs kun skyob sangs rgyas log par dad sel dang // gser thub
87b4: 'od srung shAkya thub pa gau ta ma/ / bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi// mi mchog bdun po de dag gi ni sku rnams la// me tog dag dang / spos rnams kyis ni mchod par bgyi// lus dang ngag dang rab tu dang ba'i sarba/
87b5: kyis ni// de dag rnams la skyabs su nye bar mchis par bgyi// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul tshe dang ldan pa de dag la// lha gang mngon par rab tu dad ba yod pa yi// lha de mgu zhing yid ni rab tu dgar u0f7fra nas// rab tu dang pa'i yid
87b6: kyis bdag la bsrung du gsol bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ / dge slong de dag yid rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bstod ngo do// 'phags pa stong chen po rab tu 'joms bzhes
87b7: bu ba'i ma dogs so/ / rgyag byi na po TI n+de d+hid pa rlo dang bla Tha bcud dag khyen ci'i chog sde gis des 'byur rtse shus te das pa na mi byang sos nag gnal ra // sa yo ma dod da la gyis bug so byud pa dang d+hAnas bung par byi so// phyag 'dang pa ma
87b8: rlornaMTi d+mo/ bo gad du/ gi sngags kyi rgyal morba bya chen mo 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / ltar byu ba'i sangs rgyas dang / bya chub sems dbang dang nyan thos dgang / nga sangs rgyas thams cad pa bya 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas pabya/ tshal le/ chos la grag 'chaba'o// ge dun 'byag tshang 'o// dag par rdzogs pa'i sang brgya ta kyi dun kyas
88a1: ba bdun po dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
88a2: lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la phyag
88a3: 'tshal nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdag la rig sngags de grub par gyur cig/ 'byung po'i tshogs gang su dag sa la rgyu ba rnams dang / nam mkha' la rgyu ba rnams dang / chu la rgyu ba rnams dang /
88a4: lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / yi dgas
88a5: rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / srul po rnams dang / lus srul po rnams dang / skem byed rnams dang / smyo byed rnams dang / grib gnon rnams dang / brjed byed rnams dang / gnon po rnams
88a6: bdag la nyon cig/ 'byung po'i tshogs gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang /
88a7: zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang /
88a8: zas sa me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag za ba rnams dang / zas su phyis za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin
88b1: 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma za ba rnams dang / zas su dang snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba
88b2: rnams dang / zas su gtor khud nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa
88b3: rnams bdag la nyon cig/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o// spos dang / me tog dang bdug pa dang / gtor ma yang sbyin no// bdag la sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/
88b4: rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mdangs za ba'i gdon thams cad ni dengs shig/ zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / byams pa'i sems dang /
88b5: ldan pa rnams dang / dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams bdag la nyon cig/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa rnams bdag la nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ nag mo bzhin sbyar ma/ grul bum ma/ dung can ma ma
88b6: tog ka ma la lta bu'i mig can ma/ 'phrog ma/ skra mdog ljang bu ma/ dpal ldan ma/ spre'u ltar dmar ser ma/ 'phyang ma/ rab tu 'byang ma/ dus kyi zhags pa can ma/ bum lto ma/ gshin rje'i pho nya mo// gshin rje'i srin mo 'byung
88b7: po za ba mo/ / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / gtor ma 'di ga 'bral gyis bzhes shig/ 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad las bdag la bsrung du gsol// lo brgya mtsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig bdag
88b8: la rig sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe
89a1: mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong sa ri zhes bya ba gzhon nu zor bu lang tshol bab pa/ rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pa
89a2: chos 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa zhig gnas pa de dge 'dun gyi sro gang bya ba'i phyir shing gshegs pa dang / shing rul pa'i ser ga zhig nas sbrul nag po chen po zhig zung nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong la zin pa
89a3: dang / / lus sbrid nas sa la 'gyel te/ lbu bar skyug cing mig kyang gyur nas nyal ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong sa ri nad kyis btab te sdug bsngal zhing nad tshabs che nas sa la 'gyel te/ lbu bar skyug cing
89a4: mig kyang gyur nas nyal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
89a5: 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
89a6: ba 'di na dge slong sa ri zhes bgyi ba gzhon nu thor bu/ lang tsho la bab pa/ rab tu byung nas ring po ma lags pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring por ma lags pa/ chos 'dul ba 'dir mchis nas ring po ma lags pa zhig gnas pa
89a7: dedage 'dun gyi bsro gang bgyi ba'i slad du shing bshags pa dang / shing rul pa'i ser gzhig nas sbrul nag po chen po zhig byung nas/ rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong la zin pa dang / lus spring nas ngogs la 'gyel te/ lbu bar skrag cing mig
89a8: kyang gyur nas nyal zhing mchis na/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ci ltar nan tan du bgyi// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo
89b1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas khyod song la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / nam mkha'i lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang /
89b2: lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed
89b3: kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / skar ma'i gdon dang / gshed byed dang / sbyar ba'i las dang / byad dang / g.yengs byed dang / ro langs dang / sems sbyar ba dang / spod gtong dang / bza' nyes dang
89b4: sku gnyis dang / gnod grib dang / gnod ltas dang / bri nyes dang / bsgom nyes dang / smad pa dang / rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin bdun pa dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / nyin mo
89b5: pa dang / yud tsam pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / rims drag po dang / 'byung po'i rims dang / mi'i rims dang / mi ma yin pa'i rims dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las
89b6: gyur pa dang / rims thams cad las dge slong sa ri la bsrung ba gyis shig/ sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyar ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /
89b7: chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bgyis shig/ klad pa na ba med par gyis shig/ gzhog phyed na ba dang / yi ga mchus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang /
89b8: kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / son pa dang / snying na ba dang / rtsib logs na pa dang / rgyab na ba dang / lton pa dang / mkhur ba na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / skye gnas na ba dang / rab tu
90a1: skye gnas na ba dang / rked pa na ba dang / brlan pa dang / byin pa na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na dang / yan lag na ba dang / nyid la ga na ba med par gyis shig/ mtshan mo dge dang nyin mo dge/ nyi ma'i gung gi dge ba
90a2: dang / nyin mtshan kun gyi dge ba dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol// tad ya thA/ I Di bi Di ki Di hi Di/ mi Di ni Di bi De/ A De/ g+ha De me De do dum+bA/ durtA De/ ha ri Ni/ tsan ta ri u ri be gA Te/ ba gu De/ bA na su/ bi shA tsi ni
90a3: ba ra Sha Ni/ A ro ha NI/ a ro hi Ni/ e lA/ me la e le me le/ te le/ ti li ti li/ ma le me le/ ti li ti li ti li ti li/ me le me le/ du me du me/ du du ma/ id ti/ miT Te/ baSh+Ti ba d+he/ tsa ba le/ bi ma le/ hu lu hu lu/ a shra mu khi/ kA li
90a4: kA li ka rA li/ ma hA kA le/ pra kI ra Na ke shi/ ku lu ku lu/ ba bU lu ba pU lu/ ko lu ko lu/ hu lu hu lu/ ba hu lu ba hu lu/ bo sa du ma bA/ do dum bA/ du ma dum bA/ go lA yA/ be lA yA/ ba ri be lA yA/ bi shu/ hi li hi li hi li hi li hi li
90a5: hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi l-i/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ ti li ti li/ ti li ti li/ ti li ti li/ ti li ti li/ ti li ti li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ mu
90a6: d+ha su hu/ mu tu mu hu/ mu bu mu d+ha/ mu hu mu Tu/ mu hu mu r+tha/ mu lu su lA/ su lu su lu/ su lu su lu/ mu lu mu lu/ su lu su wa/ hu lu hu la/ hA hu d+ha hA T+Ta shrahwAr+b+ha d+har+m+ma/ bAT+TaT+TA drA p+na bU b+da b+hUdz+dzaH/ pU pA pA pA pA dA pA p+na rA rA/
90a7: dza la dza la dza la dza la dza la dza la dza la dza la dza la/ da ma da ma ni/ ta pa ta pa ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ni/ pa tsa pa tsa ni/ dun dra b+hi/ gardza ni/ ba ra Sha Ni/ s+pho Ta ni/ ta pa ni tA pa ne/ tsi ni pa tsa ne/ hA ri Ni kA ri Ni/ ka mi ni/ ka ma pa ni/ marda ni/ maN Di maN
90a8: Ti ti/ kek+She/ ma ka ri ma ka ri/ shA ka ri shar ka re/ karka ri sha ba ri/ shaM ka ri/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ni/ du ma dum ba ni/ du ma dum ni/ su ku su me/ ga lA yA/ ba ri be lA yA/ be lA yA/ lhas kun du char pob shig/ i li ki si sA hA/ da ni yu
90b1: 'khor bsrung la byams/ sa bsrung bu la'adang byams te/ nga ni mig mi bzang la byams// gau ta ma ni nag po dang / da ni klu rgyal nor bu dang / nga ni nor rgyas bu la'ang byams// dbyug pa rkang gi klu dag dang // gdab bzang la'ang nga rtag tu
90b2: klu gang dga' bo nye dga' bo/ / kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing lha min dang // lha yi g.yul yang myong bar byed// ma dros klu dang chu lha dang / 'dzam pa len pa la yang byams// 'jog po dang ni mtha' yas dang /
90b3: de bzhin nor gyi sgo dang ni// gzhan las rgyal la dbyams te// gcod dang ldan pa'i bu la byams// rtag par gzi can chen po dang // gzi can la yang de bzhin no// phub ma med dang dung can dang // longs spyod ldan dang dge tshul dang /
90b4: kha na zho dang nor bu dang // pad ma dkar po phyogs dag dang // stobs kyi rgyu dang dung rkang dang // la ba dang ni mgyogs mchog dang // klu yi rgyal po de dag la// nga ni rtag tu byams pa yi// gnas bcas chu srin kum b+hi ra// da
90b5: bzhin khab kyi spu dag dang / / brang 'gro'i bdag po nag po dang // drang srong la yang dbyams so// de bzhin rna ba tshangs pa dang // shing rta'i bzhin la byams pa ste// gzi can dang ni rab dga' dang // bad sa'i bu lang rtag tu// nga ni
90b6: e la'i 'dab ma byams/ / 'phyang ba'i tshul la'ang dbyams te// mi min klu ni gang dag dang // de bzhin mi yi bla ma dang // klu chen tshol ba'i tshul can dang // btang bzung zhes ni grags pa dang // klu gang sa la rgyu dag dang // de
90b7: bzhin chu la gnas rnams dang / / gang dag par snang rgyu ba dang // gang dag lhun por gnas pa dang // mgo gcig pa dang mgo gnyis pa// de dag la ni ngabartag byams// rkang pa mngal dbyams te/ rkang gnyis pa la'angang
90b8: byams so/ / rkang bzhi pa la'ang dbyams so// gang mangs la yang dbyams so// rkang me dpal gnod ma byed// rkang gnyis ngal gnod ma byed// gang bzhi la gnod ma byed// rkang mangs ngal gnod ma byed// gang dag
91a1: tshul gnas pa yi klu rnams kun la nga byams so/ / gang du sa la gnas pa yi// 'byung po kun la dbyams so// sems can gang dag gnas par bcas// sems can kun la dbyams so// sems can kun
91a2: dang srog chags kun/ / 'byung po de dag thams cad kyang // thams cad bde ba 'ba' zhig sho// thams cad nad ni med gyur cig/ kun gyis bzang po mthong bar shog/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ byams pa'i sems la gnas
91a3: nas pa/ / drug ni rab tu gsad par bya// bsrung dang yongs su bzung ba dang // de bzhin yongs su bskyang bar bya// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byang chub phyag 'tshal lo// grol gyur phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo//
91a4: zhi 'gyur phyag 'tshal zhi la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam grol phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo// bram ze gang dag sdig pa'i chos rnams bsal bar gyur pa de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis bdag la bsrung
91a5: bar gyis shig/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang // gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang // nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / dug thams cad las bsrung bgyis
91a6: shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo sngon byung ba ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba'i zhig gnas te/ de nang bar rig sngags
91a7: kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bde legs su 'gyur bar byas te nyin mo dge bar gnas/ / nub dkar bde legs su 'gyur bar byas te mtshan mo dge bar gnas so// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo//
91a8: dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya thA/ hu hu/ hu hu/ hu hu/ nA ga le le le/ dum pa le le le/ nA ga le le le/ na le le/ hu ya hu ya/ bi dza bi dza/ thu su thu su/ gu lu gu
91b1: lu/ hu tse rje na tsa dzi ni/ a ga lu/ e lA me lA/ e li me lA/ i li ti li me lA/ i li mid te ti li mid te i li ti li mid te/ dum be su dum ge/ to su to su/ go lA yA be lA yA/ tsa ba lA/ bi ma lA/ id ta ri/ b+hid ti ri/
91b2: ri ti ri na mo bud d+hA nA na/ tsi li ki si/ go do hi kA/ na mo a ra hA la hA la/ lhas phyogs bcu kun da char phob shig/ sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA// des dus gzhan zhig na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis
91b3: bsrung ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba ma byas par/ 'dod pa rnams la zhen cing chags te rgyags pas myos nas rab tu rmongs shing rgyal ba dang 'dra bar gyur nas rab tu zhen te/ nags kyi rma bya gzhon nu mang po dang lhan cig tu kun dga'
91b4: rab nas kun dga' ra bar/ skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal du/ ri'i ngos nas ri'i ngos su rgyu zhing song song ba las de bag med par gyur nas ri'i ser gzhig tu chud nas/ de der rigs ngan gzhon nu yun ring du phyir rgol ba dgrar gyur pa//
91b5: 'tshe bar gyur pa/ glags blta ba rnams kyis rma bya'i snyis bzung ste/ de mi 'dza' ba'i nang du son pa dang dran pa slar rnyed nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di nyid yid la byas so// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag
91b6: 'tshal lo/ / dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya thA/ hu hu/ hu hu/ du hU/ nA ga le le le/ dum pa le le le/ nA ga le le/ hu lu hu lu/ hu ya hu ya/ bi dza bi dza/ thu swa thu su/ gu
91b7: lU gu lu/ hu tsa dzi ni/ tsa dza ni/ a ga ya/ e lA me lA/ mi li me lA/ ti li ma lA/ i le ti li ma lA/ aM li mid ti/ ta li mid te/ oM li ti li/ mid ti/ dum ba su dum the/ ta su to su/ go lA yA be lA yA/ tsa ba lA/ bi ma lA/ iT ti ri/
91b8: b+hiT ti ri/ riT ti ri/ na mo bud d+hA nAn/ tsa li ki si/ go do ti/ kA nAM na mo ar ha tAn/ hA la dA la/ lhas phyogs bcu kun du char phob shig/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// swA hA/ de nas de sdug bsngal de las thar te dge ba dang / bde
92a1: bar bdag gi yul du phyin nas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang bzlas so/ / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba la phyag 'tsha'o//
92a2: lo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya thA/ sid d+he/ su sid d+he/ mo tsa ni/ mo k+Sha Ni/ mug te bi mug te/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ an Da re/ ban Da re/ maM ga le/ maM ga l+ye/ hi ra Te/ hi ra N+ya gar+b+he rad ne/
92a3: rad nag r+b+ha b+ha drasra b+ha dres man ta b+ha dra/ shrI b+ha dre/ sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ni/ ba ra mA ra tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba a nar tha pra sha ma ni/ sarba maM ga la sA d+ha ni/ sarba a maM ga la bA d+ha ni/ ma na si/ mA na si/ ma hA mA na si/ ad b+hu te/ ad t+yad b+hu te/ mu ga te/
92a4: bi mug ti mo tsan mek+She ni an+na te/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ ya sho ba ti/ ba ma le/ a mri te/ a ma re/ a ma ra Ni brah+me brah+ma swa re/ buNe/ bA ra Na ma ner tha mri ta san dzI ba ni/ shI b+ha dre/ tsa na dre/ tsan dra pra b+he/ sU r+ye sUr+ya/ kAn te/ bI ta b+ha ya/ su
92a5: ban+de/ prah+ma g+ho She/ brah+ma yuSh+Te/ sarbA tA/ a pra ti ha te swA hA/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la dge ba dang / bsrung ba mdzad du gsol// lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ tad ya thA/
92a6: hu tsi/ gu ci/ gu tsi/ mu tsi swA hA/ kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rma bya'i rgyal mo gser du snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de nyid de'i tshe de'i
92a7: dus na/ rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i snying po 'di yang bzlas par bya'o// tang ya thA/ i li mid te/ ti mi mid te/ i li ti li med te/ Shi li mi la te
92a8: li/ mid ti/ bi li bi li mid ti/ bi li mi li mi li ti li ti li/ mi li/ ti mi ti mi/ dum bA/ su dum bA/ su tum bA/ tu ma bA/ su ba tsa ri/ tsi ri ki si yA/ b+hin na me Ti/ na mo bud d+hA nAn/ tsi li ba hra si/ bran ta mu la/ i rI hA re/ lo ha
92b1: timU ya/ tum bA su tu ma bA/ kuT ti/ kun Ta ta/ ku kun Ta ti/ ti la kun dza/ naT ti/ lcang lo tsan du lhas zla ba dgu 'am/ zla ba bcur char phab sheg/ i li mi li/ ki li mi li/ ka li me li/ ke du mA le/ du dum be/ su dram be/ de da li
92b2: me/ san du bad te/ bas bad te/ bu sa ra/ bu sa ra/ d+ha na bsta ra ke/ pra Ne ma sta ra she/ narka lA/ narka li me/ kha li ma g+ho She/ ra khi le/ e ti sad dza le/ tu ma be/ su tu ma be/ a han+ta/ naT ta/ pra Na DaT/ a na Na Ta Te/ a na mA le/ lhas kun
92b3: nas chu sa ra ba'i char phob shig/ na rA ya ni/ bA rA ya ni/ ha ri tA li/ kun tA li/ kun tAn Ti/ i li yi sti/ ki li mi sti/ ki li ti li mi sti/ i li me// 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag grub par gyur cig swA hA/ kun dga'
92b4: bo 'di ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i snying po yin no/ / kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di grong na 'dug pa na yang yid la bya'o// dgon pa na 'dug gam/ lam na 'dug gam/ lam gol ba na 'dug gam/
92b5: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na 'dug gam/ chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/ me'i nang na 'dug gam/ chu'i nang na 'dug gam/ dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'khor gyi nang na 'dug gam/ rtsod
92b6: ba'i nang na 'dug gam/ sbrul gyis zin tam/ dug 'thungs sam/ 'jigs pa thams cad 'dus pa na yang yid la bya'o// rlud las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur
92b7: pa dang / nang bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi las nad gang yang rung bas btab par gyur pa dang // phongs par gyur na yang shin du yid la bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gsang ba'i rigs pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro// chad pas
92b8: gcad pa'i rigs pa ni gzhu btsog gis so/ / gzhu btsog pa'i rigs pa ni spyo bas so// smyo ba'i rigs pa ni dam bcas pas so// dam bcas pa'i rigs pa ni spu zing zhes bya bas so// spu zing zhes bya ba'i rigs pa ni de
93a1: bzhin du thar par 'gyur te/ de'i nad thams cad kyang ldog par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di yang yid la bya'o// tad ya thA/ tsi li/ mi li/ ki li mi li/ ke du mU la/ bus
93a2: bad Ta Ta/ bu sa ri ni/ ke ba da Te/ ka ba da Ta ka/ mU le/ i ti sha ba re/ dum be/ dum pe/ bri yaM ka re/ A bad Te/ pa ri bad Te/ lhas kun du chu sar pa'i char phob shig/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ id Tid nA ya/ in bra go mi se kA ya/ A she na
93a3: bshan/ pA pa ni ku le/ ka pi la ming te/ i la ming te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rig
93a4: sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dri bsrung bar gyis shig/ yong su bskyab pa dang / yong su bzung ba dang / yong su bskyang ba dang zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad
93a5: pa dang / sa bcing ba bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tshe bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis/ bsrung ba byas shing sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang /
93a6: yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug pas dab dang mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba byas pa la rnam par 'tshe ba'i phyir 'ong ba/ lha 'am/ lha me 'am/
93a7: lha'i bu po 'am/ lha'i bu mo 'am/ lha rgan po 'am/ lha rgan mo 'am/ lha'i 'khor po 'am/ lha'i 'khor mo'am/ klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu'i bu pho 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu rgad po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor po 'am/ klul
93a8: 'khor mo 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ lha ma yin mo 'am/ lha ma yin gyi bu pho 'am/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo 'am/ lha ma yin rgang po 'am/ lha ma yin rgan mo 'am/ lha ma yin gyi 'khor po 'am/ lha ma yin 'khor mo 'am/ rlung lha
93b1: 'am/ rlung lha mo 'am/ rlung lha'i bu po 'am/ rlung lha'i bu mo 'am/ rlung lha rgad po 'am/ rlung lha rgan mo 'am/ rlung lha'i 'khor po 'am/ rlung lha'i 'khor mo 'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ nam mkha' lding mo 'am/ nam mkha' lding
93b2: gi bu pho 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi bu mo 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi rgang po 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi rgan mo 'am/ nam mkha' ldeng gi 'khor po 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi 'khor mo 'am/ dri za 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ dri za'i bu pho 'am/ dri za'i
93b3: bu mo 'am/ dri za rgad po 'am/ dri za'i rgan mo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor po 'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ mi 'am ci mo 'am/ mi 'am ci'i bu pho 'am/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo 'am/ mi 'am ci rgad po 'am/ mi 'am tsi rgan
93b4: mo'ang mi'am ci'i 'khor pho 'am/ mi 'am ci'i 'khor mo 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ lto 'phye chen mo 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo 'am/ lto 'phye chen po rgang po 'am/ lto 'phya chen po rgan mo 'am/
93b5: lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mo 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin rgad po 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor
93b6: po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ srin po 'am/ srin mo 'am/ srin po'i bu pho 'am/ srin po'i bu mo 'am/ srin po rgad po 'am/ srin mo rgan mo 'am/ srin po'i 'khor pho 'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/ yi dgas sam/ yi dgas mo
93b7: 'am/ mi dgas kyi bu po 'am/ yi dgas kyi bu mo'am/ yi dgas rgad po'am/ yi dgas rgan mo'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor po'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor mo 'am/ sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha za'i bu po 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ sha za rgad po
93b8: 'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor po 'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/ 'byung po 'am/ 'byung po mo 'am/ 'byung po'i bu po 'am/ 'byung po'i bu mo 'am/ 'byung po rgad po 'am/ 'byung po rgan mo 'am/ 'byung po'i 'khor po 'am/ 'byung po'i/
94a1: 'khor mo 'am/ grul bum 'am/ grul bum mo 'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho 'am/ grul bur gyi ngo ma/ grul bum rgad po 'am/ grul bum rgan mo'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor po 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo 'am/ srul po'am/
94a2: srul po mo 'am/ srul po'i bu pho 'am/ srul po'i bu mo 'am/ srul po nad po 'am/ srul po rgan mo 'am/ srul po'i 'khor po 'am/ srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ lus srul po mo'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho 'am/ lus srul
94a3: po'i bu mo 'am/ lus srul po rgang po 'am/ lus sul po rgan mo 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor po 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/ skem byed dam/ skem byed mo 'am/ ske ma byed kyi bu po 'am/ skem byed kyi bu mo 'am/ skem byed nad po
94a4: 'am/ skem byed rgan mo 'am// skem byed kyi 'khor po 'am/ skem byed kyi 'khor mo 'am/ smyo byed dam/ smyo byed mo 'am/ smyo byed kyi bu pho 'am/ smyo byed kyi bu mo 'am/ smyo byed rgad po 'am/ smyo byed rgan mo 'am/ smyo byed kyi 'khor pho 'am/
94a5: smyo byed kyi 'khor mo 'am/ grib gnon nam/ grib gnon mo 'am/ grib gnon gyi bu pho 'am/ grib gnon gyi bu mo 'am/ grib gnon rgad po 'am/ grib gnon rgan mo 'am/ grib gnon gyi 'khor po 'am/ grib gnon gyi 'khor mo 'am/
94a6: brjod byed dam/ brjed byed mo 'am/ brjed byed kyi bu pho'am/ brjed byed kyi bu mo 'am/ brjed byed rgad po 'am/ brjed byed rgan mo 'am/ brded byed kyi 'khor po 'am/ brjed byed kyi 'khor mo'am/ gnon po 'am/ gnon po mo 'am/ gnon
94a7: po'i bu pho 'am/ gnon po'i bu mo 'am/ gnon po rgang po 'am/ gnon po rgan mo 'am/ gnon po'i 'khor po 'am/ gnon po'i 'khor mo 'am/ 'ga' yang 'ong bar ngas lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas
94a8: ga/ dge sbyong dang bcas pa/ bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo do// glags tshol bar 'dod cing glags lta na yang glags mi rnyed de/ lha ni lha 'dra ba'i gnas su/
94b1: ma yin/ klu ni klu 'dra ba'i gnas su ma yin/ lha ma yin ni lha ma yin 'dra ba'i gan su ma yin/ rlung lha ni rlung lha 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin// nam mkha' lding ni nam mkha' lding 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ dri za ni dri za 'du ba'i/
94b2: gnas su ma yin/ mi 'am ci ni mi 'am ci 'dra ba'i gnas su ma yin/ lto 'phye chen po ni lto 'phye chen po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ gnod sbyin ni gnod sbyin 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ srin po ni srin po 'dra ba'i gnas su
94b3: ma yin/ yi dgas ni yi dgas 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ sha za ni sha za 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ 'byung po ni 'byung po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin// grul bum ni grul bum 'du ba'i gnas su ma yid/ srul po ni srul
94b4: po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ lus srul po ni lus srul po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ skem byed ni skem byed 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin// smyo byed ni spro byed 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin// grib gnon ni grib gnon
94b5: 'dra ba'i gnas su ma yin/ brjed byed ni brjed byed 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin te/ gnon po ni gnon po 'du ba'i gnas su mi chud do// gang la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las 'gal bar byed na de'i mgo
94b6: ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas so/ / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang yid la bya'o// ta da ya thA/ i li mi li/ ki li mi li/ kin dug d+he/ mug te/ su mug ste/ A Da/ nA Da/ su Na DA/ lcang lo can du
94b7: mchog tu lhas char phob shig/ A rA bA rA/ go do hi kA/ i li mi li/ b+hid dzi li kA/ u du kA/ u du kA/ kA du Tu kA/ i li mi li/ ti li mi li/ sa man ta ta/ kri tA/ hu lu hu lu/ hi li hi laM/ mi li mi li/ bi li bi li/
94b8: ki li ki li/ shwe ra She na/ bar Sha ma/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsa li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsi Ti tsi Ti/ Sho kho ga Shi/ a Ta Ti bi Ta Ti/ khi khi khi khi/ dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu dzu du dzu hu dzu hu dzu du dzu hu/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ra Ni/ dza ma b+hA
95a1: pra dzas b+he/ sarba duny+dza pra duSh+TA naM/ dzam b+he/ mi stam b+ha mi/ bdag la bsrung bgyis shig/ sra ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su gyur pa dang /
95a2: chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tshe bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog sheg tad ya thA/ tsi tsi tsi dra mA le/ tsi rbatsaH
95a3: mA le/ Na le ha le mA le/ pa le pha la mA le/ khu ru khu ru/ khu ru/ buru Ne/ bI re/ d+ha me/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba rnams kyi dug dang / mche ba'i dug dang / rtsa ba'i
95a4: dug dang / kha zas kyi dug btsem mo// su ru mu ru/ ke ba ra ba ra ke/ ba ra te// bi ri hi ri/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / bcas pa bdun po dag gi gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo// dug nges par bcom
95a5: mo/ dug med do// e lA me lA/ i li me lA/ ti li me lA/ ti ha du ha/ ti li mA/ ti mA/ du mA/ d+hI mA/ d+hu su kum b+hA su ma bA// tu ma bA/ sa ma tu ma bA/ A De nA De/ ti la/ kun dza NA De/ i li ki si/ nga sems can thams cad la byams
95a6: bas lhas zla ba dgu'am/ zla ba bcur kun du char pobashig/ bu Sha De/ sha ba ri Ni/ bu dA rI na~M/ ke baT Te/ ke baTe Te/ ke baT Te/ ke mU le/ i ti sha Ta re/ dum ze/ dum be/ bri yaM ka re/ a bAda? Ta/ ba ri bad Te/ lhas kun nas chugs
95a7: pa'i char phob shig/ na mo b+ha gap+tA te/ in dra go me/ saM ka ya/ i Ti Ta TA ya/ go ro hi kA ya/ b+hi da gA ri kA ma/ a le ta le/ kun ta laM/ ad Te/ nad Te/ ku nad te/ a Sha she/ bA sha ne/ bA ba ni/ ku le/ pra ti kU le/ sangs rgyas bcom
95a8: ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/ rgyal ba rnam gzigs mya ngan 'tshang la gnas/ rgyal ba gtsug tor pad ma dkar po'i drung / thams cad skyob pa sa la'i drung na gnas/ bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ni shir sha'i drung /
95b1: sangs rgyas gser thub u dus pa ra'i drung / 'od bsrung n+ya gro d+ha yi drung na gnas/ shAkya thub mchog khyad par gnas drung du/ byin nas byang chub thob gyur go tam/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la// mngon par dad pa'i lha gang
95b2: 'khod pa dag/ lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgu gyur nas// rtag tu dge dang zhi bar 'gyur bar byas// tad ya thA/ i li me li/ ke li mi li/ ki li tsi li/ ki li bo li/ u du rA/ su du mod/ bus bus gzhun/ ka ra~M dzi/ ka ran dza/ mU le/ e
95b3: tes na hA/ kuN Di li/ kun tA li/ nA rA ya Ni/ bA rA ya ni/ ba sh+ya ni pA sh+ya bA sh+ya ni/ ka bi la bA s+yA ni/ i ri bA si/ 'gro lding ba'i sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ kun dga' bo stan chen po 'di dag ni mi mjed kyi bdag
95b4: po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyis sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa ste/ kun dga' bo gang sman chen po 'di dag gi ming 'dzin pa la 'ga'
95b5: zhig rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis 'ong na/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas so// tad ya thA/ kI ra ti mU le/ e ra Na mU le/ sa man ta mU le na Da nA De/ a De/ nA De/ ku sha nA De/ id te/ mid te/ bA ru/ a ra Da kA
95b6: i li ku shi/ gau do hi ka/ ud d+h+r-i d+hu ma/ b+hin na/ meT/ sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog/ phyir 'od dag kyang bde
95b7: legs shog/ mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ nyi ma'i gung la'as de legs shog/ khyed cag kun du bde legs shog/ de dag sdig par ma gyur cig/ nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin/ rgyu skar thams cad bzang po yin/ sangs rgyas thams
95b8: cad rdzu 'phrul che/ / dgra bcom thams cad zag pa med// bden pa'i cho ga 'dis kun du bde legs su gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal ma rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung bgyis shig/ sra ba dang /
96a1: yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang /
96a2: bcing bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gang dag rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin chen po dag dang / gang dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / gang dag ri'i rgyal po gzhan rnams
96a3: dang / 'brog rnams dang / 'brog chen po rnams dang / klung rnams dang / klung chen rnams dang / sman ljongs rnams dang / 'bab chu rnams dang / lteng ka rnams dang / lu ma rnams dang / ri'i phug rnams dang / dur khrod rnams dang / dur khrod chen po
96a4: rnams dang / gzhi mod rnams dang / grong rnams dang / grong khyer rnams dang / lhas rnams dang / skyed mos tshal rnams dang / nags rnams dang / nags tshal rnams dang / lam gol ba dag na gnas pa dang / kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gang dag
96a5: cad lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ tad ya thA/ ha ri hA ri Ni/ tsa li tsA li ni/
96a6: b+h+ra ma ni b+h+ra ma ni/ mo ha ni/ stam b+ha ni/ dza ma b+ha ni/ swa yam b+hu be swA hA// kun dga' bo shar phyogs na dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung zhes bya ba dri za thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dri za 'bum phrag du ma yod pa dri za rnams la
96a7: dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/ gang shang phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang bcas/ spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ rje dpon dang bcas// mdag pa dang bcas/ po nya dang bcas/
96a8: g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig/ sra ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde
96b1: lags su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ tad ya
96b2: thA/ dz+nyA dz+ha ru/ dz+nyA dz+ha ru/ d+hu dz+ha ru/ dz+nyA ru/ d+hA ru/ dz+nyA ru/ me swA hA/ kun dga' bo lho phyogs na grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba/ grul bum gyi bdag po 'khor grul bum brgya stong du ma yod pa/ grul bum rnams la
96b3: dbang byed du 'jug pa gnos te/ gong lho phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang bcas/ spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas sde dpon dang bcas/ mdag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/
96b4: g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig/ sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyad pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde
96b5: legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ tad ya
96b6: thA/ be lu ke/ ba lu ke/ a mri ta g+hA ta ni/ pa ru na ba ti/ so ma ba ti/ hu lu bi ti/ be lu ni/ du tri ke/ tso nu tsi tsu swA hA// kun dga' bo nub phyogs na klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang zhes bya ba klu thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor klu
96b7: brgya stong du ma yod pa/ klu rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/ gang nub phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang bcas/ spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ snga dpon da
96b8: bcas/ ma dag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
97a1: bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / drug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bgyis shig/ lo
97a2: brgya 'tshe bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ tad ya thA/ be du ri be du ri/ be dU rI bi d+hu ri/ mad Ti te/ mang Ti te/ ko Ti ko Ta/ bi d+hA ma ti bid+d+ha ma ti/ hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu/ ru rA ru ru/ ru ru ru ru/ tsan tsu tsa/ tsatsatsa tsa/ tsatsatsa tsatsa
97a3: tsatsa dz+ra swA hA/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya ba gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma yod pa gnod sbyin rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/
97a4: gang byang phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang bcas/ spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ sde dpon dang bcas/ mngag pa dang bcas pho nya dang bcas// g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang
97a5: bcas pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba
97a6: dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil pa dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig/ lo brgya mtsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ tad ya thA/ so ri so ri/ shi ri shi ri/ ma ti ma ti hi ri
97a7: hi ri/ ma ti/ ki ri ki ri/ hi ri hi ri/ pe lu pe lu/ bing ga le/ tsu lu tsu lu/ ha ta ba bi Sham/ ban d+hu ma ti/ ni ha taM bi Sha ma/ ban d+hu ma ti swA hA/ shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ nub phyogs
97a8: na ni mig mi bzang / byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyal po chen po 'di bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed// sde po che la stobs po che// pha rol dgra rnams rab tu 'joms// /
97b1: gzhan gyis mi thub thul bar dka'// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul che zhing lha min dang // lha yi g.yul yang myong bar byed// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo
97b2: 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig/ sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang // zhi ba dang bde lags su 'gyur ba dang // chad pa spang ba dang // mtshon cha spang ba dang // dug gzhil ba
97b3: dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang // sa bcing bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar shog shig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ tad ya thA/ e le me le/ ki le/ ti le/ mi le/ shi le/ bA she/ dum be/ du dram be/
97b4: lhas kun tu char pob shig/ hi li mi li/ dum be du dum be/ ad Te/ pad ge ba ra ma du bad Te/ lhas 'ur 'ur kun du char phob shig/ gu Tu gu Tun ta/ aT ka pad dA yaM/ an De nan Te/ tun Te/ tsug kaM/ brag ge/ mrag ke/
97b5: i ri Di/ mi ri Di/ ni ri Di/ bi ri Di hi ri Di/ hi li hi li/ hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ mi li mi li/ tu le/ tata le swA hA/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi ming zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ lus ngan gyi ni bu thu ba/
97b6: kun du rgyal ba mi la zhon// grags su ldan na gnas pa ste// lha yi bden pa gsol ba po// des kyang rig sngags kyi rtul mo ma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bskyung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya mtsha bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mtho
97b7: bar shog shig/ tad ma TA/ ba le/ bska la/ mA ta ga can Da laM/ bA r+ra 'aNi/ bi tsi li na/ go re/ gan d+hA d+ha/ mA tA gi/ tsan rdza li/ mA la ni/ tI li ti le/ A ga ti/ ko ra/ gan d+hA ga N+Daka btsi bi hA ra/ hi la ti li/ ka d+ye swAH/
97b8: skye sngar bran 'khor ba 'jig/ gzhan gyis mi thub kab na/ grong khyer bzang na gnod sbyin zag/ shid kyi bri ni byang phyogs na/ lag na rdo rje rgyal po'i khab/ bya rgod phung por gnas byas pa// rgya mtsho'i mtha' yi bar
98a1: sa ra/ / lan gsum bar du 'gro byed pa// stobs chen zhing ni gzi brjid che// dpag tshad bcur ni rnam par gnon// gnod sbyin mkha' lding rgyas pa ni// sna tshogs spong ba gnas sgo na// gnod sbyin bkul rgyal khab na/
98a2: sde po che la stobs po che// gnod sbyin nag po nye gnag po// ser skya yi ni gnas na gnas// thub pa chen po shAkya'i tog/ sangs rgyas thub pa gar bltam pa// rkang bkra bo ni dgra can na// tsi ra ta na dbang phyug che// mnyan yod na ni phur du po//
98a3: gnas bcas na ni rgya mchog nas// yangs pa can na rdo rje mtshon// spre'u ltar dmar ser gyad yul na// bA ra na ser nag po che// blta na sdug pa tsam pa na// gnod sbyin khyab 'jug sgo can na// 'dzin pa po ni sgo drung na 'jigs byed zangs kyi
98a4: 'dab man/ / brang gis 'gro na 'joms pa po// 'brog na gnod sbyin 'brog gnas po// ser skya bo ni 'bru mangs na// 'phags rgyal na ni nor bsrung ba// bsrung byed na ni nor 'byor pa// gso ba'i mtha' na gso ba po//
98a5: dga' bo nye dga' grong khyer gnas// phreng ba 'dzin pa chu mchog na// kun dga' 'chi med sa zhag na// mche ba dkar po dngos bzang na// mi brtan pa ni gzi can na// rin chen ri ldan grong khyer na// nor gyi bu ni phyogs mtshams gnas//
98a6: smin drug bu ni gzhon nu zhes// 'jig rten grags pa skye yod na// 'od ma'i 'graman lag brgya pa// ka lid kan shing rta che// thub par dka' ni 'gro 'joms na// srid bsgrub nags na srid sgrub pa// gnod sbyin 'joms pa 'dun 'ang na//
98a7: phre ba bsrung na ri brtsegs pa// tang mar na ni bzang po pa// ma rdzogs pa na thams cad bzang // snyems pa can na spyod pa po// ded dpon nor gyi dbang phyug go// ma rgyal rgyal na mche ba gtsigs// gnas can na ni nor bzang po// zhi ba
98a8: zhi ba'i grong len na/ / zhi ba bzang po 'jigs byed na// gnod sbyin dbang po dbang 'gro na// me tog rtog na rdo 'gro na// shing bshing gi grong khyer na// kha dog can ni ser skya gnas// nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang // spun gnyis tshangs pa
98b1: ldan pa na/ / ba lang 'dzin na 'joms pa po// rab tu 'joms pa rdo 'jog na// gnod sbyin chen po 'od bsrung sil// skyugs pa yi ni ri la gnas// gsum sbas 'gram pa ldan ngogs na// ho nun ni 'od byed pa// dga' ba can dang
98b2: 'phel byed pa/ / dga' ba 'phel byed zong khyer na/ rlung gis na rlung ldan pa// 'byang bar byar na 'thab dga' ba// bcom brlag na ni bong bu ba// lang kan ni bum pa'os+ho// gnod sbyin nyi 'od rab nyams na// ko sa la ni ri mgo go//
98b3: rnam par rgyal dang nam rgyal ldan// dkar po bcom brlag yul na gnas// gnod sbyin gang ba ma la ya ra// ti se gangs na ma 'am ci// sprin gyi phreng can ban tran// rab tu gnas na dum bu ba// bi tang ga l+yar yang dag byed//
98b4: rlangs dang ldan na bde byed pa// sna nas byung na gnod sbyin mdzes// gso ba'i mtha' nam chags pa// dga' byed dang ni pa dga' dang // dpa' dang gser gyi lag pa dang // ka ling kan lto 'phyang po// ko sa lan nag po che// dge bdage
98b5: ba'i pho brad na/ / bA ra na ser skyod pa po// 'gram ldan phung po rna ba bzang // grong khyer drug na nor gzhan po// gnod sbyin stobs can mtha' ma na// srung ba can na mthong dga' ba// ba lang 'joms na gtsug phud can// phyogs mtshams//
98b6: na ni thal mo dga'// gdugs 'dra na ni bkris pa po// grong khyer drug na chu srin 'dul// tshang tshing gcig na mig yangs pa// u dum bar ra sgo nga'i 'od// ko'u sha ma bi na lhun gyis grub// rnam par snang byed zhing ldan na// sbrul gyi gdus/
98b7: na dga' ba po// g.yo ba 'dzin na ser skya'o// gyen du 'gro na bak+kul// gang po snying po thob phyed na// grong rdal tshol ba lnga mangs na// glang chen brjod pa 'du ba mchog/ chu lha'i yul na gzhu brtan po// g.yul 'gyed ldan par grong khyer
98b8: rgyal/ / sgra ngan zhing na gnod sbyin dbang // gnyi dang rgyal ngan rgyal gnyin// gnod sbyin mor grags de nyid na// gtum chen gser gyi 'od dpag can// gnod par byed dang don grub dang // 'byung bar byed pa nags na gnas// 'gro ba
99a1: drug pa 'gro 'joms na ka ba na ni ka ba nyid/ / seng ge'i stobs na gnod sbyin gang // seng ge stag stobs med byed gnyis// bye ba 'dab na sde po che// de bzhin gzhan gyi grong las rgyal// me tog so ni tsam pa na// mnyam/
99a2: dga' ba ni ri mangs na// ba lang sbyor na gnod sbyin ri// grong khyer na ni sde bzang po// gnas dang bcas na lag pa dpa'// kha la byin na bde byed pa// kau sham pa ni tshegs med pa// bzang po can na bzang po pa// skya snar can
99a3: gyi bu na ni/ / gnod sbyin 'byung po'i gdon zhes bya// 'ching bun ni mya ngan med// ma la gnas na sha thung ba// tshang tshing gcig na don grub pa// ma rgyal rgyal na dman pa po// chu mchog na ni mun dza'i sgra// sen da pan nor bu'i gnas/
99a4: gnod sbyin mi bzang 'gro ldan dag/ ser skya yi ni gnas na gnas// ba lang 'dzin dang gzhan brnyas dang // sgo ba gnas can rtag pa dang // dbu ma pa yi gnod sbyin dag/ grags pa chen po bzang ches na// grong khyer snying po
99a5: dgras dogs pa/ mya ngan sa na rmongs byed pa// khyus 'gro na ni gnod sbyin grags// ma rungs pa yang de bzhin te// nga rgyal bral dang lha rtse ba// 'jigs byin na ni yid 'jigs pa// kha che'i yul na 'od byed pa// gtum po ral
99a6: pa can grong na/ kha che'i yul gyis mtshams na// lngas rtsen zhes ni bya ba gnas// de la bu ni lnga brgya ste// sde bo che la stobs po che// lngas rtsen gyi ni bu thu bo// rgya yul gyi ni sa la gnas// phrag pa'i mig ces bya ba ni/ mdzod ldan
99a7: na ni spun dang gnas/ / ka ling kan mche ba rkang // dkyil 'khor stan na dkyil 'khor ro// ka pu sha na lang ka'i bdag/ 'od can dga' ba'i chang tshing na// nam mkha' srung na chos skyong ba// lag pa chen po ngan pa na// rnam thos bu
99a8: yi bu dpal ldan/ / rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal po'i bu// gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing // tho gar gyi ni yul na gnas// 'gror bcas ri dang gangs can dag/ sin 'du yi ni rgya mtshor gnas// grod khyer gtsug/ cig tu ma gas/
99b1: ling kan rab 'joms pa// tshigs lnga ser po 'gro lding na// seng ga lan nor gyis bdag/ ne co'i bzhin ni 'brog na ste/ 'gro'am ci ni 'og na gnas// pad ma dkar po 'od gsal ba// grong khyer chen brtse ba can// 'jigs pa
99b2: sbyin na rab 'jigs pa/ / chu dang ldan na dmar ser gnas// ba ba da bskyed pa bar// 'dod pa sbyin nam dang ldan// bu mo 'jug na rab sad pa// ka pu she na nal ku ba ra// pha rol mtha' mad dngul chun// nus pa'i gnas
99b3: na zhi byed pa/ / blta ba na thag zangs ris// ke ta kan dmar ser po// 'phral ris 'brel na bzhin rgyas pa// u D+yan yul na ma rungs pa// zong shol ngan na bum lto bo// chu srin rgyal mtshan mya ngan na// sna tshogs
99b4: sde ni bo ka na/ / dga' dang ldan na sgra sgrogs bu// phung po'i bdag por dmar ser po// chung mo can na mthong dga' bo// gnod sbyin tshwa srin rgyal po'i khab// yangs pa na ni gnas pa ste// brgya stong phrag ni mang po
99b5: yi/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas// ba lang spyod pa sbrul bdug can// lcang lo'i grong na lcang lo pa// dga' ba'i grong na dga' ba can// grong gi lhan stobs chen gnas// lha las babs na rnam thos
99b6: bu/ rang gi sde ni yongs su skyong // lcang lo can na gnas pa ste// gnod sbyin bye bas yongs su bskor// gnod sbyin de dag ni rdzu 'phrul che ba// sde che ba stobs che ba/ pha rol gyi dgra rab tu 'joms pa// thub par
99b7: dka' zhing gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ / rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa dang / 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa// lha dang / lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba dag ste// de
99b8: dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba bgyis shig/ sba ba dang // yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang /
100a1: bde legs su 'gyur ba dang chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bgyis cig/ lo brgya 'tshe bar gyur cig/
100a2: ston brgya mthong bar sheg sheg/ tad yaH/ a ka Ta/ bi kaH/ haMbi Ni hA naM/ d+ha8// d+hA ra// drug sa/ drugs/ zag ka/ brag / bdag gis mdza' ba rnams/ han tan/ han ha na/ han tan/ 6
100a3: han/ han tan/ bdag lam phan par 'dod pa rnams/ had had/ ha hata/ hang hang / tad tad/ hAd tang / bdag la phyir rgol ba rnams bcabartsa/ bcwa bca/ bca btsa/ bcab tsa/ bcab tsa/ d+haHd+ha
100a4: d+had+hA/ d+ha d+hA/ d+hu d+ha/ bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa rnams/ ha ha ha ha ha/ ha ha ha ha ha/ dzi Ta dziTi/ dza~MTadza Ti/ dzi Ti dzi Ti/ dzi Ti dzi Ti/ dza Ti dzi Ta/ bdag gi dgra bo rnams/ nA sha ya/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsul+ra
100a5: tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ me li mi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ phu ru phu ru/ phu ru phu ru/ phu ru phu ru/ pra
100a6: ru phu ru/ phu ru phu ru/ tsi Ti tsi Ta/ tsi Ta tsi Ti/ tsi Ti tsi Ti/ tsi Ti tsi Ti/ tsi Ti tsi Ti/ bdag gi dgra rnams/ nA sha ya/ tig ke mig gi/ tsig ke/ bug ke/ shI b+ha dre/ mngag l+ye/ sa man ta b+ha dre/ hi ra Nu/ gar+b+ha sarba
100a7: ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ tsan dre can dra/ pra b+he/ sUr+ye/ sUr+ya/ kAn te/ du ra bi dz+nyA ya/ dume/ dum bi do dum be/ bri yaM ka de/ bdag la bsrung bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong
100a8: bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gang dag phyogs bcu srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po dag gi ming zung shig/ kun dga' bo shar phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi sde
100b1: dpon chen po gang dag shar phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su myong bar byed pa bzhi gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ ring po dang / mig mi bzang dang / gang po dang / ser skya'o// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal po rma bya chen mo 'dis
100b2: bdag la sung bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo lho phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag lho phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi gnas
100b3: te/ 'di lta ste/ seng ge dang / nye ba'i seng ge dang / dung can dang / dga' bo'o// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar
100b4: shog shig/ kun dga' bo nub phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag nub phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ seng ge dang / seng ge'i ral pa dang / bla ma dang / ser
100b5: sna'o/ / de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba bgyis cig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyub cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi
100b6: snga dpon chen po gang dag byang phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin dga' dang / brtson skyong dang / khyab 'jug go/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
100b7: rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag phyogs 'tshams na gnas te/ gang
100b8: dag phyogs 'tshams bsrung zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed pa bzhi po 'di dag/ 'di lta ste/ lnga spyod dang / tshig lnga ser po dang / ri mnyam dang / gsar can no// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma
101a1: bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dgas la gnas te/ gang dgas bsung /
101a2: zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi po 'di dag/ 'di lta ste/ sa ba dang / shin du sa pa dang / nag po dang / nye gnag go/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/
101a3: ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag par snang la gnas te/ gang dag par snang srung zhing yongs su myong bar byed pa bzhi po 'di dag/ 'di lta ste/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / ma dang / rlung
101a4: ngo/ / de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rnam thos kyi bu'i chos kyi spun gang dag sems can rnams
101a5: bsrung zhing yongs su myong bar byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi yams kyi nang dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa rnams med par byed pa/ 'jig rten la phan gdags pa'i phyir 'jig rten na chub rnams kyi ming zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po dang / zla
101a6: ba dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang / chu lha dang / b+ha ra d+h+wa dza dang / dbang ldan dang / tsan dan dang / 'dod pa'i gtso bo dang / 'grin ngan dang / mgul des dang / pa Di dang / nor bu dang / nor bu spyod dang / sba ra ba dang / nye lnga po dang / ri mnyam dang /
101a7: gser can dang / gang po dang / seng ldeng ba dang / g.yon can dang / gnod sbyin pa lang skyong dang / 'brog gnas dang / mi'i rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i khru mchog dang / tshogs lnga ser po dang / bzhin bzangs dang / gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang
101a8: bcas pa dang / dri za sna tshogs sde dang / 'bras bu gsum pa dang / 'gul gsum pa dang / lcags mdung ring po dang mi ldan te/ gnod sbyin de dag ni gnod sbyin chen po'o// sde rnams kyi yongs su 'dren pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/
101b1: 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa dag ste/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i spun te/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus gnod sbyin 'di ni nga la rnam par 'tsho'o// gnod sbyin 'di ni nga mi gtong
101b2: ngo/ / zhes gang dag la go bar byed pa de dag ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i spun te/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal po rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig/ lob rgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong
101b3: pabar shog shig/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'tshang 'bru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa las yongs su skyobs shig/ mi'i gdon dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon
101b4: dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon
101b5: dang / 'thung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus bsrul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon

102a2: dang / byad dang / g.yengs byed dang / sbyin sreg gi yo byad dang / sbyin sreg dang / 'joms pa dang / pho nya dang / ro langs dang / sems bsgyur ba dang / spong stong dang / bza' nye ba dang / sgra gnyis dang / gnod sgrib dang / gnod bltas dang / bri nyes da

106a2: tsi Ti tsi Ti tsi Te/ hi ka ke hi ka ke ti ka ke hi ka ke/ ta Da ta ga Do/ bik+She bak+She/ he re ho re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ tsa la tsa la/ tsu lu tsu lu/ swA hA/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/ rang sangs rgyas rnams la swA hA/ dgra
106a3: bcom pa rnams la swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la swA hA/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la swA hA/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la swA hA/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams la swA hA/ yang

106a5: rje la swA hA/ nye ba'i dbang po la swA hA/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos kyi bu la swA hA/ dri za'i bdag po yul 'khor bsrung la swA hA/ grul bum gyi bdag po 'phags skyes po la swA hA/ lU'i bdag pa mag mi bzang la swA hA/
