106a8: hA/ smyo byed rnams la swA hA/ grib gnon rnams la swA hA/ brjed byed rnams la swA hA/ gnon po rnams la swA hA/ zla ba dang nyi ma la swA hA/ rgyu skar rnams la swA hA/ gza' rnams la swA hA/ skar ma rnams la swA hA/ drang srong rnam
106b1: lakrAr+tha/ brdul zhugs grub pa rnams la swA hA/ rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la swA hA/ dkar mo la swA hA/ sa 'dzin la swA hA/ dug sel la swA hA/ 'chi mad la swA hA/ rmugs byed la swA hA/ thal mo rdeg la swA hA/ 'gro ldang pa la
106b2: sAhA/ sha ba ri li swA hA/ a ra thA sha ba ri la swA hA/ gtum mo la swA hA/ ban glang chen po la swA hA/ klu'i snying po la swA hA/ na ma mkha' lding gi snying po la swA hA// yid las byung ba la swA hA/ yid las byung chen po le swA hA/ yi ge u0f7f
106b3: ma la swa nA/ nor bu bzang la swAhA/ kun tu bzang po la swA hA/ kun tu bzang po chen po la swA hA/ dam tshig chen po la swA hA/ zla ba chen po la swA hA/ so sor 'brang ba chen mo la swA hA/ bsil ba'i nags tshal la swA hA/ 'asil ba'i
106b4: nags tshal chen po la swAr+tha/ be tsen 'dzin la swA hA/ be con 'dzin chen po la swA hA/ btang bzung la swA hA/ btang bzung chen po la sne hA/ rgyal byed ma la swA hA/ zhi ba la swA hA/ lngas brtsen la swA hUM/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma la swA hA/ rma bya'i rgyal mo
106b5: gser du snang ba la swA hA/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la swA hA/ rig sngags chen mo dang / gsang sngags chen mo dang / so sor 'brang ma chen po dang / bsrung ba chen mo 'di dag gis gshed byed rnams bcom mo// sbyar ba'i las rnams
106b6: dang / byad dang / g.yengs byed rnams dang / ro langs rnams dang / sems bsgyur ba rnams dang / spod stong rnams patsam mo// skems byed rnams dang / smyo byed rnams dang / grib gnon rnams dang / brjed byed rnams bcom mo// skam
106b7: pa rnams dang / skrag pa rnams dang / dbyig dug rnams dang / dug rnams bcom mo// bza' nyes rnams dang / sgyu ga nyis rnams dang / gnod sgrib rnams dang / gnod ltas rnams dang / bri nyes rnams dang / bsgo mnyes rnams dang /
106b8: smad pa rnams bcom mo// rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / zla ba phyed pa rnams dang / zla ba gcig pa rnams dang / nyin mo/
107a1: rnams dang / mtshan mo pa rnams dang / yud tsam pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang / rims drag po rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams
107a2: dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / mi'i rims rnams dang / mi ma yin pa'i rims rnams bcom mo// rims nad thams cad bcom mo// shu ba dang / g.ya' ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / po la mig dang / g.yan pa dang / me
107a3: dpal dang / ltog pa rnams bcom mo// klad pa na ba dang / gzhogs phye ngan pa dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang / 'gul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na pa dang / rna ba na ba dang / son pa dang / snying
107a4: na pa dang / rtsibs logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto ba na ba dang / mkhur ba na ba dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / skye gnas na ba dang / rab tu rkang pa na ba dang / brla na ba dang / byin pa na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang
107a5: nyid lag na ba bcom mo/ / gdon thams cad dang / dug thams cad dang / nad thams cad bcom mo// bdag bde legs su gyur cig/ mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs// nyi ma'i gung gi bde legs dang // nyin mtshan kun gyi bde
107a6: legs dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byang chub phyag 'tshal lo// grol gyur phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi gyur phyag 'tshal zhi la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam grol phyag 'tshal grol la
107a7: phyag 'tshal lo/ / bram ze gang dag sdig pa'i chos rnams bsal bar gyur pa de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la bsrung ba bgyis shig/ pha bde legs su gyur cig/ ma bde legs su gyur cig/ mngal
107a8: bde legs su gyur cig/ rkang gnyis pa rnams bde legs su gyur cig/ rkang bzhi pa rnams bde legs su gyur cig/ rkang mangs rnams bde legs su gyur cig/ srid pa gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad
107b1: bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi ming zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / klu'i rgyal po tshangs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po tshangs chen dang / klu'i rgyal
107b2: po dbang po dang / klu'i rgyal po nye ba'i dbang po dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu dang / klu'i rgyal po drug med bcas dang / klu'i rgyal po mtsho chen dang / klu'i rgyal po mtsho chen bu dang / klu'i rgyal po chu srin dang /
107b3: kwa'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po nye dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po mi zhum pa dang / klu'i rgyal po nye bar mi zhum pa dang / klu'i rgyal po blta na mdzes dang / klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / klu'i rgyal po skyal
107b4: reng dang / klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po ban Ta ka dang / klu'i rgyal po sor mo drug pa dang / klu'i rgyal po snying por 'gro dang / kru'i rgyal po dpal ldan dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal mgrin dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal 'phel dang / klu'i
107b5: rgyal po dpal bzangs dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs bzangs dang / klu'i rgyal po chu skyes dang / klu'i rgyal po stag re dang / klu'i rgyal po lag bzang dang / klu'i rgyal por rab dang / klu'i rgyal po nyi 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po zla 'od dang / klu'i rgyal
107b6: po bzang sdug dang / klu'i rgyal po ngar ba dang / klu'i rgyal po'i 'brug sgrogs dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'byin dang / klu'i rgyal po rgyas byed dang / klu'i rgyal po char 'bebs dang / klu'i rgyal po dri med dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs chen mgo dang /
107b7: kwa'i rgyal po lcar lo can gyi mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po stag mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po ba lang mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po ri dgas mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po glang po che'i mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po rlan stobs can dang / klu'i rgyal po skye bo 'tshe dang /
107b8: bu'i rgya po sa pa dang tsu rtsu po pa dang klu la po co pa sbedang / klu'i rgyal po mi gtong ba dang / klu'i rgyal po gtor po dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / klu'i rgyal po sgra spogs kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po rdzogs pa'i bu dang / klu'i rgyal
108a1: po dpal dang / klu'i rgyal po dpal can dang / klu'i rgyal po 'phyang ba dang / klu'i rgyal po srin bu dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po gser dang / klu'i rgyal po glang po'i rtsal dang / klu'i rgyal po dkar
108a2: gsal dang / klu'i rgyal po ser skya dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab dang / klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang / klu'i rgyal po rung dang / klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po nye gnag dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs
108a3: !dang / klu'i rgyal po phred med kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po la ba dang / klu'i rgyal po skrag byed dang / klu'i rgyal po srin po dang / klu'i rgyal po brag lag dang / klu'i rgyal po ga ga dang / klu'i rgyal po sanad+ha dang / klu'i rgyal po bag cu
108a4: dang / klu'i rgyal po si ta dang / klu'i rgyal po bkra shis dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rab banan dang / klu'i rgyal pos bsrung gi bu dang / klu'i rgyal pos 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po mdog 'byin
108a5: 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po bzang po dang / klu'i rgyal po rab tu bzang dang / klu'i rgyal po nor bzang dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs bzang dang / klu'i rgyal po nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po nor bu 'gul dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po gnyis dang / klu'i
108a6: rgyal po ser po gnyis dang / klu'i rgyal po dmar po gnyis dang / klu'i rgyal po dkar po gnyis dang / klu'i rgyal po phreng ldan dang / klu'i rgyal po dmar phrad can dang / klu'i rgyal po be'u dang / klu'i rgyal po khrums stod dang / klu'i rgyal po
108a7: dza dang / klu'i rgyal po nyo lnga dang / klu'i rgyal po arma su stegs pa / klu'i rgyal po nong bu'i bu dang / klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung dang / klu'i rgyal po 'phags skyes pa dang / klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang dang / klu'i rgyal po nam
108a8: thos kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po shing rta'i bzhin dang / klu'i rgyal po rtsam par skyes dang / klu'i rgyal po gau ta ma dang / klu'i rgyal po lnga len dang / klu'i rgyal po gtsug phud lha dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud dang / klu'i rgyal po thigs pa dang /
108b1: klu'i rgyal po nye ba'i thigs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po bung ba dang / klu'i rgyal po dus las byung ba dang / kwa'i rgyal po stobs can dang / klu'i rgyal po cung zad can dang / chu'i rgyal po cung zad pa dang / klu'i rgyal po tsam pa ka dang / klu'i rgyal po go'u ta
108b2: ma nag mo dang / klu'i rgyal po yi bzangs dang / klu'i rgyal po che dang klu tsu pos du bad// skyil pos dang / skye bo/ po nadang/ klu'i rgyal po mi ma yin pa dang / klu'i rgyal po gzings dang / klu'i rgyal po mchog dang / klu'i rgyal po ba lnga
108b3: ka dang / klu'i rgyal po a luka dang / klu'i rgyal po du lu dang / klu'i rgyal po e la dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i lo ma dang / klub rgyal po 'gro sgra dang / klu'i rgyal po 'chi sgra dang / klub rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu dang / kAr
108b4: rgyal po ser skya dang / klu'i rgyal po zhi ba 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po me tog u dpal dang / klu'i rgyal po sen mo can dang / klu'i rgyal po 'phel ba dang / klu'i rgyal po thar pa dang / klu'i rgyal po blo canadang/ klu'i rgyal po rab thar dang / klu'i rgyal
108b5: po la ba dang / klu'i rgyal po mgye gas rab dga' dang / klu'i rgyal po e la dang / 'dus pa dag dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dag dang / klu'i rgyal po gsal ba can dang / klu'i rgyal po blta mdzes chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po mchog
108b6: can dang / lnga'i rgyal po mchog ldan grag ma dang / klu'i rgyal po bzhin bzangs dang / klu'i rgyal po me lo dgados na dang / klu'i rgyal pos 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po seng ge 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po 'gro lding dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po gnyis dang /
108b7: klu'i rgyal po dkar po gnyis dang / klu'i rgyal po nye dkar gnyis dang / klu'i rgyal po de dag dang / gzhan yang gang dag sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dus dus su 'brug sgrog pa/ dus dus su glog 'byin pa/ dus dus su char 'bebs pa/ dus
108b8: dus pu le tog bsgrub pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi gzung ba/ gsum la skyabs su dong ba/ nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / me dang bye ma'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i las kyi 'jigs pa las thar pa/ sa 'dzin
109a1: pa/ rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po na gnas pa/ tshe ring ba bskal par gnas pa/ dbang che bar grags pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ 'khor phal che ba/ dgra'i dpung rab tu 'joms pa/ rdzu
109a2: 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul che ba/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag ste/ klu'i rgyal po bu dang bcas pa/ tsha bo dang bcas pa/ sun dang bcas pa
109a3: blon po dang bcas pa/ sde dpon dang bcas pa/ pho nya dang bcas pa/ mngags pa dang bcas pa/ g.yog dang bcas pa/ 'khor dang bcas pa/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig/
109a4: lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ gtsang sbra ma byas pa dang / gtsang sbra byas pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa dang / 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / mi nyal ba dang / 'ongs pa
109a5: dang / ma 'ongs pa dge par gyur cig/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / mi mdza' bas 'jigs pa dang / gsod pa'i 'jigs pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra'i
109a6: 'jigs pa dang / 'joms pa'i 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dgra'i tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yos pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs
109a7: pa las bdag bde legs su gyur cig/ lha'i 'jigs pa dang / klu'i 'jigs pa dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa dang / rlung lha'i 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / dri za'i 'jigs pa dang / mi 'am ci'i
109a8: 'jigs pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'jigs pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa dang / yi dgas kyi 'jigs pa dang / sha za'i 'jigs pa dang / 'byung po'i 'jigs pa dang / grul bum gyi 'jigs pa dang /
109b1: srul po'i 'jigs pa dang / lus srul po'i 'jigs pa dang / skems byed kyi 'jigs pa dang / skyo byed kyi 'jigs pa dang / grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa dang / brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa dang / gnon po'i 'jigs pa las bdag bde legs
109b2: su gyur cig/ gshed byed dang / bskur ba'i las dang / byad dang / g.yengs byed dang / rolangs dang / sems bskur ba dang / sdong stong dang / bza' nyes dang / sdug nyis dang / gnod sdeb dang / gnod ltas dang / bri nyes dang / bsgom
109b3: nyes dang / smad pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag bde legs su gyur cig/ shu ba dang / g.ya' ba dang / mdzo dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang me dpal dang lhog pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag ba de legs su gyur cig
109b4: mtshon mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ / nyi ma'i gung gi bde legs dang // nyin mtshan kun gyis bde legs dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byang chub phyag 'tshal lo// grol bur phyag 'tshal grol
109b5: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / zhi gyur phyag 'tshal zhi la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam grol phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo// bram ze gang dag sdig pa'i chos rnams bsal bar gyur pa de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag
109b6: la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pagyis shig/ swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o// tad ya thA/ ar De/ kar De/ ma
109b7: de/ ma da bar d+ha ni/ a ba re sha ba re/ tu re tu re/ tsu ra tsu ra/ sha ba re/ bar+Na sha ba re/ hu tsi hu tsi/ mu tsi mu tsi/ swA hA// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
109b8: gtsug tor can gyis gsungs pa'o/ / tad ya thA/ i Ta Te/ mi da Te/ khu re bi khu re/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ ke tu mU la/ aM ba rI/ a ma ba rA/ ba ti/ dum be/ do du ma me/ hi li hi li/ ku tsi ku tsi/ mu tsi mu tsi sA hA/
110a1: kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis gsungs pa'o// tad ya thA/ mo ri mo ra/ ke bad Te/ man Ti maN Di te ke/ ha re ha re/ g+ha
110a2: re g+ha re/ kha re kha re/ pha le pa li ni/ dan te dan ti ni/ dan te le/ shi ka Ti/ ma ka Ti/ na Te/ ni Ti ni/ shi ri shi ri shi ri shi ri shi ri shi ri swA hA// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par
110a3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis gsungs pa'o/ / tad ya thA/ hi Di/ mi Di/ ku Di/ mu Di/ tra Di/ A Di/ dan te/ dan ti le/ sha ka ri/ tsa ka ri/ tha ga ri/ ta ga ri/ kAn tsi ni/ kAn tsa nA ba ti/ ba re ba re/ ba re ba re/
110a4: dan te/ sid d+hi swA hA// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis gsungs pa'o// tad ya thA/ tad ta le/ ta ta le/ ta ta la/ to ta le/ bI re/ bI dza la
110a5: bidz+ra d+ha re/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ bi rA dzA/ ma si ma ti/ mA ti li ni/ mun Di shrI mun De/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ b+ha dra ba ti/ sid d+hi swA hA// kun dga' bo ga sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa
110a6: sangs rgyas 'od bsungs gis gsungs pa'o/ / ta da ya thA/ a Na Di re/ ka Na Da re/ maN Da re/ khaNe Da re/ dzam bu dza ma bu na ti/ dzam bu ba ti/ med te/ mA Di ti ke/ a ma re/ sid d+hi/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ba shu ba sh+tsa
110a7: pa shu pa shu/ ba shu/ pa ti sid d+hi swA hA// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngas sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir da ltar bshad pa'o//
110a8: tad ya thA/ hi li mi li/ ki li mi li/ i li li/ ka ta le/ ke tU mU le/ a Da ma li/ Da ba pe/ Da Da ma phe/ pu sa ra ke/ pu sa Te/ na ra kan te/ kA ma Ni/ kam bu/ da ra ki ru ru ta ra/ bA ra Ni/ pra kri ti/ dngaSh+Te/ mi li
110b1: ta le hi ti hA se/ a ba la/ tu pa le/ bi l-i ke/ bad Ti bad Ti/ ti ke/ aNan tu be/ bi Di t+ya ma me// phyogs bcu kun du lhas char pob shig/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// sal dga' bas chu dbab tu gsol// bcom
110b2: ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ / i ri dza yaye/ ge ni hi kA ye/ bI gA ri ka ye/ a ru tsi/ na rubatsi/ nad Te/ nad Te/ badz+re badz+re nad Te/ u da ya na bri ye/ a le ta le/ ku la tA le/ nA rA ya Ni/ bA rA ya Ni/ ba sh+ya ni/ swar sha ni// 'gro
110b3: lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ / ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ngas bstan cing rjes su yi rang nas/ dge slong kun dga' bo dge slong sa ril bde legs su 'gyur bar byas pa de bzhin du bdag
110b4: la bsung bgyis shig/ sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug bsad
110b5: pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pas bshad
110b6: cing rjes su mi rang ba'o/ / tang yahA/ shing shing she/ Thadri/ dz+yoti dz+yota/ dz+ha ti/ u0f7fdre/ har had ha re/ hA hiNi/ dan ti sha ba re/ shi ba/ shrA pa baN+Di ni/ bad+ha bad+hA/ bo d+ha ba d+hi ba d+hi/ satwe/ bid+hI/ ba tsA Ni ye swA hA/ 6
110b7: dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pas spras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ / tad ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ mA li ni tsam ka ri/ ki ri ki ri ki ri ki ri ka ro ka ri he brah+mA ya/
110b8: rad na ka ra Na Da ke/ bi Do h+ya pus se/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ phu ru pu ru/ pu ru pu ru pu ru swA hA// dug bcom mo dug nges par bcom mo/ sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis dug des par bcom mo// rang sangs rgyas kyi gzi
111a1: badz+rad kyis drug pasam ma/ / thabatsam pa gza brjid kyis drug btsam mo// phyir mi 'ong ba'i ga brjid kyis drug bcom mo// lan cig phyi 'ong ba'i gzi brjid kyis drag bcom mo// mun tu zhugs
111a2: gze brjid kyis drag bcom mo/ / bden par smra ba'i gzi rjid kyis drug bcom mo// tshangs pa'i ma dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis drug bcom mo// dbang po rdo rje'i gzi brjid kyis drug bcom mo// khyab 'jug gi 'khor long
111a3: drugra bcom mo/ / gshin rje'i be tson gyis drug bcom mo// chu lha'i zhags pas drug bcom mo// lha ma yin gyi sgyus drug bcom mo// klu'i rig sngags kyis drug bcom mo// drag po'i mdung rjes drug bcom mo// ma
111a4: byed kyi mdung thung gis drag bcom mo/ / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos drag bcom mo// drag nges par btsam mo// drag sa'i nang du song shig/ bdag drug thams cad dang / be'u lta bu'i drug dang / ha la ha la'i drug
111a5: dang / nag po brtsegs pa'i dug dang / mche ba'i drag dang / rtswa ba'i dug dang / kha zas kyi dug dang / phye ma'i drug dang / lta ba'i dug dang / glog gi drug dang / sprin gyi dug dang / sbrul dang / byi ba dang / srin bu ki ta dang / lu ta dang /
111a6: kan b+ha dang / sbal ba dang / sbrang bu dang / bung ba dang / bta ri dang / tre ma bu ga dang / trai la ta'i rug dang / mi'i drug dang / sdig pa'i dug dang / mi ma yin pa'i dug dang / dogs pa'i dug dang / sman pa'i dug dang / rig sngags
111a7: kyi dug las bde legs su gyur cig/ dug thams cad las bdag bde legs su gyur cig/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis spras shing rjes su yi rang
111a8: ro/ tad ya thA/ dza lpa/ dzan tu le/ mA lA/ dzan tu le/ tsa bi Ti/ dzanaHle/ mtha ni gA ta ni/ gra sa ni/ ha ri sha ri/ rA ti shi re/ ta ru ta dra Na ba ti/ ha ha ha ha ta/ se he/ d+hi ti d+hi ti/ ku ru ku ru/ ba sa ra badz+re/ traT trar+tha
111b1: si/ barba ba Ta si/ si li si li/ gzigag pa'i dul sbyin// snang ba dang / rab tu snang ba thams cad rab tu rmugs par bya'o// lag pa dang / gang pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag dang / sra dang bcas te chad pa/
111b2: gcad par bya'o// u 'aM gi ni/ sar pa ti/ bte/ badz+ra badz+ra badz+ra badz+ra badz+ra/ ba ta ye swA hA// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal momathu chen ma 'di ni rgyal ba chen po bzhis smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// taH6/ dz+wal
111b3: dA la NA/ tab ta ba na/ d+ha ma rnaman/ sa ra sa raN+Da/ ka Ti kuTi/ mu Te muTiT/ ma Ti maT/ sa ra sa re/ ma ra ma ra/ ta tar/ ta tang/ te ti re/ Ta Ta TaT/ dA dA d+yAd+ya R+sha/ 28 36/ rgal ha la ha la ta la hra la/ si
111b4: sid d+hi sid d+hi/ sid d+hi sid d+hi/ swa ste/ srasti/ sra sti/ swasti/ swa sti/ srod gtong dang / gshin rje'i pho nya dang / mtshan mo nag mo dang / dus kyi zhags pa dang / 'chi bdag gi chad pa dang / tshangs pa'i chad pa dang / dbang po'i chad pa dang /
111b5: drang srong gi chang pa dang / lha'i chad pa dang / klu'i chad pa dang / lha ma yin gyi chad pa dang / rlung lha'i chad pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi chad pa dang / dri za'i chang pa dang / mi'am ci'i chad pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i chad pa dang / gnod sbyin gyis chas
111b6: pa dang / srin po'i ched pa dang / yi dgas kyi chad pa dang / sha za'i chad pa dang / 'byung po'i chad pa dang / grul bum gyi chad pa dang / srul po'i chad pa dang / lus bsul po'i cha dang dang / skem byed kyi chang pa dang / smyo byed kyi chad pa dang /
111b7: grib gnon gyi chad pa dang / brjed byed kyi chad pa dang / gnon po'i chad pa dang / ro langs kyi chad pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pa dang / chom rkun gyi chad pa dang / me'i chad pa dang / chu'i chad pa dang / chad pa thams cad las bdag la srung
111b8: bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tshe bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis klung gi rgyal po rnams kyi ming zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ klung gi rgyal po gang dga' dang / klung gi rgyal po sin du dang / krung /
112a1: ge rgyal po pag shu dang / klung gi rgyal po si ta dang / klung gi rgyal po mda' 'byung dang / klung gi rgyal po khyim ldan dang klung gi rgyal po gshin rjes la dang / klung gi rgyal po bya mu dang / klung gi rgyal po rgyas 'bab dang /
112a2: klung gi rgyal po zhags bral dang / klung gi rgyal po zhi ba 'dzin dang / klung gi rgyal pos ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po zla ba'i cha dang / klung gargyal po dbyangs can dang / klung gi rgyal po ru sbal can dang / klung gi rgyal po chu dron can dang / rung
112a3: gi rgyal po chu mchog can dang / klung gi rgyal po zangs 'dab dang / klung gi rgyal po sbrang rtsi can dang / klung gi rgyal po spa ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po bu ram shing ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po ba glang ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po 'phags pa
112a4: na dang / lung gi rgyal po rtse sbyin dang / klung gi rgyal po mdza' bzang dang / klung gi rgyal po kun gyibashes dang / klung gi rgyal po 'chi med dang / klung gi rgyal po me tog pad ma dang / klung gi rgyal po rnga len dang / klung gi rgyal po dngos
112a5: bzang ba dang / zung gi rgyal po rab bzangs dang / klung gi rgyal po dka' thub sbyin dang / klung gi rgyal po dri bral dang / klung ga rgyal po skyon bral dang / klung gi rgyal po krung chen dang / klung gi rgyal po gsar ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po ba lang
112a6: sbyin mchog can dang / klung gi rgyal po gsang srung dang / klung gi rgyal po ba lang can dang / de dag dang gzhan yang gang dag sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'bab pa'i chu klung de dag thams cad la gang dag rgyun du gnas pa/ gzugs
112a7: tha dad pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa/ gzugs mang ba/ gzugs mtha' yas pa/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can/ gzugs sna tshogs pa'i lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang /
112a8: nam mkha' lding rnams dang / dri ba rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / yi dgas rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / 'thung po rnams dang / bral ba
112b1: rnams dang / phul po rnams dang / lus sul po rnams dang / skems byed rnams dang / smyo byed rnams dang / grib gnon rnams dang / brjed byed rnams dang / gnon po rnams dang / zas su ma dngas za ba rnams dang / zas su
112b2: mngal za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag zab rnams dang / zas su sha zab rnams dang / zas su chil za ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang zab rnams dang / zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang / zas su
112b3: srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa za ba rnams
112b4: dang / zas su lo tog zab rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg zab rnams dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su phyis za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su 'chil ma za ba rnams dang / zas su dar
112b5: skabs za ba rnams dang / zas su skabs za ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su sdug pa za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su gtor lung nas 'bab pa 'thung bde dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi
112b6: rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsung bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis ri'i rgyal po rnams kyi ming zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /
112b7: ri'i rgyal po gangs can dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang dang / ri'i rgyal po rtse brgya pa dang / ri'i rgyal po seng ldeng can dang / ri'i rgyal po gser logs dang / ri'i rgyal po 'od 'dzin dang / ri'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin dang /
112b8: ri'i rgyal po khong yug dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po dbang po'i brag dang / ri'i rgyal po tshangs pa ldan dang / ri'i rgyal po dpal ldan dang / ro'i rgyal po bstan sdug dang / r-i'i rgyal po shin du rgyas pa dang /
113a1: ri'i rgyal po rin chen 'byung gnas dang / ri'i rgyal po srid bu can dang / ri'i rgyal po nor bu rnga dang / ri'i rgyal po zag bzangs ris dang / ri'i rgyal po rdo rje 'byung gnas dang / ri'i rgyal po 'gram pa ldan dang /
113a2: ri'i rgyal po lha min 'bab dang / ri'i rgyal po klog 'od dang / ri'i rgyal po khyab gnas dang / ri'i rgyal po zla 'od dang / ri'i rgyal po brag bzang dang / ri'i rgyal po nyi ma mdzes dang / ri'i rgyal po thigs pa dang / ri'i rgyal po 'bigras
113a3: byed dang / ri'i rgyal po zla ba'i brag dang / ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs brtsegs dang / ri'i rgyal po ma la ya dang / ri'i rgyal po gser gyi rtse mo dang / ri'i rgyal po kun nas 'gro dang / ri'i rgyal po lag bzang ba dang / ri'i rgyal po nor bu ldan
113a4: dang / ri'i rgyal po sde bzang dang / ri'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i mchu dang / ri'i rgyal po rig byed bsrung dang / ri'i rgyal po ba lang rna dang / ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs phreng dang / ri'i rgyal po mi 'jigs sna tshogs dang / ri'i rgyal po ral gri dang /

113a6: rgyal po can dan phreng dang / ri'i rgyal po stobs 'dzin dang / ri'i rgyal po dbang chen dang / ri'i rgyal po dus 'bri byed dang / ri'i rgyal po skem ri dang / ri'i rgyal po ba lang bsrung dang / ri'i rgyal po bya rog sgra can dang / ri'i rgyal po
113a7: bstan pa 'dzin dang / sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di na ri'i rgyal po 'di dag dang / gzhan dag kyang yod pa de la lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / dri za rnams dang
113a8: mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / yi dgas rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / srul po rnams dang / lus bsrul po
113b1: rnams dang / zhes byed rnams dang / so byed rnams dang / grib gnon rnams dang / brjed byed rnams dang / gnon po rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang thub ba rnams dang / rgyal ba 'a'or dang las pa gang dag tu duganas padedag
113b2: gis kyang rigasngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tshe bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ sdig pa thams cad sol cig/ dge ba rnams snang bar gyur cig/ mi dge ba nas
113b3: sol cig/ don rnams la snang bar bgyis shig/ gnod pa rnams sol cig/ mtshan mo bde legs nyid bde legs// nyi ma'i gung gi bde legs dang / nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag
113b4: la stsol/ / swA hA// kun dga' bo khyod kyis rgyas gang dag nam mkha' la chu zhing snang bar byed pa rnams kyi ming zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ sprin drug dang ni sngar ma dang // mgo dang lag dang nams dang // rnal ni bas shis
113b5: phun sum tshogs/ / de bzhin skrag ste bdun pa yin// de ltar hUM skar bdun po 'di dag ni// shar gyi sgon gnas bdag ste// gang dag shar phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dag go/ de dag gis kyang
113b6: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tshe bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ mchu ni mi 'dza' 'joms pa dang // de bzhin gre dang dbo gnyis dang // me bzhi nag pa
113b7: sa ri dang / / sa ga de ni bdun pa yin// de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni// lho phyogs kyi sgon gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag lce phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
113b8: rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar gyur cig/ lha 'tshams gzi brjid chen mo dang // de bzhir sngon dang snrums dang ni// chu stod dang ni chu smad dang // de ltar
114a1: bya bzhi gra zhan no/ / de ltar tu skar bdun po 'di dag ni nub phyogs kyi sgon gnas bdag ste/ gang dag nub phyogs bsrung shing yongs su sbyong bar byed bdag go// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi d+ha
114a2: mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ mon gru dang ni mon gre dang // de bzhin khrums stod khrums smad dang // nam gru dang ni tha skar dang //
114a3: teste ni bdun pa yin// de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni// byang gi phyogs na gnas pa dag ste// gang dag byang phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis
114a4: bdag la bsrung ba bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gza' gang dag rgyu skar rnams kyi khrod na chu zhing 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba dang / bde ba dang sdug
114a5: bsngal ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dag kyang ston pa rnams kyi ming zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ gza' nyi ma dang / gza' zla ba dang / gza' phur bu dang / gza' ba bsangs dang / gza' spen pa dang / gza' mig dmang dang
114a6: gza' lhag dang / gza' lha min dbang po sgrag can dang / gza' du ba mjug rings so// rgyu skad nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni// de ltar phyogs na bdun bdun no// skar ma gza' bdun de bzhin te// rdzu 'phrul che zhing dka' thub che// nyi
114a7: mdang ni zla ba dang / / sum cu cu bdun tshang ba dag/ 'char ba dang ni nub pa na// 'khor lo mtshan cha bzhin du rgyu// 'jig rten du ni zad 'phel byed// gzi tso rdzu 'phrul chen po dag/ rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis su// rigasngags
114a8: rjes su yi rang byos/ / de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo drang srong rnying pa 'artul zhugs grub
114b1: pa/ rig sngags grub pa/ grags pa 'bar ba/ klung dang ril gnas pa/ dmod pa'i mtshon cha can/ dka' thub grag pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba de dag gi ming brjod kyis khyod
114b2: kyis zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ drang srong chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs lha zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po lha skyabs kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'od
114b3: zer can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po kun gyi bshes zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnas 'jog ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grog mkhar ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'dro ba skyong gi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'dro ba skyong gi
114b4: bu rgan po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ngan spong zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ngan spong dga' zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'gro 'dzin ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'gro dga' zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'jigs pa can zhes bya
114b5: ba dang / drang srong chen po skal ldan shing rta zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mdun du bdar ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mgo bo che zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gshin rje'i me zhes bya ba dang / drang
114b6: srong chen po gnyis 'thung gi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung nag po'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ljang sdo'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ljang rdo'i tsha'o zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po dag mnyam zhes bya ba dang / tra
114b7: srong chen po 'phags po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po yang dag 'phags po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po bzod pa smra zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grags pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rab grags zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen
114b8: po bla la zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grub pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gru 'dzin ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rta bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gangs can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mig dmar zhes bya ba dang //
115a1: drang srong chen po cha byad 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gos ngan zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mda' ltar snang ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rgyags pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'od ces bya ba
115a2: dang / drang srong chen po pa bsangs zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po phur bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po spen pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gza' lhag ces bya
115a3: bdang / drang srong chen po drag sel zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen pos 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rwa gcig pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po drang srong ra zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gyur mig kyi bu zhes bya ba dang
115a4: drang song chen po gar ldan gyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po sgra'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'jigs byed glang po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ser skya zhes
115a5: bya ba dang / drang srong chen po go'u ta ma zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rta dmar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po byis pa rtse zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mis byin gyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ri bo zhes bya
115a6: ba dang / drang srong chen po srani bu 'dzin ces bya ste/ kun dga' bo drang srong chen po rnying pa 'di dag ni rigs byed rnams byed pa/ gsang sngags rnams byed pa/ dmod pa 'dor ba/ brtul zhugs grub pa/ gzi brjid che ba grub pa
115a7: pha rol gnon pa grub pa dag ste/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ tad ya thA/ hi ri hi ri/ kha ri
115a8: ri/ mi ri mi ri/ pra ri phu ri/ su ri swa ri/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ si ri si ri/ Dab phu Da Da ba phu/ gra sa ni/ ma thA ni/ da ma ni da ha ni/ g+hA ta ni/ pa tsa ni/ bA tsa ni/ ta pa ni/ tA ba ni/ ha na nid ha ni/ dA hA ni/ da hAd hA/
115b1: dahA/ da la dal dA la ni/ bA Ta ni mo ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ sA ya ma b+hu swA hA// kun dga' bo khyod kyis skye dgu'i bdag po chen po gang dag lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang /
115b2: nam mkha' lding rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto'i phye chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / mi dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi dge ba
115b3: dang / mi dge ba la sogs pa'i dge ba'i khyad par grangs med pa dag gis 'jig rten gsum du rnam par bzhag pa rnams kyi ming zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po bu can dang / skye
115b4: da mad pa tsu phred smye ga dang byed bu ga sogs/ skye dgu'i bdag po mdun du bdar dang / skye dgu'i bdag po spu zingasel dang / skye dgu'i bdag po ga byed dang / skye dgu'i bdag po mdzes gnas dang / skye dgu'i bdag /
115b5: po zan po dang / skye dgu'i bdag po lus mdzes dang / skye dgu'i bdag po rab dga' dang / skye dgu'i bdag po mkhas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dgu yo dade / kun dga'o skye dgu'i bdag po bdag nyid chen mo 'di dag ni gnas pa dang /
115b6: 'gro ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs srung ba'i phyir gnas pa dag go// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog
115b7: shig/ thogs pa med pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag gis kyang bsrung ba bgyis shig/ tad ya thA/ hi ri hi ri/ kha ri kha ri/ mi ri mi ri/ prA ri pra ri/ su ri swa ri/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ si ri si ri/ Da ba praN/
115b8: pras ni/ mahA ni/ dam ni/ da ha ni/ bA ta ni/ btsa ni bAtsa ni/ ta pa ni tA ba ni/ ha na ni da ta ni/ dA ha ni/ da had ha data/ da la da la dA la ni/ phaT ni/ mo hA ni/ g+hastA ni/ dzastA ni sAhA// kun dga' bo myed
116a1: kyis drug chen po rnams kyi ming zung shig/ tad ya thA/ aN Da rA/ ban Da rA/ ka ra Da/ ka yu rA ni/ b+hU ta ma ga mA/ bru ta ba ti/ bin du ba ti/ si ri ba ti/ ti dza ba ti/ te dze gra ba ti mgo btil po zabaH
116a2: ar DA/ ta Na DA/ tar ta ra Ta/ dan tA/ dza hA dza hA/ dze lA/ me lA/ ha lA/ pha lA/ ga hA/ ru tsi / dan du rA/ ai ri ki tsi kA/ kam bA sha ta dan du rA/ bi pu li/ na ku li/ ki ri pa/ ta raM gA riSh+Ta/ a pra ma ti dza ma bu pa
116a3: ma d+hA ma ti/ ka ma le bi ma le/ kun Da le/ a hi/ tu hi du hi/ bag ge/ bag ge/ dU te/ bad sa nA b+he/ ma hA ga re/ tu lam be du lam be/ su lam be/ swA hA// kun dga' bo 'di dag ni dug chen po dag ste/ de dag
116a4: gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal po ma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba bgyis shig/ sra ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongs su sbyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chang ba
116a5: grang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba bgyis shig lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo byed kyis shing
116a6: ldan pa rnams kyi ming zung shig/ 'di lta ste/ shing ljon pa chen po gsar zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po bya ba gnas zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po spre'u gnas
116a7: zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po ser po zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po mya ngan 'tshang zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po rna ldan ces bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen
116a8: po rgyas byed ces bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po bil ba zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po tsu ta zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po de dag dang / gzhan dag la lha gang dag gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal
116b1: morma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba bgyis shig/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ skyon brgya mthong bar shog shig/ kun dga' bo gi sngags kyi rgyal mo rna bya chen mo 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
116b2: rgyas bdun gyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsug gtor can gyis/
116b3: gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jigs gis gsungs shing rjes su yi
116b4: rang ba'o/ / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
116b5: sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngas kyang da ltar bstan cing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ / kun dga'o rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pas kyang bshad cing rjes su yi rang ba'o// mi mjed kyi bdag po
116b6: tshangs pas kyang spras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ste/ dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor bsdu
116b7: gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ / grul bum gyi bdag po 'phags skyes pos kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang gis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// gnod sbyin gyi rgyal
116b8: po rnam thos kyi bus kyang spras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ / dri za'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / grul bum gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / klu'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa
117a1: brgyad dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lngas chen dang 'phrog ma bul brgya'i 'khor can gyis kyang sbas shing rjes su ye rang ba'o// kun dga' bor gasngags kyi rgyal mom bya chen ma 'di na lha'i gdon dang / klu
117a2: gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / go 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dgas
117a3: gdon dang / shaza'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bram gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang /
117a4: gnon po'i gdon gyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no// gdon thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no// mdangs 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnam
117a5: dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas pa zab rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang /
117a6: zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin pasreg zab rnams dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su phyis za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin
117a7: 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su 'chil ma za ba rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su skyug pa za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang bzab rnams
117a8: dang / zas su gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no// gshed byed dang / bsgyur ba'i las dang / byad dang / g.yeng byed dang / ro langs dang / sems bsgyur ba dang / skrod stong dang / bza nyes dang /
117b1: phyu gnyes dang / gnod sgrib dang / gnod bltas dang / bri nyes dang / bsgomanyes dang / smad pa rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin
117b2: bdun pa dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / nyi ma phyed pa dang / nyin mo pa dang / yud tsam pa dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang / rims drag po dang / 'byung po'i rims dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / khris pa las gyur pa
117b3: dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pas 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// rims thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// klad pa na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang
117b4: snand dang / kha nad dang / 'gral nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / son pa dang / snying na ba dang / rtsab logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / ljon pa dang / mkhur ba na ba dang / chu so na pa dang / skye gnas na
117b5: ba dang / rab tu rked pa na ba dang / brlan pa dang / byin pa na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lagan ba dang / nyid lag nabs 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no// shub dang / g.ya' ba dang 'brum bu phra mo dang mdze/
117b6: dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / me dpal dang / lhog pa rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// nad thams cad dang / dug thams cad dang / sdang ba thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / yams
117b7: gyinang thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang rtsod pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad kyis 'gal bar byab ma yin pa'o// kun dga' bo gang gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mom bya chen mo 'di las
117b8: 'gal bar byas na lagan rdo rjes de'i mgo btsal ba bdun du 'gems par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis de'i snang ba mchu
118a1: bar 'gyur ro/ / sems ma rung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams bkrus par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang gshul ra zhes bya ba la thug gi bar gyi gas sngags rnams kyis de la
118a2: sdug bsngal chen po byed par 'gyur ro/ / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ rdo rjes de'i mgo 'gems par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i gzi brjid kyis kyang de'i 'byor pa thal bar
118a3: thog par 'gyur ro/ / kun dag 'o su zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bsrung ba byas sam/ skud pa btags na des bsad pa'i rigs pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro// chad pas bcad pa'i rigs pa ni
118a4: gzhu gcog pas so/ / gzhu gcog pa'i rig pa ni skyo bas so// skye ba'i rigs pa ni dam bca' bas so// dam bca' ba'i rigs pa ni spu zing zhes bya ba bas so// spu zing zhes bya ba'i rigs pa ni de bzhin du zad par 'gyur/
118a5: de la rgyal po'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ tshem rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de'i las la dug gis mi tshugs te/ mtshon gyis kyang ma
118a6: yin no/ / bde bar gnyid kyis log cing bde bar sang bar 'gyur ro// bde ba dang gnod pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / dgra tshoms par 'gyur ro// rmas pa med par 'gyur ro// /
118a7: 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// bde bar yun ring du 'tshe bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal ma rma ba chen mo 'di na he cang
118a8: che ba 'am/ char dkon pa'i cha klag par bya'o// des ni klu thams cad spro bar 'gyur te/ char chen po ni gcod par byed/ char dkon pa'i tshe ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsam pa ci srid par char 'bebs par
118b1: 'brang ngo ro/ / kun dga' bo rigi sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di dran pas kyang 'jigs pa dang / dgra thams cad zhi bar 'gyur na sus dum bur ma gyur cing rdzogs par 'chad pa'am/ bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa la
118b2: spos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i dazung shig/ 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang m+ba pa'i phyir rig sngags
118b3: rtsal mo rma bya chen mo dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa 'di kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tad yar+dz+dza/ yA pa ti/ drA ba ti/ d+har ki hu lu/ tu lu me swA hA// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
118b4: rnams/ / de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste// sangs rgyas bcom ldan dug med pa// sangs rgyas bden pas dug bcom mo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten drug gsum ste// bcom ldan
118b5: chos ni dug med pa/ / chos kyi bden pas rug bcom mo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// de dag 'jig rten drug gsum ste// bcom ldan dge 'dun dug med pa// dge 'dun bden pas dug bcom mo// sangs//
118b6: rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang // dgra bcom rnams kyi grags gang dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid kyis// ngas ni bde legs 'gyung bar byas// kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma ba chen mos drug bcom mo
118b7: dge slong sa ri bde legs su gyur cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
118b8: phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong sa rig la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong sa ri la chad pa spang bar byas te/ yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs
119a1: su bzung ba dang / yongs su sbyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba
119a2: byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsrung ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa tshe dang ldan pa dge slongs ri nad de las sos so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa dge slongs ri bcom
119a3: ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ci ltar gyur pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste phyogs
119a4: gcig tu 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di'i mthu mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos bcom
119a5: ldan 'das de bzhin du gsungs pa de la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ma 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po bzhi ni/
119a6: ma yang srid/ sa ni nam mkha' la 'phags kyang srid/ zla ba dang nyi ma ni sa la lhung yang srid/ klung ni rgyun las ldog kyang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do// de nas bcom ldan
119a7: 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsan dang / dge bsnyen pa mas mo
119a8: gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsanas
119b1: rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la mos par byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sa ri dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yi dang / rlung u0f7f
119b2: dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod pa de dag thams cad yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
119b3: gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / dz+nyA na sid d+hi dang / shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen/
119b4: gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA pra ti sa ra bi d+yA rA dzI// bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi
119b5: rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i zom na/ khang pa brtsegs
119b6: brdo rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sa'i gnas/ rdo rje'i chen po'i dpag ba sam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rdzing gi rin po che dang / pad ma'i 'od kyis sdang bar byas pa/ sa phyog rdo rje chen po'i byi ma
119b7: bdal ba/ rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'khor gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis rnam par mdzes pa/ chos bstan pa dang /
119b8: 'phrul can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
120a1: khrig 'brum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhithams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir me ldog pa/ mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa dang / ting /
120a2: de 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar rnam par 'phrul pa dang / tshe 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pa/ sems kyi skad cig zad cig yud tsam gcig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i
120a3: bstan pa sna tshogs snyan cing rgya che la zab cing yangs pa dang / spobs pa dang / tshe 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /
120a4: gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sa dang / pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang /
120a5: snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / bden pa dang / yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /
120a6: rdorje'i lus dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dus pa dang / rdo rje mthu bo che dang / rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdo rje brtsegs pa dang / rdo rje phung po dang / rdo rje bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
120a7: po rje'i tog dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcurtsa bzhi dang / nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ sred par kun tu sbyar ba rang
120a8: pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pa/ lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad kyang drim
120b1: dang bral ba thob pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon nges par bsreg pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ cha dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka bi na
120b2: dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrung chen po dang /
120b3: dang ldan pa lte nga rgyas 'od bsrung dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa'i
120b4: yang brjod du med pa dag dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral g.yog 'thab bral ris kyi lha'i bu dang / bcas pa dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang
120b5: 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu thams cad kyi 'khor can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzangs ris dang / stobs can dang / rab sem dang / sgra gcan dang / rnam
120b6: bar snang byed dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshad med/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / dung skyong dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad
120b7: ma dang / pad ma chen po dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshad med/ grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po mi ljon pa/ me 'am ci'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur
120b8: bud lnga pa dri za'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / rag sngags 'chang gi rgyal po don thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / nam mkha' ldi dge rgyal po gser mig nam mkha'
121a1: lding gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / nor bu bzang dang / gang babazang dang / lngas rkyen gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / 'phrog mabu lnga brgya'i gas/
121a2: du ma can dang / 'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang / srin me tshon mo bdun dang / drang srong gi mchog chen po bdun dang / bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar dang / gza' thams cad kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs 'tshams kyi lha
121a3: rnams dang / sa'i lha dang / dbyangs can dang / 'byung po rnams dang / bgegs rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / yi dgas rnams dang / 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang / dri ba'i rgyal po thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyong
121a4: chu lha g.yog rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lag na be con dang / bden bral dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang / dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa g.yog
121a5: bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma can dang / sred med kyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa dang / byin pa po dang / phreng ba can dang / zla ba can dang / lcags can dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / sprin tal la dang / log 'dren gyi
121a6: dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi dbang po g.yog du ma can dang / shing gseb kyi lha drug bcu dang / srin mo bzhi'i ming po dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud dang / rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang / rdo rje'i sde dang /
121a7: lag bzangs dang / gtsug gis 'gro rdo rje'i ris kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang / de las gzhan pa sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
121a8: dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grib gnon dang / smyo byad dang / brjed byed dang / skem byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas pa dang / gnod pa
121b1: po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu zla ba dang / nub ka'i lha dang / nang bar gyi lha dang / dus kyi lha thams cad dang / sa'i lha dang / thabs gcig tu zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das des
121b2: chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin du bskod/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni shin du yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin du yongs su rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni shin du yongs su bzung byang
121b3: chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa ni brnyes/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i su ni rab tu 'bar/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ni dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcus rnam par sbas/
121b4: dbu'i gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong / bdud kyi las thams cad la ni mkhas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa ni shes/ spyan rnam pa lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang /
121b5: ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pas ni
121b6: 'phags/ khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun du gsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag tu mang bar sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus
121b7: dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bya dka' ba'i spyod pa las ni phyir mi ldog/ su ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang /
121b8: dpa' byad bzang po brgyad bcu sa brgyan te/ rab tu mdzes shing rdo rje rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po rdo rje rin po che dang / mu tig dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sgra 'byung ba/ rtsa ba'i drung na rdo rje rin
122a1: bo de'i sngags bu dum shin du brtan par gnas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i chu srin du ma'i kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bres pa'i phangs pa shams pa/ rin po che du ma'i pad ma'i snying po la
122a2: gal gagi gas che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an d+ha rnyil dang / and rnyil chen po dang / dun las kyi 'od zer chen po 'tsher bas snang bar byas te// kun nas mdzes pa/ gdugs rtsa ba dang bcas pa/ rdo rje rin
122a3: bopo che'i shar bu du mas rnam par brgyan pa/ bye ba brag khrig 'bum phrag du mas rnam par brgyan pa/ bye ba khrag brig 'bum phrag du mas kun nas bskyabs pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing du mas rgyas par mdzes par byas pa/
122a4: rdo rje rin po che'i khri ri rab tsam la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo'i rgyal po ltar dpal ni 'bar/ sa phyogs ni nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par brgyan// zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la
122a5: sdug par ni snang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin du rgyas shing chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'dru
122a6: bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
122a7: zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba bkye ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par byas par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag
122a8: seng ge'i khri bkod pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang na/ nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang klu dang /
122b1: gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po thams cad dang / thabs cig du chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bye ma snyed dang / mnyam pa de dag thams
122b2: cad kyang snang ba des khyab par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor phal po che la bka' stsal pa// sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir// nyes par byas dang gnod pa kun// rab 'joms so sor 'brang ba yi//
122b3: gzungs 'di rab tu bshad par bya// 'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang // sdig pa kun ni zad par 'gyur// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin// nad do cog las grol bar byed// sems can kun la snying brtsebs// lus can ngan 'grob
122b4: 'gro ba rnams/ / de dag thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir// 'jig rten dag ni mgon pos gsungs// 'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni// lha ma yin gyis gnas su 'jug/ de bzhin lcang lo can dang ni// srin po'i gnas kyi sar yang
122b5: 'gro/ / 'byung po klu dang sha za rnams// mi bzad 'jigs pa'i g.yul 'gyed par// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang // dgra bo cog gis mi tshugs so// ming tsam gzung ste brjod byas kyang // skem byed spro byed brjed byed
122b6: dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za dang // gdon rnams rab tu brlag par 'gyur// so sor 'brang ba'i gzi brjid kyis// gzi chen mdangs rnams za ba dang // mi yi skye dgu rnams 'tshe ba// de dag thams cad rengs byed 'gyur//
122b7: byad stems mi bzang gang yin dang // pha rol dmag tshogs phung bar byed// sngags kyi las kyis gnod mi 'gyur// rtsa ba'i las las rnam par grol// dug dang dug sbyar mes mi tshugs// mtshon dang chus kyang tshugs
122b8: mi 'gyur/ / lce 'bab glog gis mi tshugs te// dus kyi rlung gis gnod mi 'gyur// rag pa'i rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis// dgra kun rab tu 'dzem par 'gyur// de'i don rnams thams cad 'grub// rtag tu rgyal ba
123a1: thob par 'gyur/ / gang gis rtag tu mgul ba 'am// lag par rig pa btags na ni// de'i dgos pa yod de cog/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang // sangs rgyas rnams da
123a2: rang 'dren dang / / de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dang // lha dbang rnams ni rtag du bsrung // so sor 'brang ba'i gzungs 'dzin la// nyan thos rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul che// rtag tu bsrung ba byed par 'gyur//
123a3: lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang // de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams kyang // de la nyin dang mtshan rnams su// bsrung bar byed de the tsom med// brgya byin lha dang bcas pa dang // tshangs pa byab 'jug dbang chen dang // dga' ba'i dbang
123a4: po nag po che/ / smin drug bu dang tshogs kyi dbang // ma mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang // de bzhin bdud ris gzhan rnams dang // drang srong gzi brjid che rnams dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha rnams dang // de kun so sor 'brang
123a5: ba yi/ / gzungs 'dzin de la bsrung bar byed// sangs rgyas bdag nyid che rnams dang // rig pa'i lha mo stobs chen dang // bdag gi ma dang khro gnyer dang // lha mo sgrol ma lcags kyu dang // rdo rje lu gu rgud dang dkar// de bzhin dkar
123a6: chen mo dang / / nag mo che dang pe nya dang // de bzhin rdo rje pho nya gzhan// zhags pa bzang dang rdo rje zhags// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// rig pa'i lha ma rdo rje phreng // bdud rtsi thabs sbyar byed pa dang // gzhan gyis ma
123a7: thub lha mo che/ / rna ba nag mo stobs chen mo// dpal yon ldan pa skal chen rnams// rna cha gdub kor pad ma 'dra// me tog so can nor bu gtsug/ sku mdog mdzes dang kham pa mo// lha mo gzi brjid chen mo dang // dpal yon
123a8: ldan pa klog phreng can/ / srin mo ral pa gcig pa dang // sangs rgyas bsrungs shes bya ba dang // skal ba chen po mi thod can// lang ka'i bdag po dpal yon can// gzhan yang lha mo mang po rnams// sems can rjes su 'dzin
123b1: byed dag/ rig pa gang gi lag na gnas// de la bsrung bar byed par 'gyur// 'phrog ma dang ni lngas rtsen dang // dung can dang ni so brtsegs ma// dpal gyi lha mo dbyangs can yang // de'i rjes 'gro rtag tu bsrung // so sa
123b2: 'brang ba chen mo 'di/ / bud med gang zhig rtag 'chang na// de yi thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rtag par mngal na bu tho chags// mngal rnams na yang bde bar ste// sbrum ma dag kyang bde bar gyur// nad dang sdig pa thams
123b3: cad kyang / / 'jig par 'gyur te the tsom med// bsod nams ldan zhing stobs dang ldan// nor dang 'bru yang rtag du 'phel// tshig kyang gzung du 'os pa dang // mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yin// bud med dang ni skyes pa
123b4: 'ang rung / / gtsang ma gang zhig 'chang bsrel na// de ni sems can thams cad dag/ thar bar bya byed brtson par 'gyur// rtag tu bde bar 'gyur ba yin// nad do cog kyang rnam par spangs// slas kyang skyeb mang bcas
123b5: pa'i/ / rgyal ba'ang de'i dbang du 'gyur// bran sumatshogs pa rtag tu 'bar// bsod nams phung pa rnam par 'phel// de laM bsam pa thams cad 'grub// dkyil 'khong kun tu zhugs pa yin// rgyal ba rnams
123b6: bka' bzhin du/ / de ni kun tu dam tshig shes// rmi lam ngan pa rmi mi 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa'i mchog/ sdig pa rnams dang de bzhin du// dgra yang rab tu phung bar byed// gza' kun rnam par gzhig
123b7: pa'i phyir/ / ye shes dbang phyug chen pos gsungs// 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed// de phyir rtag tu bcang par bya// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams dal nyon// nga ni rab tu 'di brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
123b8: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// ta d+yaH/ oM brel ba d+he/ baM phul bi ma le/ bi mu le/ dzA ya gar+b+he/ badz+ra dz+wa lA gar+b+ha/
124a1: gtag tan/ gagan ba shod+han/ sarba pa pa shod+ha na/ o gran pa ti/ ga ga na/ bi tsA ri Ni/ ga ga ri Ni/ gau gi ri/ gai ri Ni gi ri Nig ma rig ma rig tag ta/ garga rig na ri/ ga ga ri/ ga ga ri/ gib+ha ri gi d+har/
124a2: ga ga d+he/ ga ti ga Ne/ ga ma na ga ma naM/ ga rig ri/ gub+ha guH/ gu ta gu ha/ gu ru ku ru gu ru Ni/ tsa la gu ha Ni/ gu da Ni/ gu ru Ni/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsa la tsha la/ mu tse le mu tsa le/ dza ye bi dza ya/ sarba b+ha ya bi ga te/ sarba
124a3: b+han+d+ha sa lag+na Ni/ si ri si ri b+hi ri b+hi re/ mi ri mi ri/ gi ri gi ri/ g+hi ri g+hi ri// bcom ldan 'das ma sems can 'dren ma/ kun nas 'dren ma/ dgra thams cad 'joms par mdzad ma/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang
124a4: gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / nad thams cad las bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol// tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bi ga ta/ A bA ra na/ bi sho d+ha ne/ bi bi d+ha/ A ba ra na/ bi nA sha ni
124a5: mu ri mu ri/ mu tsi mu tsi/ mu li mu li/ tsi li tsi li/ ki li ki li/ mi li mi li/ ka ma le/ bi ma le/ dza ya bi dza ye bi dza yA/ ba he dza ya ba ti/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa chen mo'i cod pan dang / phreng ba mnga' ba
124a6: byad rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba/ / bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i lha mo chen mo sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ bdag la thams cad kun nas bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol// hu ru hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mgon
124a7: ma mchis pa/ skyabs ma mchis pa/ dpung gnyen ma mchis pa/ bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol// bdag sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar mdzad du gsol// tsaN Di tsaN Di/ tsarba De tsaN De/
124a8: tsaN Di Ni tsa Na Di Ni/ be ga ba taM/ sarba duSh+Ta ni b+ha ra Ni/ bi dza ya/ bA hi ni/ hu ru hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ A yu bA le ni/ su ra ba ra pra ma tha ni/ sarba de ba ga Na pU dzi ti/ tsi ri tsi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi
124b1: sa man ta a ba loka ti/ pra b+ha rba b+he/ su pra b+he/ su pra the bi shud d+he/ sarba pA pa'i shud d+he/ sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni/ d+ha rud+hu ru/ d+ha ra Ni d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ swa mu su s+ya/ sa su sas/ ru ru tsal/ tsal ya// dpal gyi sumanga' ba/
124b2: bdag la gnod par sems dpa' las bskyab du gsol// bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol// dza ya kA ma le/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/ ba ra da aM ku she/ oM pad ma bi shud d+he/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ shud d+he shud d+he/ b+ha ra
124b3: b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri Tu ru b+hu ru/ maM ga la bi shud d+he/ ba bi rba mu khi/ kha Da gi ni khaDa gi ni/ kha ra kha ra/ dz+wa li ta shi kha re/ sa man ta a ba lo ka ti prab+hi/ su pra b+ha bi shud d+ha/ sa man ta pra sA rita/ A bA b+ha si ta shud d+he/ dz+wa la dzA
124b4: sarbad drag N+Da/ graha nak+Sha rba/ sa ma A karat+na ni/ sat+ya pra te/ oM hr-i tra ta ra ta ra/ glang po che'i lha stangs kyis gzigs ma/ bdag sbrul du gsol/ la hul du/ hu lu du lu/ du du d+ha ru/ tu ru tu ru/ ka ni kan/ kin
124b5: ni/ hu Ni hu Ni/ sarba gra ha b+ha ka Ni/ baM ga le bi ma ga li/ mu tsu mu tsu/ su mu su mu/ su bi tsa ra/ ta ra ta ra/ bcom ldan 'das ma glang po che'i lta sta kyis gzigs ma/ thams cad du kun nas phyogs thams cad su
124b6: bcing ba dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i zhags pa'i bcing bas bdag 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las bsgral du gsol// badz+ra dz+wa lA bi shud d+he/ b+hu ri b+hu ri/ b+ha ga ba ti/ gan+d+ha bi sho d+ha ni/ ku k+Shi saM pU ra ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tsa
124b7: la tsa la/ dz+wA li ni// lhas chus kun du char dbab du gsol// a mri ta ba ra Sha ni be ba ta/ a ba tA ra Ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rabs bdud rtsi mchog gi sku dang ldan pa bdag la dbang bskur du gsol/
124b8: 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu thams cad 'joms pa gnod pas
125a1: 'jigs skrag pa/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / nad thams cad las thams cad du rtag par bsrung drags la/ bsung du gsol// 88/
125a2: ba la ba la/ ba ti dza ya dza ya// bi dza ya bi dza ya/ thams cad du dus kun tu bdag la rgyas par mdzad du gsol// bdag la rig pa chen mo 'di grub par mdzad du gsol// dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub tu gsol// gsang
125a3: sngags rnams bsgrub tu gsol/ / bgegs rnams gzhom du gsol// dza ya dza ya/ sid d+he sid d+he/ sid+d+ha sid+d+ha/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ pU ra Ni pU ra Ni/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol// rig
125a4: pa thams cad las byung ba'i sku can/ rgyal ba lhag par rgyal ba can de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rnam par dag pa bcom ldan 'das ma bzhugs su gsol/ bzhugs su gsol// dam tshig bskyang du gsol/
125a5: 'jigs pa mi bzad pa chen po brgyad las bdag la gzigs su gsol// sa ra sa ra/ pra sa rapra sa ra/ sarba a ba ra na bi sho d+ha ni/ sa man te a kar maN Da la bi shud d+he/ bi ga Te bi ga te/ bi ga ta ma le/ sarba mA
125a6: la bi sho d+ha ni/ kI Ni kI Ni/ sarba pA pa bi shud d+he/ mA la b+hi ga te/ te dze te dzo ba ti/ badz+ra badz+ra ba ti/ 'jig rten gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la sA
125a7: hA/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba la swA hA/ lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba la swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying pos byin gyis rlabs pa la swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa
125a8: thams cad kyi dam tshig grub pa la swA hA/ / dbang po dang ldan pa dbang pos rnam par bltas pa la swA hA// tshangs pa dang tshangs pa gnas pa la swA hA/ bya ba 'jug gis phyag byas pa la swA hA/ dbang phyug chen pos phyag
125b1: 'tshal zhing mchod pa la swA hA/ rdo rje 'dzin lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA// yul 'khor bsrang la swA hA/ 'phags skyes po la swA hA/ mig mi bzangs la swA / nam
125b2: thos kyi bu la swA hA/ rgyal po chen po bzhis phyag byas pa la swA hA/ gshin rje la swA hA/ gshin rjes mchod cing phyag byas pa la swA hA/ chu lA la swA hA/ rlung lha la swA hA/ rlung lha chen po la swA hA/ me lha la sa
125b3: sa rnam par bltas pa la swA hA/ sna'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ klu'i tshigs rnams la swA hA/ gnod sbyin gyi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ gshin rje'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ srin po'i tshogs rnams la swAH/
125b4: dri za'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ lha ma yin gyi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ nam mkha' lding gi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ mi 'am ci'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ mi rnams las
125b5: hA/ mi ma yin pa rnams la swA hA/ gdon thams cad la swA hA/ 'byung po thams cad la swA hA/ yi dgas la swA hA/ sha za la swA hA/ brjed byed la swA hA/ gnon po la swA hA/ grul bum la swA hA/ oM d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/ tu ru tu rba
125b6: sAH/ su ru sa ru sA hA/ ha na ha na sarba sha tra~M sA hA// da ha da ha sarba duSh+TA nan sA hA/ pa tsa pa tsa sarba prat+ya rI kA tra na swA hA// gang dag bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa de dag thams cad kyi lus dz+wa la ya sarba duSh+Ta tsitA nanas
125b7: hA/ 'bar ba la swA hA/ rab tu 'bar ba la swA hA/ rdo rje 'bar ba la swA hA/ me lce 'bar ba la swA hA/ kun tu 'bar ba la swA hA/ nor bu bzang la swA hA/ ga ba bzang po la swA hA/ nag po chen po la swA hA/ ma me'i tshogs la swA hA/
125b8: gnod sbyin mo rnams la swA hA/ srin mo rnams la swA hA/ nam mkha'i ma mo rnams la swA hA/ rgya mtshon gnas pa rnams la swA hA/ mtshan mo rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ nyin mo rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ dus gsum du rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/
126a1: dus su d+hU ba rnams la swA hA/ dus ma yin par rgyub rnams la swA hA/ zas su mngal za ba rnams la swA hA/ mngal 'dzin pa la swA hA/ hu lu hu lu swA hA/ oM swA hA/ sA sA hA/ b+hU swA hA/ b+hu ba swA hA/ b+hur thA ba sA hA/ tsi Ti tsiH
126a2: sA hA/ bi Ti bi Ti swA hA/ d+ha ra Ni swA hA/ d+ha ra Ni swA hA/ ag ni swA hA/ te dze ba su swA hA/ tsi li tsi li swA hA/ mi li mi li swA hA/ si li si li swA hA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha swA hA/ sid+d+ha sid+d+ha swA hA/ maN Da la ban d+he sA hA/ sI mA ban d+he sA hA/ d+ha ra Ni
126a3: ban d+he swA hA/ sarba sha d+he na/ b+hany+dza ya sA hA/ dza ma b+ha ya dza ma b+ha ya swA hA/ sta ma b+ha ya stam b+ha ya swA hA/ tshin min d+ha swA hA/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha swA hA/ b+h+r-i na dza~M b+ha na dza swA hU~M/ b+han d+ha b+ha na d+ha swA hA/ mo ha ya mo ha ya sA hA/ ma ni bi shudaH
126a4: bA hA/ sur+ye swA hA/ sUr+ya bi shud b+ha swA hA/ sho d+ha ni swA hA/ bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ tsan tra tsan tre ba ri pU ma Na tsan tre swA hA/ gra he b+h+yaHswA hA/ nak+Sha tre b+h+yaHswA hA// shi ba b+h+yaHswA hA/ shAn ti b+h+yaHsA hA/ pushrI b+h+yaHswA hA/ swas+yA ya
126a5: neb+h+yaHswA hA/ shi be ga ri swA hA/ shaM ka ri swA hA/ shAM ta ma ka ri swA hA/ puSh+Ti ka ri swA hA/ ba la bar d+hi ni ka ri swA hA/ ba la bar d+ha ni ka ri swA hA/ shI ka ri swA hA/ shrI bar d+ha ni swA hA/ shrI dzA li ni swA hA/ mu tsi swA hA/ na mu
126a6: tsi thA hA/ ma ru tse swA hA/ be ga ba ti swA hA/ oM bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mchog dri ma dang bral ba/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag bde legs su gyur cig/
126a7: oM mu ni/ mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ d+ha ri tsa la tsa la ni/ b+ha ga bA ti/ b+ha ya bi ga te/ b+ha ya ha ri ni/ bo d+ha be d+ho/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bud d+hi li bud d+hi li/ sarba ta thA ga tA tri da ya dzuSh+Te swA hA/ oM mu ni mu ni mu ni bA re/ de bzhin gshesa?
126a8: pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i dbang bskur ba/ rdo rje'i go cha chen po'i phyag rgyas btab pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol// sarba ta thA ga tA hri da ya a d+hiSh+Thi te badz+re swA hA/ bram ze chen mo rig pa'i rgyal
126b1: soso sor 'brang ba chen mo/ / kun nas ma lce'i phreng ba rnam par dag pas/ rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang / snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos thos ma thag dasdig
126b2: pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ / bram ze chen po rige ba 'di gang gi snying la gnas par gyur pa de'i lus rdo rjer rig par bya'o// de'i lus la mes mi tshugs so// ci mngon nan/ gang gi tshe grong khyer chen gyi
126b3: seng sti'i gnas na/ gzhon nu sgra can zin bzang po mngal du zhugs pa de'i tshe shAkya'i bu mos 'tshom bdag nyid ma'i nang du 'chongs pa dang / der pad ma dag byung ste/ de'i tshe gzhon nu snga can zin bzang po mngal na garba
126b4: bzhin du rig pa 'di yid la byas so/ / rig pa 'di rjes su dran pa tsam gyis me de skad cig de nyid la bsil bar gyur to// de nas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma'i lus la mes ma reg go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig pa
126b5: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ / bram ze chen po hUM des na mes mi 'tshig go/ drug gis kyang srog dang 'bral bar mi nus so// de ci lta zhe na/ bram ze chen po gang gi tshe grong
126b6: khyer chen po bdedabar pha rol tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba na/ tshong dpon mdzod stobs can gyi bu rig pa smra bar gyur to// de'i rig pa'i stobs des klu'i rgyal po 'jog po bkug go/ kug nas kyang bag med pa'i dbang gis
126b7: mabacings pas des khros nas de la bzung ba dang / de tshor ba mi bzad pa med nas ji ltar yang bdag ni srog dang bral lo snyam du shes so// de nas smra ba can mang po pos kyang 'ga' tsam gyis kyang dug las gso
126b8: bar mi nus so/ / de nas grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba na/ dge bstan ma dri ma med par dag pa zhes bya ba snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhig gnas pa des/ rig pa'i rgyal mo cheno ma 'di kha ton du shes
127a1: so/ / de de'i gnas su song ste phyin pa dang / rig pa chen mo 'di brjod do// des de la lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis de drag med par byas shing / de dran pa rnyed par byas te/ sdug bsngal chen po de las
127a2: yongs su thar bar byas nas rig pa chen mo'i snying po 'di cho ga ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du tshong dpon gyis bu de'i snying la gnas par byas so/ / bram ze chen po gzhan yang ci ltar yongs su shes na/ rgyal po
127a3: tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba'i grangs su chud pa zhig grong khyer chen po bA ra na sa na sngon yongs su rgyu ba'i tshe/ de'i shar phyogs kyi mtshams kyi stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po des dpung gi tshogs yan
127a4: lag bzhi pa go bskon te/ grong khyer chen po bA ra na se kun nas bskor nas gzhom par bshams so// de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin de la blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis grong khyer
127a5: 'phrog la thug na/ thabs gdags pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom par bgyi/ bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas pa dang / rgyal pos khyed 'tsher 'gri ba chung ngur gyis shig/ rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mony+dza
127a6: bya ba yod do/ / ngas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di pham par bya'o// thal ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang / blon po rnams kyis mgo btud de/ rgyal po chen po sngon bdag cag gis nam yang ma thos pa 'di
127a7: ci zhig lags/ shes smras pa dang / rgyal po ngas de mngon sum du bya'o zhes bsgo'o// de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin spos chu sna tshogs kyis mgo bkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo
127a8: 'di tshig bzhin du bris te/ mgo'i gtsug gi sgra'i nang du gzhag nas/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di nyid kyis go cha byas ste/ g.yul gyi nang du zhugs pa dang / gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa
127b1: thams cad pham par byas te/ ji srid skyabs du dong ba de srid du 'dis tshar bcad nas stobs kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gcig bu btang ngo // bram ze chen po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams
127b2: cad kyi snying po dang / phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa mthu chen po 'di mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ mngon sum du gyur to snyam du gzung bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mtshungs pa nyid du blta bar bya'o//
127b3: phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can tshe thung ba rnams dang / bsod nams chung ba rnams dang / longs spyod chung ba rnams la phan par 'gyur bar blta'o// bram ze chen po gang la la zhig rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba
127b4: chen mo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris te/ lag pa'am 'gul du ga ta gra na de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs par rig par bya'o/ de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur rig par bya'o// rdo rje'i las yin par
127b5: rig par bya'o/ / de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi snying po can yin par rig par bya'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan yin par rig par bya'o// de rdo rje chen po'i lus su rig par bya'o// de 'bar
