194a4: rdo rje sa/ / nam mkha'i gsung la phyag 'tsha lo// 'gro drug bdud 'joms zhal drugs// phyi nang rten 'brel dag phyir phyag/ sgeg cing cung zad 'jigs par byed// rdo rje'i sbrul phyag 'tshal lo// de sad lha mo rdo rje ma// lha la sogra
194a5: pa thams cad kyis/ / rmad byung bstod pa'i rgyal po des// bstod pa'i de ma thag tu ni// lha mo gzi mdangs cher skyes nas// rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra shring khA laM hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ rig pa gzungs kyi phreng ba'am// gasnga
194a6: sngags 'di nyid bshad tsam gyis/ / rims dang shu ba g.yan pa dang // lkog pa sha ba kra mdzend 'bras// klad nad mig nang rna nad dang // log nang glo mchin nad rnams dang // mug zer snying nad mkhal nad dang // rkang lagan dang khyam
194a7: pa na/ chu se nad dang khragan dang // ba kan rlung dang makris pa dang // shin tu 'jug pa'i nad la sogs// yams nad thams cang zhi bar byed// gzhan yang 'byung po rje byed gdon// sha thaza ma 'a' 'gro ma mo dang // barba' nga /
194a8: d+hu sar log 'dren dang // byad snyems drag po phyi rol gyi// ga sngags gsum po lasogs pa// 'jigs pa'i gnod pa thams cad kun// rlung gis smin bzhin gtor bar byed// gzhan yang stag gzigs dom dre dang // 'phar/
194b1: bsrung gsung ma tshan// sra ma bya bsgral byal// slang bra mtshu rangs padz+ra// dngas rba rdu' ta la sogs// 'jigs pa rnam mang srung ba// gsang sngags 'di brjod sa mtshan/ ga ngas sun bskong bar byed// gnod pa rnams
194b2: thams cad kyang / / sngags kyi stong pas sel bar byed// gnod byas rnams ni gnod med byed// gnod meng snod dang ldan byed cing // sbyor ba yang ni sbyor ba 'gas/ gzhan gyi sbyor ba ching ba byed// rdo rje la gu bad+had kyi rtog pa las// gas
194b3: sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / // de nas 'dir ni bshad bya ba// mdzes ma rdo rje khro mo yaM// lha'i ting 'dzin sbyor ba rnams// thig le chen mos mnyan par gyis// oM badz+ra shwa khA le/ ad mA rak+Sha rak+Sha/ hUM hUM hU~M phaT
194b4: swA hA/ / gsang sngags 'dis ni bsrung ba dang // tha ma la rtog pa'i lus skyongs byed// snying khar zla steng hUM yig gis// 'od kyi rigs kyi gtso mo dang // bla ma sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas// mdun du legs par dmigs nas ni// snying gas/
194b5: bon 'od rtse las// me tog sogs 'dzin lha mos mchod// gzugs sogs rdo rje ma rnams kyis// 'dud cing so sor legs par mchod// thog ma med pa'i srid rgyud nas// lus ngag yid kyis spyad pa yi// sdig pa'i tshogs rnams
194b6: ma lus kun/ / bgyis dang bgyid du brtsal ba dang // bgyid la rjes su ying rang ba// sdig pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun// thams cad so sor bshags par bgyi// slan chad mi bgyid sdom pa yang // rgya chen bdag gis gzung bar bya//
194b7: rgyal byams pargyas mdzad pa dang // 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi nga// rgyal dang byung chub sems pa'adang // rigs ldan de/ mo nga / grags d+hA chen 'khor lol// ban nas dang bas rnabasas mchi// maton tho gros byed pa'i phyi
194b8: kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / / gdul bya ji srid tshim pa du// mya ngan mi 'anga' gsol ba 'debs// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya// gdod nas ji srid da lta la~M// bar du lus 'dis cim byas// da ni sr-id pa'i drung
195a1: rtogs nas/ / rang gi lus 'di dbul bar bgyi// theg chen bla na med pa yi// lam chen rgya mtsho gang yin pa// theg chen 'bras bu thob bar du// rgyun ma 'chad par bstan par bya// de ltar dang sems 'dun byas te// bsod nas
195a2: rgya chen rnams bsags pI/ / dge ba bla na med pa des// thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o// dang po byams pa'i 'od zer gyi// 'gro rnams bde la dgod par bya// gnyis pa snying rje'i 'od zer gyis// 'gro ba sdug bsngal 'bral sems bskyed// gsum pa dga'
195a3: bas bde ba 'thob/ / bzhi pa chags bral btang snyoms so// de rjes rigs pa'i stobs spangs zhing // bag chags dri ma bsal nas kyang // nam mkha' lta bur bsgrub byed pa'i// de nas dag pa rjes dran bya// oM swa b+hA ba shud d+haHsarba d+ha rmA swa b+hA ba shud d+he taM/
195a4: de yis dag par byas nas ni// stong nyid rjes su bsgom par bya// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba A ta ma ko hi// dngos po thams cad ma lus par// nam mkha' lta bur bsgom par bya// der ni raM skyes nyi dkyil 'khor// dmar po 'od zer 'khrigs pa bsgom/
195a5: dedabus hUM yig sngon po yi// 'od kyis 'gro ba'i bdud bsal te// slar yang yi ge la bzhugs par// rdo rje khro mo yongasu rdzogs// zhal gsum phyag drug me dpung bzhugs// thugs khar nyi mar hU~M sngon bsam// 'od kyis bsrung ba'i 'khor lo
195a6: shar du rdo rje lhor dbyug pa/ / nub du chu ste byang du mda'// byang shar rtse gsum shar lhor me// lho nub ral gri nub byang drung // 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje brag/ steng phyogs rdo rje rtse lnga'i gur// gsang sngags brjod pas bsgom par bya// hU~M las 'od
195a7: zer rab spros pas/ / 'khor lo bkod pa'i phyi rol du// rdo rje rtsa gsum rab dang // gur ni rab tu bsgom par bya// de rjes rdo rje khro mo na// zhu nas rang bzhin med par gyur// de las nyi ma'i stang gnas pa'i// bdud bzhi mnan cing nyi zla ni// A li
195a8: kAli las byung ba'o/ / bar du hU~M las rdo rje ni// khro mo'i rang bzhin 'od kyis bskor// khro mo dang bcas 'od zer rnams// rdo rje la bzhugs sku bzhengs te// zhal drug phyag drug zhabs drug 'am// yang na zhabs bzhi ma bdud pazhi
195b1: sanan/ / zhal kun pa dang khrag ta can// dmangs can sa thad zas na// da mas san nam sa mad// bcu ga nyis byag stong g.yas pan// de rjenags pa mda' nas dang // phrul dang tha tha pan/ na
195b2: badril du sdig 'dzub ga'u/ / dbyig pa rtse ga sum tho ba'o// yang daphyag drug g.yas dang pos// rdo rje gnyis pas lpags sgrogs// gsum pas mda' ni gsor bar byed// g.yon gyi dang pos sdig 'jub ste// gnyis pa skul gyi zhags pa'o//
195b3: gsum pas gzhu ste 'gengs pa'i tshul// rdo rje lu gu chud ma yi// bsam gtan ting 'dzin la gnas na// yon tan kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// sngags kyi rtsa bar 'gyur ba'o// sngags kyi bdag nyid yongs skyed cing // lha'i rang bzhin bsgrub pa//
195b4: ya/ rin chen gzugs kyi phreng bas ni// chos rnams mtha' dag thob 'gyur te// ral gri mig sman lu dang // rkang bar byug dang gtor chen dang // sa 'og 'gro dang gcud len dang // nam khar 'gro dang sor sbyar dang // de bzhin ma gzhan
195b5: 'gro ba dang / / zhing dang rgyas dang dbang mngon spyod// rmongs dang rengs dang bgrod pa dang // dbye dang dgug dang rig sngags 'chang // bsrung dang phyir zlog chen po dang // zhwa dang lkugs dang sems rgyal dang // long dang sna tshogs nad bskyed pa'i// sbyor brgya
195b6: chen 'grub pa dang / / mngon shes drug po yongs skye zhing // su gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// phyag rgya chen po thob 'gyur na// ltas mthong tsam la sogs pa yi// dngos grub phra mo smos ci dgos// sngags kyi sbyor ba bskyed pa'i lha// dmigs pa'i
195b7: bar gyur pa yi/ / hUM las skyes pa'i lha mo ni// sngon mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma// g.yas pa ser zhing g.yon pa dmar// spyan gsum sdang mig khro gnyer can// dmar sar gyen sgra thod pas rgyan// rus pa'i rgyan gyis spras shing 'gying//
195b8: thod pa'i phreng can klu yis brgyan// zhabs gnyis brkyang bsum rol brdzis// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na// rdo rje gnyis pa gri gug ste// gsum pa sbrul gyi zhags pa 'dzin// g.yon gyi dang po sdig 'dzub ste// gnyis pas thod pa gcu
196a1: pan/ sbrul gyi zhags pa dkar po'o// yang na zhal kun rdzobasangs nyid// 'dis ni 'ching dang dbang gi las// mtha' dag rdzogs par byed pa'o// srid par bram ze las skyes lha mo ni// sngon ma
196a2: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ / phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yen lcags sgrog/ gcer gu rus pa'i rgyan ldan pa// gsang ba'i las rnams thams cad ni// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma 'dis bsgrubs// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje car/
196a3: chos rnams thams cad 'byung byed cing // dngos grub myur du bskyed pa yi// phyag rgya 'byung zhes bya ba yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// yan lag phyag rgya bka' stsal pa// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar byas shing //
196a4: skar la khu tshur bcang byas te// rgyab gnyis sprad nas 'dzub mo dang // mthe'u chung lcags sgrog bcings byas te// kha yi thad kar bzhag nas ni// rig pa'i 'phreng ba brjod pa yis// 'dod pa thams cad
196a5: 'grub par byed/ / phyag rgya bcings nas gsang sngags ni// rjes su dran par byas tsam gyis// lam du 'gro yang bde bar thar// gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par byed// 'phags ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i rgyud kyi rig sngam
196a6: las lha dang / phyag rgya gtan dbab pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdzas kyi sbyor ba bla na med// mtshungs pa'i tshogs kun 'grub byed pa// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yis nyon// oM
196a7: sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu ma/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She kas ma pa shI ye hUM// dbang bskur ba ni bla na med// dri ma'i tshogs rnams dag byed cing // ji srid ye shes tshogs rgyas nas// rig pa'i rgyal po thob par byed//
196a8: dza hUM baM ho/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe A hUM swA hA/ d+hu pi d+hi pa gan d+he/ ni we h+ye AHhUM swA hA// oM k+Shi hriHsa ka la/ g+ha na bi na wa re/ sh+yar+ya sa pa ri wa/ a a a/ ab+hi ti ra na ti/ a b+ha ta ran te/ a b+ha ta ran tu/ sarbadas/
196b1: dag/ lo ka ba la/ lo ka pA le/ a ma b.li// gri t+ya/ kha d+han tu ni bin tu hU~M phaT/ kha khA khA ti khA ti/ m+bi l+li badz+ra d+ha ka/ a dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba 'i/ zad rtogs pa spong bar byed/
196b2: mchod pa dang ni gtor ma yis/ bar du gcod pa thams cad sel bar byed// oM ka ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko te// sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje yis// rnam par spras pa'i mtshan ma la// mtshan ma med pa
196b3: rnam gnas pa/ / shes nas mtshan nyid rnam par dag/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swan+d+ha ba A ta ma ko he/ gang zhig dbang pos yul mtshon pa'i// mtshon bya mtshan nyid rnam shes dang // ye shes nyid ni mngon sum
196b4: skye ba nyid la the tsom med/ / de nas rgya chen sbyor ba'i gtso// 'khor lo'i tshig bshad par bya// gro ga ras sam shing shun la// gur gum 'gi'u wang tsan dan bcas// pu ka ser pos 'khor lo ni// brtsibs bcu ba/
196b5: mi'i steng du bri// mtha' nas mi'i phreng bas bskor // pad ma'i 'dab ma bcu la ni// phyogs bcu kun tu bcing ba yi// rdo rje la sogs bcu po bri// de yi rgyab du phyogs bcu rnams// bcing ba'i sngags ni rim bzhin bri/ 'khor
196b6: lo'i rtsibs rnams bcu po la/ / hUM gnyis bar du bsgrub bya' ming // bsrung ba dang bcas bri bar bya/ phyogs bzhir sngags dang phyag rgya dang // 'khrul 'khor gcod dang 'ching ba dang // 'gugs pa'i sngags su
196b7: bcas pa bri/ / gzhan yang mtshams rnams drug por ni// lha dang klu dang lha min gyi// gnod sbyin grul bum la sogs pa// bcing badrug po bri bar bya// lte bar bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan ni// dkyil krung thugs khar
196b8: thal mo byang / / mdzes pa'i gos lnga dbri bar bya// de rjes gsang sngags phreng ba nyid// stong phrag gcig tu brjod byas na// de rjes bstod pas bstod byas te// gser sogs dril nas lus sam 'gul// gang ba de'i gnas su gdan
197a1: par bya/ / des ni rnal 'byor bsrung don du// ji ltar bsams pa kun 'grub ste// 'jigs pa brgyad po med par byed// de nas gzhan yang rgyal po'i ras// gser la tsan dan ga zur dang // dri zhim rnams kyis byas
197a2: ni/ rgyu skar rgyal gyi nyi ma la// klur gram gyis ni 'khor lo bri// dbus su pad ma 'dababargyad pa'i// phyi rol ma khyud gsum ldan pa'i// pad ma'i lte bar bsgrub bya'i gzugs// yan lag rdo rjes mtshan pa bri// de la
197a3: snying po'i sngags kyis bskor/ / de rjes lte ba'i mu khyud la// steng 'og bcings pa'i sngags kyis bri// phyogs 'tshams sngags rnams 'dab ma la'o// phyi rol mu khAd dang por ni// rtsa ba'i sngags rings dgod par bya// gnyis
197a4: par 'od kyi rab bri/ / dri zhim dkyil 'khor steng gzhag ste// rang nyid lha yi sbyor rdzogs bya// thugs kha'i sa bon 'od kyis ni// nam mkha' 'khor lo sbyangs byas te// yi ge hUM gi rnam par bsam// de yongs gyur las sku
197a5: tshogs bsgom/ / de dbus shes rab rnam par bsam// zla dbus steng du hUM las ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ldan bsgom par bya// der ni yi ge'i rnam pa ni// mar me lta bu gsal dmigs la// mkha' 'gro ma dang
197a6: dbyer med bya/ / rang snying sa bon las byung ba'i// gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas byas nas// gser sogs dril nas lus sam mgul// btags na 'jigs pa brgyad las sgrol// thams cad du ni bsrung bar
197a7: des/ / yungs dkar ba yi rnam lnga dang // drar ba'i snyi mar bcas pa la// gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas nas ni// rgan mo ming med sbyor ba yis// gnas gsum thig le byas bsrung na// tshe ni stong phrag du mar
197a8: 'phel/ / ku sha ba mar yungs dkar til// gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas byas te// shis par gyur pa'i nyi ma la// mchod rten spyi bor gdags bya nas// 'gro ba'i nad rnams 'chad par 'gyur// khrag
197b1: dang khro tshung bcas pa la/ / gsang sngags stong phrag gsum bzlas te// zla ba gzas gzung dus su ni// nye bsnyen rdzogs par byas nas ni// rdzas ni shin du sra byas te// lha tshags gnod pa gang dmigs pa'i// snying
197b2: khar bsngag ni bstan byas na/ / gang dmigs bgegs ni rnam par 'jig/ ras ba lagasar bar gyur pa la// shes rab mtshan ldan khrus byas te// shes pa nyi ma la bkal nas// bcings pa'i drangs kyis
197b3: mdud byas te/ / stong phrag gcig gi sngags bzlas nas// lus sam mgul lam spyi bor brtags// des ni tshe lo stong phrag thub// yang na rang lus rnam bsgribs nas// chu yi tshogs kyis dag byas te// nyi shu
197b4: rtsa gcig grangs ldan par/ / gzungs kyi phreng ba brjod byas nas// gser phyag lag tu ma blangs shing // bden bral phyi rol ma song bar// gzhan gyi 'jigs pa ma bsal zhing // tshe lo brgya ni rtsa brgyad par// rims
197b5: nang tsam yang mi gnod do/ / gos dang zas dang snod spyad dang // sman la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni// mi 'khrug rgyal po'i phyag rgya yis// bsrungs na cis kyang mi she ngade// seng chen rngam pa'i stabs kyis ni// 'ug
197b6: pa'i sgra gsum brjod byas na/ / phyi rol rig sngags stong phrag ni// dums cis kyang mi tshugs so// klu'i dbang po gnam lugs kyis// rtse gcig rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcas// de nas gsang sngags gsum
197b7: brjod na/ / nang dang gdon la sogs pa sel// ri bong nu ma'i mtshams byas nas// hUM gis mnan pa'i sngags kyis ni// dmigs med ting 'dzin yid brtan zhing // 'dis kyang gnod pa las bsrung 'gyur/
197b8: phyi rol sogs pa kun spangs nas// snang ba yid kyis bslabs byas te// mi snang ba la mngon dmigs nas// bsrung ba rnams kyis dam pa bshad// de nas gzhan yang sbyor ba bshad// dur khrod la sogs
198a1: 'jigs gnas sam/ / mtsho dang mtshe'u dang dgon gnas dang // gnas dang bskyed mos tshal chen dang // me tog tshal lam yul 'khor ljongs// chu yi 'gram 'am shing gcig ga ma// yang
198a2: nang gi khyim nyid du/ / maN+Dal legs par thugs pa la// brten nas lha yi byor ba bsgrub// ras ris la sogs mdun byas te// bde ba'i stan la skyil krung gis// bsdad nas mnyam gzhag brtsam
198a3: par bya/ / tha mAl sbyangs pa'i lus kyis ni// thar pa chen po thob 'gyur te// gzhan du de ltar ma yin no// sa ga zhi shin tu nyams dga' zhing // legs par bkod pa'i ri bo la// gnas tshal shin tu
198a4: sdug pa la/ / bsil ba'i chu rgyun 'bab pa'i phyogs// rnam bkod me tog tshal gsab du// shar du sgobastan khang pa la// sngags bzhis mtshams bcings cho ga yis// gsal khung dang bcas brtsigs pa'i phyogs
198a5: sman pa'i bya yis sgra bsgrags shing / / dri zhim spos dang ldan pa la// dril bu sil si la sgra sman sgrogs// lnga ldi gos kyi phreng bas dkris// lhag pa'i 'du 'dzi rnam spangs nas// spyod pa 'thun pa'i grogs dang ni/
198a6: bde bar byang chub bsgrub par bya// 'on kyang gnas dang grogs la sogs// rnal 'byor yid 'jug phyir brtsams ste// mtha' dag spangs pa'i pha rol na// lhag pa'i byang chub ma mchis so// bde dang sdug bsngal
198a7: snga tshogs rnams/ / rang gi sems las 'thung mod kyi// sems rtog pa lus spangs pa las// ngas ni chos gzhan 'ga' ma bshad// debs sems chog sa tshogs rnams// spyang ba ba phyir snga rdzogs
198a8: thabs/ / sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang // sbyor ba rgya chen rnams bshad do// drag po bsgrub pa'i thabs 'ga' ni// rig pa'i khro mos mnyan par gyis// sa gzhi bdud rtsi lnga yis byug/ me yi
198b1: dkyil 'khor sa bon bcas/ / dur khrod pha gus bri bar bya// der ni po mo thod pa la// phyi rol mar nag tshon gyis byug/ nang du sna tshogs rdo rje ni// mu khyud gsum ldan bri bar bya// dbus su rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma//
198b2: snying po sngags bcas bris par bya// rdo rje dra ni thams cad la// hUM bri mu khyud gnyis 'phreng sngags// gsum par khro bo'i sngags bri'o// thod pa kha sbyor nang du ni// sa tshe yungs kar btsan dug dang // lan
198b3: khrag dang sha chen dang / / rkang rjes sa la sogs pa blugs// gcer bu rnal 'byor sgra bshig nas// lha yi sbyor ldan lhor bltas na// zhabs kyis thod pa'i 'khor lo ni// mnan te sngags phreng brjod par bya// khro bo chen
198b4: po'i sbyor ba yis/ / mnyam gzhag nas ni stong phrag du// bzlas ka mtshan phyed par byas na// gsang ba nyid la the tsom med// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo ni// dbus su me yi dkyil 'khor can// rtsibs brgyad mu khyud
198b5: gsum ldan pa/ / dbus su snying po sngags rnams la// hUM gnyis bar du bsgrub bya'i ming // gsang ba nyid dang ldan par bya// mu khyud gnyis pa phreng sngags kyang // ming dang gsang bar ldan pa'o// gsum pa khro bo'i sngag
198b6: bris te/ / 'khor lo mchod cing byin brlabs nas// dgra gzug sor brgyad snying khar gzhug/ de nyid til mar gyis byugs te// thod pa gnyis kyi 'khor lo yi// bar du bcug nas me steng gzhag/ seng ldeng phur bu song
198b7: brgyad pa/ / mnyam gzhag sbyor bas sngags de gdab// gsang ba'i sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis// shi bar gyur la gzhan du min// yang na byang chub yan lag las// dur khrod khrag gis 'khor lo bris//
198b8: gru gsum brtsegs pa'i gzugs bris te// dbus su dgra ming gsang sngags bcas// rtsibs la bcu gnyis par du ni// ming dang gsang ba bcas pa bri// mu khyud dang po'i sngags phreng yang // rgyal ba'i
199a1: yan lag ldan pa bri/ / sgra tsha la gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa'i// snying khar bcug nas sgra yid kyi// rnal 'byor pa yi nyal ba'i zhabs// mgo bo lhor bstan gzhag par bya// chu shel ma mthong
199a2: bar du ni/ / nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags brjod nas// mi yi rdo rje dar gyis brgyan// sdang byed sa steng 'dir mi gnas// klu'i gnas su grags pa 'am// chu'i rdzing la sogs 'gram du// dkyil 'khor ba yi rnam lngas
199a3: byug/ pad ma dmar po'i ri mo la// lte ba rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// gser gyi mdog can thal mo sbyor// klu'i gdeng ka bdun ldan pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng gnas pa// shin du bltas pas gnas par bya//
199a4: dga' bo nyer dga' 'jog po dang // mtha' yas dung skyong rigs ldan gzugs// pad ma pad chen rnams byas te// dkar dang ser dang ldang ba dang // dmar dang ljang bya sngo skya dang // dmar seng ljang ser 'dzum
199a5: pa'i gzugs/ / gtsol thal mo sbyar btud nas// rgyu skar phreng ba dang ldan gnas// 'o ma 'bras can mkhal zho sha/ bus ka tsa ti la sogs spyan// khur ba tshogs bu dang bcas pa// rin chen snod du dgram par
199a6: bya/ gza' dang rgyu skar rnams dga' zhing // klu rnams bde ba'i sems thob shog/ lha rnams yid ni mnyam gzhag nas// nying rje'i blo chen rtse bar shog/ lha klu gnod sbyin dri na sogs// byang
199a7: chub sems chen dang ldan nas/ / thugs rje nye bar dgongs nas kyang // dus su char chen 'bebs par shog/ smon lam de ye rjes su 'di// gzungs kyi phreng brgya rtsa brgyad// brjod pa'i dri ma thag tu ni/
199a8: char gyi chun yang 'bebs par 'gyur// gal te cung zad mi 'bebs na// me la sdig pa tsam gyis ni// klog gi phreng ba gtor byed na// char chen 'bebs la the tsom med// wa li khrag gis gro ba la/ gang
199b1: gi 'khor lo bsrad pa yi/ / thabs dang ldan par bri byas nas// dur khrod sa las byas pa li// rnga mo'i snying khar bcug nas kyang // rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni// lhor bltas bka' yi sbyor ba yis/
199b2: gsang sngags kyi phrag gcig brjod na// bskad pa nyid la the tsom med// sbrul dang sre mo'i khrag gis ni// rta dang mahe'i lpags pa la// mnyam du gnyis kyi gzugs bris te// dbye ba'i sngags dang bcas pa yi// 'khor mo tshang
199b3: pa'i gzugs bris la/ / lpags pa gnyis kyis dkris byas pa// zla gam bye brag dkyil 'khor la// brten pas dbye ba'i sbyor ba rdzogs// mtshal dang tsan dan ga bur bsre// zla gam dbyibs kyi dkyil 'khor la/
199b4: snying po dbang gi sbyor ba bcas// nub du bltas nas bsgrub pa yis// lha yi dbang po dbang du 'gyur// rgyud kyi khyad par sbyor ba'o// dri'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyis// shing gi lo ma dkar po la// rdo rje rgya gram gnyis brtsegs kyi
199b5: phyogs kyi rnga rnams hUM gis sbas/ / mtshams kyi rnga rnams dbu ma la// hU~M gis rwa yis yan lag la// phaT ni phyir la bltas pa bri// rgya chen gsol ba gdab par bya// gos bzangs dang ni skags shing ngu// btsug nas
199b6: rgyal mtshan brtser btags nas/ / rlung dang thog dang ser ba gcod// dman pa rnams dang 'brel ba spang // thal ba chu dang nyungs dkar la// sngags kyi phreng ba bzlas byas te// sprin la sogs pa 'khrugs pa'i tshe/
199b7: gtor ba tsam gyis 'chang bar 'gyur// 'bru mar yungs kar ser po la/ sngags nas lus la byugs tsam gyis// phran tshegs nad rnams thams cad las// ma he shin tu brtan par byed// 'phags ma rdo
199b8: rje lu gu rgyud kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sbyin bsreg thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// dngos grub thams cad myur byed de// sna tshogs lha mos mnyan par byos//
200a1: ser sna spangs shing g.yo na med// dul la dpa' ba tul bzod pa che// mkhas shing rig pa brtson 'grus bzang // sngags la mkhas pas skyen pasreg pa tsam// thab nyi shu sor tshad la// byed bkos kha phyir rdo rje ni// rtse gsum
200a2: drang grod tshan gyis bri/ / phyi rol phyag rgya rnam bkod nas// dri zhim me tog gcal du dgram// deng ni mchod cing bsreg pa'i rdzas// tshogs nas rdzas rnams pas gtor bya// thung bu rnga mo'i ril ma dang // bsal shing cher bcas shing lame//
200a3: sabon las skyes sba bar bya// der ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud// bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs byas nas// mchod cing bstod nas der rjes su// ske cha yungs kar btsan dug dang // dus phye sha chen til nag po// dang bcas sbyin bsreg stong phrag cig/
200a4: phreng ba'i sngags kyi byung ban// thagam tha ma dmar chen dang / la ma ba rgya zag rir byen// khyor bcas byen pasreg rdzogs pa dang // zhag 'dun gyis ni ba slab bye de// shi bar gyur la la tsam med// glang sha sbal gzi yang sa// na
200a5: sreg gong gis bsrub bya zhing / ba tha ldong ros ru rta dang // li ga glang po bas shar bcas// ser por dbyas la stong phrag ni// gcig gis 'phral du rengs par byed// srul ta ne'u le ma he'i sha/ bya rog 'ug sha stong brag cig/
200a6: bsreg pas bslab bya 'bye bar nges// bra'o 'bras bu sha khrag/ stong phrag gcig gis lkugs par 'gyur// rnga mong bya rog rgan po'i ga// sa lu dmar nye la dkar po dang // yungs kar ser po la sogs pa// stong du bsregs pas spang
200a7: yang byed/ wa sa srad 'tshang dbyung gis// nam byed nub dra la ba ltas byug// me tog pa ba dang bcas pa'o// bdog dpang dang ldan pa yis// 'od zer dbang ldan mong phrag gis// des par 'azugs dang bang 'gyur/ la bcas
200a8: mang gyi sbyi sreg ge/ / slong phrag byas na sdig pa 'byung // mar dang dung bcan na bcas// sbyin pa sregs stong gi tshe 'phel 'gyur// lug byang chub shid 'bras bu// yungs kar da/ bo lan tshwa las// stong bsregs ga pa ded nas
200b1: 'chad/ yungs kar sha chen phye ma dang // dur khrod thal bdug sna tshogs// khro chu bye ma'i sbyin pasreg stong // khros pas byas na lha tshogs 'jigs// uta bal dmar dang yang na dkar// gur gum bzang po'i sbyin bsreg ni/ stong
200b2: rna brgyad tsam pa sreg byas pas/ / rigs ldan bu mo dbang du 'gyur// ma drar dang yungs kar dang // ba'i 'om stong bsregs na// rnam thos rgyal po'i gter tsam gyis// longs spyod chen po 'thob par byed// oM ra/ rAHu
200b3: oM/ bsrung ba'i sngags so// oM shA na ta~M ku ru oM// thams cad du zhi ba'i sngag so// hA lA shaM ku ru hA/ mtha' dag dbang du bya'o// swa bus ti ku ru swA hA// thams cad du rgyas par byed pa'i sngags so// phaT hU~M mA ra ya mA ra ya hU~M pakagasod/
200b4: pa'i sngags so// ba bi de sha ya baM/ dbye bar byed pa'i sngags so// oM u tsa da ya uM/ bskrad par byed pa'i sngags so// laM staM pa ya/ staM pa ya laM/ rengs par byed pa'i sngags so// raM dz+wa ra dz+wa ra raM/ rims bskyed pa'i sngags so// dza A kar ShA
200b5: ya hI/ dgug pa'i sngag so// oM bA ri sha pa tA ya/ pa ta ya oM/ char pa 'bab pa'i sngags so// laM shaM laM b+hi staM b+ha yaM laM/ ser ba bcad pa'i sngags so// rdo rje te ya dze te ya dzo/ zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so// hUM ya ra yany+tsa man+ta tan tra/
200b6: ts+tshin d+hats+tshin d+ha/ bin d+ha bin d+ha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ zhes pa ni thams cad du rig sngags gcod par byed pa'i sngags so// rig pa'i rgyal po bla med ni// gsang chen 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur// gsang chen rgyud 'de ngo mtshar to// rmad byung
200b7: bas che rmad du byung/ / bstan pa'i snying po gsang chen 'di// gsungs pa'i de ma thag tu ni// phyogs bcu'i rig sngags 'chang ba rnams// ngo mtshar skyes nas thal mo sbyar// bde ba'i snying po shin du legs// legs so legs so rdo rje
200b8: 'dzin/ / gang la bde bskyed dpal thob byed// bdag cag rnams la thugs rje yis// rgyud kyi snying po 'di bshad pa// rje chen legaso ngo mtshar che// 'phags pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi rtog pa las sbyin bsreg gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
201a1: 'phags mardo rje lu gu rlung gyi rtogs u D+yan nas byung ba rdzogs s+ho// // paN Na ta a tu la d+has badz+ra la zhus nas bod kyi lo rgyab mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur ba'o// rgyag sha du/
201a2: Ad+ya tsun de ngo bi nA ma d+ha ra nI// bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha po bskul byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog sum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs cing/
201a3: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das la mo bskul byed ma'i mthu dang stobs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa// rdzu 'phrul dang pha rol gnon pa grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
201a4: bsngags shing bstod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag rnam pa thams cad kyis thams cad du dge bar mdzod cig/ namaHsa btA nAM/ saM myags bud d+ha/ ko tsan+te/ tad ya thA/ oM tsa le tsu la/ tsun d+he swA hA// brtson 'grus
201a5: chen po thogs pa med pa/ 'dul ba/ stobs che ba/ pa rol gnon pache ba/ phyag na ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / lcags kyu dang / zhags pa bsnams pa/ khro mochen mo'i dbang phyug ma/ drag mo'i gzugs can ma/ zhal ras
201a6: mtha' yas ma/ phyag stong mnga'am/ ma pha ma ma/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ don yod ma/ gdul bar dka' ma/ mig stong ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs ma/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing
201a7: mchod pa rab tu sgrub ma/ / rdo rje sen mo can/ rdo rje rdo rjes 'dren ma/ rdo rje'i mtshan cha can/ rdo rje'i sku can ma/ rdo rje'i khu tshur ma/ rdo rje'i spyan gdengs pa'i stangs stabs can ma/ drag shul can ma lags kyang // drag shul can
201a8: kyi gzugs can du bskur bar ston par mdzad ma/ spu rdo rje dang bai dUr+ya'i rgyan gyis spras pa// oM b+ha ga pa ti tsun de/ hU~M d+h+r-i/ hUM b+h+rUM/ b+h+rUMm+me/ sru~M sruM/ rU rU/ a br-i sha ya/ grI d+ha gI tA/ grI d+han pa ya/ gI h+NA ba ya/ ha ra tsa
201b1: b+h+yany+dzab+hany+dza/ sar sar/ mA rA ma rA/ ma dA ya sa rA ya/ btsab tsa/ dgad ha/ hrIn+da hrIH/ snang ba'i gdon dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang zhag bzhi pa dang / zha
201b2: bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / yud tsam pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / mngal las skyes dang / las las skyes pa dang
201b3: 'gro ba dang / gnas pa 'di dag dang / snang ba gang dag bdag la 'tshe ba dang / gdug/ pa de dag thams cad/ saM d+ha la sa d+ha ya/ mar d+ha ya mar d+ha ya/ sho Sha ya shoSha ya/ tA pa ya tA pa ya/ ung k+Shad+ha ya ud sA d+ha ya/ dan
201b4: tan badz+ran/ sa sa da Na Den/ mA ra ya mA rA ya/ gage na/ d+hU b+h+rUM hUM/ hU~M hU~M ts+tsha/ d+hU hUM d+h+waM/ oM tsa le tsu le/ tsun de sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa lha mo bskul byed ma'i mthu dang Sh+T+r-in
201b5: gyis rlabs kyis bdag gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ / 'phags snga lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho/ 6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rdi gu lAnA ma bi d+ya/
201b6: bod skad du/ 'phags pa dug sel zhes bya ba'i rig sngags sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod
201b7: na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag nga sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpar gyur pa
201b8: na/ gangs kyi ri'i byang ngos na/ spos dang ldan pa'i ri bo la// ri'i rgyal po'i sul gnas tshe// gzhon nu bsod nams brgya'i mtshan// e na ya'i lpags gyon la// sbrul gyis brgyan pa'i ska rags can// gdu
202a1: pa'i sbrul gyis mgo rgyan byas/ / mthong na gdug pa'i rna brgyan can// rug gis me tog rnams za zhing // ma lu ta'i lcug khu 'thung // nga la de 'bod 'bod du 'jug/ bu khyod tshung shog da la nyon// ngal
202a2: drug sel zhes bya ba/ / dug 'jigs rig sngags dam pa yod// dug rnams gang yin de kun ni// nga'i ming gis 'jigs par 'gyur// tad+ya thA/ i li mid ti/ ti li ming te/ i li ti li ming te/ dum be/ dum bA lI ya/
202a3: dusmai lI ye/ ta ra ke/ ta ka ra ne/ marme/ marma ra ne/ kash+tsa re/ kash+tsa ra/ mu ga te/ a g+he a g+ha ne/ i lI i lI/ e/ ska khA/ I e/ a b+hA/ i e/ shra te shra te/ dun Da/ a nu rag te sA hA// dge slong dag da'i dug sel
202a4: gyi rig sngags 'di ni sbyin pa thams cad dkar po ste/ sus rig sngags 'di lan gcig thos pa de la lo bdun gyi bar du sbrul gyis mi za'o// de'i lus la dug gis mi tshug so// sbrul gang zhig de la 'dzin na// de'i mgo
202a5: ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ / gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag sbrul gyi mdun du brjod par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbrul de 'chi ba'i phyir ro// tad+ya thA/ i la la/ tsi la lI/ tsakra khrag go/
202a6: kro TA/ ko Da Di/ ku ra ru ta/ ku ru De ti/ bu ru dA/ bu ru d+he ti/ mo De ti/ ni ku ru De/ ni ku ru Da/ ni ma mu ru ta/ bu ru de/ phud ta ra he/ phud Tad Ta na Ta ra ha/ nA ga ra he/ nA ga da Ta da Ta na Da ra he/ sarba ra he sarba tad tA ma da ra te/
202a7: id tshi id tshi/ bu ru Da ta/ tsa la bi She/ shI te/ shI tA ban d+ha le/ mA tA le/ ha le ha le/ ha la ha la/ ha la le/ i la le/ ke ba tsa le/ mi la le/ taN Di ta Na Di/ ta Ta ta Ta/ sU ta s+phu ta/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ ra ha ra bi
202a8: sha swA hA/ / dge slong dag de ltar na dug sel gyis 'byung po 'dus pa thams cad la rig sngags gang brjod cing bsnyad pa de thams cad ni de bzhin no// yang dag pa'o// bden pa'o// ma nor pa'o// phyin ci ma log pa'o// dug
202b1: 'di mi 'dug par gyur cig/ sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song cig/ 'dzin pa'i gan du sod cig/ me'i nang du song shig/ chu'i nang du song cig/ thang la song cig/ kha ba'i nang du song shig/ rtsig pa'i nang du song cig/
202b2: namakha' la song cig/ sa'i nang du sod cig/ zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
202b3: bstod do/ 'phags pa dugasel zhes bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so// @6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya hir N+ya ba tI nA ma d+ha ra nI// bod skad du/ 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
202b4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan na la ba dkar po'i lta bu'i rdo leb la byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma
202b5: thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
202b6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas la bka' stsal pa/ legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin par mi 'dod pa des/ 'das pa dang /
202b7: ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ngo // ma thos so// ma myong ngo // gang gis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / myong ba dri gzungs thob bo// de ci'i
202b8: phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag gi bsod nams byas so zhes mi 'dzin na/ bdag gis bsod nams ma yin pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas so zhes/
203a1: mi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzungs 'dzin par mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs
203a2: thob pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la dngos por ram/ mtshan nyid du mi rtog yongs su mi rtog ste/ rkyen du ma yin// rkyen med par ma yin/ 'gro bar ma yin/ 'gro ba med par ma yin/
203a3: 'pho bar ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ stong par ma yin/ mi stong par ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan ma med mar ma yin/ smon par ma yin/ smon pa med par ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ 'gag par ma yin no// legs par
203a4: gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mtha' 'dis spyod pa de ni ye shes la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ / gang gi tshe ye shes la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// gang gi mya ngan las 'das par gyur
203a5: pade'i tshe dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs len cing kun chub par byed la 'dzin te/ don rnam tshig 'bru yang yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro// yongs su ma rtags pa'i tshul khrims can yang yin te/ bden pa'i tshul khrims dang / rnam
203a6: par dag pa'i tshul khrims can no/ / ma rtags pa'i chos can yin te/ bden pa'i chos can dang / rnam par dag pa'i chos can no// gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi chos la zhugs so// sangs rgyas la lhag par bya ba
203a7: byas pa'o/ / rig pa'i cho ga la zhugs pa'o// legs par gnas de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags so// mi 'chad do mi 'grol lo// legs par gnas gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
203a8: sems dpa' chen po mi chags/ mi 'chang / mi 'grol ba de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs sa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan gyi gsang sngags gzhi
203b1: rnams kyi byig dang ldan pa'i gzung mthob bo/ / ta thA/ kraTi Ta Te/ kun la/ e la mi mar te// b+ha lA/ ma da// e mar te/ legs par gnas pa 'ad 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan das kyi gzugs kyi ming ga dan/
203b2: no// mabyon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no// legs par gnas dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
203b3: 'das rnams kyi yum mo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das pa'i don la mi gnas/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i don la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la dbyig dang
203b4: ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bsgrags pa dang / khong du chud par
203b5: byas pa yin no/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan pa yin no// legs par gnas dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems
203b6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mnyes par byas// bsnyen bkur byas/ mchod pa byas so// bsod nams grangs med
203b7: pa bskyed do snyam du shes par bya'o/ / su zhig bsam pa gang gis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa de la de nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ shes rab 'dod pa la shes rab dang / gzungs 'dod pa la gzungs dang / dbyig
203b8: 'dod pa la dbyig dang / thos pa 'dod pa la thos pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ zla ba yar gyi ngo la nyi ma shar kar 'bras sa lu'i chan dang / 'o mar spags te bza'o// sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags
204a1: 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan dag rgyun du yid la bya'o// 'on kyang gsang sngags gzhi dag gis mthus gang dag gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i lha
204a2: ma yid nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ yi dgas sam/ grul bum 'am/ shaza 'am mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa de dag la sems dga' bar 'gyur ro// bar chad byed par mi 'gyur/ rtag tu
204a3: yongs gzung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bzang dang / yangs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / ri dben la gnas pa dang / gangs ri la gnas pas kyang yongasasu bzung bar 'gyur ro// /
204a4: 'og min gyi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang 'di lta ste/ dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi mthus 'jigs pa'am/ dgon par de la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ de la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga'
204a5: ldan na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
204a6: gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / d+ha na shI dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ba na de ye shes sdes bskur zhing zhus te skar gsar chad kyis kyang
204a7: bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ya sho ba tI d+hA ra NI// bod skad du/ 'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rad na tra yA ya/ nam
204a8: Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wa re ma hA dz+ra re/ du khe mu ge su saM ban ne/ ma hA saM ban ne/ saM bad ti/ ma hA saM bad ti/ ka se ma hA ka se/ kad tsha dz+wa ra mug te si swA hA// skud pa'am chul lan gsum
204b1: bsngags na rims las thar par 'gyur ro/ / na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma A r+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma na/ Ar+yA ba lo ki ti sA ra swA hA// gdon thabs cad la tshon
204b2: pA lnga'i bsrud pa dmang po la lan gsum du sngags te/ mdud pa gsum por la bcings na par dugacod pa zhi bar 'gyuraro// na mo radan tra yA ya// na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shA ra ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sad twA ya/ taHlA/ ki la~M ka li Ni li
204b3: tsi li tsa ni gi le swA hA/ 'bru ba ra la lan gsub sngags te bskus na sman 'tsho'o// na mo rad na tA yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sadA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sa re sa re/ pi sa ra bi sa ra/ sar na sha na~M swA hA// shi
204b4: ba'i rna bar lan gsum bzlas na sos par 'gyur ro/ / na mo rad na tA yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sA tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ni se re ma/ ni sa re ki la ni mi re/ ka la ri tsi rI/ bi tsi le swA hA/ lba ba dang / lkog ma'i//
204b5: lha gor na ba dang / lce kyi ba na ba dang / gdon dang nad thams cad la 'ji ba la lan gsum du bsngags te bskus na pan no// na mo rad na tA yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ badz+ra ba Ni d+hu ma/ oM oM kA rA pra b+ha pe/ bag ba te bud
204b6: d+ha/ pra ti bud d+he/ shud d+he shan ti ki ri/ ha na ha na/ ma ma/ pA pa ma/ da ha da ha/ ba ma bA ba daM/ pa tsa ba tsa ma ma bA pa ka na/ o o De/ gra sa gra sa/ ri te De ri ti De/ shan ti ka rI ya swA hA/ shU b+ha ka rI ya sA hA/ k+Sha ma ka ri ya sA hA/
204b7: rims nad kyis btab pa la byab pa byas na/ rims nad sos par 'gyuraro// sman la sngags kyis btab ste blud na nad pa sos par 'gyur ro// zas la sngags kyis btab ste zos na dug mi gnod par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang
204b8: gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te bcings na thar bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho//
205a1: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dza ya ba tI nA ma ma hA bi d+ha rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
205a2: phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags ril bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'byung po rnams 'khrugs par gyur nas/ ma dad pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /
205a3: srin po dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / grul bum rnams 'khrugs shing khros te/ dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge
205a4: bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen pa rnams gang dag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa de dag la gnod par byed de de'i tshe ku tsho'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen
205a5: po'i shugs kyis yang dag par zin nas phyogs bzhir rnam par gzigs na/ phyogs bzhi nas glog las ser ba dang / char cher 'bab pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba 'ong ba gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang rdo rje 'chang
205a6: la brda' mdzad do/ / de nas rdo rje 'chang gtum po khros te/ stan las langs nas shar phyogs su rdo rje 'bar bstod mngon par sprul te 'di skad ces gsol to// 'byung po'i tshogs nga la nyon cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
205a7: 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs 'di bya'o/ / da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung po gtum po mi rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba dang / lo tog dag kyang ma rungs par byed pa gang dag 'byung ba de dag
205a8: gi don gyi phyir ngas rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bya'o/ / tad ya thA/ gi ri gi ri badz+ra/ ha la ha la badz+ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badz+ra/ ha na ha na badz+ra/ da ha da ha badz+ra/ pa tsa pa tsa badz+ra/ sarba b+hU tu nA ma/ b+h+ra ma ya
205b1: b+h+ramA ya/ thA b+ho badz+ra d+ha ra badz+re// bA ta ya pA ta ya/ shI g+ha na shI g+ha na/ mtha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra mtha/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ dz+wA la ya/ nA ga b+ha ba nAn/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ tiSh+ThahiSh+Tha/ shar phyogs bcad par bya'o// rdo rje snying
205b2: pa'i dbyin gyis brlab par bya'o/ / su zhig gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed pa'i mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur ro// snying 'gas par 'gyur ro// snying 'grum par 'gyur ro// badz+ra ya swA hA/ ma hA badz+nyA ya swA hA/
205b3: badz+rA b+hai ra ba ya swA hA/ a pra ti ha ta ba la bA rA kra mo badz+ra d+har ad dz+nyA ba ya ti swAhA/ de nas rdo rje khro bo stan las langs te lho phyogs su rnam par bltas nas khros te/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras/
205b4: gsang ba'i bdag po de de nyid lho phyogs kyi klu thams cad thal bar rlag go/ lus srul po thams cad kyi bar gyi gnas rnams 'bar bar bya'o// klu thams cad kyi gnas rnams dkrug par bya'o// yang spras pa/ gsang ba'i
205b5: bdag po bdag gi rdo rje lha ma yin dang / klu thams cad nas lus srul po'i bar thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar thams cad rmugs par byed pa'i rdo rje/ rengs par byed pa'i rdo rje/ rmongs par byed pa'i rdo rje lce
205b6: 'beb par byed pa'i rdo rje/ mgo 'gems par byed pa'i rdo rje/ snying 'gas par byed pa'i rdo rje 'di lho phyogs su gzhag par bya ste/ da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na klu gnod par sems pa rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro//
205b7: tad yathA/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ A ba NA ya sa dgo tsa la hUM hUM hU/ rton gyon rnon// d+hun nun d+hun/ ban d+ha ban d+ha banad+ha/ sarba ba she/ mo ha ya/ dza ma b+ha ya// d+ham pa ya/ gas gas has/ san tras gas rba ngas ya/ sarba duSh+TA nA na badz+ra d+har
205b8: adz+nyA ba ya ti swA hA/ / de nas rdo rje po nya mos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar bgyid na bdag gis kyang
206a1: nub phyogs kyi klu thams cad nas lus srul po'i bar thams cad kyi gnas rnams rnam par gtor ro/ / snying rnams dgum mo// tad ya thA/ ki li ki li/ mi li mi li/ ShAta tra ta b+ha u0f88u0f90/ rmong+ka pa snro/ ya/ dz+wal yangal d
206a2: U ti da yan shoShA ya/ gang zhig gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed na/ kye mdung rtse gsum pa 'bru ba 'dis de'i snying la me lce 'bar bar byed do// hUM hUM hUM/ badz+ra d+ha ri badz+re na/ b+han dza b+han dza/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ badz+ra du ti/ rAd d+hA
206a3: ba ya te swA hA/ / de nas lha mo chen po rdo rje lu gu rgyud g.yog nyi khri dang bcas bstan las langs nas byang phyogs su rnam par bltas te// gsad ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po g.yog nyi khri dang ldan pa/
206a4: bdag gis kyang byang phyogs kyi klu gnod par sems pa nas lus srul po gnod par sems pa'i bar dag la bzlog par bgyid do// da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba dang / lo tog kyang ma rungs
206a5: bar bgyid pa de dag gi don gyi slad du gsang sngags gzhi mi zad pa dag kyang brjod par bgyi'o/ / tad ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ tsi li tsi li/ d+ha ga d+ha ga/ d+hA ma d+hA ma/ d+hun d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa ba tsa/ nA sha ya/
206a6: nA sha ya/ ha ha ha ha ha/ badz+ra d+hA ti mo ha ya/ dzam b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ sarba nA gAn/ sarba a hi te Sha no// badz+ra Ni bud d+ha mi tre/ d+harma sa t+yen/ in dras t+ye na/ in dra ba le na/ lo ka bA la/ pra b+ha ban/ dza ma b+ha yA mi/ sarba nA gA na staM b+ha ya mi/
206a7: sarba a hi teShi no// ba run bA ba she na/ ban d+ha ya mi/ sarba nA gA na in dra tsa le nA/ sarba a he te Shi Na tsha ga li ka ro mi/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ badz+ra shad ka le swA hA/ ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bskus te me tog bkram la
206a8: a ka ru dang / tsan dan gyi bdug pas bdugs te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la bzlas brjod brgyad stong bya'o// de ltar 'grub par 'gyur te de'i 'og tu las gang 'dod pa de bya'o// skud pa nag pos ni rims nad sel te// shing ka ra bi ri'i lcag
206b1: mas ni sprin zlog go/ chu'i nang du 'dug na ni dran par bya'o// gcan zan khro bo'i nang na 'dug na ni gos kyi mtha' ma mdud pa bor ro// lto spos na ni tsha chus zhi bar byed do// so na ba la skud pas zhi bar byed do// snga ma'i me tog brgyad brgya
206b2: me tog re re nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtor to/ / nyi ma bdun na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// na mo rang na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN Da badz+ra pA Na ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nAM pa ta ye/ a pra ti ha ta ba la bA rA kA ma ye na ma
206b3: sarba badz+ra ku la bid+ha/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs lnga brgyas yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom
206b4: ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba nya bar bzung ste/ sems can thams cad la sman pa'i don dang / mi'i rgyal po rnams la sman pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs
206b5: las rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di bka' stsal du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rje rje thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di bka' stsal to//
206b6: lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ ngas kyang de thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung na sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde
206b7: Dabya ba'i phyir bshad kyis khyod kyis zung shig/ tad ya thA/ dza ye dza ya dza ye/ ma hA dza ya/ dza ya bA ha ni ye bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/ bud d+ha a d+hi ga mi dz+nya a ba b+ha se swA hA// lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi
206b8: bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams te/ lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag gang gi lus la yod pa dang / glegs bam la yod par gyur pa de'i lus la phyir rgol ba rnams/
207a1: kyis dpag tshad brgya tshun tshad gnod par byar mi chud do// mtshon dang dug dang dbyig drug dang / byad kyis mi tshugs so// mi'i bdag po dbang po de'i yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo // yul 'khor der phyir
207a2: rgol ba'i dpung gis mi chud par 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen po rgyal ba can 'di yi ger bris te 'chang ba de ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du de'i lus la dug dang mtshon dang chu dang /
207a3: dbyig dug dang sbyar ba las byung ba'i dug gzhan gyis kyang mi tshugs so// dgra'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // de la rnam par 'tshe ba dang tho 'tsham pa mi 'byung ngo // rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // yul
207a4: dor zhugs na yang lus la mtshon gyis mi phog go/ / thams cad du rgyal ba smra bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di'i gzi brjid dang / mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyis thogs pa med cing ma smad ma rmas par
207a5: rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / tad ya thA/ dza yo dza yo dza yo/ ma hA dza yo/ dza yod ta ma/ d+harma a ba b+hA sa ne/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ a ba ro ha ni/ a ba ro ha ni// A ba A pa ro bya ni/ dza ya
207a6: ku su me/ sA re swa ra ba ti/ dr-id+ha drid+hidr-i d+he/ dri d+ha pa sha ni dang d+he/ o ha ni/ mo ha naM/ dza ma b+hi ni/ sta ma b+ha ni/ dza d+hi ni/ mA b+hi ni/ da ni sa rba to te shin na/ na mo b+ha ga ba to/ bud d+ha s+ya ma hA ka run/ bi hA ri ni/ sid d+ha ma ma man tra bA da ni
207a7: swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis dram dang / bdag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba
207a8: can gyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ / tad ya thA/ dza ya dza ya dza ya/ baT baT phaT/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ badz+ri ni/ pra ha ra pra ta ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/ tar
207b1: tar/ dza ya ku su me/ ba la ba la/ tsakra tsakra/ bI Da yA bI Da yA/ a kra ma a kra ma/ bi kra me/ a tsa le ma tsa le/ kha ga tsA ri ni/ rI la sa sa ni/ badz+ra pra ha ra ni badz+ra sam b+ha be// badz+ra ka li/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te// bud d+ha ra sh+mi/ ma hAH
207b2: b+ha be/ ud tsasmanad+ha/ ma hA te tsa ba ti/ a le pa tsa le/ d+hAn d+han d+ha na// kang ka kang ka re// ka si ni/ sa ma he te d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/ tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra/ g+hA g+hu de/ badz+ra mA lA d+ha ri// sa ra sa ra sa rakA lA tsa ra ni sA hA// bcom ldan 'das
207b3: gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa lags te/ gang dag rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'gal bar bgyid pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas
207b4: bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'khrub lags so/ / 'di lta ste/ lha 'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za'am grul bu ma'am/ grib gnon nam/ brjed byed dam/ gshed byed dam/ bya dad ma ro langs
207b5: sam/ bkra mi shes pa 'am/ ma mo'i gdon nam/ gong du yang gdon gzhan nam/ skem byed kyi gdon nam/ gshin rje'i gdon yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad rmugs pa dang rengs pa dang / rmongs par gyur cig/ tad ya thA/ badz+re badz+re dz+re
207b6: ha na badz+re/ na hi na badz+re/ khA da khA da khA da/ badz+ra ni/ sA Ta ya s+phA Ta ya/ badz+re Na i Da gra ha/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gras// pA ta ya bA ta ya pA ta ya d+ha me/ d+ha d+ha me/ d+hu d+hu me/ 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad dang /
207b7: g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig/ rgyal bar mdzad ma rgyal bar mdzod cig/ ta ra ta ra ta ra/ ma hA ba ta ra Ne/ ku te ku te/
207b8: mu ku te/ badz+ra ku te swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde bar bya
208a1: ba dang snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di smras pa ni sems can chen po lag na rdo rje khyod yang legs so// lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i
208a2: lag na yod pa dang / lus la yod pa dang / glegs bam la yod pa dang / grong dam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang dam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang ngam/ 'chag sa 'am/ dgon pa'i
208a3: gnas na yod pa der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ grong dang grong khyer dang / yul de la srung ba byed par 'gyur ro// yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo // mi ngas mi 'ong ngo/
208a4: dgra mi 'byung ngo // sa phyogs der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas te/ grong dang grong khyer dang / yul de la srung ba byed par 'gyur ro// yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo // dgra mi 'byung ngo /
208a5: sa phyogs der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rgyu zhing der srung ba dang / yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skyong ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su
208a6: 'gyur ba dang chad pa spong ba dang / mtshon cha spong ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / dug gzhig pa dang / mi mdza' ba bzlog pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bar byed par 'gyur ro// tang ya thA/ ta be ne
208a7: ta ba ne/ ta ba ne/ pra ta ba ne/ pra ta ba ne/ pra ta ba ne/ d+hu ru me/ d+hu ru me/ d+hu ru me/ ma hA d+hu ru me/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu khe mu khe/ su mu khe/ swa la pra te sa mA d+hi sa mA d+hi gat+te/ mA na si/ phu ru phu ru/ d+hu ru du ru/ bud d+ha mAn se
208a8: ke swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o// gsad pa'i gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen no// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o//
208b1: lag na rdo rje mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di glegs bam la legs par bris te 'chang ngam/ lus la yod par byas te 'chang ngam/ spos dang phreng ba dang / byug pa
208b2: dang me tog sna tshogs kyi rgyun rnams kyis de la sti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed cing mchod na/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu mi'i rgyal po de'i phyi
208b3: bzhin du 'bring zhing / phyi rgol ba thams cad las srung ba byed par 'gyur ro// mi'i bdag po dbang po de la dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis grags mi rnyed do// yul der pha rol gyi dpung mi 'jug go// 'jug na yang
208b4: de dag la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgegs byed par 'gyur te/ bgegs sna tshogs brgya dag dang / bgegs sna tshogs stong dag byed par 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po de dag gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang dar rig
208b5: sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du gzhag par bya'o/ / gang du g.yul 'gyed dam/ dgra chen po dang 'thab pa der yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba
208b6: can zhes bya ba 'di mgul du btags te g.yul ngor zhugs na/ der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bumar pha rol gyid mag tshegs de la gnod pa 'dis gnod par byed de de bam par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes
208b7: bya ba 'di mu'i mgul du thogs pa de ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam// gtsug lag khang gang du nad 'go ba sna tshogs dang / mi ngas mi bzad pa
208b8: chen po byung ba der rag sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di la me tog sna tshogs kyi bla re bres la gtor ma'i cho ga gzhong khung bzhi ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bkang ste phyogs bzhir bzhag la/ de rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba
209a1: can 'di glags na der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu nad 'go ba dang / mi ngas de rab tu zhi bar byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
209a2: lagasang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di'i gong na rig sngags ches stobs dang ldan pa 'am/ gzi brjid che ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul che ba 'am/ mthu che ba ni gang yang ma mchis te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal
209a3: mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog lags so/ / yul gang dag tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// tad ya thA/ badz+re badz+re/ a mri ta badz+re/ dz+wa li ta badz+ra/ hu ta sha ni
209a4: b+han dza b+han dza/ b+han dza b+han dza/ dzam b+ha dza ma b+ha/ stam b+ha ya sAm b+ha ya/ sarba duSh+Ta grA tAN ma/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ paT paT pa Ta/ ta Ta ta Ta traT/ mu ru mu rus mud+d+ha ma d+hu ma d+ha ma/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ lu khu re/
209a5: khu'u re/ khu khu re/ khu khu me khu khu me khu khu me/ g+ho ri g+ho ri g+ho ri/ badz+ra me nA si/ badz+ra hu ti/ phu ru pu ru pu ru/ gras gra sa gra sa/ sarba a hi ta shi nan/ su ru me/ mu mu le/ badz+ra pra ti pra ti/ sarba ba le pu swA hA/ a lu ba la ni/
209a6: tsutsu ri swA hA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza ya sam b+ha be swA hA/ dza yod ta me swA hA/ dza ya ba re te swA hA/ dza yan d+ha re swA hA/ dza ya ma ni swA hA/ dza ya badz+ra ya swA hA/ a dzi ta badz+rA ya swA hA/ ma hA badz+ra hu ta sha na ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha badz+ra hastA ya swA hA/
209a7: de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam
209a8: grangs 'di la srung ba stsal bar bgyi ste yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / mi 'dza' ba
209b1: bzlog pa dang dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad dgag pa dang / 'thab pa dang zab mo dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'byed pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o// mtshams gcad tra/
209b2: bgyi'o// tad ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma bA dza ye/ mi laM mi li/ mA na si/ hU~M dzA dzA dz+dza/ dz+wa ru me/ mu ru mu ru/ tuT tunatuT+Ta/ mu lu le swA hA/ mArga ba tId+hA d+ha me be ge/ be ga d+ha ni ri/ te dza bA ti/ 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad dang /
209b3: dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srung sa shig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs shing / byin gyis brlabs pa lags so// tad ya
209b4: thA/ bud d+he bud d+he/ bud d+he bud d+he/ bud d+he bud d+he ba tI/ bud d+ha a ba b+hA sa ni/ d+harma ba tI/ sa ma hi te/ sa mA d+hi gan+d+he/ bud d+ha a ti ga me/ bud d+ha bi tA re d+harma a ba b+hA sa ne swA hA// gang la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di
209b5: las 'gal bar bgyid na/ de'i mgo sid d+ha ka bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro// su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / mchod pa dang yi ger
209b6: 'dri ba dang grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lagabang du glegs bam gnas par bgyid na/ der tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma
209b7: dang lhan cig tu rig sngags 'chang de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing dpag tshad brgya stong tshun chad du slar rgol ba dang / dgra rnams las thams cad du bsrung ba dang / mtshams gcad par bgyi'o// g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'thab pa
209b8: dang thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// slar bzlog par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po
210a1: legs so legs so/ / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang / snying rtse ba dang bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni sems can chen po sems can thams cad la ban pa byed pa khyod yang legs so rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
210a2: chen mo rgyal ba can 'dis su la bsrung ba byas pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs so// dug dang dbyig dug dang byar dang gshed
210a3: byed dang rims nad nas gdon thams cad kyi bar gyis de la mi tshugs so/ / pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab
210a4: pa yin no/ / lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga thamal dam pa'i chos rnam
210a5: par 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe/ gnod sbyin dang srin po mdangs 'phrog pa drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ shin du mi zad pa dag dang / chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal po tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa dag 'byung bar
210a6: 'gyur te/ de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di sems kyi rgyud mi mnyam pa/ mi zad pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dag dang / sems can sdang ba thams cad kyi don dang tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal
210a7: mo chen po rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs te phyag rgyas btab pa yin no/ / ga sngags kyi rgyal mo chen
210a8: mo rgyal ba can 'di ni lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji
210b1: ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya zhes bya bar zung shig/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba
210b2: can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu
210b3: dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo
210b4: rgyal ba can zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho/ / // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dza ba tI nI nA ma d+hA ra NI/
210b5: bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgad phung
210b6: bo'i ri la dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig du bzhugs te/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
210b7: zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can thams cad la sman pa dang mi'i rgyal po rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
210b8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse bar dgongs
211a1: te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen po rgyal ba can bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs pa byin gyis brlangs
211a2: pa sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir nga yang da ltar 'chad pa 'di zung shig/ tad ya thA/ dza ye dza ya dza yaM/ ma hA dza ya ba tI ye/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ti/ d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/ bud d+ha a d+hi ga ma
211a3: dz+nyA na a ba d+hA se swA hA/ / lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags gzhi rnams te/ lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang skur ba'i tshig 'di dag gang gis
211a4: lus la btags sam/ glegs bam la bris pa de'i lus dpag tshad stong tshun chad du phyir rgol ba'i gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshon dang dug dang dbyig dug gis mi tshugs so// rgyal po de'i yul der pha
211a5: rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / / phyir rgol ba dag yul 'khor der mthus gnod par mi 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di yi ger bris te 'chang
211a6: ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de'i lus la mtshon dang dug dang / chu dang rims dang dug sbyar ma gzhan gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang tho 'tsham pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i 'jig
211a7: pa mi 'byung tshom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / ba mo'i nang du song yang de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi phog/ thams cad du yang nga rgyal smra bar 'gyur/ gnod pa med cing ma snang la marmas par rig sngags kyi rgyal
211a8: mo rgyal ba can 'di'i mthu dang / gzi brjid dang stobs dang / byin gyis rlabs kyis rgyal bar 'gyur ro// tad ya thA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza yod ta me d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha rad+ha ra/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/
211b1: bod+ha ni/ ta thA ga ta/ a dISh+Ti ti ma ba ro ha ni yo byir dza ya ku su me/ sa re sa ra ba tI/ dI d+he d+heD+he dang dre d+ya pA ka ri bad d+he/ o hi ni ma ha na/ dzam b+ha ni/ stam pa ni/ stam pa ti/ sarba a hi teSh+Ti Nan/ na mo b+hA ga ba ti/ prad da s+ya/ ma hA kA
211b2: ruNA na/ bi ha ri ni/ sid d+hAn du man tra pA da swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'o bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis bdag gis rig sngags kyi
211b3: rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ / tad ya thA/ dza ya dza ya dza ya/ phaT phaT phaT/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ badz+ra pra ha ra pra ha ra pra ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ b+hA ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/
211b4: dza ya ku su me/ ba la ba la/ tsakra tsakra/ pI Ta ya pI Da ya/ a kra ma a kra ma/ bi kra me/ bi kra me/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ kha ga tsA ri Ni/ nI la ba tI/ badz+ra pra ha ra ni/ badz+ra sam b+ha pe/ badz+ra ka ya bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te bud d+ha raSh+Ti/
211b5: mahA pra b+he/ ud tsaskan d+he/ ma hA te dza ba tI/ ma ha rte dza ba tI/ ma tsa la/ ba tsa le/ d+hun d+hu na d+hA na/ ka ka ka ri/ kA si ni/ sa mI ha ta/ d+harma e ba b+hA sa ni/ tsa ra tsa ra/ g+hu g+hu De/ badz+ra mA lA d+ha ni/ sa ra sa ra/ kA la ba ri NI swA hA/
211b6: bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu rtsa dgus gsungs pa ste/ su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'da' bar bgyid pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ngag
211b7: la 'khrus par 'gyur ro/ / 'di lta ste/ lha 'am/ klu 'am gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha zang ma/ brjed byed dam/ gsod byed dam/ byad dam ro langs sam/ bkra mi shis pa 'am/ ma mo'i gdon nam/ gong ma'i
211b8: gdon nam/ skem byed dam/ skem byed kyi gdon nam/ za ba'i gdon de dag thams cad rmugs par bgyis so// rengs par bgyis so// tad ya thA/ badz+ra badz+ra badz+ra/ ha na badz+re/ ni ha na badz+re/ khAd khA badz+re ni/ sA Ta ya s+phA Ta ya/ Sha
212a1: sA Ta ya/ badz+re Ni/ i daM gra ha na/ hAM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ bA ta ya/ bA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang zab mo dang 'thab
212a2: pa dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig/ dza ya ka rI/ dza yang ku ru/ ta ra ta ra ta ra/ ma hA ta ra ni/ ku te ku te ku te/ badz+ra ku te swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
212a3: chen po lag na rdo rje la lags so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// ga na rdo rje sems can chen po byod/ sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba dang snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs pa yang legs so// lag na rdo rje rig
212a4: sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i lag ru song ste/ lus la btags sam/ glegs bam la bris sam/ grong ngam grong khyer ram// grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang dam 'chags na spyod par 'byu
212a5: ba der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas par grong dam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam yul de srung bar 'gyur ro// yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro// sa phyogs der
212a6: mi ngas mi 'byung ngo / / dgra mi 'byung ngo // rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig sum dras phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang / lhan gcig der srung ngo // yongs su skyob bo// yongs su 'dzin to// zhi ba dang bde legs su
212a7: 'gyur ba byed do/ / chang pa spong ngo // mtshon cha smod do// dug gsod do// mi mdza' pa 'gog go// mtshams gcod do// sa gcod do// tad ya thA/ ta pa ni ta pa ni/ pra ta pa ni/ d+ha ru me/ dU ru me/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu khe mu khe/ su ma?/
212a8: mu le sbal pradas mA d+he// sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/ mA na si/ phu ru phu ru phu ru d+hu ru/ bud d+ha mA na si ke sA hA// lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o// gsang ba'i gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
212b1: cad kyi gsang ba'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'o// lag na rdo rje mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di glegs bam la legs par bris te 'chang ngam/ lus
212b2: la btags te 'chang zhing de la spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis lhab lhub kyis sti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed na mi'i rgyal po de la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod
212b3: sbyin phyi bzhin 'brang ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig du srung bar 'gyur ro/ / mi'i rgyal po de la phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do// mthus yul der 'jug
212b4: pa dang / bgegs 'jug na yang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgegs sna tshogs brgya dang / bgegs sna tshogs stor byed par 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba
212b5: can 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du bkur bar bya'o/ / gang du g.yul ngor 'jug gam/ dgra chen po dang 'thab pa der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di mgul du btags te/ g.yul dor
212b6: zhugs na der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de pham par byed par 'gyur ro/ / de ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i mgul du btags pa de rgyal bar
212b7: 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du gal te nad 'go ba sna tshogs dang mi ngas mi zad pa chen po byung na der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal
212b8: ba can 'di dang me tog sna tshogs dang / cho ga dang gtor ma dang / bum pa btung ba sna tshogs kyis bkang ba bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di blags na de'i tshe rgyal po chen po
213a1: nam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas shing / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bun phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu nad 'go ba dang / mings de rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang
213a2: ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di las lhag pa'i rig sngags ches stobs dang ldan pa'am/ gzi brjid che ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul che ba'i mthu che ba gang yang ma mchiso/ rig sngags
213a3: thams cad kyi mchog rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di yul gang dang gang du spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dang de dag du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ / tad ya thA/ badz+re badz+re badz+re/ ma mi ti badz+re/ dz+wa le Na
213a4: badz+re hu tra sha ni b+han dzA/ b+han dzA/ b+han dzA/ dzam b+ha/ stam b+ha ya/ sarba gra hA nA na/ hUM hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ phaT phaT phaT/ ta Ta ta Ta ta Ta/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ d+ha ma d+ha mad+ham/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khu khu me/
213a5: khu khu me/ g+ho re g+he ri g+ha ri/ badz+ra mA na sa/ badz+ra tu ti/ hu ti ru/ phu ru phu ru/ gre sa gr-i saM/ sarba a hi ti Shi NA na/ nA bu ru Ni/ mu mu le/ badz+ra pra dI pa ni/ tsa ma le phu swA hA/ a yu ba la ni tsu tsu re swA hA/ dza ye dza ye dza ya sam
213a6: b+hathA be swA hA/ / dza yod ta me swA hA/ dze ya ba ra de swA hA/ dza yan d+ha ra swA hA/ dza ya mA na si swA hA/ dza ya badz+ra swA hA/ a rdi ta badz+ra ya swA hA// ma hA badz+rA ni tA sha na ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha badz+ra tasta swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos
213a7: kyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs
213a8: 'di la bsrung bsngal bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug dgum pa dang mi mdzub dgag pa dang / dus me lags par 'gum par dgag pa dang 'thab pa
213b1: da 'azab mo dang rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang 'jigs pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o// mtshams dgum par bgyi'o// tad ya thA/ dze ye dze ye dze ye/ ma hA dza ye/ mi li man si/ dz+nye dz+nye dz+hi/ mu ru mu
213b2: ru/ tu nu tu Tu/ mu mu le/ mArga ba ti/ d+hu d+hu me/ be ga be ga d+hA rir+t+ti/ te dza ba tI/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las srungs shig sungs shig sA
213b3: hA/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa lags so// tad ya thA/ bud d+he bud d+he/ budA ba tI/ bud d+ha a bab+hA sa ni d+harma ba
213b4: tI sa ma hi te/ sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/ bud d+ha a ba b+hA sa ni/ bud d+ha pa ri ha ri/ d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni swA hA// su la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'da' bar bgyid pa de ni mgo si ta ke'i 'bras bu bzhin du tshal ba
213b5: bdun du 'gas so/ / su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di 'chang dam/ klog gam mchod par bgyid dam/ yi ger 'dri 'am// glegs bam la bris te/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram grong rdal lam ljongs
213b6: sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor tam/ gtsug lag khang du 'jog na// der bdag tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas shing / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rig sngags 'dzin pa de'i slad bzhin
213b7: du 'brangs te bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / dpag tshad brgya stong tshun chad du mtshams dgum par bgyi'o// slar rgol ba dang dgra dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang 'thab pa dang 'tshang 'dru ba dang / thab mo dang 'gyed pa thams cad ma
213b8: mchis par bgyi'o/ / slar bzlog par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po legs so legs so// sems can chen po
214a1: khyod 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang bde ba dang / bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir zhugs pa yang legs so// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'dis gang yod
214a2: su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon dang / dug dang byad dang gsod byed dang rims dang / gnod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba
214a3: can 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ / lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di zung shig chongs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma
214a4: la dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na/ sems can drag shul dang ldan pa/ shin du mi bzad pa/ mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams dang / chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshe thung ba
214a5: chos ma yin pas yul 'khor skyob 'byung ba de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di sems mi mnyam pa sems mi sad pa de dag dang / sdang ba dang rab tu sdang ba'i sems can thams cad kyi don du 'gyur/ char gcod
214a6: par 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa phyag rgyas btab
214a7: pa'o/ / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming
214a8: ci lags/ / 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / phyag rgya zhes bya bar zung shig/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par
214b1: byed pa rgyal ba can zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gsang pa pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
214b2: 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do/ / 'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma yu ra bi d+ha kar b+he nA ma// bod skad du/ 'phags
214b3: pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya'i yang snying zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra yis 'jigs pa 'am/
214b4: 'thab rtsod kyis 'jigs pa 'am// bgegs kyis 'jigs pa 'am/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa 'am/ sbrul gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ gcan zan gyis 'jigs pa'am/ dug gis 'jigs pa 'am/ mes 'jigs pa'i
214b5: chus 'jigs pa 'am/ rlung gis 'jigs pa 'am/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang na 'dug na'ang yid la bya'o// rlung las gyur pa 'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa 'am/ bad kan las gyur pa 'am// 'dus pa las gyur pa 'am/ gdon
214b6: gyis zin tam/ rims kyis btab pa'am/ dug 'thungs sam/ nad thams cad kyi nang na 'dug na'ang 'di sa bya'o// na ma~M b+ha ga ba te/ id Ting nA ya/ in dgo mi sa~M kA ya/ A sha ne bA ba ni kA le/ ka bi la/ ming te i le ming
214b7: te swA hA/ / gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par nur cig/ nA drA ya ni/ bA rA yin/ ta ri / kun tA ya~M/ oM li mr-i s+t+wa~M/ ki sa tI li ma s+t+rai swAt+ma// rig sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig/ 16/ hihi/ d+hUH/ khar+Na/ ma
214b8: ba ti kha hi/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT swA hA/ bdag la srungs shig srungs shig/ lo rgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog shig/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod de gtor ma ri mthon po la btang bar bya'o// des thams cad zhi zhing zlog par
215a1: 'gyur rom pa'i snying po rig pa dang bcas pa/ / rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ar+tha pra dIbat+tA ra n+ti bi d+yAr+yAH// bo da ska dang// 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo smin ma mchog gi gzungs// sangs rgyas/
215a2: dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na dge slong srong nyis brgya
215a3: lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang mi 'bum phrag du ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te// yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te// sangs rgyas
215a4: k yi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas shes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrog ma mchog ces bya ba de
215a5: lta la bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa des byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po dang / 'od dpag med ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir btang ngo // de nas byang chub
215a6: sems dpa' de gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bder
215a7: song ste phyin nas/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis
215a8: kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bgyi ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
215b1: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgros ma mchog ces bgyi ba da ltar bzhugs te/ / 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas slob ma'i mchog des bdag cag
215b2: gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir btang ste/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrol ma'i mchog de bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba
215b3: nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam 'tshe 'am/ stobs dang bde ba dang / kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa la reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo// 'di skad ces kyang gsung ngo // 'di na mi 'am mi ma lags pa 'am/ 'byung po 'am sha za
