237a8: cad la thun mong du dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin par bya'o/ / sems rnams la bcing ba dang brdung ba la sogs pa spang bar bya'o// zla ba gzhan re re la mchod pa nyis 'gyur du byas la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya ba ni rang ngam rang dang 'dra bas
237b1: bya'o/ / cho ga 'di yis ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad med par 'gyur ro// blo rno ba dang nad de med pa dang / tshe lo brgya thub cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de'i tshe
237b2: sbrul shun pa rjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor te mdzes pa'i lus bde ba nan gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / yang de nyid dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan 'gror
237b3: skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rna ba'i bu gar dmyal ba'i sgra yang thos par mi 'gyur na 'bras bu smin par lta ga la 'gyur 'di rnams kyi gnas su 'gro ba med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pas gzhan yang sgrub
237b4: pa'i thabs bka' stsal pa dang / gang gis sems can tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ba dang / nyam nga ba'i 'khor ba las grol bar byed pa ni gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa chad dang ldan pa mdzes pa'i ras mkhas pas bya'o//
237b5: de nas gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs tshon sna ma lus pas gzungs kyi yi ge las sprul pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bri bar bya'o// tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer stong gi phreng ba can pad ma dang zla ba'i gdan la
237b6: bzhugs pa ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od can/ brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa spyan gsum pa phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas pa zhal zhi ba gser gyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'o// g.yon pa ni mche bas ma mchu mnanas
237b7: mi bzad pa ud pa la sngon po'i 'od zer gyi 'od dang ldan pa'o/ / dbus mi ni sgeg pa dang bcas shing dkar ba'o// g.yas pa'i phyag gis snying khar sna tshogs rdo rje'o// de bzhin du pad ma la gnas pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
237b8: mda' dang mchog sbyin pa'o// g.yon du sdigs 'dzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / de bzhin du gzhu dang mi 'jigs pa dang bum pa'o// yang 'go bor mchod rten la gnas pa'i oM dang / mgrin par AHdang / snying khar hUM de/ dpral bar
238a1: traM ngo/ lte ba'i phyogs su tri'o// rkang pa gnyis la oM aHyi ge 'di rnams bkod la rak+Sha swA hA/ dang bcas pa'i 'di'i nang du rang gi ming dang spel ba'o// de'i logs gnyis su pad ma dang / rdo rje 'chang gnyis rnga yab dkar
238a2: bo phyag na bsnams pa'o/ / steng du bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun 'bebs bzhin pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis so// logs bzhir khro bo mi g.yo ba dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / dbyug pa sngon po can dang stobs po che zhes
238a3: bya ste/ ral gri dang lcags kyu dang / dbyug pa dang rdo rje bsdams pa'o// g.yon pa gdug pa can 'jigs pa'i sdigs 'dzub ched du byed pa'o// de ltar 'bad pas rdzogs par byas la ring srel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la
238a4: bskyad par gnas pas mchod pa chen po stong phrag gcig gis mchod pa byas la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa bya'o/ / de nas dkar po phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas bzung ste ji srid bcwa lnga'i bar du stong stong bzlas pa bya'o// de
238a5: nas snga bar nam nangs pa dang bcom ldan 'das ma zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas ji ltar dngos grub 'dod pa ster ro// yang na ni thang ka de dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chus byugs pa'i phyogs gcig tu yang dag par bzhugs
238a6: su gsol lo mchod pa rgya chen po bya zhing nyi ma re re zhing brgyad brgya bzlas pa bya'o/ / yang zla ba re re la stong stong gi mchod pa bya zhing stong stong gi bzlas pa byas na tshe dpag tu med pa dang / stobs dpag tu med pa gnon pa dang
238a7: nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nad chen po med par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis nyi ma re re tshigs bcad stong 'dzin pa'i phyin cim log pa'i ngag tu 'gyur ro// yang na kha cig gis de lta bu byed par mi nus na de
238a8: yis rang gi khyim du dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i sa'i char bzhugs su gsol lo/ / ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas la zla ba 'ong ngo cog gi tshes brgyad la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya zhing nyi ma re re dus gsum du nyi shu rtsa cig/
238b1: rtsa gcig brjod na blo rno pa dang tshe ring ba dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang nad med pa dang / skyid pa dang lo brgya tsho ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// yang na rang gis ma nus na de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na tshe ring ba dang / blo rno bar/
238b2: 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang byin sreg gi cho ga sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir nye bar bshad par bya ste/ khru gang gi tshad kyi thab khung zlum po rdo rje'i phreng bas brgyan pa tsan dan dkar po 'am sa dkar gyis byugs la
238b3: matog dkar po bkram ste/ logs bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la bdag spros la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la/ phyogs bzhir mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa rab tu mdzes pa gos dkar pos g.yog
238b4: pa yalags kha brgyan pa dgod par bya'o/ / 'o ma can gyi yam shing la me sbar la der maM lha bkug ste dgang brags gsum byin la gsang gtor byas te gshegs su gsol lo// de nas tshe dpag tu med pa gsal por thub
238b5: glang gi dbus sra bsams la gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bzlas shing dgang thugs gsum dbul lo/ / yang na oM a mr-i ta a yu r+yA da te swA hA/ zhes bya bas tshe dang / blo rno pa dang bcas pas brgyad brgya dus gsum du sbyin
238b6: bsreg bya'o/ / gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba lan bdun du bzlas pa byas na tshe ring ba dang / blo rno ba dang skyid pa dang nang med par 'gyur ro// yang na zla ba re re'i dkar po phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la dus gsum
238b7: dutshe lo stong thub par 'dod pas sbyin bsreg byas na mchog gis tshe ring ba dang / blo rno ba smin par byed do// sems can rnams la smad par mi bya'o// chog 'dis rang gi lus nad kyis gos par
238b8: mi 'gyur ro/ / lo brgya lnga bcur 'tsho ba dang / dgra las rgyal ba dang / blo rno bar 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro// gal te rang gis mnus na da'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang sgrub par
239a1: 'dod na gtsug tor gyi rgyal po chen po che dang blo rno ba dang bcas par 'bum phrag cig sbyir sreg byas te/ dang po dang mthar stong stong gi mchod pa byas la yang 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas na tshe lo 'bum phrag
239a2: gcig thub par 'gyur ro/ / bye ba byas na bye ba thub bo// de ltar 'di'i cho ga'i rim pas che lo dpag tu med par 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang dpa' ba dang dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// dpal 'dod na dpal 'bras 'bum
239a3: brag gcig sbyin bsreg byas na dpal chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po 'dod na pad ma 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po chen po thob par 'gyur ro// bye ba gcig byas na 'khor los sgyur ba thob par 'gyur ro//
239a4: yang na ral gri la sogs pa grub par 'dod na ring srel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du thang sku bkram la stong gi mchod pa chen pos mchod la bzlas pa 'bum byas te/ yang lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi ral gril bzlas pa
239a5: 'bum byas te lag pa g.yas par bcangs na yid kyis 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang stobs che zhing gzhan gnon pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi gcig tu 'dren pa por gyur nas sman pa chen po'i mchog che
239a6: dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ / de ltar rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rtsa gsum la sogs pa la yang sgrub par bya'o// de ltar phan yon dpag tu med pa'i gzungs chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa mchog/
239a7: tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di ji lta ji ltar sbar ba de lta de ltar las 'grub par byed do// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyi ma re re la dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa
239a8: gcig bzlas pa bya zhing mchod rten chen por byas te yang dag par bcangs la gzhan la yang rgya cher gsal bar byas na/ de skyid par thob cing stobs dang ldan pa dang nad med pa dang / lo brgya thub pa dang blo rno ba dang skye ba dran par
239b1: 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i tshe/ sbrul shun pa rjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor te bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sgra rna bug tu yang thos par mi 'gyur na/ 'bras bu smin
239b2: par lta yang ga la 'gyur/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de ru skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas
239b3: pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho/
239b4: baN Di ta chos kyi sde dang / khams pa lo ts+tsha ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha bi dzA ya nA mad+hA ra NI ka la pa// bod skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug
239b5: tor rnam par rgyal ma'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i rtog pa/ gtsug ter rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad gis thos pa dus gcig ni/ becom ldan 'das bde ba can na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
239b6: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug chen po'i khang bzang gi tshal bde ba la nye bar bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen//
239b7: po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sems can sdug bsngal dang nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir cing tshe thung ba yod de/ de rnams kyi don du tshe ring bar nye bar
239b8: bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gzung bar bya/ gzhan rnams la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
240a1: sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
240a2: cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs bstan du gsol/ / bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs
240a3: kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal to/ / oM na mo b+ha gawa te sarba
240a4: trai lo kya pra ti bi shiSh+Ta ya/ bud d+hA ya te na maHtad+ya thA/ oM b+h+yAM b+h+yAM b+h+yAM/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ a sa ma sa man+ta ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/ go ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ a b+hi Shin+ta n+tu ma sarba ta thA ga tA/ su
240a5: ga ta ba ra ba tsa nA mri tA b+hi She kairma ma hA mu dra man+ta ba daiHo AM hi ra A ha ra/ ma ma a yu san+d+ha ra ni/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya// bi sho d+hA ya bi she d+hA ya/ ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+he/ saM ha sra ra smi sa tse di ta
240a6: sarba ta thA ga tA ba lo ka ni/ Sha Ta pA ra ma tA pa ri bu ra ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta mA te/ da sha b+hU ma~M pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga ta hrid yA d+hiSh+NI nA d+hiSh+Thi ti/ oM mu dre mu dre ma hA mu dre badz+ra kA yai saM g+ha ta na pa ri shud d+he/ me pra ti ni bar+d+ha yA yur+tha
240a7: shud+d+he sarba ta thA ga te sa ma yA d+hid+hA nA d+hiSh+Thate/ oM mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ ma hA bi mu naM/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ma ma ti/ ma ma ti/ ma hA ma ma ti/ su ma ti su ma ti/ ma hA su ma ti/ ta thA tA b+hA ta ko tri pa ri shud+d+he/ bi sA TA/
240a8: bud+d+he shud+d+he/ oM he he dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ sma rasma ra/ s+pha ra s+pha ra/ s+pha ra ya s+pha ra ya/ sarba bud+d+ha d+hiSh+Ti nA d+hiSh+Tha te/ oM shud+d+he shud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ badz+re badz+re ma hA badz+re su badz+re badz+ra gar+b+he dza ya gar+b+he bi dza ye gar+b+he badz+ra dz+wa lA gar+b+he badz+re
240b1: d+hU be badz+ra saM b+ha be badz+re badz+ri ni badz+ram+b+ha b+ha tu me sha rI raM sarba satwA nAny+tsa/ kA ya pa ri shud d+he b+hi ba tu me sa rA/ sarba ga ti ba ri shud+d+hish+tsa/ sarba ta thA ga tA shu mAM sa mA sA sa yan+tu/ oM bud+d+ha bud+d+ha sid+d+ha sid+d+ha bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha
240b2: mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bi mo tsa yaM bi mo tsa ya/ sho d+ha ya sho d+hi ya sa man+tan+totsa ya mo tsa ya man+ta ra smi pa ri shud+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta hri da yA d+hiSh+ThAn+ta d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM mudra mu dre ma hA mu dre ma~M hA mu drA ma~Mn+ta ba~M de swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gang 'di de
240b3: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'chi ba'i dbyug pa chen po 'dzin pa/ sdig pa zhi bar byed pa'i dag byed do// gang su dag tshe ring bar 'dod pas 'chang bar 'gyur ba'i rim pas
240b4: klag par bya'o/ / sa phyogs yangs pa kha cig tu sa dang pa byung gis nye bar byugs la/ dri bzang gi chab kyis chag chag gdab par bya'o// steng du bla res kyis bres shing 'phyang du bcug nas/ de'i dbus su rdul tshon dkar pos
240b5: 'khor los rtsibs brgyad pa shin du brgyan par gdab par bya'o/ / gang de'i dbus su rang bzhin gyi snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor ro// de ltar rim pa ji lta bar shar la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams su nam mkha' ltar 'dus
240b6: pa'i bza' ston 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / sa'i snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / nor bu'i snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / ro bcud kyi snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / snying po dpag med 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang /
240b7: gzi brjid snying po 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / rnga'i sgra dbyangs 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / ser bu 'byung ba'i gtsug tor te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs su gsol lo// de'i yang phyi rol nyid du pad ma 'dab ma bcu
240b8: drug pa legs par bri bar bya'o/ / 'dab ma so so re rer rim pa ji lta bar thig le bcu drug las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs su gsol lo// nang stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / phyi stong pa nyid 'byung
241a1: ba'i gtsug tor dang phyi nang stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor
241a2: dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / chos
241a3: thams cad stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / rang gi ngo bo
241a4: nyid stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor dang / dngos po med pa'i rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid 'byung ba'i gtsug tor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i gdan gyi dkyil 'khor byas nas dus ji lta ba'i me tog gi rnam pa 'bul bar bya'o//
241a5: de'i phyed kyi steng du khri btsugs te chu'i snod du rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i mchod rten bzhugs par bya'o// shog pu'am lo ma la sngags kyi yi ge sgrub pa po'i ming can yang bzhugs par bya'o// bum pa chu yis bkang ba yang
241a6: gzhag par bya'o/ / pad ma'i phyi rol phyogs pa ni bum pa bzhi yang bzhag par bya'o/ gyi lnga ldi dang gdugs dang ba dan gyis nye bar mdzes par byas nas/ yang shar du bgegs rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha
241a7: mo dang lhor 'chi ba rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang / nub tu nyon mongs pa rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang / byang du phung po'i nang rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par
241a8: rgyal ba'i lha mo dang / mer rdo rje phreng ba tshe sbyin ma dang / bden bral du sgyum chen mo dang / rlung drug ser 'od ma dang / dbang ldan du gser gyi phreng ba can tshe sbyin ma'o// snod bzhi chu bzang dang bcas pas bkar ste/ me tog gi brang
241b1: ba 'phyang du bzhug par bya'o/ / 'di'i mthar re kha gsum rdul tshon gyis ze bar bya'o// phreng dang po la skra la sogs pa med pa'i 'jim pa rlon pa la byas pa'i sats+tsha stong phrag cig bsgrig par bya'o// ma grub na brgyanges par bzhugs par bya/
241b2: phyogs bzhir bkur sti dang sti stang dang chen po'i mchod pa byas nas/ tshig gzhan mi smra ba'i dam bca' 'dzin pa'i chos smra ba rnams kyis gzungs 'di bklag par bya'o// la na rerare zhing mchod rten gyi dpung mdzod cing rab tu
241b3: gnas par bya'o/ / stong phrag gcig tu klog pas dbus kyi mchod rten gyi dbur lag pa bskyod cing mchod par bya'o// me tog dang bdug spos dang / mar me dang / dri chab dang / lhab shos la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad stong phrag
241b4: so sor mchod rten gyi phreng ba'i rnam par byas nas mchod pa bya'o/ / ji srid yongs su ma rdzogs pa de srid du mar me'i phreng ba rlung gis mi nyams pa sbyar bar bya'o// mnyam par gzhag cing gtsang spras rab tu 'jug par bya'o// de ltar
241b5: byas na zhag bdun pa'i tshe lo bdun du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / lo bdun pa'i tshe ni de ltar tshe mchog 'thob cing nad las rnam par grol nas lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba yang thams cad du rnyed par mi 'gyur ro//
241b6: de lta bu'i nye bar spyod pa'i rim pa las gzhan du byas na de yis 'grub pa ma yin no// rab tu byed pa dang po'o// rtog pa 'di yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdom brtson dam pa 'dul ba'i gtsug lag la bla med par smra ba
241b7: ne mkhan po'i gsung bzhin du/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsA ba gnas brtan dpal nyi ma rgyal mtshan bzang pos dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du rang gis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+Ti
241b8: sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra NI ka la pas hi ta/ / bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
242a1: phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa bde ba can gyi chos yang
242a2: dag par spad ba'i khang bzangs mchog na nye bar bzhugs so/ / de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/ 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa// kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
242a3: chen po rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo sdug bsngal ba nad kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can tshe thung ba rnams yod de/ de rnams kyi phyir sems can thams cad la kun du gzigs pa'i mtshan gyi dpal de bzhin
242a4: gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyid bcang ba dang klag pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir yun ring bar gnas par sgrub pa'i ched du bcom ldan 'das
242a5: kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs te/ kun du gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba
242a6: zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/ / oM na mo b+ha ga wa te sarba tI lokya pra ti bi ShiSh+Ti ya bud d+ha ya te na maHtad ya thA/ oM b+huM b+huM b+h+yAM/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ a sam sa man ta a ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na
242a7: ga ti/ ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud d+he/ a b+hi Shiny+tsan+na mAM sarba te thA ga ta su ga ta ba ra ba tsi na/ a mri ta a b+hi shI kai ra/ ma hA mudra man tra ba daM/ A ha ra A ha ra/ ma ma a yur san d+ha ra nI/ sho d+ha ya
242a8: sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ ga ga ne swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud d+he/ sa ha sra rasmi saM tsa dA te/ sarba ta thA ga tA a wa lo ki ni Sha Ta pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/ sarba ta thA ga tAm te sha b+h+yA mi pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba
242b1: tathA ga tA hri da ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu dre mu dre/ ma hA mu dre/ badz+ra kA ya sa ha ra Na pa ri shud d+he/ sarba karma a wa ra nA be shud d+he/ pra ti ni ba ra ta ya/ ma ma a yur bi shud d+he/ sarba ta thA ga tA sa ma ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Ti
242b2: te/ a mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ bi mu na bi mu ni/ ma hA bi mu ni/ ma ti me ti/ ma hA ma te/ ma ma ti su ma ti/ ta thAtA/ b+hu ta ko Ti pa re shud d+he/ bi sUT/ bAd d+he shud d+he/ hehe/ dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ s+phar s+phar/ s+yA
242b3: ras+pha ra/ s+pha ra ya s+pha ra ya/ sarba bud d+ha/ a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ shud d+he shud d+he/ bud d+he bud d+he/ badz+re badz+re/ ma hA badz+re/ su badz+re/ badz+re gar b+he/ dza ya gar+b+he/ bi dza ya gar+b+he/ badz+ra dz+wa la gan+d+he/ badz+ra ud b+ha be/ badz+ra sa b+hA be/ badz+ra
242b4: badz+ro ni/ badz+ram+b+ha ba tu/ ma ma sha rI raM sarba satwAnAny+tsa kA ya pa ri shud d+hir b+ha ba tu/ sa dA me sarba ga ti pa ri shud d+hish+tsa/ sarba ta thA ga tA sh+yA mAM sa ma srA sa yan tu/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ sid d+h+ya sid d+ha/ bo d+ha ya bo d+hA ya/ bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha
242b5: ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bi mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ sa man ta na mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ sa man ta rasmai pa ri shud d+ha/ sarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya/ a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu dre mu dre ma hA
242b6: mu dre ma hA mu dra man tra pa dai swA hA/ / gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ ngan song thams cad rgyun gcod pa 'di yi gar bris te/ mchod rten gyi srog shing gi steng du
242b7: bzhugs la/ zla ba nya ba'i tshe khrus byas te lan stong rtsa brgyad brjod na tshe zad pa las tshe phyir nur bar 'gyur ro// ngan song las myur du thar te sgrib pa rnams dag nas bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// dud
242b8: 'gro rnams kyis thos na yang de rnams ngan song gi tha ma yin te/ byang chub ma thob kyi bar du mtho ris rgyal po'i rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs sam// tshong dpon gyi rigs sam/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la
243a1: chen po lta bu'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / mchod rten de'i grib mas phog gam/ rdul gyis btab kyang rung ste ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
243a2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid rangs te mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so/
243a3: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA toSh+NI Sha si tA pa dz+nyA na mA a pa ra dzI tA pra N+ya gi ra ma hA bi d+yA rA dz+nyA bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can zhes
243a4: bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo'o/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
243a5: dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i yul sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas chos bzangs lha'i mdun sa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
243a6: dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ gtsug tor la rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms pa
243a7: sag tu na pa kyi sa/ tor gyi gas banas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag byung ngo // na mo b+ha ga wa te uSh+NI ShA ya shud d+he bi ra dzo bi ma le swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor thogs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la
243a8: phyag 'tshal lo/ / chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
243b1: dpa rgyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'jig tanan dgra btsam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag /
243b2: lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lha
243b3: drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// reg sngags 'chang grub pa'i drang srong dmed pa'i mtshan cha can dmod pas phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tsha'o//
243b4: lha tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog ma'i bdag mo dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo// chu lha la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das legs/
243b5: ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das legs ldan dga' byed dbang phyug nag po chen po grong khyer sum rtsegs 'jig par byed pa kha che'i dur khrod chen po na gnas par
243b6: mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rdo
243b7: rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i gdud la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das las kyi gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rin po
243b8: tshe'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ bcom ldan 'das gti mug gi gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
244a1: chags pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
244a2: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
244a3: mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa rgya mtsho 'jom pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
244a4: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai dUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don yod grub pa
244a5: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa la'i dang po rgya po me tog shin tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
244a6: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo//
244a7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
244a8: thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dang sel la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
244b1: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
244b2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba la phyag
244b3: 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
244b4: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
244b5: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa dang ud pa li 'dri'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
244b6: gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rab tu brjod par bya'o/ / 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par
244b7: byed pa 'byung po dang gdon thams cad zlog par byed pa/ pha rol gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba las yongs su skyob pa// sems can bcings pa thams cad thar par byed pa/ sdang ba dang rmi
244b8: lam ngan pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gdon thams cad rnam par rlag par byed pa/ gdon stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad rab tu sgrub par
245a1: byed pa/ dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/ bza' chen po brgyad rnam par brlag par byed pa/ sdang ba dang drag po dang rmi lam ngan pa rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ dug dang mtshon dang me dang chu las skyob
245a2: par byed pa/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las sgrol ba/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad kyi bar du yongs su skyob par byed pa ste/ gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/ stobs chen gzi brjid chen mo ste/ gtum pa chen
245a3: mo dkar mo che/ / gsal ba chen mo stobs chen mo// 'bar ba chen mo phreng ba che// gos dkar mo ni chen mo ste// 'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can// rdo rje phreng ba rnam bsgyings ma// pad ma'i snang ba rdo rje'i mtshan// gzhan gyis
245a4: mi thub phreng ba can/ / rdo rje khar rnamal 'joms pa mo// zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa// gzugs zhi dkar mo chen mo ste// 'bar ba dang ni gos dkar mo// 'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo// 'chi med rdo rje lu gu rgyud
245a5: rdo rje gzhon nur rig 'dzin ma/ / lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje dang // rig sngags gser gyi phreng ba can// leb rgan rtsi dang rin chen ma// rnam par snang mdzad rigs kyi 'od// de bzhin gshegs rigs gtsug tor ma// rnam par bsgyings
245a6: ma'i phreng ba dang / / rdo rje gser 'od lta bu'i spyan// rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang // pad ma'i spyan dpal sangs rgyas spyan// de bzhin rdo rje zla ba'i 'od// de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin ma dang // rdo rje phreng ba sgyu 'phrul che'i// lha mo dang ni gser 'od
245a7: can/ / spyan mdzes ma dang dkar mo dang // pad ma yi ni spyan can dang // rnam dul zhi ba'i sems dang ni// zla 'od bdag gi yon tan shes// phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag dang // ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bdag 'khor
245a8: dang btsas pa dang sems can thams cad la srung ba mdzad du gsol/ / oM re Shi ga na pra sasta sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta ba tre hUM drASh+kaM/ sa/ ni hUMrASh+To/ stam+b+ha ni hUM dr-iSh+To/ mo ha na ka rI hUM d+hiSh+To/ pa ri birA sam b+hak+Sha Na kaR+Sha d+hArmA
245b1: u smya na na smra kun su na na
245b2: bidwi ti nA~M nak+Sha d+haSh+Tham+ba sA dan ka rA t+na d+h+wa hrISh+T+r-i/ aSh+Ta nA ma hA hA d+hadz+nyA mI d+hA sa na ka rI hA dz+dza Sh+To/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM serba satwAM sh+tsa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can
245b3: rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen ma phyag stod mnga' ba chen mo/ / dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo// spyan byi ba brgya phrag steng mnga' ba chen mo// mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can// rdo rje lto ba yangs pa chen po can/ sa gsum
245b4: gyi dkyil 'khor la ma 'amadzad ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ / oM swa sti b+ha ban+tu ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwa shru swA hA/ rgyal po sa 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa dang / me yis 'jigs pa dang / chu yis 'jigs pa dang /
245b5: dug gis 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang / dgra yis 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi 'khrul 'khor gyis 'jigs pa dang / mu ge yis 'jigs pa dang / dgra bo yis 'jigs pa dang / thog gis 'jigs pa
245b6: dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba yis 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung bas 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan gtum pos 'jigs pa dang / klu yis 'jigs
245b7: pa dang / klog gis 'jigs pa dang / bye mtsha mo 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gis 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad kyis 'jigs pa dang / gdon gyis 'jig
245b8: pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen
246a1: po'i gdon dang / mi'i gdon dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dgagul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem
246a2: byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / brjod byed kyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / lus chags ma'i gdon dang / nam gru'i gdon dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon dag
246a3: re lde 'don pa'i gdon dang / bya'i gdon dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon dang / kun tu 'breng bar byed pa'i gdon dang / 'phyang ba'i gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / lus mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / ka Ta ka Ta'i
246a4: tshogs can gyi gdon dang / gdon thams cad dang / mdangs 'phrog pa dang / mngal za ba dang / khrag 'thung ba dang / zhag za ba dang / sha za ba dang / tshil za ba dang / rkang za ba dang / btsas pa za ba dang / srog 'phrog pa dang /
246a5: gtor ma za ba dang / phreng ba za ba dang / dri za ba dang / me tog za ba dang / bdug pa za ba dang / 'bras bu za ba dang / lo tog za ba dang / bsreg bya za ba dang / rnag 'thung ba dang / bshang ba za ba dang / gcin 'thung ba dang /
246a6: 'chil ma za ba dang / snabs za ba dang / dar snabs za ba dang / skyugs pa za ba dang / nom bu za ba dang / mi gtsang ba za ba dang / stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / nor 'phrog pa dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang /
246a7: de dag thams cad dang / gdon thams cadad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags thams cad ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// kun du rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po// mkha' 'gro dang mahA
246a8: 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags thams cad ral gris gcad do/ / rdo rje phur bus gdab po// tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// brgya byin gyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje/
246b1: phur bus gdab po// sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po// phyugs bdag chen po dang drag pos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po// nag po chen pos
246b2: byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ / rdo rje phur bus gdab po// ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po// me'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje nga
246b3: bus gdab po/ / ri khrod pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po// g.yung pos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// skar mda' gdong gis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris
246b4: gcad do/ / rdo rje phur bus gdab po// rdo rje gzhon nu mas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po// gshin rje gshed kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po// gshin rje'i pho nyas
246b5: byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ / rdo rje phur bus gdab po// klu ma rungs pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po// me'i las kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po
246b6: log 'dren gyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ / rdo rje phur bus gdab po// gzhon nus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po// rgyal po chen po bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do//
246b7: rdo rje phur bus gdab po// sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po// nam mkha'i lding yang dag pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po// rgyal bar byed pa dang sbrang
246b8: rtsi'i byed pa dang grub par byed pa dang / don kun grub pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po// b+hing gi ri Ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang smin drug gi bu dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan
247a1: cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ / rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris
247a2: gcad do/ / rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po// 'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ rdo rje phur bus gdab bo//
247a3: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// gang dang gang du byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab po// gang gis byed du bcug pa des byas pa'i
247a4: rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ / rdo rje phur bus gdab po// dge sbyong mgo reg gis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// pho nya dang pho nya mo dang bran pho dang bran mos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris
247a5: gcad do/ / rdo rje phur bus gdab po// drang srong gi mchog thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur pus gdab po// lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus
247a6: gdab bo/ / mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do// rdo rje phur bus gdab bo// oM bcom ldan 'das ma bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / go pa
247a7: rang/ nang 'go ba dang 'khrug pa thams cad dang / sdang ba dang rab tu sdang ba thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba 'am/ mi mdza' ba 'am mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad las bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
247a8: cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung bI gdugs dkar po can sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa me dang nyi ma ltar 'od gsal zhing dkar ba rgyas pa mnga' ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / oM dz+wa la dz+wa la d+ha ka/
247b1: d+haka/ 'da'ang / dang dang/ bi da bi dang / ts+tshi/ b+hin b+hiH/ hUMd+hU ga phaT swAH/ sarbaduSh+TAn d+hud+d+ha/ sarba d+ha taSh+Tha phaT/ sarba da nga hataSh+Ta phaT/ sarba du rA Shi ta Sh+Tha phaT/ sarba dun la b+ha phaT/ sarba m+b+ha paT sarbada?
247b2: keb+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dud+had+hIHb+h+ya phaT/ sarba a bad+ma d+heb+h+ya phaT/ sarba s+yai te b+h+ya phaT/ sarba pra pr-i k+She ti b+h+ya phaT/ sarbadz+ra b+h+ya phaT/ sar+b+ba pa s+pha b+h+ya phaT/ sarbo sta ge b+h+ya phaT/ sarbanA kin+da b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ba ti ts+tsha phaT/ sarban/
247b3: DAsi ni r+dz+dza 5/ sarba mI ma~M N+Da paH/ sarbas ku ni kaM b+h+ya phaT/ sarba sI dzan n+tike ts+tsha phaT/ sarba gare b+hu phaT/ sarba bi se b+hA phaT/ sarba la g+he b+h+ya phaT/ sarba a lam+la ke b+h+ya phaT/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+ya phaT/ sarbo bar ba n+d+ha phaT/ sarba
247b4: sarbo pa sarbo pA yA se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba utrA sa b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pA ta keb+h+ya phaT/ sarba b+ha d+hi Sh+Tha phaT/ sarba shra ma Ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gra he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tIr+thi ka b+h+ya phaT/ sarba pa t+ya r+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pA ta keb+h+ya phaT/ sarbo d+hi Sh+Tha phaT/
247b5: sarba ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba byi drA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra ma d+hu ka ra sid d+hi ka ra sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+hA tsar+Ya b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bi d+ha rA dza b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sAd+ha ke b+h+yo bi d+hA tsang+ge b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa tud+d+hoHb+ha gi nI b+h+yaHphaT/ badz+ra k+Sho mA rI ye bid+yA
247b6: rI dz+nyA ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba big+h+na bi nA ya ka nI phaT/ bar dA ya phaT/ bar bi dA ba na ka rA ya phaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma to re ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma nuSh+Ta ma nu Sh+Ta b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ru te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bi Sha tse
247b7: b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum+b+ha N+De b+h+yaHphaT/ badz+ri sId ka lA ya ma d+ha pra t+yang+girA b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa sarge b+h+yaHphaT/ ma hA pra t+yang+gi re b+h+yaHphaT/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da phaT/ hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ he he phaT/ ho ho phaT/ a mo g+ha ya phaT/ a pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ pa ra pra dA ya
247b8: phaT/ a sur bi drA ba Na ka rA phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ya k+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan+d+harba b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kinAr b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+huHte b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum+b+har+Ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba
248a1: pA ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta pU ta neb+h+yaHphaT/ sarba skan+d+he b+h+ya phaT/ badz+ra sA ka lA ya ma hA pra t+yang gir rA dzA ya phaT/ kA lA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA ya phaT/ mA tri ga NA ya phaT/ beShA bI ye phaT/ ma hA mA tri ga Na nA ma s+thi tA ye
248a2: phaT/ ma he shwa pi yai phaT/ prah+mA Ni ye phaT/ AMg+ne ya~M phaT/ ma hA ka l-I ye phaT/ kA la dan Di ye phaT/ a ni dI ye phaT/ ro d+hI ye Ta/ tsa mu Na DI ye phaT/ pa rA hI ye phaT/ ma hA pA rA hI ye phaT/ rAt+ti ye phaT/ kA la rA tI ye phaT/ ya mdaN
248a3: TI ye phaT/ kA pA lI ye phaT/ ma hA kA pA lI ye phaT/ kau mA rI ye phaT/ ya mI ye phaT/ pA ye pe phaT/ k+Sha pe rI ye phaT/ nI ri tI ye phaT/ ba ru Ni ye phaT/ mA rA tI ye phaDa/ ma hA mA ru tI ye phaT/ sA me ye phaT/ I sA nI ye phaT/ yoH/
248a4: sI ye phaT/ a tharba NI ye phaT/ sa pA rI ye phaT/ krI snas rI ye phaT/ ya ma rA tI ye phaT/ ni si ti pA tsa re b+h+yaHphaT/ tri san pA re b+h+yaHphaT/ d+ha ra NI ye phaT/ a ti muk+ti ka smad ma hA sma sA na nI pa si nI ye phaT/ e te b+h+ya/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+ya/ sarba do le b+h+ya phaT/
248a5: oM Sh+T+r-i b+han+ta b+han+d+ha sarba duSh+Ta na rak+Sha rak+Sha maM sarba satwAM sh+tsa swA hA// gang su dag bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad la sdang ba dang sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul dang drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams
248a6: dang sdig pa dang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'khrug pa 'khrug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / mi mdza' ba mi mdza' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de rnams las bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams
248a7: cad la 'du da so/ / yo rgya yor gyur cig/ rnon tu marmong shog shi da yo da mam pa dag sa rnams pa dang gnad go/ sbyin gang su dag gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / mdangs 'phrog pa rnams dang / mngal za ba rnams dang / khrag 'thung ba rnams dang /
248a8: zhag za ba rnams dang / sha za ba rnams dang / tshel za ba rnams dang / rkang za ba rnams dang / bcas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / gtor ma za ba rnams dang / phreng ba za ba rnams dang / dri za ba rnams dang / me
248b1: tog za ba rnams dang / bdug pa zab rnams dang / 'bras du za ba rnams dang / lo tog za ba rnams dang / bsreg bya za ba rnams dang // nor 'phrog pa rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / rnag za ba rnams dang / bshang
248b2: bza ba rnams dang / gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / 'chil ma 'thung ba rnams dang / sngabs zab rnams dang / nga sngabs za ba rnams dang / skyugs pa za ba rnams dang / nor bu za ba rnams dang / mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang /
248b3: stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang /
248b4: gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon
248b5: rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams
248b6: dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang / smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / brjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams
248b7: dang mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / kun du bre sa'i gdon rnams dang / tshir ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / bum pa lta
248b8: bu'i gdon rnams dang / 'phyang ba'i gdon rnams dang / lus mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / ka Tang ka Ta'i tshogs can gyi gdon rnams dang / gan mas dpa 'dug so// dag dang ma ba dag sems can mas cad la dirmis nyin gcig pa rnams dang /
249a1: nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / zla ba phyed pa rnams dang / zla ba gcig pa rnams dang / nyin mo pa rnams dang / nyi na phyed pa rnams /
249a2: yud tsam pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang / rims mis dang rnams dang // 'byung po'i rims rnams dang / yi dgas kyi rims rnams dang / sha za'i rims rnams dang / mi'i rims rnams dang / mi ma
249a3: yin pa'i rims rnams dang / rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims
249a4: thams cad dang klad pa na ba bdag dang sems can thams cad la gsal tu gsol/ / bda' bo da 'ad sems na thams cad kyis gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang mig nad dang sna nad dang / kha nad dang mgul nad
249a5: dang snying nad dang / rkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rnan pa dang so na ba dang brang na ba dang / snying na ba dang gnang na ba dang rtsibs logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang ljon pa dang rked pa na ba dang / mdoms na ba dang / gzhang na ba dang /
249a6: skye gnas na ba dang rab tu skye gnas na ba dang / brlan pa dang byin pa na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang nying lag na ba gsal du gsol/ bag yod da la mam pa da sems can thams cad la 'byung po dang
249a7: yi dgas dang ro langs dang mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang shu ba dang mi ga ser dang / g.ya' ba dang 'brum pa phra mo dang mdze dang phol mig dang bas ba ljags dang / mchin nad dang mtshan par rdol ba dang g.yan pa dang
249a8: gzhang 'brum dang me dpal dang / lhog pa dang skem pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang skrag pa dang lud pa dang / brgyal ba dang dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang dug dang / byad dang me dang dmu chu dang mi ngas dang 'thab mo dang /
249b1: mngon dang gnod pa dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang bu t+yaM bu ka dang tAM lA Ta ka dang sdig pa dang / sbrul dang sre mo dang seng ge dang / stag dang dom dang dred dang / ga da dang / chu srin dang spyang ki dang / chom po dang de dag la sogs pa
249b2: srog 'phrog par byed pa gzhan thams cad kyang bsal du gsol/ / gdugs dkar mo can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo'i rig sngags kyi mthus dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad dam dpag tshad lnga brgya'i nang tshun chad du
249b3: rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/ / gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o// rig sngags thams cad bcing bar bgyi'o// gzhan gyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o// mtshams gcad par bgyi'o// sa bcing bar bgyi'o// phyogs bcu bcing bar bgyi'o//
249b4: nam mkha' bcing bar bgyi'o// gzhan gyi snga rab tu rengs par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na la/ a tsa le a tsa le/ kha kha me kha kha me/ bi Sha de bi Sha de/ bI re bI re/ bI ra bI re/ sngo me swo me/ shAn+te shAn te/ dAn te d+han+te/ badz+ra d+ha ra ba na
249b5: d+ha ban d+ha ni badz+ra pA ni phaT/ oM hUM Sh+To phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra pA ni ban d+ha ban d+ha badz+ra pA se na sarba duSh+Ta bag+ni bi nA ya kA na hUM hUM phaT phaT// hUM druM ban d+ha phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba satwAM sh+tsa swA hA// gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug
249b6: tor nas byung ba'i dugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di gro ga 'am ras sam shin shun la bris te/ lus sam mgul du thogs pa byas nas bcang bar bya klag par bya ste/
249b7: de dag la rnga srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ rims kyis mi tshugs nad kyis mi tshugs/ tshad pas mi tshugs/ me dang chus mi tshugs/ bsgyur ba'i las thams cad kyis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi
249b8: tshugs/ rug sbyar mas mi tshugs byed kyis mi tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa bye ba stong phrag
250a1: brgyad bcu rtsa bzhir skye ba dang skye bar tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi'i rig sngags kyi lhas kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mnyam par bzhag nas de la rtag par
250a2: bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sbed par byed do/ / rdo rje po nya po dag gzhug brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis kyang rtag par yongs su spyod par byed de de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro// nam du yang gnod sbyin nyid dang srin po nyid dang 'byung ngo /
250a3: nyid dang yi dgas nyid dang sha za nyid dang / srul po nyid dang lus srul po nyid dang / mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan
250a4: par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di 'chang na/ tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyong
250a5: par 'gyur ro/ / thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ro// mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur ro// bsnyen gnas byas pa can ma yin pa yang bsnyen gnas byas pa can du 'gyur ro// gang dag mtshams med pa lnga byas pa de yA
250a6: sdig pa ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/ / sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro// bud med gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi
250a7: thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di 'chang na bu 'dod pa des kyang bu rnyed de/ tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs kyang rab tu ldan no// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ste/
250a8: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug dang rgyal dang rgyags pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// galal zhig gis mi nad dang / ba lang gi nad dang thu da yams kyi nad dang gnod pa dang 'gro ba'i nad dang 'khrug pa thams
250b1: cad dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba la bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi pham pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub
250b2: 'i gang khyel len mede rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro cher mchod pa chen po byas nas/ / grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo 'am gtsug lag khang ngam// grong ngam grong khyer ram/ ljongs sam grong rdal lam/ dur khrod dam/
250b3: ri'am/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzug so// gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rim gro cher byas te/ btsugs pa tsam gyis g.yul zhi bar byas par 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad dang gnod pa dang 'gro ba'i
250b4: nad dang 'khrug pa thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po nye dga'
250b5: bo dang de dag dang gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang dus rus su char 'bebs so/ / dus dus su glog 'byin to// du su su 'brug sgrogs so// nad dang gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// oM hUM Sh+To ban d+ha ban d+ha sarba
250b6: duSh+TA na rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba sa/ tAMshwa swA hA// oM hU~M Sh+To banA d+ha banA d+ha sarba dushwA na rak+Sha rak+Sha ma mas pa ri bA ra s+ya sa tI shu badz+ra bA ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a na ba lo ki ti mur+d+ha nat+ti dze ra shi/ oM dza la dza la// Shad
250b7: khA da/ D+ha kad+ha ka/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi dar bi da ra/ ts+tshind ts+tshin da/ b+hin d+ha bin d+ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwAM sh+tsa sA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+Thi Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM phaT sAt+ma/ hUM rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarbas
250b8: tAM shu hUM phaT swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ a tsa le a tsa le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bI re bI re/ bI re bI re/ swo me swo ma/ sarba bud d+ha/ a d+hiSh+Thi na a d+hiSh+Thi te sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ba tre sarba dush+tsa tsi ta tAn hUM swA hA// sangs rgyas
251a1: kyi rnal 'byor gyis shig pa thams cad la lan gsum bzlas par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang nam
251a2: mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar
251a3: po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo/ rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+Te Sha si tA ta pa tre a pa ra dzi ta ma hA pra t+ye gi ra pa ra ma si d+hi na ma d+ha ra ni/
251a4: bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
251a5: 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyis mi thub pa gtsug tor rgyal mo la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
251a6: sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas chos bzangs lha'i mdun sa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom/
251a7: ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas gtsug tor rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi dbus nas gsang sngag
251a8: kyi tshig 'di dag byung ngo / / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
251b1: dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
251b2: lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i drang song pon
251b3: pa 'dor ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i drang srong phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po la phyag
251b4: 'tshal lo/ / legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog pa'i bdag po dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan srod med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum rtsegs
251b5: 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na gnas pa mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das pad mo'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// btso
251b6: ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das klu'i
251b7: gsul phyag 'tshal lo/ / com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal pol phyag 'tshal lo// ma ldan das de 'inag shegs padagra rtsom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od par du med pa la byag 'tshal lo// com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
251b8: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi lha bA dwe r+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tsha'o//
252a1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa la'i dbang po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
252a2: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
252a3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
252a4: rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ud pa la'i dri'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la
252a5: phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa/ gzhan
252a6: byi rig zugs thams cad gcod par byed pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zlog pa/ sems can gamed pa da chis pa thams cad las grol bar byed pa snang ba dang rmil ma dan pa thams cad zlog pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gdon thams cad
252a7: 'jig par byed pa/ gdon stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi 'jigs par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa/ bza' chen po brgyad 'jig par byed pa/ dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/ ma rungs pa dang sdang ba dang /
252a8: rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa dug dang / mtshon thams cad dang / mi dang chu las zlog par byed pa/ na 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las sgrol ba ste/ gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che// gtum pa chen mo stobs chen mo//
252b1: 'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che// dkar chen 'bar phreng gos dkar mo// 'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can// rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags// pad ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshan// gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can// rdo rje'i mchu
252b2: can rnam sgeg mo/ / zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa// zhi ba gsar gyi phreng ba can// dkar chen 'bar bgos dkar mo// 'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo// rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang // rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin ma// lag na rdo rje
252b3: rigs gser phreng/ / leb rgan rtsi dang rin chen ma// rnam snang rdo rje gtsug tor grags// phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang sems can thams cad bsrung du
252b4: gsol/ / oM sarba ta thA ga to/ Shi Sha si tA ta ba tre hUM hUM hrI ts+li/ dzam b+han ka rI hUM dwai d+hIH/ stam b+ha na ka rI hUM dI hrIH/ mo ha na ka rI hAM dI hrIHwau/ ar+d+han ShISh+mA hrI sl-i A n+dan/ ts+tshe d+de kr-Id+ha na r+g+hA Sh+T+rIH/ pa ra bi Sha b+hak+Sha Na ka nI hUMd+hA hrI sh+lo/ sarba
252b5: duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta naM stam b+ha na ka re hUM druM hrIHSho/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa gra tA nAM bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M dI hrIHSh+To/ sarba par bi d+h+wa ts+tshe da na ka rI hUM druM hrIHSh+Ti/ tsa tur shi tI nAM gra ha sA nAM/ bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hUM dI hriHSh+T+r-i/ aSh+Ta be sha tI nAM na k+Sha tA NAM pra sA dan ka rits+tsha
252b6: druM hrIHSh+T+r-i/ oM Sh+To NaM ma hA gra tA NAM bi d+hi sa na ka rI hUM druM hrIHSha~M/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba sa twaMsh+tsa/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog ma chen mo// phyag stong
252b7: mnga' ba chen mo/ / dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo// spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba chen mo 'i byed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can// rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag dang sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig/
252b8: rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang // gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma// rdo rje 'gros dang dkar mo dang // pad ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang // sangs rgyas dpal dang de bzhin spyan// rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od dang ni// de bzhin zla ba rdo rje 'dzin// rig pa
253a1: dang phyag rgyad da da gsang sngags kyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kun nas bsrung bar mdzad drugasal/ / mai raM'i gan pa shas+tha sarba ta thA ga tok+Sh+Na id+ha tA badz+re hUM dz+raM/ dzamathun
253a2: kan+ti nA~M d+h+waM/ zhwa ga sh+ma/ ar+dz+dza ka// ka ra~M hUM d+h+waM/ ba ra bi d+ha sam b+ha k+Sha na ka rI ts+tshe dz+dza/ sarba prar+thanA~M saMm b+ha na ka rI hr-i dwai/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa gra hA NAM bi d+ha sa na kA dI hU~M drA/ tsa t+ya dA shi tI nI ga ha sa haswa dz+nyA bi d+hi sa na ka rI hUM d+h+waM/ ahA bi/
253a3: tIrIn NA~M pra kA trA sA da na ka R+Sha hUM tra~M/ maN+Da NA~M ma hA gra ha NAM bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hU~M trA~M/ trA hUM ga da/ na yas ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tar nas byung du gangaso tsunan na sa// ngas la // dgra stong mnga'
253a4: chen po spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag dang sems can thams cad rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / rkun po'i 'jigs pa
253a5: dang me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / dug gis 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang / mu ges 'jigs pa dang / dgra yis 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pas
253a6: 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung bas 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po chad pas jigs pa dang / lha'i 'jigs pa dang / klu'i sa 'jigs pa dang / klog gis 'jigs pa dang /
253a7: nadayab shA gis gis pa da na na 'gis padag gdon / bu'i gdod da/ rgya ma yin gyi dod da/ du 'i dod sa pa dzi / dod ga gdod pa la ga nag/ phyi po dong / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang 'byung
253a8: po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ba'i
253b1: gdon dang / nam gru'i gdon dang / gshin rje'i gdon dang / bya'i gdon dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon dang / kun tu 'breng ba'i gdon dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon las bdag ba de legs su gyur cig/ zas su mdangs za ba dang //
253b2: zas su mngal za ba dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su zhag za ba dang / zas su sha za ba dang / zas su tshil za ba dang / zas su rkang za ba dang / zas su btsas pa za ba dang / srog 'phrog pa dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba dang / zas
253b3: sa phyis za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba dang / zas su gtor khung nas sang nga da pa gamapa dang / chu che ma gyu sa// zas su snrubs za ba dang / zas su dang skabs za ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su gtor ma
253b4: rab dang / zas su phreng ba za ba dang / sa dri za ba dang / mdu ma ga pa sa ma pa ma sa 'das 'a tho ga na lag gan dag thams cad kyi rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// kra nang
253b5: rgas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ / bra gos yod / mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// dbang phyug chen pos byas/
253b6: pa'i rig sngags gcad do// pur bus gdab pa// sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad da // bar bus gdab 'o// nam mkha' lding yang dag pa dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rag sngags gcad do// bar bus gdab po/ nas
253b7: po chen pos byas pa'i rag sngags gcad / / pur bas gdab bo// ma ma chags rnams kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// bur bus gdab pa// mang thad pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad da// blar bus gdab go/
253b8: bar byed pa dang sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / don kun grub pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// pur bras gdab po// sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// bur bus gdab bo// b+hi gi re ti dang dga' bye dadabang phyug dang chos
254a1: kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ / phur bus gdab po// dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// pur bus gdab po// dge sbyong mgo reg gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do//
254a2: pur bus gdab po// dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// 'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pas byas pa'i
254a3: rig sngags gcad do/ / phur bus gdab po// lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// pho nya dang pho nya mo dang / bran pho dang bran mos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po//
254a4: drang srong gi tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// mi 'phrod pa za ba'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags
254a5: gcad do/ / phur bus gdab po// bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la bsrung
254a6: dugasol/ bsrung dragasol// mo a si tA an wa/ kapra r+d+ha su ti ti bi ki si tAta pa tra/ ma dra la nga la/ wang+ka 'ang/ han tan/ dar dang/ bi dang bi dang / tsAN+rats+tsha/ binra bi/ ban d+ha banad+ha/ d+hAd+hA baT paT s+yAH/ snang po'o/
254a7: paT No ho phaT/ a mo g+hA ya phaT/ a pra ti taN+Da ya phaT/ ba ra dA ya phaT/ ba ra pra drA ya phaT/ prat+ko sI la/ sa su rab dA ba wA pra la// pa ra bi dA ba na kaR+Sha ya phaT/ sarba de be sh+tsaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nAk+Shas
254a8: b+h+ya Ta/ sarba b+he te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pra te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pi shAtse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kram b+hU d+he b+h+yaHpa nas rba du ten bya baT/ sa rbaka Tane b+h+ya baT/ sa ba kan te bya ba nas ma thun me Sh+yar gas rba ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a pa s+phAr b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sta ra ka N+yA
254b1: phaT/ sarba DA ki ni b+h+ya phaT/ sarbe re ba tI b+huHphaT/ sarba yA ma ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sha ku ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mA tran nI ke b+h+yaHphaT/ marba ka ma bu ki ma ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a la ma bi ki b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka ta da ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kaN+De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan
254b2: dri b+h+yas/ ma du ya/ sarba N+DI skye ma/ zan du skye ya// wa la ho b+h+ya pa// Na ru kide b+h+yaHba/ du bre 'i b+hu ya/ b+h+ya/ baT/ byA'i b+h+ya ba/ sa pa dra bye b+h+ya phan/ bas b+h+ya ba kras ga / 'o m+b+ha yan/ de med g+hu ya/ mA~M pra shakaNar rba/ ts+tsha di b+h+ya la/ du b+hu yaT/ sarba tI TI gi b+h+yaH phaT/ sarba
254b3: shra ma Na b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tIr+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pA ta ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bad+yA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra/ ma d+hu ka ra sid d+hi ka ra sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ke b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa tur b+h+yo ba gi nI b+h+yaHphaT/ badz+ra ku ma rI ye badz+ra ku lan d+ha ri b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma hA pra t+yaM ge
254b4: re b+h+yaHphaT/ badz+ra shaM ka lA ya praH gi ra rA dzA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA ya mA tri NA na ma s+thi tA ye phaT/ brad+d+hA NI ye phaT/ biSh+Nu bI ye phaT/ ma te shwa rI ye phaT/ ru dI ye phaT/ ma hA kA lI ye phaT/ tsa mun DI ye phaT/ ku mA rI ye phaT/ bA rA tI/
254b5: ye phaT/ in drA ye phaT/ a ga ne ye phaT/ yA mA ye phaT/ nI ri te ye phaT/ ba ru NA ye phaT/ mA ru tI ye phaT/ sau mA ye phaT/ i shA nI ye phaT/ kA le data DI ye phaT/ kA lA rA tI ya phaT/ yAM ma daN DI ye phaT/ yA ma rA tI ya/
254b6: phaT/ kA pA lI ye phaT/ a ti mug ti s+pha shAn ba ba saM nI ye phaT/ oM Sh+To ban d+ha ban d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sA // sems can gang su dag bdag la gdug pa dang gag pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / dreg shul dang drag shul gyi
254b7: sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdig pa dang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'khrug pa dang 'khrug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba dang sdang 'i sems dang ldan pa rnams byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas bdag dang sems can thams cad bsrung du gsol/ lo ba rgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong ba gyur cig/ gno sbyin dgadon gang su dag zas su mdas
254b8: za napa dang / 'i 'breg pa rnam sa dang / ma lu mang zang rnapa pa dang / mas du ga cus rnams dang rba sun za rnams dang ma lu sha rba rnas dang / zas su tsi ma zab rnams dag su nas pa rnam sa dang / mas tsa la zab rnalas dag thog phrag pa rnams dang / zag su stug mazab rnams dang // bras su tor ma za ba rnams dang /
255a1: zas su phreng bza ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang / zas sum tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zasu lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sram
255a2: za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag za ba rnams dang / zas su phyis za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su skyugs pa zab rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang /
255a3: zas su dang snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su gtong khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag
255a4: shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi
255a5: gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / kum b+haN Da'i gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon
255a6: rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang / smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / brjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam gru'i gdon rnams
255a7: dang gshin rje'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / kun tu 'breng ba'i gdon rnams dang / de rje do pa'i don ma da bdon mi gan/ mas da / bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/ lo bacha
255a8: 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar gyur cig/ rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang /
255b1: rims mi zad pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims nad thams cad//
255b2: dang / klad pan ba bsal du gsol// gzhogs byed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang sA nad dang kha na dab mgul nad dang snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha 'o na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang so na ba dang / skyeng na ba dang gan na
255b3: ba dang rtsibs logs na ba dang / rgyaban pa dang ljon pa dang / rked pan pa dang chu so na ba dang / brlan pa dang rje dang na pa dang / lag pan ba dang rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang nying lag na ba gsal du gsol/ gdugs dkar/
255b4: mo can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang mkha' 'gro ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang rims nad dang / shu ba dang g.yan pa dang 'brum bu pra mo/
255b5: dang mtshan par rdol ba dang / mdze dang po la mig dang / bas bldags dang me dpal dang g.yan pa dang / pa dang sems pa dang glag pa dang / lu ba ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / mi dran pa dang dbyig dug dang spyasgyu ma da pya dang med da chud ming dang / bdud dang 'ching ba
255b6: dang / dgra dang gnod pa dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / spang bud+d+he bu ka dang / trai la tra ka dang sdig pa dang sbrul dang / sri mau rnyed stag dang dom dang dred dang / g.yag rgod dang chu srin la sogs pa'i srog chags rnams gsal du gsol
255b7: de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags bcing bar bya'o/ / gzi brjid bcing bar bya'o// gzhan tham sbyin kyi sa khyo/ ma co// d+ya thA/ oM an le a na le/ kha si ma kha sa me// b+hai bI ra/ sam+me so m+me/ shAn+te shAn+te/ n+sa na
255b8: Shi bi Sha da/ bI re bI re/ de bI badz+ra d+hA ri ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni badz+ra pA Ni phaT/ oM hUM hUM hrIHSh+T+r-i phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra pA Ni ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badz+ra pA sha na ma ma sarba duSh+TAM bi g+ha bi nA ya kAM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// nye ba'i snying po'o// sus de bzhin gshegs pa
256a1: thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di grog 'am/ ras sam shin shun la bris te/ lus sam mgul du thogs sam/ klog par byed na /
256a2: la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du drug gis mi tshugs// mtshon mi tshugs ched chung 'i tshugs byin ga gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// gdon tha~Md dang bgegs dang /
256a3: log 'dren thaMd kyang dga' bar 'gyuraro// rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi rnams dang / grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyis kyang de la rtag tu 'thun par bsrung ba dang skyob pa dang sbed par byed do// de rnams kyi yid du 'ong
256a4: ba dang dga' bar yang 'gyu ro/ / skal pa chen po stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhir skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// rdo rje'i rigs pho nya mo drug bcu rtsa bzhi yang rtag par phyi bzhin yongasu skyong bar 'gyuraro// nam du yang yi dgas dang / sha za dang srul po dang /
256a5: lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyuraro// mi dbul por mi 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nas kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas bcoM ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems
256a6: dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sbed par mdzad cing / de dag gi thug su byon pa dang dgyes par yang 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba
256a7: phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang na tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ / thub par ma byas pa yang thub par 'gyuraro// mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyuraro// bsrung ba ma byas pa yang bsrung ba byas
256a8: par 'gyu ro/ / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang byang bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par byang bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bu 'dod pa gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs
256b1: dkar mo can phyir zlog pa chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang ngam klog na bu 'dod pa nges bu rnyed de tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs kyang rab tu rnyed do/ / 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro//
256b2: mind dang thugs nad dang / yis kyi nad dang 'tshe ba dang gnod pa dang nad 'go ba dang / jug sems dang mdo kyi ma chogs de thams dpas de zhin shenas pa'i mu gtong nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di
256b3: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro cher byas te mchod pa chen po byas pa la grong khyer tha~Md kyi sgo 'am/ grong ngam grong khyer raM/ grong rdal laM ljod sa dgon pa'i gan su gzug so// 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog ma chen mo gas sngags kyi rgyal mo 'dir mi
256b4: che te us su shis su'o/ / sa kyin dang 'tshe ba dang gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang pha rol gyi dmag tsog thad ra tu zhi bar khru'o// trag+h+ra/ swo d+ha bar+d+ha ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha sAhA/ au tsI ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badz+ra ma ma dak+Sha raHbadz+ra pA Thi bru~M phaT sAH/ oM sarbatwa thAg toSh+Na
256b5: Sha.An sa a ba lo ki ti tsur na ke dzo rash+mi/ oM hu dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha kad+ha ka/ da ra da ra/ bid ra bi dar/ ts+tshits+tshits+tshin+da/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ hU~M d+hu ba rba phaT swAt+ma/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+ThiHhU~M phaT swAt+ma/ tad+ya thA/ oM an le an le// khas me khas me/ bair ber/ sau ma sau ma~M/
256b6: sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi ti sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta ba tre hU~M phaT/ huM ma ma hUM ni swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po rnams dus dus su char 'beb so// dus dus su sprin bsdud pa dang /
256b7: dus dus su 'brug sgra spogs par 'gyuraro// nye bar 'che ba thaMd la sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor dbyas nas lan gsum bzlas par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa 'dzi/
256b8: rkyen dngas te/ bco ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// gas pa de zhi ga shegs pa'i ga to nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyi mi mub chen mo byar zlog pa ma yos grub pa zhes bya ba'i ga dung sa rdzogs so//
257a1: brti bar nye badra dang / lo the bzung ga brjod gyis kha che'i bdud ci 'byung gnas kyi gtsug lag 'ang ga depa rnying la gdugs nas gtanal phab pa'o// rgyag daskad du/ An ta thA ga taT+TaHsa tAH pa tra a pa dra//
257a2: nAm d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
257a3: dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la
257a4: phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten na yang
257a5: dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba dang phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
257a6: tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
257a7: legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum rtseg 'jigs par byed pa dung khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// pad mo'i gdung la
257a8: phyag 'tshalo/ / rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
257b1: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshan che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo//
257b2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrug pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi zla bai dUr+ya'i/
257b3: 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
257b4: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
257b5: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tsha
257b6: lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ud pa la gsung gi tig gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin
257b7: gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba phyir zlog pa 'dis 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa/ / gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba las zlog
257b8: gsems can bcings pa thams cad 'grol ba/ sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad zlog pa/ gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jig par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa/ gza' chen po brgyad 'jig par
258a1: byed pa dgra thams cad zlog pa ma rungs pa dang sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ dug dang mtshon dang me dang chu las sgrol ba ste// gzhan gyis mi thub dral shul che// gtum pa chen mo stobs chen
258a2: mo/ / 'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che// dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo// 'bar ba'i phreng ba gos dkar mo// 'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can// rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags// pad ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshan// gzhan gyis mi
258a3: thub phreng ba can/ / rdo rje mkhar rnams 'joms pa mo// zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa// gzugs zhi gzi brjid chen mo can// 'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo// rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang // rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin ma// lag
258a4: nardo rje rigs gser phreng / / leb rgan rtsi dang rin chen ma// snang mdzad rdo rje gtsug tor grags// rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang // gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba// rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang // pad ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang // phyag rgya'i
