258a5: tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag la bsrung du gsol/ / bsrung bar mdzad du gsol// oM ri Shi gaN pra sha stA ya sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM druM/ dzaM b+ha na ka rI hUM dAM/ stam b+ha na ka rI hUM trAM/ ma hA bid+ha sam b+ha k+Sha Na ka rI hUM dr-I/ ba rabing+ga
258a6: sam b+ha k+Sha Na rI hUM dAM/ sarba duSh+TA Ni stam b+ha na ka rI hU~M dr-i/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa gra hA tAM bi d+hA sa na ka rI hI draM/ tsa tu rA shi tI n+tegra ha sa ha sra NAM/ bi d+h+wan sa na ka rI hUM dAM/ aH bi sha tI nA~Mnak+Sha tANAM pra sA ka rI tI d+l-i/ aSh+mA NAM ma ha gra haNAM bi d+h+waM sa naM ka rI hUM
258a7: d+hA ra/ / rak+Sha mAM// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsugator nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo// phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo// dbu skyong mnga' ba chen mo// spyan byi ba phrag stong mnga' ba chen mo
258a8: mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pas kun nas bdag la bsrung du gsol// bsrung du gsol// oM rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / tshom rkun gyis 'jigs pa dang me yi
258b1: 'jigs pa dang chu yis 'jigs pa dang / dug gis 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang / mu ges 'jigs pa dang / dgra yis 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pas 'jigs pa dang
258b2: dus ma yan par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung bas 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chang pas 'jigs pa dang // lha yis 'jigs pa dang / klu yis 'jigs pa dang klog gis 'jigs pa dang /
258b3: nam mkha' lding gis 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro bos 'jigs pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye/
258b4: chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem bed kyi gdon dang /
258b5: rjeden gyi gdon dang / skyo byed kyi don dang / kri sho non gyi gdon dang / non po'i gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / nam gu'i gdon dang / gdon de dag thams cad las bdag ba de legs su gyur ci// mdangs 'phrog pa dang / zas sum ngas za ba dang // zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su zhag za ba dang / zas su sha pra pa dang / bras su tshil ba/
258b6: pa dang / zas su rkang za ba dang / zas su patsas pa za ba dang / srog 'phrag pa dang / zas su skyugs pa tha ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba dang / zas su gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / zas su lhag
258b7: ma za ba dang / zas su mchil ma 'thung ba dang / zas su snabs za ba dang / zas su rar snabs za ba dang / zas su rnag za ba dang / zas su gtor ma za ba dang / zas su phreng ba za ba dang / zas su dri za ba dang / zas su gdug pa za ba dang /
258b8: sems 'phrog pa dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba dang / zas su lo tog za ba dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba las bdag pa de legs su gyur cig/ de dag thams cad dang gdon thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig
259a1: a a do/ su ga go pa gams da/ sa ga gonas gro ma gro byes khri snya ga / ga so// / thugs bdag chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gtsang // brang bus gdab bo// sred med kyi bus byas hA/
259a2: rig sngags gcad do// pur bus gdab bo// nam mkha' lding yang dag pa dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcod do// bur bus gdab bo// nag po chen po dang ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gang
259a3: bo mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ / phur bus gdab po// rgyal bar byed pa dang / sbrad rtsir byed pa dang / don kun sgrub pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags
259a4: gcang do/ / phur bus gdab po// b+h+r-i gi ri ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus
259a5: gdab bo/ / dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// 'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do//
259a6: pur bus gdab po// bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la bsud du gsol// oM a si tAn tA na pra d+ha s+phu Ta ba ki si tA ta pa tre/ dz+wa la dz+wa la khA/
259a7: ShA ra/ da ra dA ra/ bi da bi dar/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ hUM hUM phaT baT swA hA/ he he phaT/ tse ho phaT/ a mo b+he phaT/ a pra ti ta tA phaT/ ba ra pra dA phaT/ ta gi ri tI baT/ a su bi rA pra ka paT/ sarbe be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/
259a8: sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma rA Te b+h+yaHTa/ sarba ga ru de b+h+ya phaTa~M/ sarba gan d+hi n+ta b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kin ner b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma hor ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ya k+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dAk+She se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te ny+tsaHphaT/ sarba bi shAn+do b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hu te b+h+yaH
259b1: 5/ sam N+Di gyu / sar+dz+dza/ m+mA ne mas na byams mamanas m+b+ha paT/ bar+b+ha b+ha m+b+ha // s+yArgyas pa da byas nasaH / samangan yang /
259b2: sarba duN+Te Sh+T+rIHswA phaT/ sarbaHr-i b+haHTa/ sarbakr-i tak+Shamr-i/ kA khor dge bA N+Di tsin+da gr-i/ gdus ca dotid+ya thug te ts+tsha nA~M/ sarbat+kan+ti b+h+yabaT/ sarba~M bras paT/ sarba ba~M trA~M Sh+Tha9 5/ dza ya ka ra ma d+h+r-i kar/
259b3: mthamra d+hi ki r+g+ha bin nA g+ha ga/ tsa tsur b+h+yo T+wAMg ni g+ha phaT/ badz+ra mA me dwai dr-ir d+hi ya r+dz+dza phaT/ ma hA kr-i d+d+ha ge b+h+ya9/ badz+ra zang ba lA ya thaHkaur dzA rdza la phaT/ mai hAk+Sha yA ya ma tri/ nam s+sa
259b4: phaT/ bISh+Ta bI ye phaT/ bA ha nI ye phaT/ a ga ni ye phaT/ ma hA kA lI ye phaT/ kA lA den DI ya phaT/ in dri ye phaT/ ro dr-i ye phaT/ kau ma rI ye phaT/ bA rA hI ye phaT/ tsa mun dri ye phaT/ ra tI la phaT/ kA la rA tI ye phaT/ ya ma dan rje/
259b5: ye phaT/ pA~M pA lI ye phaT/ a gti mug ti swa sAn bA si ni ye phaT// sems can gang su dag bdag la sdung ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnam pa dang / drag tshul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / mangs 'phrog pa rnams dang / sa sum sa/
259b6: zab rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su nag za ba rnams dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams
259b7: dang / zas su spyugs pa za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su gtor khang nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / zasu lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma 'thung ba
259b8: rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su dang snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag za ba rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa
260a1: za ba rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/
260a2: rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag bral gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gdod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / yi dwags kyi gdon nam sa dang / shA zhwa'i gdon rnams dang / #
260a3: gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang / spro byed kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / brjed byed kyi
260a4: gdon nams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / gshin rje'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / kun tu 'bring
260a5: ba'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams dang / rims nyin cig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang /
260a6: rims mi zad pa rnams dang / rims ldang dub pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang khad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang /
260a7: rims nad thams cad dang / klad pa nab gsal du gsol/ gzhogs byed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang mig nad dang / sA nad dang kha nad dang mgul nad dang / snying nad dang lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / na ba nab dang so na ba dang snying
260a8: nab dang klad pa na ba dang / sken pa dang rtsibs logs na pa dang / rgyab na ba dang ljon pa dang / rked pa na ba dang / chu so na ba dang brlan pa dang / rje dang na ba dang lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba gsal
260b1: du gsol/ gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog ma chen mo 'dis dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun tshad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang shu ba dang g.yan pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang mdze dang po la
260b2: mig dang bas ljags dang / me dpal dang g.ya' ba dang / lhog pa dang skem pa dang / skrag pa dang dbyig ngag dang / dug sbyar ma dang byad snyoms dang / me dang chu dang mi ngas dang / dgra dang gnod pa dang / rus ma yin par 'chi ba dang sbrang bu N+Di bu ka
260b3: da tre lA tA dang sdig pa dang sbrul dang / sre mo dang seng ge dang / stag dang dom dang / dred dang chu srin dang bung ba lta bus gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o// gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o// gzhan gyi rig sngag
260b4: bcing bar bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ bi Sha de bi Sha de/ bI ra bI ra/ badz+ra d+ha ri bi d+ha ba d+ha ni/ badz+ra pA ni phaT/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ hUM hU~M ban d+ha phaT ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA// sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdang+ga
260b5: dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma 'di gro ga 'am/ ras sam shing shun la bris te/ lus sam mgul du thogs na/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs// me yis mi tshugs/ chu yis mi tshugs
260b6: dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs/ rus ma yin par 'chi ba'i rus byed par mi 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i
260b7: rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis kyang de la bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa dang / sbed pa byed de de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro// bsal ba chen po brgyad khri ba'i stong du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// nam du yang
260b8: gno da zin dang / yi dgas dang srul po dang / lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro// mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
261a1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gnan gyis mi thub pa phyir zug mchen mo 'di 'chang na tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas hA/
261a2: 'gyur ro// mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur ro// bsnyen gnas ma byas pa yang bsnyen gnas byas par 'gyur ro// bsnyung ba ma byas pa yang bsnyung ba byas par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi
261a3: las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/ / bud med bu 'dod pa gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma chen mo 'di 'chang nas 'dod pa des bu rnyed de/ tshe dang bsed
261a4: nams dang stobs kyang rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// mi nad dang phyugs nad dang / gnag nad dang yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang nad 'gro ba dang gnod pa dang 'khrug pa
261a5: dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro cher byas te/ mchod pa chen po
261a6: byas la/ geng khyer thams cad kyi sgo bam grong ngam/ grar khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so// gzhan gyis mi brub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo 'di rim gro cher byas te/ btsugs ma thag tu g.yul zhi bar 'gyuro//
261a7: sems kyin da dang 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba rnams rab tu zhi par 'gyur ro// taH thA/ oM.oM d+ha shad+ha ma marak+Sha rAk+Sha swA hA/ oM hU~MSh+To ban d+ha ban d+ha badz+ra ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha badz+ra pA Ni hU~M phaT s+tha
261a8: !/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI las na A ba lo ki ti mAr d+ha ni te dzo rA thI/ oM hU~M dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ da ra da ra/ bi dang bi dang / tshen+d+ra tsin+ti/ b+hin d+ha bin d+he/ hU~M hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM sarba ta thAg tiSh+NI Sha hUM phaT sA hA/ taHthA/ aM a na le an ye/
261b1: khas me kha sa me/ bI ra bI ra/ sa mi sa mes na rbad b+has d+hi Sh+ThA na ya d+hiSh+Tha te sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA tA ba tre hU~M phaT/ d+hu ma ma hA ni swA hA/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor du bya'o// klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis kyang dus dus su char 'bebs so// 'phags
261b2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub mi zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho/ / // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga to uSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre nA ma a pa ra dzi tad+hA nI/ bod skad tra/
261b3: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom
261b4: ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas na/ chos bzangs lha'i mdun sa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe com
261b5: ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ gtsug tor rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi dbus nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di
261b6: dag 'byung ngo / / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba zag
261b7: bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lan cig byir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// phyir mi
261b8: 'o ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i drang srong domod pa 'dor ba dang phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tsha lo//
262a1: rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan drag po dka' thub las bzlog pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo// legs
262a2: ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum rtseg 'jig par byed pa rung khrod na gnas blo mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
262a3: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ / pad ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhon nu'i gdung la
262a4: phyag 'tshal lo/ / klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
262a5: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la
262a6: phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi lha bai dur+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
262a7: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
262a8: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu/
262b1: bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
262b2: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ud pa la'i bsung gi tog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas phyung ba gdugs dkar po
262b3: can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa/ gzhan gyis rig sngags gcod pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba las zlog pa/ sems can bcings pa thams cad 'grol ba
262b4: sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa thams cad zlog pa/ gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jigs par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa/ gza' chen po brgyad 'jig par byed ga/ dgra thams cad zlog pa/ ma rungs pa
262b5: dang / sdar ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ dug dang mtshon dang / me dang chu las sgrol ba ste/ gzhan gyi mi thub drag shul che// gtum pa chen mo stobs chen mo// 'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che// dkar me chen mo stobs
262b6: chen mo/ / 'bar ba'i phreng ba gos dkar mo// 'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can// rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags// pad ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rje mtshan// gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can// rdo rje mkhar rnams 'joms pa mo// zhi ba'i
262b7: lha rnams kyis mchod pa/ / gzugs zhi gzi brjid chen mo can// 'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo// rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang // rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin ma// lag na rdo rje rigs gser phreng // le ba rgan rtsi dang rin chen ma// snang
262b8: mdzad rdo rje'i gtsug tor grags/ / rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang // gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba// rdo rje spos dang dkar mo dang // pad ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang // phyag rgya'i tshegs de dag thams cad kyis bdag la srung du
263a1: gsol/ bsrung dru gsol// ma shi gaN pra shAm+b+ha ya/ sarbata thA ga toSh+ThaSha si tata patratra drA/ dzastan kar t+na d+ha/ ba b+han kar drA d+ya/ mahA bin+da sa maH/ na basmai/ par bit+tas ma b+hak+Shan ka re d+h+waM d+hi/ sarba dra Sh+TanI ste b+han kas/
263a2: tr-I d+hi/ sarba ya k+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra ha nA bid d+ha nas na ka ra hUM drA/ tsa tur shI ti n+dan/ gra has ha sa nAn bid+h+wan sa na ka ra d+hu dru/ aSh+Ta be sha tinAn/ nak+Sha ta nA ma pra/ sA da na kar tAM dr-i/ aSh+Ta nA ma ma nyan ma bid d+ha na sa na kar hUM dr-i/ rak+Sha ma ma/ bsrung du ga
263a3: bcom ldan 'das pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can rdo rje'i gtsug tor phyir zlog mchen mo/ / phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo// dbu stong mda' ba chen mo// spyan bye ba brgya brag stong mnga' ba chen mo// mi
263a4: phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can rdo rje yangs pa chen mo/ sa gsum gyi dkyil lokho la mda' mdzad pa chen mo kun nas bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol// oM rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa dang /
263a5: me yis 'jigs pa dang / chus yis 'jigs pa dang / drug gis 'jigs pa dang / mtshan gyis 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang / mu ges 'jigs pa dang / dgra yis 'jigs pa dang / nad kyis 'jigs pa
263a6: dang lce 'bab pas 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung bas 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa dang / lha yis 'jigs pa dang / klu'i 'jigs pa dang / thog
263a7: gis 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gis 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro bos 'jigs pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi'am ci'i
263a8: gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnodod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul
263b1: po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / de dag las kyang bdag bde legs su gyur cig/ gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang / mdangs 'phrog
263b2: pa dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su zhag za ba dang / zas su shaM za ba dang / zas su tshil za ba dang / zas su rkang zab dang / zas su btsas paza ba dang / srog 'phrog pa dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang /
263b3: sa su gcin 'thung ba dang / zas su gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / zas su lhag ma za ba dang / zas su mchil ma za ba dang / zas su snabs za ba dang / zas su ngar sna bas za ba dang / zasu rnag za ba dang / zas su gter ma/
263b4: za ba dang // zas su phreng ba za ba dang / zas su dri za ba dang / zas su bdug pa za ba dang / sems 'phrog pa dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba dang / zas su lo tog za ba dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba las bdag
263b5: bde legs su gyur cig/ de dag thams cad dang gdon thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// kun tu rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i
263b6: rig sngags gcad do/ / phur bus gdab po// phyugs bdag chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// nam mkha' lding yang dag pa dang lhan cig
263b7: pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ / phur bus gdab po// nag po chen po dang ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i ra/ sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// rgyal bar
263b8: byed pa dang sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / don kun 'grub pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab po// b+hing gi ri ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang tshogs kyi bdag po dang /
264a1: lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gtsang ngo // phur bus gdab po// dge sbyong cer bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur pus gdab po// 'dod chags dang /
264a2: bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do// phur bus gdab bo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo
264a3: can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol// oM a si tA na lA tA pra b+ha s+phu Ta/ bi ga si tA ta ba tre/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khA da khA da/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi dAr bi dA ra/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ bin d+ha bin d+ha/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA tA/
264a4: he he phaT/ ho ho phaT/ a mo g+he phaT/ a pra ti ha ta phaT/ bar prad phaT/ a su ra ba dra ba ka phaTi/ sarba daM bi b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ru te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan d+ha ra be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kai na na re bya phaT/
264a5: sarba ma ho re ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pi shA tse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hu te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum b+ha na De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pA tu ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka ta pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba skan d+he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba un
264a6: man d+he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a pa sma re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba o star ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dur lang g+hi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba duSh+pe k+Shi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dz+wa ri b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kri dkar ma kA khor te b+h+yaHphaT/ ki ra Na be tA da byAHphaT/ tsid tsha pre sha ka/
264a7: du shur ti ti b+h+yaH phaT/ dur byug te b+h+yaHbaT/ sarba tir thi ke b+h+ya baT/ sarba shra ma Ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+ha d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra/ ma d+ha ka ra b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ang+ga sA dA ke byo bidI tsa b+h+ya phaT/ tsa tu b+h+yo b+hi gi nI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kau mA ri ye b+h+yaH
264a8: phaT/ bid+ha ra d+hi ye b+h+yaHphaT/ ma hA pra t+yaM gi re b+h+yaHphaT/ badz+ra shr-i ka lA ya/ pra t+yaM gi ra/ rA dzA ya phaT/ ma hA ka la ya ma tri ga Na na ma s+thi ta ye phaT/ bi Na bi ye phaT/ prah+ma ni ye phaT/ ag ni ye phaT/ ma hA ka li yai phaTe/ ka la da Na Di ya phaT/
264b1: in dri ye phaT/ rau dr-i ye phaT/ bA rA hI ye phaT/ tsa mun Di ye phaT/ ra tri ye phaT/ kA la ra tri ye phaT/ a ma ni Ni ye phaT/ kA pA lI ye phaT/ a d+hi mug ti sma shan ba sa na ye phaT/ sems can gang su dag bdag la sdang ba'i sems dang
264b2: ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzi brjid 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mdangs za ba rnams dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams dang / za su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas su
264b3: shaza ba rnams dang / zas su tshol za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba rnams dang / zas bu mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / za su
264b4: gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su snrubs za ba rnams dang / zas su dang snrubs za ba rnams
264b5: dang zas su rnag za ba rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams
264b6: dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su le tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa
264b7: rnams dang / lha'i gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / mi'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po/
264b8: gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang /
265a1: lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang / smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / brjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams
265a2: dang nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / gshin rje'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / kun tu 'breng ba'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams dang / rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang
265a3: nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang rtag pa'i rims rnams dang / rims mi bzad pa rnams dang / rim pa ldang dub pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i rims rnams dang /
265a4: rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims nad thams cad dang / klad pa na ba bsal du gsol// gzhogs byed na pa dang yig
265a5: 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang sA nad dang kha nad dang / mgul nad dang snying nad dang lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / son ba dang snying na ba dang / glad pan ba dang / rtsib logs nab dang rgyab na ba dang / N+ya nas sto me pa dang /
265a6: chu so na ba dang / brlan pa dang / rje dngan pa dang lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na sa dag la du gsol/ bsrung du gsol// gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor nas byung ba phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis
265a7: dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang / rol ngas dang mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang shu ba dang g.ya' ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang mdze dang / phol mig dang bas bldags dang / me dpal dang g.yan pa dang lhog pa dang skem
265a8: pa dang skrag pa dang / dbyig dug dang drag myur ma dang / bya dadang me dang chu dang mi nges dang / dgra dang gnod pa dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang bud+h+ya ma bu ka dang trai la ta dang sdig pa dang / sbrul dang sre mo dang seng ge dang stag dang dom dang
265b1: dang srung gi dang nu srin dang bung ba lnga bum gzhan gyis srog 'phrog pa de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags payid bar bya'o/ / gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o// gzhan gyi rig zugs pacing bar byo'o/ gdon thams cad bcing bar bya'o//
265b2: sa~M man le an le/ TI de/ bair b+her/ kha d+hA bad d+ha ban+ta d+ha ni/ badz+ra d+hA 8/ hU~M paT ya thArmA/ d+hIhrI bak+sha/ bAnad+ha pAr+b+ha ya swAH// ma bzhin ga shegs pa'i gtsug tong nas byu gags
265b3: dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma chen mo 'di gro ka 'am/ ras sam shing shun la bris te lus sam 'gul du btags na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du drug gis mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs mes mi nugs chus
265b4: mi tshugs dbyig dug/ gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs so// dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dum byed par mi 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang bgegs dang / rnam par log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang /
265b5: dga' bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis kyang de la bsrung ba dang sgrub pa dang rnyed par byed do// de gzhan gyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong /
265b6: du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// nam du yang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang yi dgas dang srul po dang / lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyur mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung
265b7: gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung bI gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo 'di 'chang na tshangs par mi spyod pa yang
265b8: tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ / thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ro// mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur/ bsnyen gnas ma byas pa yang bsnyen gnas byas par 'gyur/ bsnyang la ma byas pa yang bsnyang
266a1: ba byas par 'gyur mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa yang ma lus par byang bar 'gyur sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro/ / bu med bu 'dod pa gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor
266a2: nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma chen mo 'di 'chang na/ bu 'dod pa des bu rnyed de tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs kyang rab tu rnyed do// 'di nas shi 'phos na yang 'jig rten gyi khams
266a3: bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / mi nad dang phyugs nad dang gnag nad dang / yams kyi nad dang 'tshe ba dang nad 'go ba dang gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs
266a4: pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma chen mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ rim gro cher mchod pa chen po byas la grong khyer chen po'i sgor zhugs la grong khyer ram
266a5: grong ngam grong rdal lam ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so// gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma chen mo 'di rim gro cher byas te/ btsugs ma thag tu g.yul khams zhi bar 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad dang 'tshe
266a6: ba dang gnod pa dang 'khrug pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyu ro// tad+ya thA/ oM Sh+To ban d+ha ban d+ha/ bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM/ oM hUM Sh+T+r-i ban d+ha gar+b+ha badz+ra bdag la srungs
266a7: shig srungs shig rak+Sha rak+Sha ma/ / badz+ra pA Ni ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga to sh+tsi Sha a ba lo ki te mAr d+ha te dz+re rA shi/ o dz+wa la dzA la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ dar dang / bi da ri bi dar/ tshin d+hi tshan d+ha/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/
266a8: swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha hUM phaT paT swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na lo/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bI ra bai ra/ sau me sau me/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa dze hUM phaT swA hA/
266b1: hUM ma ma hUM ni swA hA// sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor du bya'o// klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis dus dus su char 'bebs so// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
266b2: yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho//
266b3: gtsug tor lha yul chud pa kha che'i paN+Di ta ma hA dz+nyA nas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ sa man ta mu kha pra be sha ra sh+mi bi ma lo Sh+NI Sha pra b+hA sa sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya sa ma ya bi lo ka te nA ma d+hA ra NI// bod skad du/
266b4: kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
266b5: phyag 'tshal lo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnan byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / zham ring ba lha'i tshogs chen po dang / tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha
266b6: rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'khor mang po tshogs pa la bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos ston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste ji ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po
266b7: bsags pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i dab ga gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab pa dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i gter chen po skyed par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar de bzhin
266b8: gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshangs pa dang lhar skye ba'i 'bras bur rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar lha'i gzugs 'dod pa dang
267a1: lta bas chog mi shes pa'i mtshan dang dpe byed bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar brtson 'grus brtsom pa lta ba dang /
267a2: bdud 'dul ba dang rga shi dang / skye ba las grol ba dang / brdzus te skye ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
267a3: sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'thob pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ji ltar shes rab dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po dang / thos pa rgya mtsho bsags
267a4: pa dang / mang du thos pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis pha rol du phyin pa drug gi chos kyi sgo 'di nyid nyin mtshan du rjes su sems shing rjes su spyad de dka' ba
267a5: chen po'i phyir sgom par yang byed do/ / de nas lha'i 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba g.yog lha'i bu bye ba phrag stong dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo khri brgyad stong gis bskor/
267a6: balha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzhal med yang rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i rtsig pa rtsigs pa'i khang bzangs bskyed mos tshal sna tshogs dang / lha'i me tog gis mdzes par byas pa'i rdzing gis legs par brgyan pa dang ldan pa zhig
267a7: yang lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de lha'i bu mo'i mchog me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / lhan cig dgo' ba chen yod ni ldan zhing lha'i bde ba la ni chags// rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i sgo bzhi dang ldan pa'i khang
267a8: bzangs kyi nang na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal gyi dregs te snyams shing nyal lo// de nas nam phyed tsam na lha'i bu de nyid kyis log cig lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgra bskyungs te nyal bar gyur to//
267b1: denas gnas mchog de na lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda' gdong zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa des lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de la bskul mtshi din ces spya / na kyi snyi drin med pa da 'ongs// khyod gnyid la dga' zhing chags/
267b2: pas ci zhig bya// dga' ba la goms par byed cing chags par gnas pas ci zhig bya/ lha'i longs spyod dpag tu med pa la spyod pa ci zhig bya/ nga ste zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byeng par 'gyur te/ lha'i longs spyod dang bral zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshe
267b3: ba chen po myong bar 'gyur na/ khyod kyi gnas gzhal med khang dam pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa ci dgos// khyod kyi srog ni yod med kyis// thabs ni myur du rnam par soms// shes de skad smras nas lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda'
267b4: gdong mi snang bar gyur to/ / de nas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pas tshig mi snyan pa de thos nas brgyal te mal nas khas bu ba tu sa la lhung ngo // de nas lha'i bu mo'i tshogs de dag kyang sgra ni bshig/ rgyan rnams ni lhung / gos ni
267b5: bsil/ kha nas khrag dang gsher bag ni chad nas mchu dang rkan dang mid pa dang / lce ni skams la smre sngags stong phrag du ma ni sme ste ngu zhing cho nges 'debs la/ kyi hud kyi hud de ces 'dzer cing / lha'i rin po che'i snod nas spos chu dang tsan dan gyi
267b6: chu grang mos 'thong zhing / / kha cig ni mgul nas 'ju/ kha cig ni lag pa nas 'ju/ kha cig ni de'i sbal 'o byed/ kha cig ni rkang pa nas 'ju// kha cig ni mgo la mthu/ kha cig ni brgyal te 'gyel/ kha cig ni sa'i steng na chu med pa'i nya bzhin du
267b7: 'gre ldog/ kha cig ni lus la mes tshig pa bzhin du 'gre ldog/ kha cig ni smre sngags dum 'don cing kyi hud kyi hud ces zer cing du'o// de nas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de brgyal ba sangs te dran pa thob nas/ kha nas khrag skrag
267b8: cing sdug bsngal chen po drag po nyams su myong nas shugs ring du phyung ste/ / lus 'dar zhing shing rlung gi shugs kyis gtab pa bzhin du g.yo bar gyur la/ sgra bsgyangs pa'i snying gis rings pa rings par lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la bder/
268a1: song ste phyin nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rkang pa la gdugs te/ rkang pa gnyis la 'dus nas 'diskad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag la bskyab du gsol// bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po che ba'i bdag nyid
268a2: can bskyab du gsol/ / lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda' gdong gis bsgo ba thos na// bdag dgung bdun na 'gum pa'i dus bgyid do zhes mchi zhing / sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba soms shig ces mchin// lha'i dbang po thabs
268a3: gang gis bdag 'chi bdag gi dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur bar 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i gnyen po bka' stsal du gsol/ lha'i dbang po ci nas kyang bdag 'chi bdag gi sgo nas thar pa'i tshogs
268a4: bdag la bskyab du gsol/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshig de thos nas snying rab tu sdug bsngal bas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu mo 'jigs shig/ gang gis 'chi bdag pham par
268a5: 'gyur zhing / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa skye ba dang / rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang / mya ngan las rgal ba bla na med pa'i
268a6: sman pa yod de/ de ni khyod kyi skyabs dang / rtsa lag bzang po dang / dpung gnyen dang pha ma lta bur gyur pa yin no// de ni ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa yin gyis 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs pa der bdag cag myur du 'dong ngo //
268a7: de nas de'i tho rangs lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po drim med pa dang / lha dang lha'i bu mo stong phrag dra ma dang lhan cig dga' ldan gal ba der deng nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
268a8: kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dman pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
268b1: bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di la lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda'i gdong gis bskul te/ deng dgung bdun gyi gdugs la nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di 'chi bdag gi sgo'i dbang du 'gyur ro// zhes
268b2: mchin bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha'i dbang po brgya byi tshogags na nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'dzum pa bstan pa des zhal nas kha dog du ma dang
268b3: ldan pa'i 'od zer byung ste/ 'od zer byung ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas te/ 'od zer gyi sdang ba des lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto
268b4: 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang 'byung po thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byas nas bskul te/ bskul nas kyang 'od zer de slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor zhug
268b5: so/ / zhugs ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di zhag bdun gyi nyin par 'chi bdag gi sgo'i 'jigs par 'gyur ba de nyon cig/ 'di gal te 'chi ba'i dus
268b6: byas par gyur na sdug bsngal shin du chen po drag po'i tshor ba sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba rnams myong bar 'gyur ro/ / thog mar ni grong khyer chen po bA rA Na sA ra smig ma mkhan gyi phyi sa khung gi 'dam rdzab kyi nang du sha zo mo phag mgo
268b7: can du skye bar 'gyur te/ phyis khud de na bshang gci za'o// phyis khung de nyid kyi nang na srog chags bye ba brgya stong gnas te/ de dag dus gsum du phag mo de'i sha za zhing keng rus 'ba' zhig lus par byed do// de nas yang las kyi dbang gis
268b8: lus kun rdzogs par gyur te/ lo bdun tshang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ de nas dgon par rus sbal gyi skye gnas su skye la/ de na chu'i ming yang mi grag cing shing grib kyang med de/ nyi tshan gyis lus
269a1: gdungs shing tshig la bye tshan za zhing bya rog dag gis lus gtogs nas lus dum bur 'gyur ro/ / de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus byung nas zhag par 'gyur te/ lo lnga tshang bar de ltar 'gyur ro// de nas 'chi ba'i dus
269a2: byed par 'gyur te/ bA rA Na sA de nyid du 'bab chu chen por nyen por skye bar 'gyur// de nas yang las kyi dbang gis gang na chu med pa der 'phangs nas lus chen po de la sbrul gdug pa dang / bya rog dang sre mo dang khyi dang gzig dang dred dang lce
269a3: sbrang la sogs pas za'o/ / srog chags sna tshogs pa gzhan dag kyang za'o// de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus byung zhing zad par 'gyur te/ lo gsum du de ltar 'gyur ro// de nas yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas khyim bdun du skye
269a4: zhing 'dzam bu'i gling gi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/ mdze can gyi khyim dang dbul po'i khyim dang / g.yung po'i khyim dang / shan pa'i khyim dang rigs ngan gyi khyim dang / gdol ba'i khyim dang dmus long gyi khyim du skyes te lo drug bcu
269a5: bar du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ / sdug bsngal de dag myong nas/ de nas shi 'phos te sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug tu bskal pa brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po de lta bu'i sdug bsngal
269a6: chen po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ / ci ste brgyal mi'i lus thob na yang dbul ba dang / yan lag ma tshang ba dang / shes rab chung ba dang yi ge mi shes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang bral ba dang / 'jig rten
269a7: thams cad kyis smad pa dang / rtag tu skom pa dang bkres pa sems pa dang / tshe thung zhing nad mang bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa'i gtam ngan thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi/
269a8: spyan sngar shin tu 'jig skrag ste/ yid mi dga' nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag re ba ma mchis par gyur to// bdag la skyabs bgyid pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang
269b1: po 'chi bdag gi chad pa chen po'i gnyen po yod kyis de bas na re ba med par ma byed cig/ des phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba dang /
269b2: dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// shin du yongs su dag pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang
269b3: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das re ba 'phel ba
269b4: mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das lha thams cad bskyab du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das skye dgu'i 'jig rten thams cad bsgral du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
269b5: sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa bsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dgug tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dbugs dbyung du
269b6: gsol/ bcom ldan 'das sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas la gzigs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag brgya chen pos
269b7: gang bdugasal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brda drugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad dugatan ba ston pa chen po bshad du gsal/ bad ba gshegs pa
269b8: bshad du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAHthub pas skad ces gsol ba thugs su chud nas/ rnam pa kun tu rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la rnams par zhugs sa/
270a1: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rnam pa kun zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gtsug tor dbus nas byung nas/ des phyogs kun du snang bar byas te// rin po che'i gdugs lta bur nam mkha' la 'dug pa dang //
270a2: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de gzigs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams
270a3: cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags zung shig/ phyag rgya 'di ni gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs shing rjes
270a4: su yi rang ba'o/ / gzungs sngags 'di mthong ba dang / thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang / ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyuraro// sngon gyi las kyi sgrib thams
270a5: cad kyang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing / / sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang 'jig par 'gyur te dper na me yis rtsa bsregs pa// rlung gis thal ba myur du deng // de bzhin tshe rabs snga ma la// bsags pa'i sdig pa thams cad
270a6: sreg/ dper na char pa 'bab 'gyur te// ri la 'bab chubab pa yis// sa yi steng gi phyag dar dang // nyal nyil thams cad 'dod par 'gyur// de bzhin gzungs 'di mthong ba dang // thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa 'byang // dpeng na me yis
270a7: gser sbyangs la/ / sos gcad rung bar snyi bar 'gyur// de bzhin bzlas brjod byas tsam gyis// lus skyong 'gyur te the tsom med// dper na nyi ma shar gyur na// 'od zer kun du rab tu 'byung // de bzhin su zhig gzugs 'chang ba//
270a8: de'i lus kyang rnam par mdzes// dper na skam por nya 'gro ldog/ chu dang bral bas 'chi sgor 'gro// la l-is slang yang chu bor bas// de na gnas shing yang rtse'o// de bzhin dran pa tsam gyis kyang // mi rnams tshe ni zlog par byed// lha'i
270b1: dbang po gzungs sngags bstan gyis nyon cig/ na ma/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM ma hA tsin+ta ma Ni dz+wa la na/ sa ga ra gam+b+hI ra/ A kaR+sha ya/ A kaR+sha ya/ a yun+ta ra san+d+ha ra/ k+Sha Nak+Sha Na/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/ k+Shu nuk+ShA nu/ sarba ta thA gta ma hA sa ma ya/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/
270b2: ma hA b+hA ba na/ sa ga ga/ sa sho d+ha ya/ mAM sarba satwe sh+tsa/ b+ha ga ba ti sarba bA baM bi ma la/ dza ya dza ya/ dza ya lab+h+yAM/ sAT s+phu Ta/ s+pho Ta yo s+phoT ya/ bi ga taM a ba r-i Ni/ ba ya ha ra Ni/ hU hU hA/ mri two dat+ta d+hi ra/ a b+ha ya prad/ uSh+Ti 'bya ba lo ki
270b3: sa man+ta mu khe/ sa man ta bya ba lo kyi te/ ma hA mA ye/ ma hA pA sha d+ha ra/ a mo g+ha bi ma le/ A kang+ka ya A kang+kaH/ a ka D+ha ya a kaD+ha ya/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra sa b+ha ra/ i nA ya bi sho d+ha ni/ b+hu shi ta b+hU tse/ ma hA mu dA bi lo ki ti/ dza yar+tha
270b4: ya sid d+ha sid d+ha/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ saM bo d+ha ni saM bo d+ha ni/ sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ saM sho d+ha ni sa sho d+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ni bi sho d+ha ni/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ma sarba pA baM/ sarba ta thA ga ta ku la b+hu dza/ sa ma ya ti// pra sa ra tu ma ma bu nu/ bi na sh+yan+tu
270b5: ba baM/ sarba ki la bi sha ha ra/ ma Ni pi shud d+ha/ sho d+ha ya bi ma la bi ka si ta pad+ma/ ka bi tsata b+hu dze/ Sha Ta bA ra mi tA pa ri pu ra Ni/ sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha pi lo ki te swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya na/ a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ a yu da di swA hA/ mu N+yad di swAhA
270b6: buN+ya bi so ki te swA hA/ pu d+hA a ba lo ki te swA hA/ mri t+yadat+te swA hA/ ya ma det+ta swA hA/ ya ma du te swA hA/ saM ha ra Ni swA hA/ saM b+ha ra Ni swA hA/ san+d+ha ra Ni swA hA/ pra ti sa ra Ni swA hA/ oM dzo pa ti swA hA/ te dzo ba ti swA hA/ dza ya ba ti swA hA/ sarba ta thAg
270b7: ta mu dra a d+hiSh+Tha te swA hA/ / lha'i dbang po gzungs sngags 'di lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la rjes su ston cig/ de ni khyod kyis lha'i bu de la yun ring por phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor
270b8: dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / dam tshig la rnam par lta ba'i gzungs sngags 'di bris la mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug go/ mchod rten sar pa 'am/ snying po bcos pa yang rung ste de'i nang du gzhug/
271a1: spos dang byug pa yang phul la gzungs kyi rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dran par bya zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsgom par bya'o// nyin zhag gcig la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par bya'o// de nas nyi ma shar ba dang shar
271a2: phyogs su bltas te spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la/ nyi ma logs su me tog gis gtor ro// a ga ru dang du ru ka'i bdug pas bdugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o//
271a3: mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btab pa la rig sngags kyi snying po 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug nas dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag na gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
271a4: skusku gdung dang ring bsrel mchod rten re re'i nang du bcug par 'gyur ro/ / ring bsrel gyi snying por yang 'gyur ro// snying po 'di bris la gzhug go/ oM na ma ste yad d+hi ka nA/ sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya gar+b+he dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+harma d+hA tu gan+d+haM saM b+ha ra ma ma
271a5: a yu/ sa sho d+ha ya saM sho d+ha ya/ ma ma sarba pA paM sarba ta thag ta/ sa man+toSh+Ti bi ma le bi shud de/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hUM/ aM baM saM dzaHswA hA// kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
271a6: thams cad kyi snying po 'di la gus par byas te mchod rten gyi las byas ni tshe zad pa las slar nur te tshe ring por spyod par byed do/ / gal te shi 'phos na yang sbrul gyi lpags pa rjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pas 'jig rten
271a7: gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / 'chi ba'i sngagasasngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro// phyin chad nam yang 'chi ba'i tshor ba mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// phyin chad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang ngan 'gror
271a8: 'gro zhing skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ / phyin chad sems can dmyal ba pa'i sgra rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur na 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rig sngags 'di bcom
271b1: ldan 'das las bzung nas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang lhan cig tu nam nangs pa dang rang gi gnas su song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i lung bzhin du cho ga go rims bzhin du mchod rten gyi las byas nas/
271b2: bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yang byas pa dang / byas ma thag tu lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa sdug sngal thams cad nye bar zhi nas sdig pa thams cad dang bral te/ lus rnam par dag nas lpags pa'i mdog ni gser gyi kha dog lta bur
271b3: gyur/ / sgra dang mig ni mthon yid lta bur gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mngon du mthong / nam mkha'i dbyings nas de bzhin gshegs pas legaso legs so// zhes bya ba'i gsung ni phyung ngo // de nas lha'i bu de sgrib pa dang bral ba'i lus
271b4: su gyur par mthong nas yang mtshan cher zung ste rab tu dga' nas/ a la la sangs rgyas/ a la la rig sngags/ a la la chos/ 'bras bu 'phral du ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa thugs rje mchog tu che ba yid/
271b5: bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu de la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas lha'i bu de rang gi gnas su song nas lha'i me tog dang bdug pa dang / spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa sna tshogs blangs te/ lha'i gos
271b6: dang sdud pa dang / rgyan kyang blangs nas g.yog 'khor thams cad dang / lha'i bu mo dang lha'i tshogs dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas su dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /
271b7: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po byas te lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas chos nyan pa'i phyir de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po dang /
271b8: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das su las gang gis lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa
272a1: la mi zad cing shin tu tsha ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag legs so leg so// skyes bu dam pa dag legs par dris so// de'i phyir
272a2: nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/ / lag na rdo rje sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus na lho phyogs kyi rgyud na yangs pa 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod de/ de na bram ze dri ma med pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa/ byed pa gsal ba yid gzhungs pa
272a3: gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ mdog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bsam pa can/ rig pa smra ba zhig gnas te/ de rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rjes su sems shing sgom la mang du
272a4: byed de/ / sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod do// de nas grong khyer de nyid na khyim bdag rab snang zhes bya ba phyug pa nor che la longs spyod che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig gnas te/ khyim bdag de ni dad pa dang mi ldan zhing gzhan mu
272a5: stegs can la dad do/ / bram ze de ni khyim bdag de la yang dang yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di snying po dang bcas pa bsgrogs kyang khyim bdag de ni de la dad pa'i sems mi skyed kyi/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ngas bram ze 'di dus bu du ma thar
272a6: gtubs la nya dang ru sbal bsregs pa bzhin du bor te kha dan skyugs kyis dgang ngo snyam mo/ / des 'di snyam du bsams ma thag tu khyim bdag de sha kra dang / mdze'i nad kyis btab po// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 'chi kar sdug
272a7: bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po myong ste/ shi nas sems can dmyal po chen po mnar med par skyes te/ der bskal pa'i tshad du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ngo // de nas shi 'phos nas nya dang phag dang / ru sbal gyi nang du bskal par sdug
272a8: bsngal myong ngo / / de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba thig nag tu skyes te// der yang bskal pa'i tshad du sdug bsngal chen po myong ngo // de nas shi 'phos nas grong khyer de nyid du dmus long gi khyim du skyes te/ dmus
272b1: long du gyur nas phan tshun du slongs mo la song ba dang / gtsug lag khang cig tu phyin pa na/ de na dge slong snying rje la gnas pa zhig 'dug ste/ des de mthong nas byams pas rgyas par byas te zas byin no// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
272b2: 'di yang bsgrags so/ / dmus long des gzungs sngags 'di thos pa dang / tshe rabs dran par gyur nas bram ze de yang dran te/ rjes su sems shing kye ma'o mi bzad pa'i las byas so snyam nas ngo tsha dang / khrel yod par gyur te/ 'chi
272b3: ba'i dus byas pa dang gzungs sngags 'di'i mthus sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du skyes te/ gzhal med khang chen po'i nang na lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor cing lha'i longs spyod chen po myong bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na
272b4: khyim bdag dmus long du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za ba 'am yid gnyis su gyur na de ltar mi blta ste/ lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di nyid do// lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sdom pa gsum gyis
272b5: bsdam par bya'o/ / lag na rdo rje las des 'bras bu rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 'di lta bu myong ngo // lha'i bu 'dis byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du las kyi 'bras bu tha ma 'di myong ngo // lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i
272b6: dus na bram ze dri ma med par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom 'am yid gnyis su gyur na de ltar mi blta ste/ lag na rdo rje khyod nyid do// dmus long la gzungs sngags 'di sgrogs pa'i dge slong de ni
272b7: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong du gyur to// de nas lha'i 'khor mang po des sngon byung ba 'di thos nas rmad du byung bar gyur/ dga' ba thob par gyur te/ ca co dang ga zha'i sgra chen po
272b8: phyung nas a la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig sngags 'di'i mthu ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'o/ / zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas 'khor de las lha'i bu khri nyis stong ni phyir mi ldog par gyur
273a1: to/ / lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag 'bum ni bud med kyi dbang po dang bral nas skyes pa'i dbang po byung ste phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di
273a2: skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi tshig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni mthu che ba phan yon che ba legs so// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar
273a3: 'gyur zhing gang gis sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad du gsol/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di'i phan yon dang
273a4: sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di nyon cig/ 'di ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di dus gcig tu dran par bya'o/
273a5: rang srel gyi snying po 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi mchod rten la bskor ba bya'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis kyang dus gcig tu dran par bya'o// des ni gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed khrag
273a6: khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ / bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro//
273a7: sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i sku gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyu ro// tshe'i ring por 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi lpags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas bskal pa mnyam pa'i
273a8: phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / phyin chad mngal gyi gnas kyi dri mas mi gos par 'gyur ram// gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der brdzus te skye zhing pad ma las skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams cad du
273b1: tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lta 'dod par 'gyur ro// bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gal te cho ga bya bar 'dod na des khrus byas la gos gsar ba
273b2: bgos te/ spos kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o// snying po'i rig sngags kro ga la bri bar bya'o// mchod rten lnga gdab par bya'o// rig sngags 'di yang mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag par bya'o// mchod rten bzhin grwa bzhir gzhag go/
273b3: gcig ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag ko/ shing bu btsugs te ba dan dmar po dpyad bar bya'o// me tog gis gtor ro// bum pa gang ba lta gzhag go// grwa bzhir pog por bzhi nas du ru ka dang / a ga ru dang tsan dan dang /
273b4: gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug par bya'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin chen 'di gnyis kyang yan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// snying po'i sngags brjod cing dkyil 'khor la bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// nad kyis btab pa dang gnod
273b5: padang nad tshabs che ba dang / tshe zad pa dang dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po dang pha rol kyi dmag tshogs kyis skrag pa dang bu 'dod pa dkyil 'asor la mngon phyogs par gzhag go// rma bya'i sgo lngas byab par bya'o//
273b6: bachod rten gyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o// cho ga 'di lan cig byas na gal ba lu bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang bral nas sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / sems can dmyal
273b7: bdang dung 'gro'i sgra gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal dang sgrib pa dang sdig
273b8: pa dang gdug pa thams cad tshe rabs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// tshe zad pa yang phyir nur zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// yun ring du nad kyis brnyongs te shan
274a1: zad pa yang lus yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / lus shin du yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// bsam pa yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byin chad 'chi bdag gi sgo'i sdug bsngal mi
274a2: mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / sbrul gyi lpags pa brjes pa bzhin du lu sa bor nas bskal pa mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der pad ma las skye bar 'gyur ro//
274a3: thams cad du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro// skye ba thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// 'di bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bzhin du nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas
274a4: na de'i sdig pa'i sgrib pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ / bzlas brjod cho ga bzhin du lo gcig tshad par byas na 'jigs pa med par lta ba kun nas sgo'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i
274a5: ting nge 'dzin 'thob po/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa 'bar ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i lus yongs su
274a6: dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / che rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dag pa'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ro//
274a7: tshe rabs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnams su yang shin du yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'gro 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi lpags pa rjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal pa
274a8: mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / 'chi bdag gi sgo mi mthong zhing rmi lam lta bur kun tu shes so// tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi'am bcwa lnga la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs sngags 'di
274b1: gnyis lan brgyam brgyad bzlas brjod byas shing ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mdzod rten la bkor pa byas na 'azlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis 'phral du mtsho chenul sgra 'thung ste/ / legs sozhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyu ro/ 'bral du dag
274b2: sgrib pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug gi dri ma dang ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro// lus dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// skyes pa 'am bud med dam khye'u 'am bu mo
274b3: gdadang gtam byas pa de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa rnams las grol bar 'gyur ro/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la smras na yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// 'i tshogs thams
274b4: cad la smras na yang bya'i tshogs thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ / tha na khyi dang ru sbal dang / sbrul dang byi la dang sre mo dang / srog chags sna tshogs la smras na yang thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// bye ma la lan nyi shu rtsa
274b5: gcig bzlas brjod byas te dur khrod du gtor na/ gang gi rus pa la phog pa de dag sems can dmyal ba gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de nas yongs su thar te mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro// gang dag mtho ris su skyes pa de dag gi lus
274b6: la me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ / gcan zan dang bya sna tshogs gang dag dur khrod der 'gro ba de dag thams cad kyang bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ri la gtor na ri dgas dang / bya rgyu ba de dag thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyu ro//
274b7: kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na/ gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dag mnar med par lhung nas gdung ba bsregs
274b8: pa las 'phral du yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ / lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ gal te mgul nas thag pas btags te/ khrid pa yang gshin rje'i gnas na 'phral du ldog par 'gyur ro// de'i 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su
275a1: grol bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can dmyal ba ma ca ma dzin namamar 'jig par 'gyur te the tshom med do// chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje yang bran bzhin du sems shing 'dug go// lus bsam gtan gyi lam bzhin nam/ sbrul gyi
275a2: lpags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du mngon par dga' zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / 'chi bdag gi sdug bsngal mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'bum bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na/ 'bum chad nas
275a3: mchod rten thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ / bdag kyang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// nges par 'phral du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gA'i klu dbye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi
275a4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing lung snyan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / de nas mchod rten chen po gcig gi nang du bcug ste shing bu bsgreng ba byas na dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ra ri bsrel
275a5: gyi snying po 'bum gyi mchod rten zhes bya'o/ / gang dag de las bya ba rnams byed pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// than
275a6: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams dang / gzhan yang srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs gang dag der dor ba de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// tha na grib mas phog na yang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na bya ba mang du byed pa lta
275a7: smos kyang ci dgos te/ 'di'i yon tan dang phan yon ni brjod par mi nus so// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas
275a8: na gnas pa'i lha'i bu de dag dang / brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang / de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan
275b1: 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags mthu chen po 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu
275b2: rin po che lta bur mthong ba dang / thos par dka' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lhan cig tshogs nas slad ma'i dus na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gzung bar bgyi'o// rgyas par bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la
275b3: bsgrag par bgyi'o/ / 'di 'dzin pa'i sems can chen po de'i skad bzhin 'brang zhing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang sba bar bgyi'o// bu bzhin du yongs su bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
275b4: pa/ grogs po dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di ngas khyed la gtang ngo // 'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba
275b5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / shI len dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes sgyur cing zhus te gtan la/
275b6: bab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sa rbor ga pra sha ma ni nA ma d+hA ra NI// bod skad du/ 'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gri
275b7: thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag chos kyi rnam
275b8: grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston cig/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li mi tsi le mi/ ba na na ko ki li/ shri ma ti/ kuN Da le/ dun du b+hi/ in dra ni mu le sAtra/
276a1: 'di dag ni zas ma zhu ba dang spos pa dang / khrag dang mkhris pa 'dres pa dang / gzhang 'brum gyis btab pa dang / gzhang nad can dang / za khu dang lud pa can dang rims nad can dang glad pa na ba dang gzhogs phyed na
276a2: ba dang yi dgas kyis zin pa'i gsang sngags gzhi yin te/ kun dga' bo gang gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed pa de ni ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten nam mthong ngo // cha zad pa ni ma gtogs so// gsang
276a3: sngags gzhi 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog go/ 'dod chags dang bral ba ni chos thams
276a4: cad kyi mchog go/ / / dge 'dun ni tshogs thams cad kyi mchog go// bden pa'i tshig dang bden pa'i ngag 'dis bdag gis zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang 'chos pa dang / myangs pa rnams
276a5: legs par bde bar zhu bar gyur cig swA hA/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa nad thams
276a6: cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje bla ma'i rgyal po la phyag
276a7: 'tshalo/ / tad ya thA/ badz+ra badz+ra/ ma hA badz+ra/ sarba b+hu d+hi ha na ha na badz+ra na swA hA/ lan las nan rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dz+wa ra pra sha ma ni nA ma d+hA raNI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rims
276a8: nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i
276b1: tshal na bzhugs te/ de nas dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ dge slong des
276b2: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can rims nad kyis rnam par gtses pa dag mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsrung du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
276b3: gnas logs su gzigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo phyogs 'di na me lce phreng ba zhes pa'i rims gnas te/ de sems can rnams la nyin cig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang nyin gsum pa
276b4: dang / nyin bzhi pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'tshe bar byed de/ de bsrung ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag yin no// tad+ya thA/ dz+wa la ni dz+wa la ni/ pra dz+wa la ni pra ti pa ni/ pra sha ma ni/ bdag gi rims nad song shig/ ma 'dug shig swA hA/
276b5: bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bla na med pa dang 'jig rten na chos dang dge 'dun bla na med pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi rims nad song shig ma 'dug shig/ swA hA/ sin r+d+haH
276b6: mnadra ba dwe/ ta rad+ya/ bid d+h+ya taM brah+ma A nu mo te swA hA// skud pa nag po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dor ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs
276b7: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyAn mi tra dang dAn shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba zan/
276b8: ye shes sdes bskur ci khrus te gtanal phab pa// dkan mchog gsus la phyag 'tshal lo// phags pa 'od dpag tume dpa la phyag 'tshal lo// NathA/ e la mi ti ma y-i/ tan pa / cig non
277a1: d+ha mi/ e ka ti kan// ti ti kan tsa dur tsi ka na sni t+ya dz+wa ran swA hA/ cho ga ni 'di bris te mgul du btags na rims med par byed do// rims nad zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a k+Shu ro/ ga pra sha
277a2: mni sU tra/ / bod skad du/ 'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal
277a3: bo'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nag po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i
277a4: kha gyi grong khyer chen po 'dir mig nad dag byung na de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nag po mig nad kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di dag yod de// tad+ya thA/ ru ti re phu// re d+hi ra a k+Sha phu ru d+ha ri pi ga le/
277a5: pu/ bA te phu/ ba ta le phuH/ ha na te phu// mAM sa dun du b+hi phu/ pad ma a kI phu/ pa da ma daDa Da ha ri ni ye phu swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nag po yi rangs te/ bcom
277a6: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / cho ga ni 'di yin te// srad bu dkar po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas te mdud pa bdun dor ro// chu la lan bdun bzlas pa byas la lag pas bya bas na mig nad zhi bar
277a7: 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// te b+han many+dzu shrI s+'u ThA ra/ sarba ta thA ga d+hA/ ba la bi d+hi d+ha/ sarba tathA tA nan/ na ge su~M sti/
277a8: sarba tran na swA hA// 'brum bu'i nad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a d+ha pra sha ma ni sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gzhang 'brum rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
277b1: dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na// 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa'i tshal na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong
277b2: gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das bco lnga'i gso sbyong zla ba nya ba de nyid kyi tshe dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom
277b3: ldan 'das kyis snam logs na rnga yab thogs te/ / bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
277b4: nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud pa/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na dge slong gzhang 'brum can mang po dag gzhang 'brum gyi bro
277b5: nad kyis gzir te/ / sdug bsngal mi bzad pa drag po mi bde ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
277b6: ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzhang 'brum sel ba'i mdo long shig/ kun dga' bo la la zhig gzhang 'brum sel ba'i mdo ming dang tshig dang /
277b7: yi ge shes na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro// tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ a lan te/ a la me shwa li tsi ni kun she sam b+ha ba swA tA// kun dga'
277b8: bo 'di lta ste/ byang phyogs na ri'i rgyal po gangs shes bya ba de na sa la'i shing rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba de'i me tog gsum yod de/ gcig ni 'phel ba zhes bya/ gnyis pa ni 'jam pa zhes bya/ gsum pa ni skam
278a1: bzhes bya ste/ / ji ltar de skam pa de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi rlung gi 'brum bu skams par gyur cig/ mkhris pa'i 'brum bu skams par gyur cig/ bad kan gyi 'brum bu skams par gyur cig/ mi gtsang ba'i 'brum bu
278a2: skams par gyur cig/ khrag gi 'brum bu skams par gyur cig/ 'das pa'i 'bram bu skams par gyur cig/ de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi ba dkan gyi 'brum bu rnams par gyur cig/ mi gtsang ba'i 'brum bu rnams
278a3: par gyur cig/ khrag gi 'bum bu sems par gyur cig/ 'dus pa'i 'brum bu skams par gyur cig/ sA'i 'brum bu skams par gyur cig/ 'phyang ba'i 'brum bu skams par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ sha me shA ma ne/ sha me sha ma ne sAhA/
278a4: na bar ma gyur cig/ rengs par ma gyur cig/ sgra 'byung bar ma gyur cig/ 'dzag par ma gyur cig/ sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig rab tu sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig zag par ma gyur cig ba du zag par mgyur cig 'di nyid du zad pa dang / yongs su zad/
278a5: padang med par gyur cig// sa'i 'og tu song shika/ na mo b+ha ga bA ti/ bud d+ha ma t+ya pA ti na/ sid d+hun tu man tra bA dwe ne swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yid ngangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
278a6: gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/ klags pas grub pa 'di srad bu dmar po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas la/ mdud pa bdun bor te mgul du gdags so// 'phags pa gzhang 'brum rab tu zhi bar byed
278a7: pa'i mdo rdzogs so/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin+da mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya tsor bir+d+ha na sa na nA ma d+hA raNI/ bod skad du/
278a8: 'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das zhem yod pa tshe dang ldan pa
278b1: na dag po dang thabs gcig tu lus 'phags ril gshegs pa'i tshe/ / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos me nod pal po che zhig rgyang ring mo nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang skrag ste// zeng zhes byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
278b2: gsol lo/ / bcom ldan 'das mi rgod dgacig go// bde bar gshegs pa mi rgod dag cig go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod mi rgod rnams kyis 'jigs sam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'jigs
278b3: lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa 'jigs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod mi rgod rnams kyis ma 'jigs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gti mug chen po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms
278b4: pa 'di bka' stsal to/ / Na thA/ a ru lo me/ rba ti lo me/ a nu lo ma/ pa ti lo ma/ a ti ka/ pra ta ke/ ba ke/ a te be ke/ go ra/ gan d+ha / tsan ra li/ ma ta ki/ bug gsi/ ri mi mi/ ri d+hi maco ba ci tso tha danaH/ bi swA hanaH
278b5: b+h+ra mnaH/ mA mi yan du ya bang zan sbyin mun tsa me swA hA// kun dga' bo ngas dpag tshad ban tshun chad kun du bsrung ba dang / mi rgod thams cad dang / ri gsed kyi grong mi thams cad dang / gseb lam srung ba thams cad dang / gnod papa
278b6: sems pa thams cad kyi rkang pa bcing bar byas so/ / rmugs par byas so// rengs par byas so// ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bskor pa'am/ ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba ltar mi rgod rnams 'dang bar gyur cig
278b7: rengengs par gyur cig/ kun tu rengs par gyur cig/ mgo rmongs par gyur cig/ mdud pa ma grol ba'i bar du 'chi bar ma gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yid rangs
278b8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / chog ni shing kun dang / bong bu'i su bsres te bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// yang na gos kyi mtha' mal mdud pa bor te/
279a1: bde bar byin nas dkrol bar bya'o// 'di ni grub pa'o// 'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho/ @6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba hu pu tra pra ti sa ra na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa/
279a2: bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
279a3: sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
