300b8: dam chos yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/ / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni// gang la dad pas yid ches na// 'grub par the tshom med par 'gyur// bzlas brjod
301a1: u0f7f'brum ni byas gyur na/ dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// ston pa shAkya'i thugs rje 'di// ge slong ner ba na rak+Shi tas// tho gar yul nas rnyed pa ste// 'gro ba kun gyi dpal ru shar// 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par/
301a2: lung ga sus stom rje / sngon pa da gsug zhe pa/ tu byed 'dug dag sa// b+ha ga du/ chub kyi du da shA sug dag sus na pag mitha la rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byab/
301a3: chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcag na// bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas na ar me nig lta bu'i rdo leb la/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la sogs pa nyan thos
301a4: chen po rnams dang / 'phags pa byams pa dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa rnams dang mi
301a5: mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang // dri za'i rgyal po zur phung lnga pa la sogs pa dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas
301a6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs ste bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ri rab kyi rtse mo la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
301a7: logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha 'di dag ni mchod rten bgyid par 'tshal ba sha stag ste/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir mchis na// ci nas tshangs
301a8: pa'i bsod nams 'phel ba dang / lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu las dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma
301b1: dag bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lnga de ltar bcom ldan 'das de dag la chos bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/ ye d+harmA
301b2: hetrapra b+ha bA he tun teSh+Tha ta thA ga to h+ya ba rata/ teShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH/ chos gang rgyus 'byung de dag gi/ rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te/ dge sbyong che na pos de skad gsungs// spyan
301b3: ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di lta ste/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi su yin te/ sus nyan cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo // spyan ras gzigs dbang
301b4: phyug rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dang pa can gang la la zhig gis mi gnas pa'i sa phyogs su mchod rten ni skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam srog shing ni khab tsam/ gdugs ni bklu la'i me tog tsam zhig byas la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba chos
301b5: kyi dbyings kyi tshigs su bcad pa nang du bcug na des tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi'i phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
301b6: bka' stsal nas/ nyan thas de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yod rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
301b7: ya chu mnalanas 'ad ga nams kyi sa sun shAg nan su ga nam tha chu na thags rgya la zhun ga / / sa gang rgyas 'byung da dag gis// rgyu dang 'gogs
301b8: yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to// dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs// ye d+harmA ta tra pra b+ha bA he can te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ tathAny+tsa lo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dwe mA hA shra ma NaHsnying po 'di lan cig brjod pas
302a1: sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ / mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zhi zhing zlogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po gang la dmigs te brjod na sangs rgyas kyi sku 'am/ mchod rten du byas par 'gyur mchod pa gang la dmigs
302a2: te brjod na 'jig rten gyi khams gang btsam phul bar 'gyur ro/ / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po rdzogs s+ho// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// a s+phar smar/ bi sman dang rgyu jig sa ma mas rin po che
302a3: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i char dpag tu med pa nam mkha'i khams gang bar bsams la dbul lo/ / rin po che brdar pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// namaH
302a4: sa man ta bud d+hA nI/ a pra ti ha na shA sa na nAM/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ hUM hUM/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ phaT phaT sarba dur ni mi ti duHswa ba na shan ti ku ru swA hA// sangs rgyas stong gi sngags 'di ni// gtsug tor
302a5: 'bar ba zhes grags te/ / las rnams gang dag stong phrag ni// brgyad cu dang ni dgu phrag lnga// rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams dang // bkra shis dpal grags thams cad byed// rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma dan// lan cig bzlas pas
302a6: sel bar byed/ / gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi thab
302a7: DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ oM b+he Sha dz+ye b+he Sha dz+ye/ ma hA b+he shadz+ye/ b+he Sha dz+ye sa mud ga te swA hA// sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la sngags kyis gdab pa/ rdzogs s+ho// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
302a8: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ / na mo b+ha ga ba te red na ke tu rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te sa myaka sa bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM rad ne rad ne ma hA ra da ne rang
302b1: nani dza ya swA hA/ 'di brjod cing bskor ba gcig byas pa yang dpag tu med pa byas par 'gyur ro// bskor ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya prad k+Sha ra na tra yA nA ma d+hA ra NI// bod skad du/ 'phags
302b2: pa dkon mchog gi rten la bskor ba bya ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// oM na mo da sha di ga tI kA la
302b3: sarba rad na tra yA ya/ na ma pra dak+Sha su pra da k+Sha/ sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni swA hA// gzungs 'di lan cig brjod pa la phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal zhing bskor ba byas par 'gyur ro// thog ma
302b4: med pa nas bsags pa'i sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur ro// dgra dang bgegs kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// nad dang gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro//
302b5: bskor ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ dkri rnam pa ri sho d+ha nI na ma/ bod skad du/ yon yongs su skyong ba zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin/
302b6: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 6 dpa se sa dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa blo dang ldan pa'i jam dpal gno/ nu gyur pa la phyag 'tsha'o//
302b7: namangs man ta pra b+ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ye/ a ra ha te b+h+yaHsa myaka sa bud d+hA ya/ na mo many+dzu shI ye/ ku mA ra bud+hA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twa ya/ ma ha kA ru Ni kA ya/ taHthA/ oM ni rA la ma be/ nirA b+ha sa/ dzam
302b8: dza ye la ba d+he/ ma hA ma te dak+She dak+Shi NA pa ri sho d+hA ya swA hA// 'di lan cig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// yon mang po la spyad pa yang byang bar 'gyur ro// yon bdag de'i yon yongs su 'phel bar
303a1: 'gyur zhing tshogs thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / 'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang mi 'byung ngo // 'dul ba lung las rnam par nges pa'i mdo las byung ba yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs
303a2: rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bu me ru ka la pa rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ta te/ sa myag sa bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ka la be ka la be/ ma hA ka la be pa ri sho d+ha ni swA hA/
303a3: gzungs 'di lan cig bzlas pas ri rab tsam gyi yon yongs su sbyong bar byed par gsungs pas lan lnga'am drug tsam bzlas so// yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal na/
303a4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ smi ti ma ti ma ti/ te dz+wa bi d+ha/ hu ru ma hu ru ma kriSh+Na tA ru me swA hA/ shu dag nag po la sngags 'di la na brgya
303a5: brgyad bzlas brjod byas te zos na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 'i
303a6: sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / taHthA/ ma ti ba hu l+ye/ ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na/ dar shes ne pra dz+nyA ba ta/ gam b+hi re/ b+ho d+he maN+Da nus ri ni/ a b+hi d+ha ta mon d+ha/ ka ri ba d+ha ma ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ prad+hI dI b+he/ me d+ha ba di nas
303a7: rba a d+hiSh+Thi te/ su ru su ru/ d+hu ra d+hu ru/ me d+ha a na ya swA hA// cho ga ni nang par zhing bzlas brjod byas na lobs sbyin par 'gyur ro// sman bram hi snyim par bcug ste/ dud pa byung gi bar du bzlas pa byas te zos na thos pa 'dzin
303a8: par 'gyur ro/ / thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ pra dz+nyA pa ra d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI// bod skad du/ shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
303b1: thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan zhes bya ba ri rab kyi ngos la bzhugs te/ ri rab la gnas pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyis bskor nas/ mdun du byas te chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems
303b2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das sems can shes rab rtul po blo zhan pa/ yid mi gzhungs pa rnams kyi slad du shes
303b3: rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol bshad pa/ hUM bi bu bi bu/ pradz+nyA pa ra d+ha ni dza ra dza ra/ me d+ha pa ra d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud d+hi pa ra d+ha ni swA hA// gang zhig gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang 'dri ba dang 'drir
303b4: 'jug pa dang / chung ngu na yi ga 'bru gcig tsam thos na yang de'i tshe 'di nyid la shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// gang gis zla ba drug gi bar du nyin re zhing rtsa bas khyor gang la rig pa 'di lan bdun btab ste nyi ma shar ba'i tshe
303b5: 'thungs na tshigs su bcad pa stong stong 'dzin to/ / lan cig 'thungs na lnga brgya 'dzin te/ nyin gcig bzhin shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du brjod pa tsam gyis dran pa dang yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro//
303b6: shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban de klu'i dbang pos sgyur// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+ya ga ra si ha dang zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de de btsan dras zhus te
303b7: gtan la phab pa/ / rgya gar skad du/ pra dz+nyA bar d+hi ni nA ma d+ha ra NAM/ bod skad du/ shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs// na mo rid naH yA ya/ nAmaHsa rgya.a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ maHsa twA ya/ u0f7fTA/
303b8: sA la te s+tha la te ma ni te swA hA/ rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te khyor tshul lan gsum bzlas te/ 'thungs na zhag bdun nas thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho//
304a1: d+hagang gyi mkhan po don ga r+b+ha dang / lo tsAb bane k+ta'i dbang pos bsgyur / rgyagang kyi mkhan po ba che ka si ta dang / zhwa chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de de btsan dras nus te gtan la phrab pa// rtag / du / khra par d+ha ni nam d+hA rmA/
304a2: bod skad du/ shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs// na mo rang nA tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ i bi ba bi ba pra dz+nyA pa ra d+ha ni/ dza ra dza ra/ ma d+hU par/
304a3: nidz+hi ri d+hi raM/ bud d+hi bar d+he ni swA hA/ rig sngags 'di'i tshig ni 'di yin te/ nang nga zhing rtsab mo kyong gang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ zla bi gcig gi bar du 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// shes rabab skyed pa zhes
304a4: bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ban de klu'i dbang pos bskur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra si ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa/ dkon mchog gsum
304a5: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'big pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA a ba lo ki ni/ ba li kri ni/ pra b+ha lo ki ni/ dzi ba ha ba ri sho
304a6: d+hani d+hi da ni ya ga me/ a sha pa ri shod+ha ni/ sarbas twA ma nor the/ ka ya sid d+he shru ti d+hA ra NI smr-i ti d+hA ra NI swA hA// cho ga zhag bdun gyi bar du shing a ba marga'i sa shing la lan bdun bzlang dod byas te nang re bzhin thos na nyin gcig la/
304a7: shu lo ka brgya brgya lobs so// zla ba drug gi bar du byas na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// shu lo ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs s+ho// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po
304a8: dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ kha li kha li ba li te swA hA/ gdong 'khru ba'i tshe chu khyod gang la sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te 'thungs na nyen gcig kyang yi ge shu lo ka
304b1: lobs par 'gyur te/ / sngon lobs pa rnams kyang brjed par mi 'gyur ro// shu lo ka lo brgya lobs pa rdzogs s+ho// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags
304b2: pasun ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bI re bI ra/ ma hi ti dz+re/ te dza ma tIt+tA raNI/ shru ta d+hA raNI/ dza ya na ti bi dza ti ti d+hA NI swA hA// sman bram hi zho gnyis zhib tu btags te/ 'o ma'i nang du bskol la sngags 'di lan
304b3: nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te zhag bdun gyi bar du 'thungs na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'am/ bstan bcos kyang rung ste// thos na nyin zhag gcig la shu lo ka stong lobs par
304b4: 'gyur ro/ / shu lo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// taHthA/ ti/
304b5: shAtri shul shA khi/ A r+yA ba lo ka te shwa rA ya/ a dz+nyA ba ya ti/ ba re na bu ha la/ srid d+hA tra swA hA// cho ga ni 'phags pa spyan rab gzigs dbang thug gi zhabs drung du dkyil 'khor byas te lam thong bas byas la tshul sngags
304b6: kyig btab ste bzhag nas/ nang par tshul lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te dro khar kha zas 'a me dang spags te zos na zhag bdun lon na nyin gcig kyang shu lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro// yid ches pa'i rtags yod do// shu lo ka
304b7: rgong lobs pa'i gzungs s+ho/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phag yun sa
304b8: dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ ka ba tsaka rnal la te swAt+ma/ tshul lan bdun bzlas te gdong bkrub na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// tshog 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan kyang chu bzhags lan/
305a1: bdun bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs la// dro' 'azas 'om dang spags te bza' ba de lta bur zhag bdun gyi bar du byas na nyin gcig kyang yi ge shu lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro// shu loka stong lobs pa'i gzungs s+ho/
305a2: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+yathA/ oM mu ni kan te mu ni pra b+ha sA re swA hA// bcom
305a3: ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor byas te/ shu dag mthe bod tsam blangs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas zos na thog ma'i nyin mo yi ge shu lo ka stong klags pa tsam gyis
305a4: lobs par 'gyur ro/ / zhag gsum lon pa'i nyin mo shu lo ka sum stong lobs par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun lon pa'i nyin mo thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bu lo ka sum stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// dkon mchog gsum la
305a5: phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ smi ti ma ti ma ti/ te dzA bi d+hA/ hu ru me ha ra hu ru kriSh+Na hu ru me swA hA/ shu dag dkar po
305a6: la sngags 'di bzlas brjod byas te thos na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / mi brjed pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum gyi rten la sngags 'di lan
305a7: re brjod cing rkyang phyag re byas te/ phyag gsum byas na sde snod gsum thos pa dang / bsams pa dang / bsgoms pa'i bsod nams dang mnyam par 'gyur ro nyi ma re rer phyag gsum gsum byas na tshe 'di nyid la mthong ba'i
305a8: lam gyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ / de ma thob kyi bar du mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / 'byung po dang / nad rims kyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ oM na mo many+dzu shrI ye/ na mo su shrI ye/ na mo ud ta ma shrI
305b1: ye swAhA/ / phyag bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// i ri mi ri/ d+ha da mem/ b+ha drA pa laM b+ha ba tu swA hA// gos
305b2: phrugs gcig la lan song bzlas brjod byas te/ mi ya rabs sam/ slob dpon nam// gzhan gang yang rung ba gcig la byin na zla ba phyed phan chad kyi gos phrugs brgya thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nor zas sam/ rkang 'gros
305b3: gang yang rung ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o/ / gos brgya thob pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// oM na mo sha ba ra na ma swA hA/ so rtsil sngags 'das btab ste/ khar bcug na gang la bltas
305b4: pa de dag dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / mi dga' bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i
305b5: sman la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+yathA/ a ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru// lag sa ki li ka li ku lu ku lu/ b+ha ra b+ha ra
305b6: b+h+r-i ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru d+hu ru/ b+ha ya b+ha ya/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba karma a ba ra Na dza ni me sha pra b+ha ya sAd+d+ha/ dz+wa la ne bi d+ha ni be sAhA/ ku ru pa tsa li swA hA/ sa ga ra/ sa ma bi ro sA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+NI te swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i tshig
305b7: ni 'di yin te/ nang bar langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig lon pa'i tshe las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// spyan lnga yang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// de la mig nad 'byung bar
305b8: mi 'gyur ro/ / lus la nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// yid kyi nyes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// spyan lnga yang rnam par dag par 'gyur/ de bzhin du yid rnam par dag pa lnga yang thob par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams cad du sangs
306a1: rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bku byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed/
306a2: pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// lus mdzes par 'gyur ro// sems dang bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa pad ma'i spyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad yongs su sel ba'i de bzhin
306a3: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ne/ bi sho d+ha ne ma ma sarba pA ba bi shod+ha ne/ shud d+hi bi shud d+he/ sarba karma a ba ra Na bi shud d+he swA hA// rigs kyi bu
306a4: 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gang gis gzungs 'di'i yi ge 'am/ / tshig gam ming ngam// thams cad chub par 'dzin na pa de bskal pa 'bum phrag bcu bzhir tshor bas dran par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang la myur du/
306a5: phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du bsod nams zad par mi 'gyur ro// ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la
306a6: phyag 'tshal lo/ / ma~M mo kha mu Shi/ ta mA Sha/ dzi mu khi mahAsa? m+b+ha khi tA thA ga tA mu kha s+t+ri tan/ chen d+ha chen// b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ swA tA nA~M gats+tsha swA te swA hA/ mad me dang / brtaka dang / gagon ring po la lan nyi shurtsa gcig bzlas pa
306a7: labras te bgegs na mcher ba'i sman zhi par 'gyur ro/ / chom med do// sman zhi pa'i ga'adus rdzogs s+ho// // kon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
306a8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsreg gsol 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tat+ya thA/ hu re c-ir/ muT ga ta ne swAhA/ tshog ni lag pa la bzlas brjod byas nas lto mnyes na mazhu ba'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
306b1: mazhu ba'i nad 'byung ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du gzigs la phyag
306b2: 'tshal lo/ / tadzaSh+Tha/ dI ri ti// taskar bad d+has/ ma tsa la ma tsa la sA hA/ lan bdun brjod de/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la gsol ba btab na ma thams cad byams par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa snang ba thams cad rabatsun
306b3: bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho/ / / dkon mchog gsum li phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// oM kum ru ru ba d+hA ri Ni bi
306b4: shras b+ha a gats+tsha a gats+tsha/ la g+hu la g+hu/ d+h+waM b+hU/ hUM hUM/ dzi na dzi ka many+dzu shI ye/ ta ra ya mAM/ sarba duHkhe b+h+yaHphaT phaT/ sa ma ya sa ma ya/ a mri twod b+ha bod b+ha ba/ bA baM men shA ya swA hA// sdig pa
306b5: thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// oM bka ba tse/ dza b+ha ni/ staM b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ sarba ngo shag nas ni swahA shar phyogs su
306b6: bltas te 'dug la/ sngags 'di brjod cing rang gi lag pas sna bdun gdong la blags nas tshogs kyi nang du song na khros pa dga' bar 'gyur ro// khro bzhi par byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // 'phags pa
306b7: khro ba zhi par byed pa'i gzungs dpal chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ / ka taM bi ka te/ ro sha pra sha ma ni swA hA/ gang khros pa'i mdun du brjod na/ de'i khros bzhi nas nges par 'ong ngo // khros pa zhi ba'i gzungs/
306b8: rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ u shrI Sha ya d+ha re/ rin te swA hA// ma bsgrubs kyang las thams can 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'gi'u wad las lan brgya rtsa brgyad
307a1: bzlas nas dpral bar thig la byas na gang bltas pa de dga' bar 'gyur/ mig ci la lan brgyaH brgyad sngags te mig la bsdus na gang dang / phrad par bya ba de dga' bar bgyur ro// bye ga la
307a2: lan bdun bzlas te 'thungs nam bsgyangs bor zas rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / tshogs pa'i nang du 'gron bdag gi gos kyi mtha' ma nas lag pa ga yon pas bzung la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas
307a3: tshogs pa'i nang dus ngan tshig btsun por 'gyur ro/ / tshig btsun pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+yathA/ oM ma le kA la~M a le kA li mu da tsi taM swA hA/ (
307a4: ma la bltas te/ tshul sngags 'di 'i nadun btab ste/ phyogs ban+d+har gtor na bdag bsrung bar 'gyur ro// bdag srung ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // 'phags pa yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba/ sangs
307a5: rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ / na mo b+ha ga ba te/ uSh+Ta Sha5/ d+hA re da nga na ti ye b+hU hA/ sa bsgrubs kyang klags pas 'grub ste/ gi rkang la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te dpral bar thig le byas na/
307a6: kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// ti tsa la sngags te myig la bslus na/ gang bltas pa mig spyad 'thun no// tshul sngags te 'thungs na gzhan rnams zas ster snying 'dod do// yid du 'ong ba'i gzungs
307a7: rdzogs s+ho/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// oM b+ha ga sa timr-i tiSh+Thi ti/ ba la ba per ma sidaHAH// chag ni zhag bdun gyi bar du na re zhing 'phags pa stan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis na
307a8: pAr chu byor gang la lan bdun sngags kyis btab te 'thungs na/ nyin gcig kyang yi ge shu lo ka sum brgya lobs so// zla ba gcig gi bar du byas na mi 'am ci dang 'dra bar mgrin ba snyan par 'gyur te/
307b1: bi tsis zabar mi bya'o// mgrin pa snyan pa'i gzus rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ches gras
307b2: dang ma dang / yud tsam kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// taHn+da/ na/ tre/ sarba ti ni srang ta/ sarba twa thA u ta/ na sha ni ma/ sa si tan naM/ brtan stu hA// de'i tshig ni phyogs gang du 'gro 'ad kyang rung // dpal na bdun
307b3: brjod nas song na dan thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / don thams cad grub pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// sa la phyag 'tshal lo// da/
307b4: 'dunas phyag 'tshal lo// na mo ha ri d+hi ya/ tari d+hi kum rigo re/ gan d+hA ra~M/ tsaN Da la~M/ ma ti ke/ ka li ka la~M/ che ga mo zhig gis te te/ kha ra ba ra/ btsa ba tsa/ a ba tra ya/ mu nA ya/ che ga mo zhig gi se sha man+ta sa swAH
307b5: oM baH/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa li ma nAn/ de bi sarbas skA ka ri ni dza~M/ tal ta 9/ dz+wa la dz+wa la swAH/ 'di'i tshig ni grags pa tsam gyis ma bsgrub par las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ gdand dang / rims ldang can de /
307b6: rol sa dang / gdon rnamam pas par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad kyis btang bar bgyur ro// dpes grod du song ska lan badrin zas brjod byas te/ dong la thugs na pas rnyed par 'gyung // khrel bcwas
307b7: brjod byas na gags 'gyed pa'i tshal na thebs par 'gyur ro/ / lo ma'am me tog gas/ 'bras bu la sngags nas su la byin pa de dga' bar 'gyur ro// las grub pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// dug zhi bar byed pa zhes
307b8: byab/ bdud rtsi sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun la phyag 'tshal lo// taHthA/ oM su ru su ruka/ ba ra ba ra ke/ bi re ti ri/ shud d+he bi shud d+ha swA hA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bden pa dang / gzing rjid kyis klu'i dug dang / sbrul gyi
308a1: du dang myur ba'i dug dang / / khardzas kyi drug dang / rtsa ba'i dug dang / gcan can mche ba'i drag bcom mo// dug nges par bcom mo shes brjod par bya'o// drag thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// 'phags pa
308a2: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ / ta re te re ta ra ya/ b+ha ga ba te/ ban d+ha mo tsa ni swA hA/ 'phags pa'i sngags de bzlas brjod byas na bcings pa las grol bar byed do// bcings pa las grol ba'i gzungs rdzog s+ho//
308a3: 'phags pa bdud thams cad skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// oM sarba ta bA ga ta ma ni sha ta d+hi ba ti/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+hAm d+ha tru ga r+b+he/ ma ni ma ni ma hA ma ni/ hri dA ya ma na~M sA hA// sngags
308a4: 'di brjod pas dkar po'i phyogs kyi lha rnams dga' zhing bsrung ngo / / nag po'i bdud thams cad dang nga zhing brgyal lo// dregs pa ma rungs pa rnams skrag pa dang brgyal lo// bdud skrag par byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //
308a5: rma 'byor par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ubs ubs sum sum/ sarba nan rbad swAhA/ hUM phaT/ sha ma shan ti ku ru ye swAhA/ lan gsum brjod de rmal mchil
308a6: ma byugs na rdos phog pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang / rtsa chad pa dang / klad pa chag pa rnams sos par byed do// rma 'byor par byed pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// me'i zug rngu rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs// bsil mdzad chu yi
308a7: lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ / oM b+h+ra ma ni b+h+ra ma ni/ dz+ha ri b+h+ra ma ni swA hA/ zhes lan bcu gcig brjod de mchil ma byugs nams tshig pa'i zug rngu zhi'o// me'i zug rngu rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// mkhris pa'i nad sel
308a8: ba'i sngags/ dkon mchog ga sum la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo hi du he ge swA hA/ bsil yab kyis lus la g.yabs na mkhris pa'i nad dang / mig ser dang / g.ya' ba'i nad sel bar byed do// mkhris pa'i nad sel ba'i
308b1: gzungs sngags/ rdzogs s+ho// // bad kan gyi nad sel ba'i gzungs sngags/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// oM shan ti shan ti/ b+hi ti shan ti/ sarba bi ti mu la myags swA hA/ zas mthub
308b2: dang spros pa dang sman nad dang / chu dang khrag skyugs pa dang / bad kan gyi zug gzer rab tu sel lo// bad kan gyi nad sel ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// k+Sha ya'i na sal
308b3: ba'i sngags/ na mo hi tu he ke swA hA/ lus la ni bdun nad khod skams kyis btab na bsil yab la chus gtor te/ lan drug bcu rtsa gcig sngags nas de'i lus la g.yabs na nad med par 'gyur ro/ k+Sha ya'i nad sel ba'i
308b4: gzungs rdzogs s+ho/ / // 'phags pa rims dang srog chags kyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// oM dza dza re/ paR+Sha sha ba ri swA hA/ na maHsid ha bya g+ha rak+Sha ta rak+Sha/ kha thin
308b5: drA me kha me kha/ tsan ti ti ba ta ye/ ro ga ni dI ba sa ta ye swA hA/ dril bu la lan bdun bsngags te/ gang gis sa phyogs su dkrol ba dang / bya dang / gcan zan dang / srin bu dang byi ba dang / rims nad thams cad bsrung bar 'gyuraro//
308b6: rims nang srog chags kyis mi tshugs pa'i/ gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// s+yAd ya the dan/ kha Te kha Te/ kha Ta bi kha Te/ tsa le bi tsa le/ bi lam be/ ba le ba le ba te/ tsan dre tsa ra Ne a mr-i
308b7: ta nir g+ho she/ rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus bzhi par gyur cig swA hA/ nad pa'i sman la gdab bo// stod chen mo nas phyung ba sman la sngags kyis gdab po/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'dra
308b8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi lha be dUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ oM b+he Sha dz+ye b+he Sha dz+ye/ ma hA b+he Sha dz+ye/ b+he sha dz+ye sa mu ga te swA hA// sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la
309a1: sngags kyis ga pa rdzogs s+ho/ / rtag ga dang / athab rnamanaH/ ba sa dang / mtshagathapa pa gas sngags/ bcom ldan 'dasas las nga na sul rtswag sa/ na brjon
309a2: pa byed pa gzi brjid rgyas par byed pa/ longs spyod 'phel bar byed pa/ dbang phyug 'phel bar byed pa/ 'khor 'phel bar byed pa/ tshe 'phel bar byed pa/ dgra zhi bar byed pa bgegs zhi bar byed pa'o// dkon pa chog gsum
309a3: la mchod pa phul la sems byams pa la gnas pas dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o/ / 'di lta ste/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM shang khi ni di bi/ a ga ts+tsha a gats+tsha tiSh+Tha d+hane d+han dzA ye/ bI bI bId d+he/
309a4: ki ri/ d+hi d+hi d+hi ti ka ri nan/ bi bi tA/ be sha pa sta a yu d+hA rin yU yu/ a yut+pa la ne/ tathA ga tA sma ra pa d+hi tsi ta ta/ ma tI la po dang / de nyi ma pa na shad khi ni sAH// bdag dge ba 'di nyid kyis sprul pa'i sku 'di nyid du mthong bar gyur
309a5: cig stong pa nyid la bzod pa thob par gyur cig/ stong pa nyid kyi don mthong bar gyur cig/ stong pa nyid kyi don byed par gyur cig/ 'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa mchog/
309a6: thob pa rdzogs s+ho// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs// bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM mu ni d+harmA/ saM gra ha d+ha me/ a nu kra
309a7: sa/ / pa pAm+b+ha m+b+ham+b+haH te/ ste bu man par brtan / sarbag tuba'i ban / sam chub brtan / oM badz+nyAH te m+b+ha tim to / 9u0f7f/ em dbyung mi pa la
309a8: swAhA/ 'di gzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi
309b1: pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho/ / / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
309b2: taHthA/ oM pra dz+nyA pra dz+nyA/ pradz+nyA a pa b+hA sa/ pra dz+nyA pa la ga ti sarba d+harma ad d+ha ka ra b+hi d+ha mA ni/ sid d+ha su sid d+he/ sid d+hAn tu maM b+ha ga bA ti/ sarba dz+nyA na sa na d+ha ri/ b+ha ga bA ti bde tsha la/ pra sa ra d+he hasta ma ma su ka ra/ sid d+hi sid d+hi/
309b3: bad u0f7f/ 5pa/ spel / 89/ ba ba/ dz+ra gaH/ a ga sa gan byug ma b+hi ma swa hA/ di ga rgya bas shes rab kyi pa rom tu phyin pa stod phrag nyi shul pa bzung bgazung / sa kyi TI sa
309b4: byang bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes
309b5: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ oM hriHshru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye swA hA/ pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA ye/ sarba turga ti sho d+hA ya/ rA dzA swA hA/ 'di gzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa gzung bar 'gyur ro// bltas
309b6: ngan pa sna tshogs kyang bzlogs so/ / las kyi sgrib pa dang ngan song thams cad rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // pha rol du phyin pa drug gi snying
309b7: po'i gzungs/ 'phags pa yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// na me d+harma k+Sha ya sa~M b+ho ga kA ya/ ni ma Na kA ya/ tad+yaSh+Tha/ dA/
309b8: na pa ra mi tA/ shI la bA ra mi tA/ k+Shan ti bA ra mi tA/ bIr+ya bA ra mi tA/ d+hA na bA ra mI tA/ pradz+nyA pA ra me tA/ sarba d+harma shU n+ya tA sA hA// 'di bzung bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug bzung bar 'gyur ro// stong nyid yid la byas par 'gyur ro// rtag tu
310a1: bzlas brjod byas na chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ / mtshams med pa lnga byang bar 'gyur ro// bltas ngan pa thams cad kyang mi sdig go// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po'i gzungs/
310a2: rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin pa'i snying po 'di lan cig thos pas sbyin pa thob par 'gyur ro// oMn ma s+t+rai b+ha ga ba ti d+h+wanA d+hi pa te swA hA// tshul khrims kyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas tshul
310a3: khrims thob par 'gyur ro/ / na maHsarba ta thA ga tA naM/ ma hA ka nA da ma kA naM/ na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai/ shI la ba ri bu na sha ri yai shI la ma ma/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ kin tiSh+Tha sa bud d+ho b+ha ga ban d+harma s+ya/ sa ma dz+nyA na pa ya ti swA hA// bzod pa'i
310a4: snying po 'di lan cig thos pas bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/ a tsin t+ya go tsa ya/ na mo k+Sha na yai pa hu b+hiHta thA ga tA na b+hU ta ko Ti b+hi bi ri ba ra ti ta yai rak+ShaM ku ru tu ru tu ru sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ shAkya mu ni
310a5: sarba ta thA ga ta ma pA ra mi tA dz+nyA na go tsa ro dz+nyA na pa ya ti swA hA/ / brtson 'grus kyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas brtson 'grus thob par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nAM/ ma tsin t+ya bi sha ya nAM/ na mo stu ta b+ha ga ba te bIr+ya bA ra mi
310a6: tA/ bIr+yan ku ru bIr+ye bI r+ye ma hA bIr+yA tathA ga ta/ sarba dz+nyA na pa ya ti swA hA/ bsam gtan gyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas bsam gtan thob par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nAM/ oM bi mi le/ nir ma le/ d+hu ne d+hA ne d+hA ne
310a7: bri ye hUM phaT/ shes rab kyi snying po 'di lan cig thos pas shes rab thob par 'gyur ro// na maHta thA ga ta ya/ a pa ra mi ta dz+nyA na go tsa ra ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ dz+nyA na pA ra mi ta ye/ dz+nyA nA me ku ru
310a8: ku ru bi gAn ta s+ya/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ hi hi hi hi/ dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA/ hUM hUM phaT/ pha rol du phyin pa drug bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs// rdzog s+ho// // pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i snying po 'di lan cig thos pas pa
310b1: rol du phyin pa bcu thob par 'gyur ro/ / na maHsa pa ta nAM/ ta thA ga ta nAM/ da sha bA ra mi tA pa ri prA ra kA ni nI// pha rol du phyin pa bcu thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho//
310b2: 'di lan cig brjod pas byams pa thob par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nAM/ tsu nu tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ kA ru NA/ kA ru t+ya tsid ta mud pA pa ya/ b+ha ga ba te sarba b+ha ya me nA sha ya swA hA// 'di lan cig/
310b3: brjod pas snying rje thob par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ nA mo b+ha ga ba te sarba satwa pra yai hUM mra di te swA hA// 'di lan cig brjod pas dga' ba thob par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga ten+d+haM/ ma tsin d+hu bi shan+da
310b4: o tu ru tra ru traM/ hu lu hu lu/ mu lu mu lu swA hA/ 'di lan cig brjod pas btang snyoms thob par 'gyur ro// na maHsa ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ A nu ga te oM ku ruM gi ni swA hA// tshad med pa bzhi thong
310b5: par 'gyur ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM mra ni d+harme/ sa gra hA d+harme a nu gra ha t+yeH'i mug
310b6: tit+ta larme/ sa dA a nu gra h+Na d+harme/ bai shra baN+Da pa ri ba d+harme/ sarba ka t+yA pa ri pra ma Na d+ha me/ sa ma tA pa ri brta nA d+harme swA hA/ oM pra dz+nye shru ti smi ti bi dza ya d+hId+har NI ye swA hA/
310b7: 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bzung bar 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs
310b8: rdzogs s+ho/ / / @#/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// oMn+ti/ na maHsarba bud d+hA mAM/ oM mAM
311a1: ta yASh+Ta/ 'di bzung bas 'phags pa phal po che bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'dri ba dang klog pa la yang dang 'phrag/
311a2: 'phags pa bal po che bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs sos+ho// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// namaHsa man bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti taH
311a3: shwA sa nAn+tu/ oM kaNakaM Ni/ ta thAg ta ud b+ha ba shAn te bar du ud tam ud tama?/ tathA ga ta/ ud b+ha ba hU~M phaT swA hA// 'di gzung bas 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i
311a4: mdo thams cad rdzogs par blags shing kha ton du byas par 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro//
311a5: phyag rgya rnams kyang shes par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i snying po rdzogs s+ho// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// nam
311a6: n+nanad+hA/ m+b+ha b+h+yaH/ d-i bas 'phags pa'i 'dzin gyi rgyal ba
311a7: 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs// rdzogs s+ho//
311a8: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo// oM bi shu ne swAhA/ 'di ni zung na 'phags pa rma bya chen mo bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa
311b1: ma bya chen mo'i snying go/ rdzogs s+ho// / dgon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// namaHsa man+ta bung d+hAn/ ma prati ta shwA sa nAnA oM ma Ni dang / badz+raN+Dim hA pra nyas pa/
311b2: la na// sbyin na smras
311b3: rdzogs s+ho/ / / 'phags pa lang kang gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad par bya'o// taHthA/ yo bdam/ bdame pa/
311b4: na tan/ tsu lu tsu lu tsamra/ bral bul bulayule yu la yul/ ba le ba le ba le/ sa man/ gan d+henang/ man te/ bram te/ den kA k+ShaH/
311b5: blo gros chen po rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags kyis tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed na/ lha'am/ lha mo 'am
311b6: klu'am/ klu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin nam// gnod sbyin mo'am/ lha ma yin nam/ lha ma yin mo 'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ nam mkha' lding mo 'am/ mi
311b7: 'amachi 'am/ mi 'am ci mo 'amalto 'phye chen po'am lto 'phye chen mo 'am/ dri za'am/ dri za mo'am/ 'byung po 'am/ 'byung mo'am/
311b8: bral bum man/ grul bum mo 'am/ shaza'am sha za mo 'am/ gnon pa'am/ gnon mo'am/ brjed byed dam/ brjed byed mo 'am/
312a1: srin po 'ag/ srin mo ga/ 'phra me po 'am/ 'gra men mo ma/ mdas 'phrog pa'am/ mdangs 'brog ma'am/ lus srul po'am/ lus srul mo'am/ mi'am/
312a2: mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis klags mi rnyed do// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag klog par byed pa des lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad klags par 'gyur ro// sngags kyi tshig
312a3: 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis srin po la sogs pa rnams bzlog pa'i phyir gsungs so/ / 'phags pa la dkar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad klags par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags/
312a4: rdzogs s+ho// / ye d+ha mA he tu pra b+ha pA he kye n+te ldan u0f7fthA ga to bya ba daH/ te ny+tsa yon ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shram NaH// maM b+ha la b+hal// / u0f7f/
